ProductName: BENGOO G9000 Stereo Gaming Headset for PS4 PC Xbox One PS5 Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones with Mic, LED Light, Bass Surround, Soft Memory Earmuffs (Blue)
Review: Sound QualityThe sound quality of the headphone is good for the money, I would say for the price, I've rated it 5*. The bass is good and rich, I found them superior to in-ear headphones, which were used before these. Sound is clear, no hiss or distortion experienced.MicrophoneWhile not able to easily experience my voice at the other end of a chat, I have had no complaints about distorted sound, I can be heard well and clearly enough to chat and collaborate during gaming sessions. Having an adjustable arm for the microphone is handy to keep it out of the way while not in use.Noise cancellingWhen not active noise cancelling, they cover the ear nicely which blocks out a good deal of background noise.ComfortThe headphones adjust to a range of sizes, the padding on the over ear speakers is comfortable and can be worn for several hours while gaming, the over ear design helps to block noise helping to immerse yourself in the game.ConnectionsThere are two connections, the 3.5mm jack plug and the USB plug, the USB plug is only there to power the lights in the headphones, however the 3.5mm jack plug is essential for compatibility across my laptop and Nintendo switch. It would be nice if the sound carried over both the USB & the 3.5mm jack plug, but this is a minor point.OverallVery happy with these headphones, for the money the sound quality is very good, it is ideally setup for gaming. The built-in mic does the job well and allows me to communicate with our players well. The lights are a bonus, but don't really affect the performance of the headphones, does look good in the dark though. I would say they don't quite have the depth and range for purely listening to music, for which I have separate headphones. But for action gaming they are ideal.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 January 2021

ProductName: BENGOO G9000 Stereo Gaming Headset for PS4 PC Xbox One PS5 Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones with Mic, LED Light, Bass Surround, Soft Memory Earmuffs (Blue)
Review: This is the first time i have purchased a headset for gaming, but i am very very impressed.  They are extremely comfortable, and really keep the outside sound out.The top of the headset has a large cushioned area for comfort on the top of the head, and the ear pieces have a very soft and comfortable padding that fit perfect around the ears.  The microphone can be moved up and down so you can move it out the way when not needed.The cable appears to be made from a very strong cloth material and not the cheap plastic cables, which im sure will last some time.  There is a inline volume control and mute flip switch on the cable which is very useful.The connection is a standard headset connection and also has a USB cable that can be used to power the headset so it lights up blue, which i don't use.Overall i am very pleased with this, so pleased infact that i brought another 2 sets for my 2 lads to use with their xbox.  Very comfortable, smart design and sound quality is brilliant and great at blocking out the external noises, superb value for money.

Review: Ho acquistato il prodotto per utilizzarlo alla console per giocare in chiamata, devo dire che dal punto di vista delle prestazione è davvero perfetto, i cuscinetti posti ai bordi e sopra le cuffie sono davvero comodi e confortevoli (forse durante l'estate possono risultare difficili da sopportare per via del caldo), il regolatore dell'audio e il pulsante per attivare il microfono sono posti sul cavo in giù e li trovo davvero comodi ed intuitivi, riguardo al rapporto qualità-prezzo devo dire che le ritengo le migliori che abbia mai acquistato e usato finora, consiglio l'acquisto!

ProductName: BENGOO G9000 Stereo Gaming Headset for PS4 PC Xbox One PS5 Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones with Mic, LED Light, Bass Surround, Soft Memory Earmuffs (Blue)
Review: I got this in a rush when I needed a new headset. In hindsight a bit more research would have had me getting something else. As a precursor to the review I feel that it is worth noting that I am very rough on audio peripherals. I don't know why, but they usually last me about 6 months regardless of the quality and price. This is why I choose to buy at a cheaper price point more frequently rather than high-end less frequently.Pros:Price for the quality is greatDecent speaker/mic soundGood quality cable that is at least 6' longSits comfortably on the headStereo/mic to separate stereo and mic connector includedIn-line mic mute switch and audio volume adjustmentCons:The USB is only a power source for the blue lights on the headset (it is a bit misleading in its uses, but if I had researched it a bit more I would have found this out before purchase)The in-line mute and volume knob would be better with a mic gain knob as wellIt tends to make my head a bit sweaty (I have long hair and live in South Texas, US. So it is hard to find headsets that don't do that, but still something to keep in mind)The headset only goes on one way (The traditional right and left side is enforced by the mic only being usable one way. I know I am in the minority, but I like the mic being on the right side of my head)So this is absolutely worth the money, but if you are looking for a high-end headset this is not it. I know my cons were a bit nit picky, and I don't want anyone to think that I regret this purchase. I knew I was getting a quick solution to needing a headset, and I honestly got more than I was looking for. The USB lighting, while completely useless, is a cool addition. The only reason it didn't make it into the pros section is because unless you want to look cool on stream it is wasted resources.So, yea. If you want a good quality headset for a good price this is great for you.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 28 June 2018

ProductName: BENGOO G9000 Stereo Gaming Headset for PS4 PC Xbox One PS5 Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones with Mic, LED Light, Bass Surround, Soft Memory Earmuffs (Blue)
Review: This item is really great for the price! I really like that I can use them on my MacBook, on my HP laptop and on the Dell PC at work. There are so many products that I can't use on my MacBook that it was exciting that these headphones worked. I haven't used them for online gaming, but they have worked great for Zoom and solo gaming.I would love if they came in green too (as that would match the rest of my setup), but at this price, and with the way they actually function, colour is pretty minor. I also found the splitter cord a bit redundant, as I couldn't tell the difference with or without it- but then again, I can't do that on my brother's 100-dollar headphones either, so maybe it is just me. They a tiny bit heavy (I'm not aa big person), but I also find that issue with any noise-cancelling headphones. At least they don't pin my glasses to my head, which has hurt me on my other set of headphones.I'm not sure what people mean by them not being stone enough (at the loudest, the volume hurts my ears bit, so they're definitely loud enough), efficient enough (they do cancel out the noise- when they're on, I can't hear my window AC unit running and my dogs sound muted) or that the mic doesn't work (it has picked up my front door opening in another room when I'm on).Overall, they were a great purchase and I would definitely recommend them.

Review: I've been using the G9000 headset for a few months now, and it's a solid choice for any gamer and works great for online meetings. First off, the sound quality is on point – I can hear every game detail, which ups my gaming experience. The bass surround is like being in the game! The mic is clear, and my friends hear me without any issues. It's also got this cool LED light that adds some style to my gaming setup. The only small downside is the plastic housing feels a bit cheap, but hey, it's a great deal for the price. In a nutshell, the G9000 is a winner for me.

ProductName: BENGOO G9000 Stereo Gaming Headset for PS4 PC Xbox One PS5 Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones with Mic, LED Light, Bass Surround, Soft Memory Earmuffs (Blue)
Review: Auf der Suche nach einem neuen Gaming-Kopfhörer habe ich mich nach Durchsuchen des riesigen Angebotes für dieses Modell entschieden und bin mit dem Kauf sehr zufrieden.Ich habe den Kopfhörer bisher an der PS4, am PC und testweise zum Musikhören am Handy getestet.Die Soundqualität ist gut, keine Verzögerungen oder Abbrüche und die Sprachausgabe funktioniert auch reibungslos.Der Kopfhörer sitzt bequem und ist durch den verstellbaren Bügel auch für große Köpfe geeignet. Durch das Polster oben am Bügel drückt der Kopfhörer auch nicht auf dem Kopf.Das Kabel ist lang genug und hat eine praktische Bedienung für Lautstärke und Stummschaltung.Dazu sieht das Headset mit der Farbcombo schwarz, blau, silber sehr schick aus, insbesondere wenn man es per USB mit der Hardware connected.Alles in allem ein top Kopfhörer für diesen günstigen Preis. Von mir volle 5 Sterne.

ProductName: BENGOO G9000 Stereo Gaming Headset for PS4 PC Xbox One PS5 Controller, Noise Cancelling Over Ear Headphones with Mic, LED Light, Bass Surround, Soft Memory Earmuffs (Blue)
Review: These headphones have excellent aesthetics, outstanding sound quality, estimable ergonomics and a good microphone. Everything was as advertised, and exceeded my expectations. The only downside would be that the materials are not the highest of quality in terms of durability, but that is not a problem if you care about your headphones.I was just using standard Apple earphones for everything, and I would say that these were a definite upgrade. My friends could immediately tell that I had a better quality microphone.The sound quality is also excellent. I listen to a lot of classical music, so it had to play many different elements, but it has certainly pulled through with its crisp sound.For anyone out there who may be wondering if you can use this on Apple products without the traditional headphone jack, you can, as long as you have the adapter that can convert from the lightning cable to the 3.5mm plug.Overall, I’d say it is worth more than what you pay for, and as long as you know how to handle things with care (though it would still be able to take a few good hits). I would recommend to anyone looking for good quality but affordable headphones for not only gaming, but even general purpose. I hope this was helpful.

Review: If you are looking for a gaming headset with a bit of everything.- The light frame(cushion on top) without access to clamping force.- Comfortable ear cushions with proper internal padding and am really happy with that because I don’t like when my ears are smashed.- Multiplatform compatibility with extra dongle available. I'm using the same brand of headphones right now, bought new ones as a replacement since these ones are almost going (I have to keep the wire in a certain place or else the sound dies in one end.) and even these ones that I have now even though like I mentioned they're breaking were better? Probably just got a bad shipment of them because like I said the ones I had before were fine.I would honestly beware on buying these, though, since I thought they were good but after this I'm very disappointed. Review: Pros:LightComfortableDurableGreat Sound quality and basslong lasting batteryusb type cCons:Bad mic qualityshallow earcups depthno swivelHp version....The sound quality and Sound stage are great i have no issue hearing people in battlefield or mw2 or pubg and other shooters even games like deadly daylight or texas chainsaw massacre can easily hear poeple sneaking around in the bushes and the bass is crisp and clearterrible mic quality voice is very compressed and nasally sounding sounds fine in discord as they use a lot of voice enhancement and compression but when using ingame chat with randoms can sound terrible depending on the gameear cups are not deep enough for my liking so i paired mine with some earcups from brain waves as pictured using their micro Swede with memory foam coated in cooling gelnot a big deal to me but cant swivel the ear cups to place around your neck and can make a little uncomfortable for some poeple because of this lacking feature but its fine for meif it had swivel  and a better mic i could give this a 5 star but you could always upgrade the mic to a wireless modmicthis is the hp model as hp acquired the HyperX brand from kingston it would have been nice to be advertised as such as many of the kingston model are still floating around and they are supposedly a bit better sounding headset with a better quality mic but not a huge difference overallalso i don't know why the price jumped from $140Aud for the kingston model to $240 for the hp model guess its just hp being greedy i wa slicky and got on sale for $180 so not too bad but still

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I’m very happy with the all round quality, comfort and experience of this headset. Dita nicely over my ears and sits firm on my head without feeling like my brains are being squeezed out.Sound is phenomenal. For music, gaming and general use. Picks up so much more, sometimes disturbingly so, especially when in a spooky place in game. Music is great, bass is bassy.Quality is top notch. From m the extra long adaptable cord to the decorative stitching along the padded head band. Mic is easy to pop on, and works really well. No complaints from other players about poor quality. And is easily adjustable from the remote that’s attached to the cord (which has a clip on the back so you can pop it on your shirt) also has a handy mute button on the side.I recommend these to anyone who loves seriously good sound even without it’s extra booster button.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Not as good as I expected, clarity is a bit lacking, comfort is great but for FPS the imaging is only OK and the soundstage is fairly narrow.But build, comfort and quality is great!

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Pros:1. Played Rainbow Six Siege with this headset. I could hear ash's footsteps from halfway across the map and could tell exactly where it was coming from. 10/10 for soundwhoring.2. On control panel audio devices, you should click properties for this headset and set the frequency in 'advanced' to the max because it isn't maxed by default. It improves sound quality and crispness a lot.Cons:1. It's very tight and creates this kind of suction when you put it on, which feels like when you're driving to a high mountain top and your ears start getting blocked. It's not really that uncomfortable, to be honest as you eventually forget it's there.2. The firmware updater will tell you the latest version is 0010, and that you have the newer version 0030. This is not true, Hyper X admitted that it was a mistake and that 0010 is actually the latest version. So please go to the website, download the latest firmware update even if it tells you that you're downgrading to an older version.On PS4 it might not work until you update the firmware :)3. Virtual 7.1 surround sound is both a pro and a con. For gaming, it's terrible and messes up the directional audio because it emulates and duplicates directional audio that most games already have. But when listening to some music, it can sound really good.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I have gone through so many head sets , it even tho the $800 ones from other brands like turtle beach had a bit more feature they never lasted me more than few years at best UNTILL I brought my first Cloud 2 head set over 4 years ago. I use Dolby Atmos with my PC as on my console , buddled with that app the sound quality on this head set is amazing,  best thing about this head set is the fact u can replace parts or by new parts ex- mic, headphone ear pads , if needed so u don't need to spend another alot of money buying a whole new head set if mic or other part of the head set fails or worns off ,,  best money I spent ! Worth every $

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I thought it's a lot better then what it is, I couldn't feel the surrounding sounds better then my last headset which was MSI cheap headset,but still the quality is so good but in summer you will feel little hot on your ears after using it for 30 minutes.For listening to music,it's so good ,the microphone is so good,but surrounding sounds are disappointing

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Sound quality is good.Comfort can be an issue, I can only wear these for about 1.5 hours before I want to take them off. Ears/head starts to hurt.The Mic monitoring does not work. There is an option to enable/disable it within the software but it simply does not work. This is the worst part about this headset as it feels like you are wearing earmuffs and it is hard to hear your own voice when speaking which is a strange feeling.I owned the Razer Blackshark v2 before these but my cat chewed through the cord. I prefer the Razer tbh.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Bass could be a bit better but overall these are comfortable to wear, have very good sound and great mic.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I actually liked this headset and when I opened the box and replaced the protection around the earphones from the leather ones to the foam ones, so much better.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: My friends recommended this set and I'm not disappointed.The build quality is excellent feeling very sturdy and comfortable, the option of leather or cloth earcups is a nice addition to hopefully suit everyone (I prefer the leather cups). The weight is more than I'm used to but is still comfortable and I'd rather have a set weigh a bit more than feel light and flimsy.The microphone is adjustable thanks to a bendy wire however it doesn't have the best travel range so you can't just fold it out of your way when not in use, instead you have to unplug it which is a minor annoyance but worth noting.Audio quality is good however bass is lacking and there is no way to control how much bass the headset has, which is something much older Razer headsets had control for. I'm sure there's probably some program that can do it but no control is built in. The surround sound feature I find just muddles the audio to an extent, especially for music, so I don't find myself using it. For gaming the sound is clear and directional audio works fine, although it is a little quiet compared to general media volume, at-least for the games I have played, but this just meant raising the volume up while in-game so no issues there.Arrived very quickly, much before expected arrival date and I opted for free shipping so props to the courier for that one.Overall I'm satisfied. Much cheaper than buying it in stores and is probably the best quality (especially in build) headset for the price.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Basely New

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I have used HyperX headsets since the original Cloud in 2014 and then progressed to the Alpha years later. Both of these headsets were flawless in terms of performance and comfort. Now that the leatherette band on my trusty Alpha's has started to crack/peel after many years of extensive usage, I thought I would treat myself to a wireless HyperX headset...and opted for the Cloud II Wireless.The Cloud II is a horrible step backwards from the Alpha and even to it's predecessor (original Cloud). Despite it being lightweight and comfortable AF, it's performance has been nothing but erratic and frustrating. I've never had to adjust voice chat/mic threshold settings in a game for others to hear me properly...but the Cloud II mic seems to have a mind of its own and only activates mid-sentence, even with mic sensitivity cranked up. Yet it still somehow allows a constant barrage of annoying ambient background noise through. Then without me changing a thing it will work fine for 5 mins....then back to the same issues. The speakers themselves also cut out/stuttered from time to time for no apparent reason. Another not-so-hot feature of the Cloud II is it resets the volume back to low everytime you switch them off/on (why??).As soon as I changed back to my old Alpha headset, the mic/sound issues disappeared. It's hard to tell if the Cloud II wireless is just (hyper)sensitive to RF interference or if the mic is just trash.TLDR - I got a refund for the Cloud II wireless due to very erratic mic performance/connectivity issues and opted to go back to the old faithful Alpha (which is flawless).

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Perfectly serviceable, had no problems with sound quality or microphone, a good amount of gaming hours before needing a charge with enough distance for me to move about the house wirelessly. Earphones are just a tad on the small size for my big ears but comfortable enough that it's not a problem.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Updated review after 3 years of use:Overall its a 7/10, I noticed a year of use sometimes I get loud buzzing noises or screeches that last for a second or 2 and then stop it would happen from time to time but after 3 years it is just gone. The headset overall is very comfy and good for gaming, the mic quality is very good based on feedback from my friends so happy. But after 3 years what can you expect from daily use the foam is falling apart and the mic mute, sound scroll wheel has failed completely. I paid 360 dollars for it when I got it and regret that price. I guess now for 210 dollars its still a good buy but consider my review.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I have had 2 sets of these headphones.  The first set had the USB module die after 2 years. They were also getting tatty so I thought ah well, a new pair won't go astray :)Unfortunately, the second pair also had the USB module die.  I can still plug them into the audio jack but no surround sound any more.  They didn't even last 2 years this time and they still look nearly new as I didn't use them as much as the old pair.Comfortable, good sound, good look, just not durable.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Though Sound and Microphone quality are fine, design and assembly introduce some real head-scratchers (what you have to do after ripping the set off when your pain threshold is exceeded).To be exceedingly fair, this set may be OK for someone with a small head and ears, like children. Straight out of the packet, the design has the earpads clamped together by the arc of spring steel. This means the wider they are forced apart, the greater the force clamping down on your skull. So, the bigger your head, the more pressure. Short of taking the risk of bending parts of the frame out of shape to relieve the pressure (voiding warranty, I am sure), you are stuck with it.To add insult to injury, the next problem is that much of this pressure bears down on your ears, not your head. Unfortunately, as elegant as an oval looks in design terms, the ear is NOT oval shaped! (unless you are a Vulcan...) So, again, unless you have very small ears, the cups will be squeezing your ears into your brain (or so it feels after a long session).To try to alleviate the discomfort, I swapped the faux leather pads for the supplied cloth alternates. What a design joke. It took half an hour of pulling and squeezing to get it done. The genius designer did not just specify a stretch rubber-type retainer that slips over the frame, but, critically, a very narrow channel, about the thickness of a finger nail, that it must slip into. This made the job of simultaneously stretching and controlling the retainer, while trying to get it to slip into its narrow resting place a real nightmare.These headphones were three times the price of my last ones (from a different maker) that I could wear with no issues for hours (sometimes forgetting I had them on). These new ones are immediately mildly uncomfortable, rising to extremely uncomfortable after an hour or so. My old ones lasted me the better part of a decade. I cannot imagine that I will tolerate these for long. Sometimes, even a friend's recommendation is not a reliable review. (I am too polite to tell him what I think, but as I have said nothing about them, I suspect he knows.....)

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I got these to replace my dated earbuds that I use for my phone and Quest, and right out of the box, I was impressed with both the sound quality and design of the headphones.The detachable mic is a great addition, and the extender that connects it via USB is a good alternative for those that don't have access to a jack. The only thing that kept it from a 5-star review was the size.My ears are somewhat large, so most won't have an issue, and even if you do, it's nothing major.Overall it's a great headset for listening to music, watching movies and playing games with.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: My favourite headset i've ever owned. i have backups of this model incase they ever go out of production. Its light, comfortable and sounds good.Durable. all moving parts are made of metal. Very important i've come to realise when shopping for headsets. metal joints dont squeak. This headset i've had for 4-5 years is undamaged. I've slept in this thing many times.If I remember right the cloud 2 has the best stats among its peers for the price point.But the comfort is my favourite part. The mic is usable. I wouldn't complain if a friend used it. but I use a desk mic instead for quality.I have bought new headsets and gone back to the cloud 2.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: There is no bass and every time you move, the cord runs runs against you and you can hear it very loudly in the headphones (heaven forbid you have a tendency to bounce your knee/knees). I don’t know in what world these are supposed to be gaming headphones.You can’t even get immersed into anything because of itDon’t waste your money!

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Best headset I've ever had, super comfy and sound quality is great!

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I love how nice it sounds the surround sound has boosted my gameplay greatly and how comfy it's very adjustable for different head sizes to

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Grandson feedback is they are excellent

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Arrived earlier than the expected date, as usual with Amazon, and packed overly well.  This was a purchase I made for my eldest son, who we're getting a gaming computer built for and so he has followed what his favourite pro player uses and of course we were able to find them on the Amazon site with no trouble.He had always used a different brand previously and was a bit dubious about how these would be, but he absolutely loves this pair and said they are more comfortable, have better sound quality, better noise cancellation and more options for personal preferences. So he is a very happy chappy!!Once again, no problems with this purchase from beginning to end. So please keep up your fantastic work, as you have one very, very gratefully buyer.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Hurts ears after wearing for a while. Also broke within a year.It was pretty good otherwise.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: At this price point its the best you can get comfortable enough to wear for long sessions 4-6 hours at a most with great sound quality for the price point for more money you will get better sound but at this price point you can't go wrong.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Bought theseheadphones in late July of 2022, I was using them very rarely only to watch YouTube. Everything was working fine, until one week later the PC, USB to AUX headphone adapter stopped working, every time, randomly it will stop working. Most frustrating thing ever. I have to reach to the back of my PC, unplug the USB, and plug it back in, for it to maybe work again. My product may be defective but who knows? wanted to get a return however return window has closed. Disappointing Honestly.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Overall great headset for gaming, its light so it doesn't even feel like i have anything on my head. very comfortable with the included fabric foam covering and the sound quality is just great. however, the only problems that arise with this is the foam coverings being a bit finicky to replace and the mic quality. but other than that its just 10/10 would recommend to anyone wanting to get a new headset for gaming.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Good for games be better if the usb amp was compatible with xbox

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Bought it for work purposes, gives me freedom to move around but also the noise cancelling on the mic helps when I’m in the office

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Very comfy for sure, but the sound quality didn’t meet the expectations.Used it to play warzone and the audio sounded muffled. I have another cheaper pair of hyperX that sounds a lot nicer than this.Also, no volume remote if you plug them straight into the controller.Returned

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: If a great mic is what your after maybe don’t grab this ended up buying a yeti mic in the end

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: The microphone, it's absolute ****It functions but if you want nice quality MICROPHONE stay away.The wireless headphone and surround sound is the best though, going to the fridge to grab a coke without having to rip them off my head is one of the best feelings.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: As a wireless (NOT Bluetooth) headset it works really well for Video conferencing and is comfortable for meetings going for longer times.The longest meeting I've been in thus far is 90 minutes and the headset remained comfortable with no excess pressure on the ears or over the head.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Good headset, allows you to replace microphone unlike other brands

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I've been using this headset for a few days now and they've worked wonders, the sound quality is brilliant and is only made better by the HyperX audio dongle, specifically in video games. Outside of this however, the 7.1 enhancement feature isn't the best for watching videos or listening to music, as it does more to distort them, whereas with video games it serves to make positioning and other noises far clearer. Aside from this, even without use of the audio enhancement feature the headset manages to impress with both audio and mic quality.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I use this product for gaming and for work purposes, works flawlessly with discord and twitch, the 7.1 surround amp is on another level, If you play fortnite / realm / siege, it allows you to pinpoint footsteps, i almost felt like i was cheating to be honest.Music is amazing, lots of bass, i normally have to turn the headphones to max volume to enjoy my Metallica, but I found I actually had to have it on 7 - they are really really loud, which is perfect.Do yourself a favour and treat yourself to these, you wont regret it.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I play competitive CSGO and these headphones are really well rounded and provide great comfort and sound quality at the same time. I use Sound Equalisation in Windows settings and can hear a lot in-game. I feel as if this headset is really well balanced for all in-game audio, especially compared to the Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro (which are great headphones, but for gaming I think these are better). Microphone quality is generally quite good, I had a situation where I sounded robotic, but resetting my PC alleviated that issue.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I’m a casual gamer and compared to my old cheap Logitech headset which was more designed for zoom calls this was a HUGE upgrade. I have no frame of real reference but the ability to wander around the house while on discord waiting for a game queue is nothing short of god like. Seems very reasonably priced for how good it sounds!!

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Decent headset, sound is not great even with the latest firmware

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: They sit very tight over the ears which is good but put a lot of pressure on the top of the jaw which becomes very uncomfortable

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: While it is advertised as a universal plug'n'play device, you need another adaptor to use the volume controls etc from the controllers / console.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Mainly using it for PS4 (MW, Apex, etc). Usually solo play, sometimes party chat with mates. Using it for WFH online meetings as well.Sound is great, good surround sound. Comfortable to wear during long periods (my ears fit perfectly inside). Not too heavy. Workmates say the sound is clear, although I look and sound like I'm about to report a crash on the Tulla from the helicopter.All in all - great price for this quality. Arrived almost a week earlier than expected (Melb west suburbs). Good accessories. Highly recommended for any use.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: These work great as budget headphones. The part that ruins it is the static or white noise. When no audio is playing, theres an incredibly annoying hissing sound that emanates.If you have one and you're reading this, you can test it by listening to it with no audio plugged in, then listen to it unplugged. the hissing noise disappears the moment you unplug.That noise is the one thing I absolutely hate in headphones. Such a shame. I heard incredible things about these headphones but none of them mentioned this. My razer kraken pro had this problem but it was solvable with the attached volume wheel. Was looking for a replacement for my Man o' war but i cant even return this because its a product from the UK.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I just love the way it feels' looks and sounds listening to music and playing games I love it and it's so easy to connect to your pc with the wireless dongle.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: I really like this product it was comfortable and all however after a couple months of use the volume dial stopped working. keep in mind I do light gaming once in a while.

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: The product is comfortable only wish the microphone arm was longer

ProductName: HyperX Cloud II – Gaming Headset for PC, PS5 / PS4. Includes 7.1 virtual surround sound and USB audio control box - Gun Metal
Review: Excellent. Works exactly as described. No complaints.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: We use these in our open plan office and they block out the background noise really well. Comfortable and would buy again.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: I have migraines 24 hours a day and doesn't aggravate them.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Good headphones for work calls. Great quality audio.MS Teams integrated controls sometimes doesn’t work but when it works it’s great.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: This headset arrived without an official box but in a plastic ziplock bag. Looks like it was a free headset given with a computer purchase. Very disapointed with this - and given there is no warranty card looks really dodgy and I am surprised this is allowed on Amazon. Will be reporting.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Work great. Exactly what I wanted.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Ligero, cómodo y proporciona gran calidad de audio al receptor y al emisor. Vale como manos libres para móvil por conector jack y para ordenador por conector USB o jack.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: I love how compact it is and easy to bring everywhere BUT it's too tight and hurts my ears. I can't wear for long, it really hurts my ear cartilage.UPDATE: I've used this for a few months now and it has loosened and is WAY MORE comfortable now. I guess you just need to use it for a while for it to be less tight.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Design simple et sobre. Le produit est assez qualitatif et les écouteurs sont confortables (on peut tenir quelques heures sans sentir l'inconfort récurrent chez certains fabricants "entrée de gamme"). En outre, le son est de bonne qualité et les oreillettes isolent assez bien de l'environnement de travail. Le microphone aurait tout de même pu être un peu mieux pensé; s'il reste correct pour ce que j'en fais, on remarque quand même le manque d'aboutissement dans sa réalisation (une simple tige en plastique....).Le raccord USB est très bien et permet d'utiliser à la fois la prise USB ou la fiche jack (sans pouvoir toutefois utiliser le régulateur manuel de son). En outre, il y a là toute les options nécessaires pour les appels etc...N-B: je regrette que le label "made in China" n'est pas été indiqué dans l'annonce. En outre, je trouve que le produit est très satisfaisant, mais très cher pour un produit de cette provenance. J'espère que le temps et la longévité d'utilisation viendront contredire mes premières impressions.Cependant, c'est un produit que je recommande et qui reste de loin mon casque préféré.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: I bought these to replace a basic, aging Plantronics headset.  A world of difference.  They are comfortable to wear for long periods, great sound quality as well as a good microphone.  They are not active noise cancelling and should not really be classed as noise cancelling in any shape or form... the ear covers rest on the ear so have little impact to cancelling noise from the surrounding area.Still... the clear sound, good microphone and being comfortable to wear was just what I was looking for and these fit the bill perfectly.  I do find sometimes that the microphone could do with a Windscreen Pop Filter which can be bought independently, but positioning the mic a little further away helps.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 January 2022

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: 周りに人がいる職場でのWEBミーティングの際に相手に周りの声が入らないようにするため、マイクが単一指向性でノイズキャンセリングマイクを探してこちらの商品にたどり着きました。結果は通話相手に周りの声がだいぶ抑えられて満足しています。また、オンイヤーですが音声もよく聞こえて音漏れも気にならず総じて満足です。注意点としてヘッドバンドの長さ調整幅が少なめなので頭大きい人は小さく感じるかもしれません。私は男性、頭普通サイズですが最大に伸ばしてちょうどいいサイズです。

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: EXCELENTE CALIDAD

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Very good headset. If it was slightly bigger, it would be ideal
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 26 February 2022

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: A bit costly but good sound quality during meetings/calls. People on the other end have been praising how I sound during the calls (Teams, Zoom).Could be a bit uncomfortable for day long calls but good if you have breaks between calls. Average day office work is doable where you use the headphone for 2-4 hours but someone working all day on calls (customer care) would find it difficult to sustain through this headphone. 4/5

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: The sound is clear and the recording from the mic is also great

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Gute Produkt, Sprachqalität ausgezeichnet

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: L'apparecchio è eccellente.Ottima qualità del suono. Io lo utilizzo per i meeting on line di lavoro... non ancora per la musica.Molto comodo il dispositivo per i comandi, simili a quelli di un jabra altoparlante.Acquistato in un momento di riduzione del prezzo si è rivelata un'occasione irrinunciabile.Il microfono aiuta molto contro i rumori dell'ambiente da dove si parla.Consigliato.Molto soddisfatta.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Works perfectly well for office calls. Noise cancellation is to good. The jabra connector is really handy. Price a bit on the higher side. But good things come with a price i guess. Not ideal for hard core music lovers. But music is quite decent.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: niestety po niewielkim używaniu słuchawek w lutym 2024 roku przestały działać - łącznik umożliwiający połaczenie/rozłączenie, głośność +/- przestał działać. Słuchawki działają bez łącznika, ale niestety bardzo słabo.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Los headset dan lo que ofrecen. Buena calidad de audio, ideales para usar en herramientas de comunicación cómo Teams o Zoom. Tienen control de volumen así como para mutear sonido. El cable principal en color rojo le da un toque de modernismo y se tiene la opción de conectar a través de entrada 3.5 o USB.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Good sound quality & product quality. Recommended product.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Das Headset ist angenehm zu tragen. Ist sogar mit Team kompatibel und unterdrückt Nebengeräuche. Kabel ist lang genug. Ist zu empfehlen.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: J'utilise le casque a titre professionnel. Très bon produit

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: This model headset is great the noise cancelling technology even covered the construction noise going on about 10 feet away from my desk. My callers said that they couldn't hear any construction going on.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 31 January 2024

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Me han sorprendido mucho. Buscaba auriculares bluetooth pero tras probar varios modelos y marcas, decidí que aún no existe lo que busco (doy clases de inglés por teléfono y Skype y pido claridad por encima de todo). He probado estos auriculares con el PC y el iPad, en casa y hasta en un autobús lleno de pasajeros hablando, y por la calle en un día de mucho viento, y mis alumnos me oyen perfectamente. Piensa en si necesitas el conector USB antes de comprarlos porque si no, puedes ahorrarte 40€. Si se me rompen, editaré esta crítica. Mi combinación personal para viajar y trabajar es el Jabra Active 65t y estos Evolve 40.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: This product is used for office work and listening to music. The sound quality and comfort level are great!

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Gör sitt jobb men är inte särskild bekväma att ha på under längre tid

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Buon prodotto, le trovo comode per lavoro e sembra che il microfono filtri bene i rumori intorno in ufficio (soprattutto quelli provenienti di fronte a chi le indossa, piuttosto che alle spalle).Purtroppo non avvolgono l'orecchio, quindi non isolano chi le indossa dai rumori circostanti: in ufficio ho quasi sempre il volume a 100%.Molto comodi i comandi fisici per volume/microfono/chiudi chiamata: permettono di agire pur non avendo la finestra della chiamata avanti.Anche il cavo è molto lungo (se considero dall'USB alla cuffia; non uso quasi mai il jack).Se dovessi ricomprarle probabilmente valuterei la versione bluetooth, più comoda da riporre non dovendo avvolgere/srotolare il cavo.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: I use this product every day. It is extremely comfortable for extended use (I use mine sometimes in excess of 5 hours at a time), and without any ear discomfort. Sound quality is perfect for my requirements; VOIP as well as watching films/TV and listening to music.The microphone yields excellent quality and people often compliment the clear sound at the other end of VOIP and broadcasts. The only very minor gripe is that moving the mic to and from the useable position is extremely noisy so you have to mute before doing so.The flexibility of both USB (for PC) and audio/jack (for phone) is welcome, although you lose the mute capability when you detach the controller, necessary for jack use.The controller is very simple to use, although I tend to only use three of the buttons (volume up and down, and mute. The busy light is a great feature though I don't have much use for it myself.The red lead from the headset to the controller is very sturdy and I've snagged it by accident a few times and without issue.The earpads feature a tilt mechanism for greater comfort that may explain why these are more comfortable than other headsets I've used.I've rated everything 5 stars, with the exception of the value for money at 4 stars. I did this only to indicate that these headsets are not as cheap as others, but in all fairness that difference in price is likely at the expense of quality in the other units.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 February 2019

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Using them for Teams and Skype. Work very well. Sound is OK on Teams but I think that's a Teams thing as opposed to the headphones. They sound great when I listen to music or watch videos. They are comfortable, but I don't think I could wear them for hours on end or all day. They're great for short periods of time though. Good quality, light, and the cord is long with mute etc...  I like them!

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Das "JABRA Evolve 40 MS Duo USB und 3,5mm Klinke" passt gut zum Fritz-Fon C5, mit dem zusammen ich es einsetze. Die folgende Rezension beschreibt meine Erfahrungen mit dieser Kombination.Geliefert wird das Headset mit USB-Anschluss und Klinkenstecker. Der Klinkenstecker steckte bei Anlieferung im kleinen Gehäuse für die Lautstärkeregelung und die Telefonsteuerung (Mikrofon stumm schalten, Gespräche annehnmen oder beenden). Dort habe ich den Klinkenstecker abgezogen und kann ihn jetzt ins Fritz-Fon stecken. Das heißt aber auch, dass Lautstärkeregelung und Steuerung nur mit USB-Anschluss funktionieren. Steuerung und Lautstärkeregelung erfolgen übers Telefon. Für mich ist das nicht nachteilig.Der Kopfhörer sitzt bei mir gut auf dem Kopf. Ich empfinde den Sitz als bequem - auch nach dreistündigem ununterbrochenen Tragen. Für unterschiedliche Kopfformen kann man beide Muscheln bei Bedarf drehen und/oder einige Zentimeter aus dem Bügel herausziehen.Der Klang ist tatsächlich dumpf, wie es auch in einigen anderen Rezensionen zum Ausdruck kommt. Darunter kann die Verständlichkeit leiden. Am Klangbild sollte der Hersteller noch arbeiten. Schließlich ist es kein Kopfhörer für Rock- oder Pop-Musik, wo vielleicht der Bass betont sein müsste.Die Zuleitung ist in der Tat etwas steif. Sie ist aber glatt, weshalb kaum Geräusche entstehen. (Ich habe das Telefon beim Telefonieren mit Headset in der Hemdtasche und bewege mich eher wenig.)Kabellos wäre das Headset sicherlich noch bequemer zu tragen. Der Preis wäre dann vermutlich deutlich höher.Insgesamt bin ich mit dem Headset recht zufrieden. Die fehlenden Höhen beim Klang und die damit verbundenen Einbußen bei der Verständlichkeit lassen jedoch nur vier Sterne zu.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: A good quality wired (USB-A) headset. Audio quality is good and the padded ear cups provide a decent seal. The headset is reasonably light. It comes with a hardware mute button, and another button that supposedly interacts with MS teams (haven’t tried).The only small criticism I have is with the cable, it tangles up very easily as it has a natural twist, and is rubber-coated.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Good audio and mic quality.Noise cancelation is rubbish.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Ero alla ricerca di un paio di cuffie da usare in ufficio, comode, con buona qualità audio e funzionali. Queste Jabra Evolve 40 mantengono le promesse e rispettano i requisiti che cercavo. Il plus sarebbe stato la connettività bluetooth ma bisogna andare sulle Evolve 65 con un esborso quasi doppio considerando che anche questo modello non è proprio a buon mercato. Avendo provato altre soluzioni devo dire che sono soldi ben spesi. Il prodotto è ben fatto ed anche alla vista si ha la sensazione di materiali premium. Le cuffie si indossano bene e non sono troppe pesanti. Non hanno una soppressione attiva del rumore ma solamente passiva(isolamento dato padiglione auricolare delle cuffie). Ottima anche l'integrazione con programmi di chiamata vocale online come Skype for Business/Lync con la possibilità di gestire le chiamate (rispondere, mettere in mute, regolare il volume) tramite il controller. Questa versione può essere usata sia tramite connessione USB oppure jack 3,5" dando la possibilità di usare queste cuffie anche per telefonate tramite cellulare. Prodotto altamente consigliato.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: I love Jabra products, we use the conference call device in the office.These headphones are definitely worth it. Bass response is great when listening to music. The passive noise cancellation makes working in the office a little better, although I would prefer to upgrade to some active cancellation. The mic noise cancellation I think is very good, with callers remarking that it sounds like I'm working in a library and not a busy open plan office.However, I have two fairly minor niggles the spoil my enjoyment a little:1. The cable/lead is quite rigid and hard to the touch. Which equates to it audibly banging in your ear, even when it brushes against your shoulder you can hear it through the right headphone. It's rigidity means that it splays out in a wide coil and doesn't just fall to the side. It gets in the way and is quite annoying. Audiophiles beware.2. Not a game changer, but disappointing for such a great product. The microphone is supposed to clip away onto the headband. It does this magnetically, but the magnet is extremely weak. The mic base is attached to the right earpiece and when it twists to fit your ear, the mic will instantly pop off the headband.It's still a high quality product, but if you are niggled by small details I'd look elsewhere.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 May 2016

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Éstos audífonos han cumplido con todo lo que esperaba de un equipo de éste precio. Están verdaderamente diseñados para escuchar voz humana lo más claro posible, ser escuchado con claridad, y para usarlos todo el día. No son lo mejor para escuchar música, al estar configurados para llamadas, la música se escucha plana y no bien ecualizada.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Buena opción para hablar tanto para ordenador como smartphone, la única pega es que el cable es algo rígido y cuando roza con algo de oye mucho y es molesto. El micro bien. Para oír música son regulares, sonido muy plano y sin matices para mi gusto.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Utilisation pour passer des appels vocaux. Son clair et net. La molette pour faire descendre le micro est un peu fragile. Le micro n'est pas réglable d'avant en arrière.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: リモートワークでの会議用に購入しました。比較的頭が大きい方で、ゲーム用に使っているLogicoolのG535はギリギリのサイズ感だったりしたのでサイズが合うか心配でしたが、アジャスターの伸び幅が大きく余裕でした。Teams連携モデルなので、手元のボタンで着信応答出来るのは便利です。少し硬めのケーブルもクセがつきにくくて私は好きです。マイクが左右自在かつ、使わない時はヘッドバンド部にマグネットで格納されるのも良いですね。マイクの感度も問題なく、環境音もいい感じにフィルタしてくれているようです。会話用なので音質はあまり期待していませんでしたが、試しに音楽を聴いてみると思いのほか良いです。中音域重視で高音低音は抑えめなバランスですが、解像度が非常に高く粒の立った音質です。かなり気に入ってしまって、あまり悪いところが見つからないのですが、強いていうならバンド部やケーブルの赤色が朱色よりの発色なのが残念、もう少し真紅や深い赤色ならもっと格好良いのに。お値段だけのことはある、満足度の高い商品だと思います。

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Great headset
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 December 2023

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: El auricular tiene una calidad de sonido 8/10y al tener la posibilidad de usar USB o cable "jack" tipo iphone, puedo desenchufarlo del portatil y utilizarlo con mi telefono con mucha facilidad.De calidad está muy bien, y mejor que otros que antiguos de Jabra

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Pour mon emploi en télétravail ce casque est top. Je l’utilise pour mes visios Zoom, messenger et Meet c’est top. Je l’utilise aussi sur mon iPhone via un adaptateur et la qualité du son est au rendez-vous. Moi qui passe entre 4 et 8h au téléphone par jour je préférai un filaire pour pas avoir de soucis de batterie et le cable est assez long pour pas être gênant.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Ho acquistato le cuffie Jabra Evolve 40 Stereo MS (85 €) per il remote working in sostituzione di un paio di MPOW PA071A (30 €) che si era danneggiato nel cerchietto sopra la testa e nella cucitura dei cuscinetti dopo un anno e mezzo di utilizzo intenso.Sia le Jabra che le MPOW sono cablate, hanno i cuscinetti in simil pelle, il telecomando, l'attacco jack, l'attacco USB A, ecc. In più, le Jabra hanno un peso minore (116 g vs 172 g), hanno migliori prestazioni audio, hanno la cancellazione passiva del rumore, sono integrate con Teams, sono dotate di busy light ed è possibile mettere "a riposo" l'archetto del microfono grazie ad un magnete che lo ancora al cerchietto. Il costo comprende una custodia Jabra.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Das Headset hat eine sehr gute Tonqualität, was - neben dem Tragekomfort - das Wichtigste am Headset ist.Ich persönlich finde den Tragekomfort ebenfalls sehr gut, wobei ich die Kritiken verstehen kann, dass es einigen zu wenig Polsterung ist. Da das Headset aber ausgesprochen leicht ist, habe ich hier kein Problem.Die Verarbeitung ist relativ gut, nicht aber ganz so toll, wie es aussieht: An den beweglichen Teilen ist das Plastik doch etwas "billig". Mal sehen, wie lange das Headset beim vielen Rein-in-die-Tasche-raus-aus-der-Tasche hält.Für den Schutz gibt es eine eine separate schützende Neopren-Tasche. Damit sind auch die unten stehenden Kritiken bezüglich der Geruchsbelästigung erklärt. Der Neoprengeruch der Tasche haftet tatsächlich ein wenig für einen längeren Zeitraum an den Kopfhörern an. Ich kann es nachvollziehen, dass das stört. Ich als Surfer kann man das aber leicht ignorieren ;-)

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Bueno, claro y robusto

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Went through a series of cheaper headphones that would only last a few months.  These Jabra have held up well through heavy use and provide great sound quality for me and those on the other end that I'm speaking to.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: amazing headset, solid in performance yet light in weight,  its usb adapter provides useful features ...

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Works great. The USB adapter gives you control over mute and call answering, the sound is good and the mic is great for noise cancellation. Reasonably comfortable when worn for a long time. Great for work calls. Doesn’t taste great without seasoning.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 July 2023

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: It has good Noise cancellation option. Almost minimising the external sound. After purchasing this my colleagues can hear me clearly. Thanks Jabra!!It is a way costly but worth it!!

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: Ottimo prodotto, buona la qualità del suono, ottimo l'isolamento acustico.Niente da dire.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset, Black, One Size
Review: 耳あて近くのプラスチックが薄く壊れた、買い直すか、ハンダこてでプラスチック溶接するか悩んだが、別の方のレビューで結束バンドを使われているのをみた。修理としてはコレで十分

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: I am pleasantly surprised by the quality of this headset. I use it on both my PC and PS4 (3D Audio enabled). Coming from a neat 5.1ch speaker setup on the PC and a beefy 7.2ch with the PS4, I expected to be disappointed by a budget wireless headset, but thankfully all the reviews are right! It delivers great sound, is very accessible, and budget-friendly.I'm sure there are better options out there if you're already in the headset scene and looking for new one to try, but I definitely recommend this one for anyone just looking to enjoy some immersion without disturbing the peace of the house.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: at first when i bought this product I thought it wasnt going to be the greatest sound quality but i was wrong, this item is the bed head phones I have had. it comfy and sounds great with, the only thing is that the mic isnt the greatest. it sounds little muffled which isnt to bad but noticeable. ( sometimes the audio bug but  not often plus its a wireless so its gonna happen every now and then

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Mostly good. Sounds great and I'd say excellent battery life. Also comfortable over the ears. Only issue is I can't connect via Bluetooth unless using the dongle.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Owned Razer headsets in the past and found them very good so wasn’t let down with this headset.Purchased to use with the ps5 works well just plug and play.Purchased another set for my son to play on his switch.Great little headset very comfortable to wear nice snug fit. Light headset not heavy. Great sound crisp clear.The design of this headset blends in doesn’t look like a gaming headset can remove the microphone and wear out and about while on the go gaming and to listen to Music. Very pleased with this headset you get a lot of features for under $100 money well spent especially for a wireless headset. Keep in mind this is the 2021 older model doesn’t have Bluetooth. The new version 2022 model has Bluetooth. The only thing I could say about this headset is would have been nice if it came with a small cloth pouch to place the headset in when not in use.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Staff in local jbhifi shop agreed this was a great choice for kids on Nintendo switch. Excellent quality and value for money. We bought on sale here & saved lots compared to instore.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: The headphone component of the headset is quite good. Comfortable, decent range (though more for gaming than music) and the range of the wireless is excellent. The microphone is truely disappointing though. It is has such a low sensitivity that it has to be physically touching your face to pick up, and even then the input strength is at times not loud enough to overcome the noise supporession on common voice tools like discord and google meets. I bought these hoping to use them for both gaming, and video conference meetings, but I have had to revert to using my wired headphones for video conferencing and these purely for gaming (where I do not require a headset).

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: First time buyer of a headset as I'm getting into gaming and wanted a headset that I could hear everything clearly through without disturbing my hubby. Well, this is it for me! Can use with or without aux cord, and with transceiver for wireless play. Sound is a surround with a deep tone that allows you to hear everything clearly. Very goods for the price - got this set on special when they were under $100. Only downfall is that I should have bought more sets at that price! I love them!

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Playing my favourite music.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: These are a great pair of wireless headphones for a console - and if I didn't already have a Sony-branded pair, I'd probably be gushing unreservedly.I'm a big fan of the USB-C charging, the charge lasts forever, the volume wheel is great and they're very comfortable.  The downside is the power-on button takes a while to work (possibly to stop accidental pushes, but why not quick on / slow off?).  That's fine, but my big gripe is it mutes the other audio outputs from my PS5 if the USB transmitter is plugged in, even if the headset is off.As mentioned, I'm contrasting this against the older PS Gold headset that I've carried over from my PS4.  If that headset isn't switched on, its USB transmitter doesn't affect the HDMI output to the soundbar.  Switch them on, and the soundbar mutes and you get an on-screen battery indicator for the headset, which is neat.  Switch them off again and the audio goes back to the soundbar.  I don't necessarily expect third party devices to transmit battery data back, but the muting is annoying, particularly as the Razer transmitter dongle is tight and I worry about its longevity if I'm pulling it in and out frequently.That said, I'll keep using it as it's more comfortable than the Sony headset and the volume wheel is more intuitive than the million-and-one buttons on the Sony earcup.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: works really well for going between my MacBook Pro and PS4, however, the plastic around the adjustable slider cracks easily, leaving large chunks of the plastic missing.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Got these for my 11 year old son. Have been a good product for use on his switch lite, can hear the speech and game noise clearly. Can on the odd occasion have the microphone not work, but after a little jiggle will work again.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Very comfortable headset, sound is good and works well with my PS5. However, microphone could do with being a little louder/more sensitive

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: It seems Amazon is selling the older version, at least the one I got is. RZ04-03780.You can identify this by the dongle design (see photo I attached)This headset works perfectly with the wired USB C to 3.5mm cable, and sounds great and mic is super quality.!However problems appear when you connect via the USB C dongle wirelessly.It connects within a second and works fine with headphone sound, however the mic volume is so low, even when you have mic turned up to 100% from windows sound options in the control panel.I uninstalled and re-installed drivers too. then I upgraded the firmware on both dongle and headset to the latest. Still the Mic volume is way too low.In one occasion it disconnected on me and had to re-connect manually to get working.I will monitor this behavior and return this if it continues to do so.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: The bass is punchy, 3d audio works perfect in console, in pc stereo works great, but for more better experience you have to downlod immersive hive software. The fit is little bit tight if you have small head u r good to go else u do need 10 min break after 2 hour. I first tested god of war and “BOY” this headset is a bang for bucks

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Very good sound quality and extremely comfortable material for long hours of gaming.However they don't support the razer app to configure headset and don't have a Bluetooth option so you have to keep USB-C adaptor when wanting to use on phone for music.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Good value for money if you’re on a budget but certainly not top end of the market.Registration for 7.1 surround audio does not work for some reason. Serial number is not being accepted on razer.com.au website.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Absolutely amazing battery performance, Sound performance has been great for gaming and listening to music. Absolute no latency issues. Very light, although its mainly plastic. The only downfall to this headset is the ear muffs themselves are made from low quality fabric that pills as per photo you can see it happening. Not sure how long these will last sadly or if replacements are available.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: I bought this because I needed a wireless headphone. The sound is good for the price you get however I have to turn the volume all the way up to really hear the sound. Made for gaming but would not sound good with music. Comfort is good for an hour so until I my ears starts to hurt because I wear glasses. Mic is terrible, so don't buy this headphone if you want to use it the mic.Used it for 7 months and the dongle receiver just stopped working. Headphone works when I plugged it via AUX. Disappointing that Razer products just doesn't lasts. this will be the last time I get a Razer product. Good thing I still have warranty so returned the product.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: The supplied USB-A to female USB-C cable (Extension cable for the USB-C adaptor) does not work, however if I use my own cable or plug it directly into a USB-C slot, the product works fine otherwise.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: The microphone is terrible, I've tried everything I can bar using 3rd party programs to try to increase the microphone volume.The headset is capable of connecting to your phone with the usb c wireless adapter however I wouldn't recommend it, because it appears the 4/5g interferes with the headset and it just keeps making the reconnecting/disconnecting beeping sound.To get use of the 7.1 surround sound you have to register with razer and download their special app, for whatever reason when i did this i lost some of the sound on the games i was playing, friends could still hear it when i streamed, but i couldn't hear some sounds through the headset.the battery life is alright you do get 20ish hours out of it.After using this headset i won't be buying another razer product.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: It is delivering what it is intended for. Perfect gift for my son. He is loving it and can't stop thanking me.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Good

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: If you use voicemetter it is a little hard to set up but it work all so you need to get the razer app

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Vulnerable to interference,Loses connectivity often and have to reconnect dongle frequently.Auto off when no output for 10-20 minutes and cannot turn this option off.Overall sound quality is not bad but noises occurs at least once a day and it's very annoying.If every wireless headset is like this, don't get one.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: The device connects well. The headphones feel very cheap and the sound quality is rather poor for the price. I tested them against Lenovo H600 set which I was hoping to replace them with, the Lenovo set was far superior sound quality. Decided to patch up my old set and use them.Would not recommend this product

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Great headset, only thing is, a fixed in mic would have been more practical. The detachable mic falls off sometimes.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Like other reviewers, headset band cracked then snapped after only a few wears. Entire build is plastic, steer clear!

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Very good all rounder highly recommended.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: great for gameing and music sound quality is awsom highly recomend

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Was a pain to setup, had a lot of trouble getting the connection between the laptop and headphones. To top it off, it stopped working completely after about a week.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Two months use now and completely unusable. Seemed a good fit to start but the sound quality quickly degraded and the USB C connector easily falls out and no customer support.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Has no sound when I set it up

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Drops out all the time, usb C connection is terrible. Mic is shockingly poor.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: My pS4 gold headset got destroyed by my dog. I didn’t want to pay a ridiculous price for a replacement. These were great balance of price vs function. They work just as good as the gold set for way less money.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Got this one on special and it’s great. Lovey cables and feels very light.Wireless range works through my whole house. Very Happy with the purchase!

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: I only wish I had purchased one of these for me. I'll have to wait for my old ones to break first

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
