ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Thanks

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Using it for 2 years now and the sound and mic is great for gaming and casual movies and music, wireless connectivity is super mine doesn't have bluetooth but works with any phone with USB C dongle, Good quality product and sturdy

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: I got this product a couple of days ago and I am already in love with it! The cups are nicely around my ear and its really well balanced sound. The only problem that I currently have with it is that the mic is too soft. If I had the choice to return it and get my money back I wouldn’t.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Didn't manage to use it coz didn't realize it doesn't have Bluetooth connectivity. Meant for the serious gamers I guess, but just way too many adapters, cables and dongles to mess with. In the end not for me, so returned without opening to local seller*. However, the refund took a while and only after I chased the seller several times or else they don't really bother to follow up even though they know of the RMA.*Important: Please bear in mind returns at Amazon are NOT free, even with Prime! Local returns minimum $4-$6. Make sure to use tracked delivery for returns to have proof of delivery else you may not get your refund. Returns to Amazon International can be a bit costly so keep that in mind when making purchases from the International Store.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Köpte dessa till min dotter och hon är jättenöjd.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 30 November 2021

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Después de 4 meses de uso puedo decir que me encantan.No los he usado muchas horas seguidas, ha sido de forma más ocasional (un par de horas 4 o 5 días a la semana). Me parecen muy cómodos y ligeros y no me ha resultado pesado su uso, al menos de momento. Tampoco se han desgastado ni se han roto las almohadillas ni la diadema y tampoco el micro (y no lo tengo siempre puesto, lo pongo y lo quito según lo necesito).Los he conectado a varias plataformas (ps4, ps5, Nintendo Switch, pc y teléfono). Son muy versátiles, aunque puede ser incómodo conectar el receptor a ciertos dispositivos (en el móvil se nota bastante, por ejemplo, y en el modo portátil de la switch también... aunque ahí molesta menos y solo estorba para el modo sobremesa). El receptor es una conexión USB-C, pero trae también un adaptador a USB, así que no supone un problema grave. Sí es cierto que sería mucho mejor que tuvieran conexión a través de bluetooth, pero yo tampoco lo he echado en falta (tal vez quien utilice dispositivos de Apple sí deba tenerlo en cuenta).El sonido está bien y el micrófono capta el audio también de una forma bastante nítida. Si vienes de unos auriculares de 20€ a estos, notarás bastante la diferencia... pero si esperas más, deberías buscar en gamas superiores.La batería dura bastante, yo los he cargado como mucho una vez por semana. También se apagan solos si no detectan aplicaciones o juegos activos reproduciendo sonido durante unos minutos, al menos cuando están conectados en el ordenador.En definitiva, dan lo que prometen en cuanto a versatilidad y comodidad y su relación calidad-precio es buena, pero no esperes lo mismo que te dan otros de gamas más altas.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Ich hab das Headset vor ca. 7 Monaten für 45€ gekauft und es ist das beste das ich bis jetzt hatte.Positiv:+ Im Gegensatz zu einigen Bewertungen hier hat bis jetzt jeder gesagt, dass sie mich über Teamspeak perfekt verstehen und ich auch nicht dumpf o.ä. klinge.+ Der Klang des Headsets ist sehr angenehm. Auch die Bässe und Stimmen hören sich satt und klar an.+ Das Headset funktioniert Wireless und hat eine große Reichweite. Selbst wenn ich von meinem PC in die Küche gehe, bricht die Verbindungen nur selten ab. Sind gute 10 Meter.+ Lässt sich easy aus und anschalten mit Hilfe von dem Powerknopf direkt am Headset, mit dem man bei kurzem Drücken auch Pause/Play bei Youtube Videos oder Musik machen kann.+ Mikrophon kann ausgesteckt werden, falls man mal nicht mit anderen redet oder einen Film gucke/ Musik hört+ Kopfbügel kann einfach verstellt werden und ist hochwertig.+ Das Polster der Ohrmuschel lässt sich abmachen, damit man es sauber machen kann und die Muschel umschließt das ganze Ohr, so dass das Headset selbst nach einigen Stunden nicht unbequem wird.+ Akku hält ca. 15-20 Stunden wenn er vollgeladen ist.+ Sieht gut aus. Schlichtes Schwarz mit dem Razer Logo auf der SeiteNegativ:- Wenn das Headset nicht eng eingestellt ist, kann es bei schnellen Kopfbewegungen verrutschen, allerdings fliegt es nicht runter.- Ist zwar Wireless, allerdings nicht über Bluetooth, sondern über einen USB-C Stecker, der mit einem Empfänger verbunden werden muss

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: J'utilise ce casque pour jouer à mes jeux pc, mais aussi pour mes appels, et écouter ma musique bref pour tout. Le son est vraiment bien.Positif : léger, prix raisonnable, joli finition, micro et écouteur de bonne qualité, la qualité des câbles est juste top.Négatif : le support bleutooth est trop large, mais du coup j'ai acheté pour quelques euros un hup usbc mâle femelle usbc avec deux femelles, et une mini rallonge usbc mâle usbc femelle pour pouvoir connecter le casque et un chargeur de smartphone en même temps car j'utilise beaucoup mon smartphone. Et pour mon pc qui possède un port femmelle usbc je peux donc le connecter directement, après si je veux être en internet je me sert de la mini rallonge usbc sinon le support bleutooth ne passe pas.Personnellement pour mon utilisation ce caque me convient parfaitement car ces inconvénients ne me gêne pas à moi mais peuvent gêner d'autre personnes.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: Pros: Affordable, Lightweight/Comfortable, Mute Button, Plug and Play, Long Battery Life, Classically Simple DesignCons: Average Sound, Cheap Microphone, Low Wireless Range, Not Very LoudThe headphones are great if you're looking for a modern wireless headset with all the necessary features.It's got a noise cancelling mic, a wireless receiver, a mute button, a volume wheel, breathable earcups and a sturdy lightweight build.The earphones don't get super loud, the volume wheel is extremely limited and the wireless signal does not go anywhere past the room you have the receiver in unless you use the extension. Which is fair but some other headphones on the market do a much better job of reaching other rooms.Still it's easy to forget these headphones are £99 which is the perfect price in my opinion. Some things like the sound quality, the simple design and not so premium microphone hold it back. But it's a great bang for the buck. This is a very solid headset with no frills and gimmicks.Well except one gimmick, they claim you can use these with your smartphone, not iPhones however so bear that in mind. You can plug the USB C receiver into your phone and enjoy them like normal headphones, there's no carrying case however so the microphone and cables stay at home.If you need a decent pair of wireless headphones with modern connectivity and comfort as the focus. Buy them.

ProductName: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Multi-Platform Gaming and Mobile Headset, Quartz Pink, One Size
Review: First impressions are a full 10/10Now only factor is how long it'll last. Build quality is really good and it seems it'll last a long time, but that only time can tell. Don't think twice of getting this.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Fits well, and I have a giant head. Sound quality is great. Haven’t had many headsets personally but it is the best sounding one I have ever had. Voice input quality is also delicious🤙🏼

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Pretty much what I expected, as I have been using Steel Series headsets for quite a few years. Good sound and comfortable to wear. I would recommend.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: This works great on my PlayStation 5 and XboxSX but when I’ve finished using it on my PC I basically have to go through Bluetooth devices and device manager to remove it so I can go back to using regular speakers again. This is a real pain so I bought a HyperX set for the PC and that’s a lot easier to remove. Other than that the quality is really good.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: The battery life is very long and the sound is good. An overall comfortable and good value headset

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I love the product but i dont like the shipping company DHL. They did not deliver the item properly.but still love the product and amazon customer service.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: They sound fine. Very "punchy" sound I guess you'd call it. Many gamers would like this. A bit over the top for my taste.I have a MASSIVE gripe with the software and am super pissed-off to the point where I quite like these headphones but will NEVER buy another Steel Series so long as I live. The software goes by the ridiculous name "GG" and has a module called "Sonar" where all the audio shapiing features reside.You have to create an account to use the Sonar module, therefore you have to create an account to use GG. This can only be because because Steel Series are harvesting every single bit of data about you they possibly can. The main purpose of GG is to load some spyware on to your PC and report on your gaming habits (possibly other habits) to Steel Series.Sonar can make the ohones sound alright but there's WAY TOO MUCH messing around to get things right. They sound AWFUL out of the box, so there's a lot of audio manipulation to get them usable. There's some BS "AI" feature that does nothing I can discern but I guess the marketing department says AI is so hot right now so we need to have "AI" headphones to go with our "AI" washing machines, dryers, refrigerators, toasters, blah blah blah.My gaming buddies tell me the mic sounds great which is awesome but be warned - the mic is EXTREMELY sensitive so you need to turn the threshold RIGHT  UP in the Sonar feature of GG or your gaming colleagues will hear every rustle and scratch you make.And they're very light and quite comfortable. I'm concerned about the build quality but time will tell.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Worth every penny.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: The only downside is it doesn’t automatically reconnect to the bluetooth device (my phone) when I turn it back on.Very annoying.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Overall, the sound has been great for games like Escape from Tarkov using the setting for the game within the Sonar software. Positional audio and sound quality in general are really good.Battery life is much lower than expected. Expect to have to charge every night and also likely during the day if you're using them for a full day + at night. A firmware update made my battery life much shorter which was disappointing. Hopefully a future update will help with this.Microphone, as expected, is relatively average but is definitely serviceable for gaming. Just be aware that it will move itself sometimes due to being retractable and that a small movement in the mic will make your voice significantly quieter which can be annoying at times (classic Steelseries mic problems).

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Fast efficient serviceHappy

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I bought 2 of these to replace the Logitech G Pro X Wireless which has inferior sounds compared to this Nova 7.Also, upon installation of the Steel Series software, updated the firmware of the 2 headsets without any difficulty.Highly recommend.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I've got this too use with my PS5. Out of the box impression were really good. However, after using it for 15 minutes, I've started noticing some weird sound profile, as though as you're playing underwater.When the sound is being delivered properly, it's amazing but when it starts playing up, it becomes weird and annoying.Connected to the PC, installed the SteelSeries GG (latest update), and there was a critical firmware update available. And that's where the issue is. Good luck trying to get it updated.When you click on the update, it'll detect if the headset is connected (via the USB-C dongle), I get that the headset is connected but the "update firmware" button is greyed out.I've tried all possible troubleshooting steps like:- Waiting the headset to fully charge- Disconnecting/connecting the headset- Trying on a different computer- Uninstalling/reinstalling the SteelSeries GG software.Nothing have made it to update.Next step, was to try to get to support. Virtually non existent. Or maybe, literally non existent.There's no "contact us", even though there's a button, you just go to an FAQ page. Nothing there actually explains what to do in case you're unable to update your headset.On their discord server, it's the same. They ask you that before raising a ticket (which you can't anyway), to read the FAQ, and if you still need help, reach out to the community support (community mind you).Created a post, no replies (not surprising because it's a community support) not an actual support, a week goes by and still no support, even after tagging the person who created the support page on discord.I did a bit of research and other people are complaining about the same thing. You can first do a research on the headset and you'll see review sites mentioning the weird sound profile, and other users complaining about issues and lack of support on Reddit.My advice, just stay away from this headset, or SteelSeries altogether because when you need support, you will not find it.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I bought this headphones for work... Very comfortable and excellent quality!

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I wanted to raise the max volume because it's too quiet out of the box. However, I'm forced to install Steelseries' bloated, resource-heavy software that's clearly designed to market their other hardware. Unfortunately, in the end, it didn't even recognise the headset when I had it plugged in by USB so I couldn't raise the volume. Besides the headache of that software, the sound quality and mic quality aren't anything special. Not worth the price. Bloated price point because its 'gamer gear'. Kicking myself that I got sucked in. This is the last time I'll buy gamer-specific gear, never again. Would return this rubbish if I could.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Bought for the wife, when she started gaming. She uses them everyday and loves them.Simple plug and play but has some very useful and advance features with the free software.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I watched many reviews on YouTube and they all say it is a good headset because of all the extra features, but it turns out that the two main functions of it which is the audio quality and mic quality is just worse than many cheap headsets. the comfort is probably the worst thing, it gets hot, is terrible for VR as it just slides off my ears and for some reason they added some heavy metal to the top of the head strap. There was also no mention anywhere that they are noise cancelling.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Used the headphones for pc gaming

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Le casque SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7X propose une expérience audio complète. Son design allie confort et esthétique, offrant une expérience agréable pour les longues sessions d'utilisation. La qualité sonore est impressionnante, offrant une immersion totale dans les jeux, la musique ou les films. La connectivité aisée facilite la mise en place.Le seul bémol réside dans le logiciel accompagnant le casque, SteelSeries GG. Bien qu'il offre des possibilités étendues pour personnaliser le son selon les applications, j'ai constaté quelques bugs gênants. En particulier, un problème où le son cesse de sortir du casque. Espérons que SteelSeries adresse ces problèmes avec des mises à jour logicielles à l'avenir.Malgré ces inconvénients, le casque Arctis Nova 7X reste une excellente option. Si vous pouvez faire abstraction des problèmes logiciels occasionnels, c'est un choix solide.PS : On a même une petite construction cubique en carton à faire ! Une petite déco bien mignonne.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: ゲームに試してみた時に、音がすごかった。敵のステップはどこからか分かりやすくて、ディラーもあまり感じてなかった。

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Fan de la marque steelseries pour leur périphérique PC, voulant remplacer mon arctis 7 de 2017 je me suis laisser tenter par Le nova 7 2022. Que dire ... la qualité n'est pas au rendez-vous, beaucoup trop de pression sur les oreilles, son pas mieux que mon ancien casque même avec l'application (pas non plus gênant, le plus gros défaut reste le ressenti sur le port du casque, inconfort pour ma part), impossible à supporter lors de mes longues sessions de jeux.Je déconseille ce produit aux gamers qui passent x heures avec le casque sur les oreilles.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Works wonderfully. Really love that you can utilize chat-mix. Also super easy to connect to your phone!

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: The headset is super comfortable, more so than the Hyper X Cloud 2 that I used to use. The battery life is great and you can use it wired if need be as well as use it whilst charging.The software (Steel Series GG) offers really good sound equaliser options along with multiple profiles. There is a ChatMix option where as you can turn a dial on the right ear to incrimentally change the volume between the game sound and chat software (I use Discord). This is ideal for when you want to concentrate on the game sound rather than your friends conversations.The headset can be connected to the PC wirelessly, and simultaneously the Bluetooth connection can be used to connect to your phone so you can take calls or listen to your own music whilst gaming.In all this is a fantastic headset and well worth the £129 I paid.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: The mic quality sounds significantly better than any other cheap headset and the sound quality left me speechless. 100% would recommend

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Super happy with this purchase!Sound quality: Top tier, no complaints at all when gaming, wether in chat with friends or playing solo, brilliant at low or high volume also! The 360 spatial audio is wicked on loads of different games too.Comfort: Great! I can where them for an extended period of time and have no trouble. Also, the size extender is easy to use also with a good range.Battery: No issues with battery levels, they last for a good few days before needing a charge and it charges quickly.Features: The microphone pull out is great, it can easily be put back away when not needed which I love. The mic mute is great too with the LED indicator. The party/game volume wheel is a good addition, very handy to have.Connectivity/the Dongle: It connected super easily to my computer, it updated and prompted the software download for me. Then when switching to Xbox it was just as easy and worked perfectly, right away.I’ll also add, making the switch to a wireless headset is brilliant and you should definitely go for it if you’re on the fence, yes they’re a bit more pricey but it’s 100% worth it in my opinion!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 January 2024

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Le uso da circa 2 settimane.Possiedo diversi modelli di cuffie, cablate ( Sennheiser HD 599, le mie preferite in assoluto !! e HyperX Cloud Alpha S ) e wireless ( Sony pulse 3d, discreto suono ma mille volte piu scomode.. )Importante aggiornarle collegandole ad un pc ( nel dongle spostare il tastino su usb o non le rileverà ) e disattivare il limitatore del volume dal software steelseries, essenziale.Qualche piccola modifica all'equalizzatore e prenderanno letteralmente vita.Attivato anche il Dolby su series x.Buon suono, forte e limpido.Possibile aumentare dall'equalizzatore i bassi che possono diventano belli possenti, io ho preferito un suono bilanciato aumentando leggermente i bassi.Le impostazioni del software steelseries gg vengono salvate nella cuffia per essere effettive anche su xbox.Questo non vale per il software sonar, effettivo solo su pc.Durata batteria eccezionale.Comode e leggere, ci si dimentica di averle addosso !Collegamento con bluetooth contemporaneo anche con il wi-fi veloce e senza problemi ( il volume si regola dal dispositivo collegato per il bluetooth, rotella nel padiglione sinistro per il wi-fi ).Cosa importante e comodissima: La console non si accende con le cuffie, quindi è possibile accenderle per usarle con un cellulare o tv in bluetooth senza avviare la console.Collegamento wi-fi con il dongle che non mi si è mai disconnesso o dato distorsioni di sorta.E' possibile comunque usarle anche con jack 3,5 ( cavo incluso )Insomma soddisfatto, valgono il loro prezzo.Unica cosa resta da vedere se dureranno...i precedenti modelli steelSeries arctics tendevano a rompersi fin troppo spesso nel collegamento con i padiglioni....spero abbiano migliorato questo punto debole.Per sicurezza le indosso prendendole dall'archetto per non sforzare il collegamento archetto/padiglione auricolare e le lascio un pelo larghe.Spero durino visto che hanno tutto quello che cercavo senza ( per ora ) alcun problema.Spedizione amazon veloce come sempre, ma la confezione delle cuffie è stata impacchettata senza nessuna imbottitura nel pacco, quindi era libera di sbattere su e giu durante il viaggio...fortunatamente nessun danno.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Po prawię miesiącu użytkowania i przesiadce z krakenów v2 mogę z czystym sumieniem polecić te słuchawki jeżeli łączą się z PC lub konsolami przez adapter, jeżeli chodzi o bluetooth'a to dźwięk jest płytszy ale i tak dają radę. Słuchawki bez zainstalowanego oprogramowania "SteelSeries GG" brzmią bardzo dobrze jednak pełną moc osiągają po odpaleniu "Sonara" i krótkiej zabawie z equalizer'em, można też wybrać gotowy profil pod konkretną grę, oprogramowanie oferuje również włącznie dźwięku przestrzennego co jest bardzo przydatne w różnego rodzaju FPS'ach. Jedyne co mnie trochę rozczarowało to fakt że słuchawki były wcześniej otwarte, prawdopodobnie były po zwrocie. W pudełku brakowało kartonowego ludzika do złożenia. Jako że zależało mi na słuchawkach a te wyglądały jak nowe, nie nosiły śladów użytkowania i grają bardzo dobrze to nie zwracałem ich.Na plus:+ długa praca na baterii około 45h, korzystając tylko przez połączenie z adapterem+ bardzo lekkie i wygodne+ dość dobry zasięg+ możliwość grania, oglądania i jednoczesnego rozmawiania przez telefon+ grają bardzo dobrze bez oprogramowania, wystarczy załączony adapter+ przy rozładowanych słuchawkach podłączenie do ładowania na 15 min daje jakieś 5-6h użytkowania+ dużo przycisków, pokręteł funkcyjnych na samych słuchawkachNa minus:- przy połączeniu przez bluetooth'a dźwięk może rozczarować
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 October 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Das SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7X hat meine Erwartungen für ein Wireless Gaming-Headset wahrlich übertroffen. Die Multi-System-Kompatibilität ist das absolute Highlight dieses Headsets und macht es zu einem vielseitigen Begleiter für Gaming-Enthusiasten.Die Tatsache, dass dieses Headset nahtlos mit verschiedenen Systemen wie PC, PS4, PS5 und mehr kompatibel ist, hat mir das Leben wirklich erleichtert. Es ist großartig, dass ich nicht mehrere Headsets für verschiedene Plattformen benötige. Egal, ob ich auf dem PC spiele oder meine Freunde auf der PS4 herausfordere, dieses Headset bietet immer eine beeindruckende Klangqualität.Die Klangqualität ist wirklich erstklassig. Die Audioleistung ist klar, ausgewogen und lebendig. Die Bässe sind tief, die Höhen sind klar und die Mitten sind gut definiert. Das trägt zu einem immersiven Spielerlebnis bei, egal ob ich in einem Actionspiel unterwegs bin oder mich in ein Story-getriebenes Abenteuer vertiefe.Die kabellose Verbindung ist stabil und zuverlässig. Ich hatte keine Probleme mit Verbindungsabbrüchen oder Störungen, selbst in hektischen Multiplayer-Spielen.Der Tragekomfort ist ebenfalls bemerkenswert. Die Ohrpolster sind weich und bequem, und das verstellbare Kopfband sorgt dafür, dass das Headset perfekt auf meinen Kopf passt, ohne zu drücken.Die Akkulaufzeit ist beeindruckend. Ich kann stundenlang spielen, ohne mir Sorgen um einen leeren Akku machen zu müssen. Das schnelle Aufladen ermöglicht es mir, schnell wieder ins Spiel einzusteigen.Das Mikrofon ist auch von hoher Qualität. Die Geräuschunterdrückungsfunktion sorgt dafür, dass meine Teamkollegen meine Stimme klar und deutlich hören können, ohne von Hintergrundgeräuschen gestört zu werden.Insgesamt bin ich äußerst zufrieden mit dem SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7X Wireless Gaming-Headset. Es bietet eine beeindruckende Klangqualität, Komfort und Multi-System-Kompatibilität auf höchstem Niveau. Wenn Sie ein Gaming-Headset suchen, das für verschiedene Plattformen geeignet ist, ist dieses definitiv eine hervorragende Wahl

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Got this because my Old Arctis 7 headset finally broke. I decided the best option was to go for the Nova 7, because the Pro was double the cost.Overall, this headset performs great. I can tell the audio quality has improved slightly, as well as the Bluetooth being a huge plus, as I can play Music from my phone, and talk with my friend over discord on my PC. You can also just take the headset anywhere, on planes etc, unlike the arctis 7's.There are some downsides to this headset. The main for me is the design. I feel this headset is not as minimalist and stylish as the Arctis 7's, it feels a little bulkier, however it's still very lightweight and the standard headset cushions are very good for breathability. I would actually recommend these over the Nova Pros because I have read many people sweat inside the tight leather seal of those.The use of USBC is also great, I love that they have simplified the charging and now we no longer need a micro-usb cable to charge the headset. The headset band has some adjustability if you have a large head, and there is a degree of customization if you like that.Overall a solid product, and definitely feels like an upgrade from the Arctis 7's. I was a little disappointed these were not available in white as my setup is white, but you can probably buy some kits to customize that. If you have the money, go for the Nova Pro, but for most, the Nova 7 is a completely adequate and justifiable upgrade. 9/10.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Le premier casque sans fil que j'ai acheté de ma vie, n'ayant jamais eu confiance en cette technologie, la pensant trop peu fiable.Et bien je me suis lourdement trompé, ce casque est excellent !Très bonne autonomie, pas de déconnexions intempestive, très bon son et bon micro.Ses fonctionnalités sans fil Wifi et Bluetooth sont très pratique pour travailler ou jouer sur le PC tout en pouvant passer un appel; d'ailleurs la molette permettant de baisser le son d'une appli pour n'avoir que le son de l'appel est super, pas besoin de stopper le son manuellement sur le PC.La recharge est relativement rapide en USB-C et ses différents canaux sont très pratiques pour bien différencier les applications entre elles.Question confort, je peux garder ce casque durant des heures sans avoir mal au crâne et ses coussinets de base sont très confortables.Le + de ce casque qui donne un touche très agréable à l'ensemble : La possibilité de changer beaucoup d'éléments facilement ! (la bande d'arceau, les oreillettes et les coupoles sur le côté, bien que les coupoles soient purement esthétiques)En un tour de main vous pouvez personnaliser et améliorer le confort du casque sans trop de manipulations compliquées, et c'est un point non négligeable !Petit bémol uniquement dû à mon boitier (un Corsair Crystal), le dongle USB-C permettant la connxion est si large que cela me bloque un port USB-A.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Finally got this @ black friday very cheep, very nice!Tip: buy the leatherette ear cushions and voila! they feel exacly like the Arctis Nova Pro Wireless and you save like $200.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 March 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Wcześniej korzystałem z Steelseries Arctis 7 więc w porównianiu Nova 7 wypadają kilka razy lepiej. Jest kilka plusów które zaobserwowałem po tygodniu korzystania:1. Żywotność baterii starcza na dużo dłużej.2. Dźwięk w tych słuchawkach to po prostu mistrzostwo, słuchanie muzyka stało się jeszcze przyjemniejsze jak na słuchawki przeznaczone głównie do gier dla mnie bomba.3. Mikrofon uległ znacznemu ulepszeniu po lekkiej konfiguracji w aplikacji Steelseries mikrofon brzmi o niebo lepiej niż jego poprzednik.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Ho provato altre cuffie prima di trovare quella che fa davvero per me.Comoda: non da mai fastidio e puoi tenerla per ore senza sudare né sentire fastidioPerformante: il doppio collegamento da una parte con la Xbox e dall'altra con il telefono permette di essere sempre collegato contemporaneamente con il gioco e con il mondo e perché no puoi ascoltare la tua musica. A livello sonoro è superlativa a patto di equalizzarla a piacere.Esteticamente stupenda, forme riuscitissime, materiali premium. Nessuno scricchiolio presente invece in tante altre.Dimenticavo, batteria pazzesca, da quando c'è l'ho, ho fatto due ricariche.Super acquisto

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Good quality, comfortable and ideal for gaming that involves communicating with a team.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Voy a intentar resumirlo.Lo bueno:Los auriculares me parecen espectaculares. Vengo de unos Logitech Pro X y estos me parecen mejores. Lo de poder mezclar el sonido del bluetooth con el del dongle me parece genial, puedo tener el discord en PC y el audio de la Switch al mismo tiempo, o estar jugando al PC y coger llamadas sin tener que quitarme los auriculares.En cuanto a materiales se sienten bastante premium, con metal y plásticos buenos y sólidos. Lo único que me parece débil es el micrófono, pero el tiempo lo dirá.La batería dura muchísimo, no es el que más pero no puedo quejarme, me dura la semana entera y un poco más sin problema.Son bastante cómodos, puedo estar horas jugando y no hacen daño ni me molestan, aunque hay un pero que comentaré ahora.Lo malo:Aunque sean cómodos no se fijan bien a la cabeza. Si miro hacia abajo mientras hago cosas por casa, me da la sensación de que se me van a caer. No se caen, pero quedan flojos y se mueven algo. Además lo de poder girar los altavoces em su propio eje nunca me ha gustado, me cuesta un rato quedarme cómodo.Por otro lado, como otro punto negativo, es la aplicación de Steelseries Sonar. Es lo más complicado que he visto en mi vida. Una vez lo instala te crea un montón de salidas de audio, una para gaming, otra para media, otra para chat y otra que ya ni recuerdo que era, y crea un par para la entrada de audio.Cada vez que inicio el ordenador me vuelvo loco para intentar escuchar el discord, cuando consigo eso me cuesta horrores escuchar el juego porque sale por otro lado, un horror. Al final he optado por usar la propia salida básica de los auriculares e ignorar sonar, he activado dolby atmos y a correr, ni he jugado con el ecualizador porque no quiero tener lío cada vez que quiero sentarme un rato al PC.En resumen, los aconsejo pero si no tenéis paciencia para la app pasad de la parte de Sonar.Por cierto, si no os lo detecta es porque el dongle seguramente esté en modo Xbox (si la luz está en verde), hay un pequeño botón que cambia la luz a blanca y ese es el modo PC. Una vez hagáis esto ya os detectará y podréis desactivar desde la aplicación (en la parte de Engine) el ChatMix que me parece horrible.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: After my previous reptilian headset randomly died, I hopped onto the Steel Series Nova 7X after hearing good things.Straight out of the box, plugged dongle into xbox and everything came alive, quite effortless.The headset is a tidy piece of kit, feels good in hand and for the price I think it's what you'd hope for, no sense of cheap plastic.Initial impressions in use, it sounds good but the bass feels flat/restrained, not something I'd expect in a headset with this price tag but equally "Gamer" audio is often tuned for the high end details to find footsteps etcI also found a lack of mic monitoring a little jarring at first, unable to decide if I'm shouting in the outside world or not.Jumping onto the play store to find the steelseries app, assuming I can tweak things..after multiple search terms etc I found no such app.After hitting Google, it seems I need to plug the USB dongled into my PC and download the SteelSeries GG app (skippable registration)From there I was able to set the headset EQ, and just using one of the presets (i liked "Smiley") the headset absolutely came into its own.. bass strong enough I felt the headset vibrate on my head, while delivering crisp highs, also in my clicking around I was able to turn off a volume limiter (probably best left turnee on, it can get painfully loud!) And while I saw no direct toggle for it I also seem to have turned on mic monitoring.In use, comfort is very good though I did find it made my ears feel quite warm, it's also a 27c day so I'll not pin that on the headset.All in all, excellent headset far superior to my previous but its 2023 and Steelseries doesn't have a mobile app for it? What on earth!!!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 March 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: ゲームで音がする方角が分かりやすい感じがしました。公式から別途ソフトを導入して使用する必要があります。ただ時々なにかの合図、通知？の音がするときがありそれが気になります。一応設定で通知なしにしてるはずなのですが。

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I love the headphone and all its features but unfortunately it is a bit too loose for me

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: On va pas perdre de temps et aller à  l'essentiel- Confort : au top bien mieux que des corsair void  ou l'ancien artic 7 qu'il remplace- Autonomie : première fois que j'ai un casque qui tient aussi longtemps (on est largement a plus de 24h d'écoute continue )- quand on le porte on est comme dans un oreiller c'est super agréable- le réglage de l'appui tête est bien pensé et s'adapte facilement-Qualité du son très bonne pour du sans fils , cela ne vaut pas du filaire hifi mais pour du sans fils on est proche du mieux que l'on puisse espérerEt la on va parler des 2 défaut à mon gout- SteelserieGG  obligatoire car sinon sous discord le micro va couper donc obligé de mettre le soft et d'activer sonar- Toujours sur le soft être obligé de créer un compte c'est juste dépassé- Le micro : il n'est clairement pas au niveau des casque Corsair et  Sennheiser  pour moi il est trop court , on ne peut pas le mettre pile devant la bouche et donc la captation du son est limite limite  ce qui fait que si vous le bougez un poil trop bas ou trop haut on ne vous entends plus ou très mal  tout cela pour économiser 3cm de tige  et surement un micro de meilleure qualité …. vraiment dommage

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: All round a great improvement over the already great previous Artics headphones. Better build quality, more comfortable, better Bluetooth connectivity, better sound, USB C, better battery life and they have the ability to be paired with other consoles (so you’re no longer limited to wireless only with Xbox or PS).By default they are a little quiet as there’s a software volume limiter on which you can switch off this off when connected to their app on PC.Problems start when the volume limiter is off though as you’re able to hear clearly that the audio level and sound quality isn’t as good in the left ear cup, when the volume is high enough the sound in left ear cup is slightly distorted and it gives of a very faint static sound (which isn’t present in the right), on lower volumes these issue is barely noticeable - but once heard you can’t unhear.I returned my first pair and had the same problem with the second pair, some research on Reddit suggests this is a known issue.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 December 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I used to use Corsair Virtuoso XT. The good thing about those headphones is that they pair with two BT devices and the wireless/radio (PC). But, only one BT can "talk" at given time. However, after 8-9 months of usage, I've had some serious battery trouble with the Corsair. The support told me just to return them, so after some tests (I liked them, did not want to return, but I could not get them to work properly) - I did.This is when my gamer friends recommended the Arctis 7 headset. Since I use it for working too, I had to get the Arctis Nova 7 one (there are multiple 7 models, the difference is compatibility apparently, pc/xbox/ps - so make sure to check before you buy! I'm on just plain arctis nova 7, which works with PCs and BT just fine).The battery life on this baby is vastly superior to Corsairs (think ~7 hours vs around 1.5-2 days on Arctis), the delay should be the same (check before you buy!), the features include everything I need.Arctis Nova 7 pairs easily with my phone, works out of the box with my PC, you don't need the Sonar software thing either. Even EQ works without it. The only thing I wish this headset had was more than just 4 choices for the "microphone echo". the lowest one above 0 is a bit too loud for my liking. But other than that, I really, really like that headset. So far absolutely 0 problems with that. It is also pretty light and the headband is adjustable, which was not the case with Corsair.Oh, I wish it could display the charge in resolution higher than 1/4 (i.e. empty, 25%, 50%, 75%, full), but the Corsair ones were the same.I am very happy with that headset, I loved Corsair Virtuoso XTs, but if you do not need to pair with two BT devices, this one is just cheaper and better.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Lo primero me gustaría decir que en casa tengo unos Logitech g733 y un Sennheiser HD 560s, partiendo de esa base puedo hacer un análisis más o menos precisoComodidad- me parecen bastante cómodos, no tanto como el g733 donde clasificaría a estos últimos con un 9/10,  y a los artics con un 8.5/10, dejando en último lugar los hd590s con un 6/10 ya que no son cómodos para largas sesiones y se sienten muy duros, ambos(Logitech y steelseries) con un acolchado viscoelástico, aunque los artics aprietan un poco más la cabeza, pero podrás estar horas sin que te molesten(para una cabeza mediana) decir que los g733 son rígidos y los artics puedes girar el auricular y quedan relativamente cómodos cuando nos lo quitamos y lo dejamos reposar en el cuelloSonido- me ha sorprendido bastante ya que suena mejor que los g733 y no mucho peor que los hd560s, no soy un experto en cuanto a sonido pero es perceptible la diferencia entre estos cascos mencionados, en general un sonido limpio y bastante más neutral que los g733 con un volumen a mi parecer bastante alto tanto para jugar, como ver películas y escuchar música, mi nota seríaLogitech g733 7.5/10Artics nova 7 8/10HD 560s 8.5/10(este tiene sonidos muy planos que quizás a muchos no les guste)Calidad de construcción- muy correctos, con una mezcla entre plástico y metal da la sensación de robustez, se sienten más pesados que los g733 pero hay que tener en cuenta que los de Logitech hicieron unos cascos ultraligeros, espero que me duren bastante, 8/10 para artics nova 7Bateria- aqui lo doy un 9/10, con una carga de 15 min tienes para 6hr y en menos de 2hr tienes la carga completa con una duración de 30hr aprox, según el volumen y uso que le des podrá ser más o menos, simplemente excelente!, Tienes unos leds que según los colores indican el estado de su batería aunque no son precisos, para ver con exactitud el nivel de batería, debes descargar la app de la marca.Software y conectividad- estos auriculares se puede conectar también a través de bluetooth con lo cual, podrás estar jugando a tu juego favorito en el pc y escuchar las notificaciones del móvil y con una distancia que llega un poco más allá que los Logitech g733, en cuanto a la app de steelseries al principio puede ser un poco lioso aunque tiene varios preset que puedes elegir a tu gusto, además, tienes para dar volumen independiente y elegir entre escuchar más fuerte a tus compañeros de partida o el juego(para esta opción debes tener instalada la app, si no, no funciona..)Si quieres prescindir de la app, solo tendrás que conectar y disfrutar.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Prese usate in ottime condizioni e devo dire che valgono tutto il prezzo pagato. Sono comode, suonano bene, hanno una batteria che dura davvero molto ed alcune features molto utili. Questo detto, pur avendo la testa grande, ho dovuto sostituire i cuscinetti dei padiglioni con alcuni più spessi per aumentare la presa e l'isolamento. Inoltre il software dedicato, sonar, presenta parecchie imperfezioni o bug che lo rendono utile la metà di quanto potrebbe essere. Per di più la qualità audio non è così alta, almeno a mio parere, non raggiunge minimamente i livelli tanto decantati in rete. Se paragonate alle mie epos h3 pro hybrid, che spesso si trovano nuove alla stessa cifra di queste nova 7, l'audio è povero e poco profondo.Rimangono comunque valide per quel che costano e godibili, tra le migliori nella fascia di prezzo.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: + Feels good with glasses on, doesn't make skin above ears itchy.+ Lightweight+ Adjustable+ Mic is well hidden well and doesn't irritate you with its presence when you don't need it+ Transparency mode that plays audio from your mic, I don't plan to use it outside, but good to have.+ Wired, Wireless 2.4G, Wireless Bluetooth - it's good to have all three options available- Sonar was one of the main selling points for me, but it's Windows only- Set of cables missing one very important cable - USB-A to USB-C adapter (while they added USB-C to USB-A), so if you have Macbook, or USB-C only ultrabook, don't expect to update your firmware easily.- Not very loud, you might find them a bit quiet for some conditions and on max volume you can hear white noiseAs for sound quality - it's average. Good and balanced sound on all frequencies out of the box. Maybe a bit richer bass than it should be, but it's definitely advantage for gaming.As for sound localization, the same problem as in other headphones -15° to +15° forward and backward sound the same or almost the same. Overall, they're good at producing footsteps.So, in terms of quality they're like €80 wired headphones and you pay extra on top for build quality, wirelessness, and other features. In terms of music/gaming performance you don't get anything extra.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Next  level geluid een must voor elke gamer zowel pc als ps5 100% en telefoon

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Had these for a few months. Have had to change headsets a lot because I tend to come across issues over time.These have been really solid so far. Volume is great and the audio quality is good enough for me easily.Best part is that the battery life is great.My only gripe is that the microphone is quite quiet.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 10 February 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: I had great expectations from steelseries using the Artis 7 wireless but this has been an utter disappointment.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Lätta och inte för stora för min son som är 12 år.Bra batteri och bra byggkvalitet. Bra ljud!Uppskattade funktioner:1. Snabb igångsättning med trådlös 2,4 GHz dongel.2. Dubben trådlös uppkoppling 2,4 GHz + Bluetooth.3. Möjlighet att justera balansen mellan de båda ljudkällornaSaknade funktioner och negativa upplevelser1. Hade önskat att de även var brusreduserande.2. Ett svagt brus hörs via 2,4 GHz
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 July 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: Fangen mit dem Aufbau an ,es macht einen stabilen Eindruck. Eine Menge Plastik aber stabil.KomfortDie Ohrpolster sind am Anfang etwas hart ,werden aber schnell weicher ,insgesamt komfortabel für lange sessions. Passive Isolation ist kaum vorhanden ,man hört seine Umgebung recht gut ,fast wie bei offenen Kopfhörern. Man bekommt nicht so schnell heiße Ohren (für mich sehr wichtig)Größenverstellung ist sehr gut ,es passen auch große Köpfe drunter,  im Gegensatz zu vielen anderen Marken.Ein Nachteil ist die Geräuschübertragung ,egal was man anfasst oder wenn der Kopf bewegt wird, man hört es.Der größte Minuspunkt sind die kleinen Ohrmuscheln ,sie sind in der Länge extrem kurz.Ich hab sie mit meinen sony 1000 xm2 verglichen ,sie sind einen ganzen Zentimeter länger als die steelseries . Ich mein damit den Innenraum der Ohrmuscheln, dadurch mussten die Ohrläppchen immer hochgeschoben werden damit der Kopfhörer überhaupt getragen werden kann.Was nach längeren Tragen zu Kopfweh geführt hat.Das war auch der Grund warum ich das Headset wieder zurückgeschickt habe. Ich kann das auch nicht nachvollziehen ,größenverstellbar sogar für große Köpfe und Ohrmuscheln für kleine Kinder.Akkulaufzeit ist gut wie angegeben, ca. 35 Std.KlangIst ganz ordentlich, Bässe und Höhen sind stark betont, also wie bei den meisten gaming Headsets.Der Bass könnte trockener, präziser sein aber die meisten werden zufrieden sein ,alles Geschmackssache.Höhen sind gut ,keine zischlaute ,sehr schön.Mitten ,die für die Sprache wichtig sind, sind zurückgenommen ,dadurch sind die Dialoge ziemlich leise.Mag ich gar nicht, da werde ich an Filme und Serien erinnert, bei denen man auch öfter fragt "was haben die gesagt ? "  Für Singelplayer nicht der Brüller.Das räumliche kommt wirklich gut rüber , Ortung der Gegner usw. Ist sehr gut, also für Multiplayer geeignet.Hoffe das die Info den einem oder anderen hilft

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless USB-C Multi-Platform Gaming Headset with Bluetooth for PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch & Android - 38 Hour Battery, Fast Charging, Noise-Cancelling Gen 2 Microphone
Review: These sound great and feel great, only downside is that your ears sometimes rest on the drivers, however no more so than any other steel series headset I have owned in the past. However the fabric they use on the ear cup more than makes up for it.

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: Of all the goods I ordered online or few I have this headset is easily the most overrated frustrating stressful piece of crap I ever ordered...in my top 2.Before Day one I got it I did my research read reviews ....what the critics say .......but sometimes your own actual hands on experience matters more than what others say.Corsair may excel in life or keyboards but I question the competency of their audio department big time in BOTH functionality AND compatibility .First day i got it all functions worked ....ecen before i installed the drivers via the wireless usb. I look after all.my tech stuff I don't fiddle I use instructions rather than deviate risk wrecking perfectly working device .But when the driver itself generates a sinister ' seed ' in your pc system planting data of other audio drivers for different headset without me knowing until ...come day no.2 receiving the headset i discover mysteriously that my original driver was overridden...with icon and model of a lesser headset...so of course the headset did not respond to the wireless signal. On top of that after driver auto pilot problem courtesy f the stupid icue client ...coincidentally...the headset lights did not come on...and I suspected I had a faulty headset...that  happened to develop a fault in the functionality of the headset at same time the driver buggered up.There were no programs or updates from Windows that interfered .The notion I conclude is for it over inflated undeserved price tag the corsair void elite..and perhaps all their advanced wired headsets...by it name sake is nothing more than a empty a la k void of a hole that rips you off sucks your cash in its void centre ..leaving you with a useless piece of junk excuse for a headset  .Maybe I got a rare effective headset I don't care if others give it praise ...vut let be reminder to you all frankly that there no such thing as flawless technology...frankly whrn it comes to headsets corsair best stick with wired and abandon the wireless experiment it a sham and a lie that it compatible to window 7.The most overblown overrated headset I can think of ...all I got o it of it while it worked on day no.1 was 3 hrs of watching a movie...on top of that before the drivers auto switched to reflect a headset through the icue client u do NOT own...whrn initially correct drivers were installed...it was not compatible unresponsive to watching YouTube channel on the net ..non responsive to fifa soccer  waste of time and money if u have Windows 7 that they say it windows 7 on top of all their fraudulent claims at Corsair well I blame them for false claims about the performance and quality for misleading customers who own win 7. I arranged for refund ...I got new headset coming...this time lesser known brand but one uses science fact not fiction like corsair to explain it compatibility etc...it half the price too and usb connection I gladly take that over a failure of a wireless device

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: Not quite as comfortable and impressive as my previous model of the same headset, but I'll give it time to wear in and re assess

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: Très bonne qualité par rapport aux prix d'autres modèles supérieure en gamme.Agréable à porter même avec des lunettes.Quand le micro est relevé il se mute automatiquement et c'est très pratique.La distance sans fil est moyenne (ça ne tient pas les 10m promi mais plutot 6/7m).L'autonomie est moyenne (je le recharg tous les 2/3 jours) mais il se recharge rapidement et on peu l'utiliser en le chargeant.Bref je recommande surtout que le prix est intéressant pour un modèle corsair sans fil avec tous ses avantages et très peu d'inconvénients.

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: Zunächst einmal möchte ich anmerken, dass ich ein enorm fauler Rezensionenschreiber bin. Doch statt den üblichen "passt schon" und "alles wie erwartet" Rezis, möchte ich hier doch einmal etwas länger ausholen...Ich habe mich nach langem Überlegen, ob es ein reines Gaming-Headset, oder eine Art Kombilösung aus Gaming-Headset und Kopfhörer für Musik unterwegs werden soll, für das reine Gaming-Headset entschieden.Diese Entscheidung beruht auf der Tatsache, dass es die Notwendigkeit gab mir ganz zügig ein neues Set Earbuds zu bestellen, welche mir anschließend so gut gefallen haben, dass eine Kombilösung nicht mehr notwendig war. Also habe ich mich durch den unfassbaren Angebotsdschungel aus Gaming-Headsets gearbeitet und darauf auf folgende Kriterien geachtet:- Stoff an den Höhrmuscheln- 7.1 Sound- Namenhafter Hersteller- Tragekomfort- Gute Bewertungen- Preis max. € 150,00-- Solide Verarbeitung- KabellosWas soll ich groß sagen - Alle diese Eigenschaften bietet dieses Headset und überzeugt mich dabei auf ganzer Linie.Es war mir wichtig, dass man auch bei längeren Spielesessions ein angenehmes Tragegefühl hat und das vor allem keine nervige Schweißbildung, wie unter Kunstleder-Ohrmuscheln entsteht. Das Headset hat ein nicht zu unterschätzendes Gewicht, ist also kein ultra-leichtes Plastikdingsbums, sondern sitzt angenehm "satt" auf dem Kopf. Das ist aber auch genau das was ich wollte. Ein solide verarbeitetes Gerät, dass nicht nach 10x absetzen an irgendeiner Sollbruchstelle zerbricht.Der Sound ist für meine Ohren tatsächlich herausragend und läßt sich mittels kostenlos downloadbarer Software auch für Soundfetischisten haarklein anpassen. Es hat eine wirklich tiefe Basslast und kristallklare Höhen und überzeugt mich auch in den Mitteltönen vollständig. Ich habe auf YouTube viele Videos mit Sound-Demonstrationen für 7.1 Systeme angesehen und war begeistert.Die Übertragung mittels W-Lan Dongle reicht in unserer etwa 80m² Wohnung bis in jeden Raum und wird erst nach 2 Türen und drei Wänden auf dem Balkon brüchig, was für mich völlig in Ordnung geht!Der Akku hält mehrere Stunden zuverlässig und die akustische Warnung für geringe Restladung ist früh genug, als das man in aller Ruhe das Ladekabel anschließen kann und weiterspielen kann, wöhrend das Gerät lädt. Hier aber ganz wichtig zu wissen - es ist NICHT möglich das Headset nur mit Kabel und ohne den W-Lan-Dongle zu benutzen. Das Kabel ist tatsächlich nur zum Laden dabei.Wer RGB-Styles mag, der wird auch hier mit der Software und individuellen Einstellmöglichkeiten glücklich - ist nicht meins, aber es geht halt.Zu guter Letzt habe ich mich mit dem Preis beschäftigt, welcher mit knapp € 120,00 sicher kein Billigprodukt repräsentiert, aber eben auch längst nicht in der Top-Liga mitspielt. Aus genau diesem Grund ist das Headset noch interessanter für mich, weil es mit wirklich vielen, anderen Geräten aus weit teureren Bereichen mühelos mithalten kann. Ein guter Freund von mir nutzt ein Headset aus dem Preissegment über € 400,00 und ich kann nicht wirklich richtig viele Unterschiede feststellen.In der Hoffnung Euch eine Kaufentscheidung etwas erleichtert zu haben, wünsche ich viel Spaß mit dem Void!

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: Le cuffie Corsair Bluetooth che ho acquistato qualche anno fa sono ancora sorprendentemente belle e performanti. La qualità del suono è cristallina e le cuffie sono in grado di distinguere perfettamente i suoni alti e bassi. Se sei un appassionato di musica, queste cuffie ti permetteranno di ascoltare la tua musica preferita ad un livello superiore, ma non solo! Anche guardare film sarà un'esperienza immersiva grazie alla qualità del suono che ti farà sentire come se fossi in mezzo all'azione. Inoltre, se sei un appassionato di gaming online, queste cuffie sono ottime per distinguere con facilità i passi degli avversari, dando un vantaggio competitivo sul campo di battaglia. Consiglio vivamente queste cuffie a chiunque cerchi un prodotto di alta qualità e performance.Pro⬆️:-Sono cuffie molto comode , con un giusto peso.-Non hanno la cancellazione del rumore ma le cuffie coprono così bene che sembra quasi che ci sia.-Sono eleganti e dal design moderno.-L'audio e il microfono hanno un buon suono solo in alcune app (discord) l'imput è basso e non si riesce ad alzarlo.-Buon raggio d'azione , copre circa la metà della mia casaContro⬇️:-A volte può richiedere un po' di tempo per ristabilire la connessione quando si accende, il che è fastidioso quando si ha bisogno di rispondere rapidamente a una chiamata-I padiglioni auricolari possono diventare caldi dopo un po', ma in gran parte ne vale la pena per quanto sono efficaci nell'isolare i suoni esterni.-La porta di ricarica sulle cuffie è piccola e difficile da localizzare.

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: Uso delle cuffie prettamente per il gaming, suono pulito e qualità impeccabile indipendentemente dal genere ed anche nel mix di musica e audio di gioco; tasto on/off microfono e regolazione volume facilmente utilizzabili. Ottimo prodotto anche per ascoltare musica o guardare film, la versione usb ha il cavo della giusta lunghezza.

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: Spedizione: imballato con cura, rispettate le date di spedizione.Prodotto: ottimo prodotto, qualità prezzo eccellenti, materiale di costruzione plastica di buona qualità.Opinioni personali: il prodotto è ottimo sia cablato che non in quanto li posseggo entrambi, le utilizzo da più di un anno ogni giorno e non hanno grossi segni di usura, soprattutto la spugna che poggia alle orecchie è ancora come nuova. Per il loro prezzo l'audio è perfetto nessun calo di prestazioni. Le consiglio a chiunque sia per lavoro in quanto molto comode sia per gaming se si vuole un ottimo prodotto anche competitivo senza spendere cifre astronomiche.Può essere anche un ottima idea regalo.

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: De titel van de review zegt eigenlijk alles. Op het eerste zicht lijkt de bouwkwaliteit beter dan verwacht, veel plastic maar de belangrijke componenten zijn in metaal uitgevoerd. Vrij zwaar aanvoelend product, wat zowel een voordeel als een nadeel kan zijn. Zit zéér comfortabel omdat het de volledige oorschelp omsluit en de randen van het oor dus niet schuren tegen de randen van de hoofdtelefoon. Wel wat warm indien lang gedragen. Audiokwaliteit is voldoende, zeker voor gamen, maar indien je deze hoofdtelefoon primair voor muziek koopt zou ik een ander product uitkiezen, al is ook daar de kwaliteit voldoende. Microfoon-kwaliteit ook voldoende met vrij goede ruisonderdrukking, volume standaard wat aan de lage kant maar dit kan omhoog gedraaid wordenVoor deze prijs zeker aan te raden, veel waar voor je geld vergeleken met anderen in dezelfde prijsklasse
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 9 July 2021

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: My old headphones suddenly died and as I game a lot - I had to buy new ones sooner rather than later. My issue is that majority of the headphones usually hurt my ears after wearing them for 1h + (not a glass wearer, just weird ear issues), so it was difficult for me to find ones that wouldn't do that.I went to my boyfriend and he let me tried his Corsair headphones for a few hours. I quickly knew - these are what I'm looking for. Found them here, cheaper than expected, and bought them. Got delivered very quickly. The build quality is good, they do not look like they going to fall apart after 2 months of use. The sound quality is very good, but I can't say if you can listen to classic music or hard rock in them with a A++ quality, as that's not what I use them for. They are quite heavy, but well balanced and comfy to wear. I like that the mic is attached, but if you tip it up it turns off, no need to press any buttons. I love the customisation. You can make your own light profiles: different light colours, different type of pulsing or switch the light off completely (which saves the battery). Battery life is good, I purchased the headphones about a week ago and didn't need to charge them yet.As summary: I was delighted to find something that doesn't hurt my ears, is very decent built quality, good sound quality, attached mic and no cable - all for a very good price! My boyfriend has got the same pair and been using it for about a year (more or less) and he's very happy with them too.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 November 2023

ProductName: CORSAIR Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset – 7.1 Surround Sound – Omni-Directional Microphone – Microfiber Mesh Earpads – Up to 40ft Range – iCUE Compatible – PC, Mac, PS5, PS4 – White
Review: Ho comprato questo prodotto per effettuare streaming online.A me non piace avere cuffie così grosse in testa, infatti il mio primo tentativo fu un paio di auricolari wireless ma con scarso successo. Dopo una ricerca abbastanza approfondita ho deciso per questo modello di cuffie per una manciata di motivi:- La marca- I cuscinetti in memory foam- Il tessuto in microfibra (invece che in pelle!)L'audio è spettacolare. Normalmente stereo, ma se collegato con l'usb con scheda audio 7.1 integrata si ha un effetto davvero incredibile. Il suo è perfetto anche ad alto volume. E' stracomoda. Non pesa sulla testa, i cuscinetti sono morbidissimi e anche col caldo, dopo diverse ore, la sudorazione è limitata.Il microfono non era una delle mie priorità, ma se lo è per voi allora questo prodotto non è adatto. L'audio registrato dal microfono è molto simile a quello di una semplice chiamata telefonica, ma molto limpido.
