ProductName: EPOS H3PRO Hybrid Wireless Gaming Headset with Bluetooth and ANC, Detachable Boom Arm, Smart Button Audio Mixing, PC Playstation Xbox Nintendo Mobile Compatible (Sebring Black)
Review: C'è da dire che sono, assieme alle Corsair Virtuoso RGB Wireless XT, le uniche cuffie da gaming che possono funzionare "CONTEMPORANEAMENTE" sia con il dongle e sia con il Bluethooth.Spiego meglio: se stiamo giocando al PC (cuffie collegate con il dongle), possiamo contemporaneamente (se associate e collegate ad uno smartphone con il bluethooth), possiamo rispondere alle chiamate o ascoltare della musica ecc senza interrompere l'audio proveniente dal PC.PRO:- Connettività doppia in contemporanea 10/10- Sono leggere e comode. Inoltre i padiglioni, nella parte che poggia attorno alle orecchie, sono in velluto, quindi non scaldano eccessivamente la zone circostante le orecchie  9/10- Batteria buona, come da dati dichiarati (con il mio uso Dongle + Bluethooth circa 28 ore senza ANC) 8/10- Buona la qualità e l'opportunità di mutare il microfono alzando l'asta e anche la possibilità di rimuoverlo (è presente un ulteriore microfono interno per quando si è in giro) 8/10CONTRO:- Se collegate con il dongle o con cavo 3.5 (in dotazione) hanno un ottimo sound, con bassi profondi, ma se si ascolta la musica con il bluethooth, a causa della mancanza del codec AptX, sentirete un leggere gracchiare. Male visto che costano 280€  6/10- Il software per gestire le cuffie è abbastanza scarno e presenta dei piccoli BUG  4/10- La funzione ANC (attivabile con uno switch sul retro del padiglione destro) non fa altro che inserire un lieve rumore bianco (tipo fischio di orecchi). Epos non la può chiamare ANC... non serve a nulla 1/10- Sono di plastica, abbastanza anonime 3/10Alla fine ho deciso di renderle perchè avendole pagate circa 280€ mi sarei aspettato di più dall' ANC, dalla qualità costruttiva, ma soprattutto manca una borsa per il trasporto :(

ProductName: EPOS H3PRO Hybrid Wireless Gaming Headset with Bluetooth and ANC, Detachable Boom Arm, Smart Button Audio Mixing, PC Playstation Xbox Nintendo Mobile Compatible (Sebring Black)
Review: Lamentablemente, no puedo recomendar éstos auriculares.Hace tiempo que quería sustituir mis Steelseries Arctis 7, dado que me apretaban bastante, pero no salían modelos nuevos interesantes, hasta que vi éstos EPOS.Sobre el papel me convencieron bastante, por el hecho de que se pueda conectar a varios dispositivos a la vez, y que tengan el pedigree de Sennheisser (aunque ya sean dos empresas aparte), a parte de juguetes con ANC, etc.Percepción de calidad vs precio:Cuando me llegaron, directamente vi que la calidad percibida no está a la altura de casi 300€ de precio, es puro plástico todo. Por otro lado, se suponía que han de ser super cómodos, pero la diadema es relativamente estrecha y las almohadillas no son muy profundas, entonces las orejas tocan los drivers.Tecnología:De cara a la tecnología, primero, el prometido ANC (insonoración de sonido activa) es muy, pero muy mediocre, de hecho, apenas notas diferencia alguna, realmente, no sirve de absolutamente nada en éstos auriculares. Por otro lado, configurar los auriculares es bastante doloroso, entre que las instrucciones no explican nada , y luego una vez instalado todo, sigue sin detectarlos, etc etc., estuve 40 minutos peleando para hacer que funcionen en PC de trabajo por Bluetooth y en el Gaming por USB (y eso que no soy un patán tecnológico, trabajo en la industria digital).Sonido y micrófono:Y, finalmente, el sonido. La calidad del sonido es buena, de hecho, sería lo único bueno que puedo decir de ellos. Pude escuchar música con buena calidad, tiene un espectro de sonido bueno y claro, con bajos medios y altos bien balanceados. El surround sound propietario de EPOS es decente, pero no llega al nivel de Atmos o DB:X (los cuales suelen venir con los Corsair o SteelSeries). Ahora la otra cara de la moneda del sonido - el micrófono. Lamentablemente, muy malo. Mis compañeros dijeron que sueno muy robotizado, y que sonaba hasta mejor con mis Arctis 7 de 2017. También se me comentó que a veces el microfono “saltaba” a muy mala calidad de por si solo, lo cual solo se solucionaba reiniciando los auriculares.Calidad:Y, matiz final de algo que me he percatado, al mover el auricular derecho, se cortaba el sonido de él por completo, hasta moverlo de nuevo, donde se reactivaba. Dudo mucho que sea intencional, y lo voy a firmar como otro fallo más de calidad.Resumen:Resumiendo, he tramitado la devolución de éstos auriculares, dado que, para mi, no valen el precio que he pagado por ellos ni de cerca. He optado por unos Corsair Virtuoso Wireless XT para sustituirlos, los cuales son 50€ más baratos. Veremos si se nota diferencia.

ProductName: EPOS H3PRO Hybrid Wireless Gaming Headset with Bluetooth and ANC, Detachable Boom Arm, Smart Button Audio Mixing, PC Playstation Xbox Nintendo Mobile Compatible (Sebring Black)
Review: Really disappointed after seeing some nice reviews about this headset.The main feature that I wanted was the wireless aspect, being able to move more freely when talking and playing was a huge pro. However, whenever using this as bluetooth or even with the dongle, it will cut out every 30 seconds or so which was supper annoying when communicating on discord or in game.The same would happen when using it for listening to music on my phone, the audio would cut out for a second or so, consistently.The build quality is great, plenty flex and microphone cap replacement is a cool feature.Active noise cancelling works fine but you can easily hear the buzzing in your ears.Microphone is okay on 3.5mm, USB, Bluetooth and Dongle connections, nothing crazy which is the norm for headset microphones.The sound quality isn't anything special, pretty flat in my opinion, I'm sure some adjustments can be made for better quality.

ProductName: EPOS H3PRO Hybrid Wireless Gaming Headset with Bluetooth and ANC, Detachable Boom Arm, Smart Button Audio Mixing, PC Playstation Xbox Nintendo Mobile Compatible (Sebring Black)
Review: Utile pour une double utilisation Jeu /travail

ProductName: EPOS H3PRO Hybrid Wireless Gaming Headset with Bluetooth and ANC, Detachable Boom Arm, Smart Button Audio Mixing, PC Playstation Xbox Nintendo Mobile Compatible (Sebring Black)
Review: The build quality is excellent, the gold and green (in my case) looks very stylish and understated. The packaging and accessories are all of a very high standard, but for a piece of equipment in excess of £200, I was expecting much more in terms of sound quality on a console…I bought the H3PRO Hybrid on the strength you can customize the audio and save the ‘Profiles’, via Windows software. I thought these profiles would be saved to the headset, just as they can be saved to my Logitech G933 Artemis Spectrum wireless headset and also a pair of Turtle Beach's I had prior to the Logitech's. But, how wrong I was.If you are a PC gamer, you can tweak the audio and mic to your liking via the EPOS Gaming Suite and save these custom profiles. They sound great on PC and, importantly, *only* on PC.However, I’m a PS5 gamer, and I was disappointed (to say the least), to find that you have to suffer the flat equaliser setting and there’s absolutely no way of changing it. No bass, treble or 7.1 surround sound enhancements whatsoever; just the flat, bland response you would expect from a graphic equaliser with all the sliders set to zero. You could be forgiven for thinking the sound was coming from a much cheaper headset than it is.What’s more, there’s nothing in the manuals or software which states these custom profiles can only be used on a PC and no mention of this fact on their website. It was only when I called their support line that I was told they only work on PC!!I wanted to like this headset so badly, but for a premium, top-of-the-range £200+ device, the very ordinary, bland sound on a console is a huge let down.

ProductName: EPOS H3PRO Hybrid Wireless Gaming Headset with Bluetooth and ANC, Detachable Boom Arm, Smart Button Audio Mixing, PC Playstation Xbox Nintendo Mobile Compatible (Sebring Black)
Review: Leider musste ich mittlerweile schon die Garantie beanspruchen, da das erste Headset nach circa sechs Monaten angefangen hat zu rauschen und das Mikrofon kaputt ging. Ansonsten finde ich diese Kopfhörer super Sie sind sehr angenehm zum Tragen und der Ton ist sehr angenehm

ProductName: EPOS H3PRO Hybrid Wireless Gaming Headset with Bluetooth and ANC, Detachable Boom Arm, Smart Button Audio Mixing, PC Playstation Xbox Nintendo Mobile Compatible (Sebring Black)
Review: Like others, I wanted to like this headset - it had all the features I wanted and had so many connectivity options that I was going to use it for literally everything.Except, the microphone input will frequently cut out and randomly begin to stutter when using the headset wirelessly using the included dongle. Friends will beg me to mute my mic so that I don't assault their ears.Pros:Amazing audio quality after you download their software and tweak the equalizer. Out of the box the headset uses a flat EQ profile, I got rid of that pretty quickly.Lots of connectivity options, you can even have the headset simultaneously connected to one device while connected via bluetooth to the other. It can play audio from both devices simultaneously which was pretty interesting but I doubt I'd actually use it like that.Cons:Wireless performance is incredibly sensitive to all sorts of interference, and this ended up being the reason I'm returning this headset.Ear cups eventually get pretty warm and uncomfortable after a few hours of continued use.-----Let's talk about the wireless dongle and why I'm returning the headset. Out of the box, the documentation includes diagrams that suggest that it's prone to interference; it suggests that the dongle should only be plugged into USB ports that are at the front of your computer/device, and not to connect the dongle into any ports on the back of the computer. Instead, you should use an included extension cable if you do need to use a back port, so that the dongle isn't back there.Ok, sure. A little bit of testing quickly demonstrates why this is necessary - the headset can barely tolerate any obstacles between itself and the dongle. Audio was jittery and choppy if you didn't have the dongle in direct line of sight (it was indeed completely unusable when using a port in the back of the computer).Even when using the extension cord, while audio was always clear as long as I stayed nearby, the microphone would frequently begin to stutter and would be nonfunctional for ~15 seconds at a time. This happened maybe once an hour. Between changing USB ports and testing using and not using the extension cable, I could not fix this.-----All in all, this could have been a great headset. I'd initially just assume the microphone issue was somehow my fault, but there are so many reviews of other people complaining about how unreliable the wireless connection behaves.Back to hunting for another wireless headset!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 September 2022

ProductName: EPOS H3PRO Hybrid Wireless Gaming Headset with Bluetooth and ANC, Detachable Boom Arm, Smart Button Audio Mixing, PC Playstation Xbox Nintendo Mobile Compatible (Sebring Black)
Review: 購入して使い続けて3か月ほどで、ブームアームの上げ下げでのミュート機能が効かなくなった。旧ゼンハイザーコミュニケーションの時代からヘッドセットを愛用して使い続けてきたが、H3PROは品質が悪いのではないのか？と感じてしまう。1年半から2年は問題なく使い続けられると信じて買ったが、EPOSになってからダメになったんじゃないか？製品の各種機能は満足しているが、すぐに故障するものと思って買ったほうが良いかもしれない。

Review: It took very long to be shipped to me considering I paid extra for quick delivery. I got the package in a zip lock so don’t expect any free pouch. Otherwise, it works as most jabra headsets would! Really great clear sound.

Review: Quite happy with this headset. Quality of construction is good, they are comfortable, sound is clear, microphone is good. The only thing is, they could be a bit louder. Happy to recommend them.

Review: Elegí esta marca porque es la que usaba en call center y sé que es buena para ese tipo de trabajo. Trabajo desde casa. Como un plus, la paquetería entregó en otro lado el paquete, puse el reporte con la misma y además le hice saber al vendedor por aquí, el vendedor fue súper amable y atento, siempre estuvo al pendiente conmigo y la paquetería. Recibí en excelente condición.

Review: Casque relativement léger, facile à installer voilà pour le positif de ce casque.Je l'utilise pour les réunions en visio. Mes interlocuteurs ne m'entendent pas bien car le micro n'est pas d'une grande qualité. Le rapport qualité prix c'est pas vraiment intéressant. Je vais devoir changer de casque.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: If you're searching for a consistent, well-performing audio solution for your work-from-home or in-office needs, then the Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset is worth considering. This headset has proven versatility by integrating seamlessly with Microsoft Teams, Zoom, and Google Meet, making it an excellent choice for different conferencing environments. It does great when you want to relax and listen to your favorite audio content.The headset's compatibility and ease of use with Windows 10 is particularly impressive. The plug-and-play feature eliminates complicated setup processes, making it ideal for users who value simplicity and efficiency.The handy in-line controller is a distinctive advantage of the Jabra Evolve 20 UC. The controller dramatically enhances the user experience by providing easy access to adjust volume levels and mute the microphone. This is a big plus during professional meetings, where time is often of the essence.The build quality might be a slight letdown for those expecting a premium feel, as the headset feels somewhat cheap. However, this isn't indicative of its durability or its performance.Despite the somewhat less-than-premium tactile experience, the Jabra Evolve 20 UC more than redeems itself with its consistent performance. After several months of use, this headset continues to work flawlessly, showing no signs of wear or deterioration in audio quality.The Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset's reliability and user-friendly features were so impressive that I bought a second one for use in the office. It's a testament to its functionality, ease of use, and durability.To conclude, the Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset may not win accolades for its build quality, but its dependable performance, practical features, and affordability make it a solid choice for anyone needing a reliable audio solution for both professional and personal use.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: For what you pay, you get a usable, enterprise entry level headset. It works. You paid under a hundred bucks. The mic is pretty incredible. If it's raised up, people can't hear me because of how directional it is. When it's pointed at my mouth, people can't hear others talking nearby. That's exceptional performance in my books. If I need another headset like it, I'm buying the same brand and model or better.I didn't know PC headsets mics could be this good. If you're used to more expensive enterprise stuff, this might be a big downgrade for you, but as a residential end user, this was a huuuge upgrade for my work Teams calls. It also has a toggle button to mute or unmute that comes in line in the cable with a big red light so you aren't saying the wrong things at the wrong times. It lets you know.A+++

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: The item is exactly what I needed, it works perfectly.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Came with no box. Just bubble wrapped. Test the headphones and the sound Quality is not good. Have to increase volume way higher then normal/average. And not compatible to certain app.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Funktioniert einwandfreiEinfache HandhabungKann es nur empfehlen
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 26 January 2024

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Noise cancellation is fantastic; even if my mic is facing into the air away from my mouth and I try to talk, the people on the other end of the call can barely hear my voice. Just goes to show how great this headset is for noise cancellation. Have worked remotely abroad a lot while travelling and so have taken important calls in various loud and busy locations with thanks to this headset for no disruptions!Jabra is always great quality and for the price of this headset you really can’t go wrong.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Aucune basses et aucun aiguës, le son stagne dans une fréquence medium désagréable qui fait saturer la voix de mes interlocuteurs (réglage et test n'y changeant rien).Au vu du prix j’imaginai de la qualité sachant que mon dernier casque-micro USB valais presque le tiers du prix de celui-ci pour une qualité infiniment meilleur.La qualité du micro n'est pas meilleur.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: This headset has good sound quality and noise cancellation, and I would have kept It if it was comfortable for my large head (23-1/2" circumference at eyebrow level). Although I could position the earpieces over my ears, they pressed in too much because of my head size, and I wouldn't be able to wear them for hours during the workday. The exposed foam ear covers felt scratchy and didn't look durable. These could work well for someone with normal head size, but I had to return them.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 November 2022

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Som bastante audível. Microfone de qualidade.Cancelamento de ruído do microfone não é o melhor, se baixarmos o som para os 70% torna-se possível, por exemplo, ter música de fundo na mesma divisão sem ser perceptível, no entanto o cancelamento não é dos melhores.Para o preço e considerando ser a gama mais baixa dos headsets JABRA, é aceitável, mas considerando o volume do mic nos 70% ou inferior. Com o volume nos 100% o cancelamento de ruído praticamente não existe.Mesmo nos 70% ouve-se, por exemplo, o teclar do computador.Avalio positivamente uma vez que enquanto falo,  apesar de distorcer um pouco a voz, de facto anula o barulho de fundo, mesmo com barulho ou música alta, sendo o discurso 100% perceptível.Agora se pretende um micro que não grave esses barulhos, música, ou pessoas ao lado nos momentos de silêncio, procure uma gama superior.Quanto a saída de som, avalio muito positivamente, não é noisecancelling, ouve-se que se passa a volta, mas também consegue anular um pouco do barulho para nos deixar concentrados na tarefa.O som parece me de bastante qualidade. Claro que não ser excelente para bpm's mais altos mas faz o trabalho na perfeição, caso o intuito seja ouvir uma música ''normal'' ou ver um filme ou uma série, ou para conversar ao telefone.De facto, a realidade é que para o preço, e tendo em conta o mercado não se pode ter grandes exigências.  (Paguei 52€).

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Awesome product for this price. This headset is teams certified so it works well there. The wire is quite long and it comes with a mute control so all in all an amazing buy for somebody who attends long meetings on teams.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 20 January 2024

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Von technischer Seite her ist dieses Headset sehr gut. Tonqualität ist sowohl in der Ausgabe als auch bei der Eingabe super.Abstriche muss man hier beim Komfort machen, da sind die teureren Modelle von Jabra besser aufgestellt. Den Mikrofonarm zu drehen ist recht laut.Durch das leichte Gewicht lässt sich das Headset lange bequem tragen und hat einen festen halt.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Received mine yesterday, used it for a couple of hours on calls...it sounds great and feels great, love it except it's USB-A.  Some of the reviews mention USB-C, and now I see there are two versions of this.  I wanted the USB-C version, otherwise I need to add an adapter to use on my phone (USB-A + an adapter is pretty bulky).

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Es una diadema muy práctica, cómoda y se escucha a la perfección, definitivamente volvería a comprarla

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: Pelo valor não compensa em comparação com outros da marca. O modelo não tem fone em couro, o som é ligeiramente mais abafado que o anterior e não possível usar sem o USB como o modelo superior que despluga e vira P2.

Review: Great sound quality, and works well in a busy office environment.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: El audio y la comodidad son muy buenos, muy contento con la compra.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 20 UC Wired Headset, Stereo Professional Telephone Headphones for Greater Productivity, Superior Sound for Calls and Music, USB Connection, All Day Comfort Design
Review: ヘッドセットとしての出来は普通。左右両用になっていますが、ヘッドホン自体には「Ｌ」「Ｒ」の表記がありません。ヘッドセットで通話するだけの用途なら良いですが、音楽だと逆で聴いてしまう可能性があります。ちなみに、マイクが付いている側が右です。
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 June 2022

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Lo mejor lo que se escuchan, pesan poco y aíslan bastante del ruido ambiente. Te puedes alejar varios metros del ordenador sin problema de cobertura  incluso con paredes de por medio. Perfectos para teletrabajo y para oficina. Los volvería a comprar.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Appareil que j'utilise toute la journée dans le cadre de mon travail, permet une autonomie et mobilité plus grande. Conforme à mes attentes, performant, en écoute parlé et batterie.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Battery life great, good sound from headphones and mic works well
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 February 2024

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Möter definitivt mina förväntningar! Sköna att ha på sig en längre stund, bra batteritid, bra ljud i hörlurarna och i micken! Jag är jättenöjd! :)

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: 今まで数千円のヘッドセットを使用していましたが、バッテリーに問題があったり音声機能に難が多かったので、値段が高いですが思い切って購入しました。音声機能はさすが、Jabraといった感じです。が、使用を始めて2週間くらいから、ヘッドバンド部分がカタガタゆるゆるとなりホールド力が無くなりました。自分は頭が大きい方なので、だいたいきつくて悩まされます。使用開始時点はちょうど良かったのですが、この短時間で使用に耐えられないくらいゆるくなってしまったので、何度か壊さない程度に手で内側に曲げて使用しています。あとイヤーパッド（スピーカー部分）、本体をぶら下げているだけで落ちてきます。

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Work perfect
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 February 2024

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Envoi rapide. Usage professionnel du casque (téléconférence) et usage régulier pour écouter de la musique. Bon compromis pour les 2 usages. Connexion Bluetooth aisée. Solide.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Brilliant headset, light weight and not hurting on the ears. Very good clear sound
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 28 September 2023

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Easy connection to phone and computer so I can use the same headset for my calls and teams meetings which is really convenient. I can hear crystal clear and people initially could hear me really well however after a recent update via the app I'm getting the sense that people are struggling to hear me on teams, so much so my last meeting ended with us doing by phone as it wasn't working, the headset worked on the phone fine so I will watch and assess over the coming week.  Apart from that it connects quickly and automatically every time you turn on after initial pairing and I love lifting the mic for muting which is excellent when on teams calls. Overall seems to be a really good headset
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 October 2022

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Returned two of these. Certified for teams.  Both randomly emit a dangerously loud white noise mid conversation.  Jabra blame it on Microsoft.  My trusty logitech H800s have no issues despite being made prior to teams even being invented.  Jabra support don't want to know and suggest raising with Microsoft which is akin to throwing a sausage up an alleyway. Not comfy to wear either in my opinion.  Overpriced incompatible garbage.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 September 2023

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Attention livré sans station de charge. La description est trompeuse.Son de bonne qualité.Super pratique connecter mon iPhone et mon pc. La bascule se fait automatiquement.Le micro est super efficace sur le pcEn revanche on m’entend mal en Bluetooth sur mon téléphone. Il faut limite mettre le micro dans la boucheSuper confortable même pour grosse tête.La House est pratique pour le transport

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Soms moet je opnieuw verbinding maken maar dat is meer een w10 Bluetooth ding dan de headset zelf
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 13 June 2023

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Bought these as I was fed up needing to be attached to or in very close range of my laptop whilst on a call, as with previous headphones. These are high quality, comfortable to wear and enable me to walk around whilst on a call if I need to. Sound quality is great and crucially noise cancellation is brilliant too - great for when you’re working in a noisy office! The headset is size adjustable so you can tailor to your needs. Bought these on Prime day and they were well worth the money with the discount.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 December 2023

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Good battery life, but the microphone does not stay in the storage position, the magnet, will not hold it, while not the end of the world, if it say it does it, it should.Okay, so after using these for a few weeks, the range of the headphones has decided to drop from about 10 metres to a couple of metres, the mute function on longer works, and if the mic is not a certain position the mic doesn't work. Tried call customers services, but they seem to be constantly on training.So overall a complete waste of money. Will now have to go a buy another headset.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 November 2022

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: En remplacement de mon précédent casque j'aurais similaire mais filaire, le bluetooth est bien pratique bien qu'ici limité à 2 devices simultanées. J'ai quelques soucis en passant d'un device à l'autre, parfois c'est comme s'il n'était pas connecté donc j'ai tendance à allumer/éteindre le bluetooth pour contrer ce problème. Sinon et vu que j'ai de l'expérience avec ces casques, j'espère que les coussinets dureront longtemps. En tout cas pour de l'usage intensif (télétravail par exemple), c'est vraiment très confortable à utiliser toute la journée, on entend bien et on est bien entendu, le casque est léger et ne fait pas mal.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: The Jabra 75 are more expensive but well worth the money. These are a bit cheap and small sized.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 April 2023

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: No hay nada mejor para teletrabajar y estar en la oficina, cómodos, ligeros y lo más importante la cancelación de ruido ha eliminado los problemas de tener que hacer llamadas con personas cerca hablando al mismo tiempo

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Nach langem hin - und her habe ich mir dieses Headset für mein Homeoffice gekauft. Dir Frage war DECT oder Bluetooth.1. Das Bluetooth hat noch vom Arbeitszimmer in die Küche, durch das Wohnzimmer bis ins Schlafzimmer funktioniert. Durch die Alu-Balkontür hat es dann kapituliert, wobei man aber eine Sprachmitteilung über den schlechten Empfang bekommt. Aber da ich es mit meinem Handy kopple und man das Handy überall hin mitnehmen kann, hat man quasi überall Empfang.2. Die Sprachqualität ist sehr gut, wurde mir zumindest von mehren Kollegen auf Nachfrage so mitgeteilt. Hindergrundgeräuche wie die Kaffeemaschine oder das Radio werden herausgefiltert :-)Ebenso ist die Klanqualität sehr gut.3. Hat man am Handy Bluetooth angeschaltet, verbindet sich der Kopfhörer automatisch, sobald man ihn anschaltet. Das lästige Suchen und koppeln fällt also weg, die Kopplung geht sehr sehr schnell.4. Es hat einen bequemen und guten Sitz.5. Ich führe pro Tag etwa ein bis 2 Stunden Gespräche. Der Akku hält mehrere Tage ohne aufzuladen. Man hat das Gefühl, dass er ewig hält. Aber auch während dem Laden kann man ihn problemlos nutzen.Ich würde jetzt ja etwas negatives schreiben, finde aber nichts. Vielleicht der Preis. Aber das sehe ich immer so: Wer billi kauft, kauft 2 x. Hier sicherlich nicht!Darum gebe ich eine klare Kaufempfehlung.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: I’m really happy with them.It does cut out on calls maybe once a week for about 3 or 4 seconds.  But great
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 February 2024

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Purchased in September 2022 and in January 2023 the earphone broke off the headband. The plastic connecting the earphone to headband is a 3-4mm circle.  The unit was replaced free of charge by Jabra. Now to July 2023 and they broke again. This is a design flaw and inherent weakness. Amazon customer service have been excellent in refunding me and I have replaced with another brand.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 July 2023

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Très bon casque audio + micro pour les call en TEAMS. très bonne restitution sonore pour l'écoute de la musique en stéréo. (re)Connexion automatique une fois que le casque est appairé. Double connexion Bluetooth avec le PC portable et le smartphone efficace. petit hic, rapport prix / performances un peu élevé ! le même casque en USB est 2 à 3 fois moins chère !

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Buscaba unos auriculares inalámbricos y con micrófono, que no pesaran y fueran cómodos.Lo primero que tengo que decir que es cuando lo pedi, en un auricular sonaba una pieza suelta y era muy molesto en el oido. Lo mande a descambiar y el siguiente vino igual, así que asumo que los auriculares son así (aunque me parece raro).En cuanto al producto en si:* Calidad del audio: Calidad normal, ni buena ni mala, pero para lo que yo lo necesitaba (videollamadas y algo de música van bien)* Cancelación de ruido: totalmente inexistente, aunque en la descripción aparece* Comodidad: Son realmente cómodos, y por mas rato que los lleves puesto ni te pesan ni molestan en las orejas.En resumen, por el precio que valen creo que deberían dar algo mas de calidad, yo lo cogí con una buena oferta y por eso puede que me lo los quede, pero por el precio original no creo que merezcan la pena

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Its noise cancelling feature is perfect. Easily connect to your device either via bluetooth, cable, or with chip. My co-workers directly recognize the difference when I switch to this headset.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 23 November 2022

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: I purchased these as I was getting fed up with the wire on my current headphones and wanted the freedom to move around while on calls, however this item is not fir for purpose. The volume on these needs to be at level 50 whereas my previous headphones would be fine on level 20. The volume up to level 30 is very feint and really not great when you are alone in a quiet office. I would urge to think about buying something else.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 November 2022

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Très satisfaite de mon casque Jabra, facile d'utilisation.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Employé dans le milieu pro par des personnes ayant une activité de support ==> besoin de confort et d'un bon son (HP et micro).Ce casque ne peut s'appareiller que sur 2 périphériques bluetooth maxi. Dans notre cas d'utilisation, il est appareiller avec un PC et un portable. Il bascule sur le portable automatiquement quand on décroche, puis reprend le PC quand on raccroche. Bonne autonomie. Appareillage très simple. Pas d'interférence avec d'autres appareils bluetooth.Bref hormis le nombre de périphérique pouvant être raccordé, rien à dire: très bon matériel, mais un peu cher...

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review:

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Ich telefoniere viel beim Spazierengehen und habe ein Headset gesucht, das bequem zu tragen ist und Umgebungsgeräusche wie Straßenlärm beim Sprechen gut abschirmt.Leider ist das Evolve 65 aus folgenden Gründen letztendlich nicht für mich geeignet:- Ich habe einen recht kleinen Kopf und selbst bei der kleinsten Einstellung ist der Bügel etwas zu groß/weit für mich, und ich habe ständig das Gefühl, dass das Headset vom Kopf rutscht, speziell, wenn man das Mikrofon hoch- oder runterklappt.- der Ton ist ziemlich leise. Es ist unangenehm, den Lautstärkeregler ständig am Anschlag zu haben, und sich trotzdem noch konzentrieren zu müssen, um den Gesprächspartner zu verstehen.- das Mikrofon dürfte zwar Sprache gut übertragen, schirmt aber kaum Nebengeräusche ab. Sogar normales Atmen wird vom Gegenüber als "Orkangeräusch" betitelt.Positiv ist mir aufgefallen (leider nicht ausreichend, um das headset zu behalten):+ stabile und unkomplizierte Bluetooth-Verbindung+ unaufdringliches Design und praktische Bedienung

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Je suis déçu. En fait il y a un problème générique avec le Bluetooth pour tous les casques : Si on veut un son wifi, on prend toute la bande passante et on perd le micro. Si on veut le micro, il réduit la bande passante du son et il se met à sonner creux. J'espérais que Jabra fonctionnerait mieux avec son dongle fourni mais ce n'est pas le cas : Ca reste du bluetooth classique, peut être avec une meilleure portée mais pas de meilleure qualité. Connecter le casque nous en déclare en fait deux sur windows, un avec "bon son" (il dit "stéréo") mais sans micro, et un autre avec "mauvais son" et micro, il faut choisir. Le connecter en filaire ne change pas le résultat. Pourquoi prendre un produit cher dans ce cas ?Par ailleurs, ce casque est posé sur les oreilles et il ne tient que par la pression qu'il exerce dessus, c'est gênant à terme et ça fait un peu mal avec des lunettes.Bref je préfère un casque bluetooth sans micro, moins cher et plus confortable, qui aura un son de qualité, et un micro correct posé sur la table à côté, on en trouve pour pas très cher qui fonctionnent très bien. Une alternative est de trouver un casque filaire qui sera de qualité pour le micro et le son...

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Es ist ein gutes Headset, sitzt gut, scheint mechanisch stabil, auf Arbeit hab ich es auch und da leistet es gute Dienste. Die ganze Phone-Integration ist überflüssig, einfacher Support für Kopfhörer und Mikrofon würde ausreichen, aber da gibt's sicher auch Abnehmer für.Das Hauptproblem ist der Bluetooth-Standard selbst. Ich zocke was, oder höre Musik - satter Sound. Ich joine nebenbei Mumble oder einen Discord-Sprachkanal - die Musik wird kurz unterbrochen und kehrt dann BRÜLLEND LAUT in 90er Jahre Kofferradio-Qualität zurück. Aua.Was ist passiert? Ein Programm hat das Mikrofon angesprochen. Der Bluetooth-Treiber schaltet daraufhin vom A2DP-Profil (gutes Audio) zum HandsFree-Profile (bestenfalls Telefonqualität, aber halt mit Mikrofon-Daten). A2DP hat halt gar keinen Kanal fürs Mikrofon, und das Headset versucht schon klug zu sein und holt HFP erst raus, wenn ein Programm das Mikrofon haben will. Aber dann gibt's halt im Bluetooth-Standard keine Optionen mehr.Der Support ist aber echt gut. Ich hab nur ein bissl den Chatbot auf deren Website gepiesackt und hatte plötzlich ein Support-Ticket offen, auf das auch tatsächlich ein echter Mensch nach wenigen Stunden reagiert hat. Der hat dann so durch die Blume gesagt, dass es mit Bluetooth halt nicht anders geht.Ich schicke das Ding jetzt jedenfalls zurück und hole mir ein Gamer-Headset. Einige davon nutzen nämlich einfach ein eigenes Funkprotokoll und haben all diese Probleme halt nicht. Dann kann ich halt nicht mehr gleichzeitig ne LED-Leiste oder meinen Kühlschrank ansprechen oder wasweißich.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Ich habe im Büro der Firma das "Jabra Headset Engage 65 Duo" und im Home Office jetzt das "Jabra Evolve 65 SE".Zum Tragekomfort muss ich sagen, tun mir die Ohren weh, nach ein paar Stunden des Tragens. Dieses Drücken habe ich bei dem "Jabra Headset Engage 65 Duo" nicht.Die Funkreichweite finde ich sehr gut. Ich kann das Stockwerk wechseln und habe weiterhin Empfang.Ich hätte mir auch einen Mikrofonschalter gewünscht, wie beim "Jabra Headset Engage 65 Duo". Die hoch und runter Schieberei nervt etwas.Ich finde es auch etwas zu teuer. Über 100 € geht gar nicht. Der Preisunterschieb zum "Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Headset", welches mit Kabel ist dürfte nur 20 € ausmachen.

ProductName: Jabra Evolve 65 SE Wireless Stereo Headset - Bluetooth Headset with Noise-Cancelling Microphone, Long-Lasting Battery - MS Teams Certified, Works with All Other Platforms - Black (6599-833-309)
Review: Das Headset ist wirklich super und hat eine tolle Qualität, jedoch stimmt die Reichweite nicht. Ich kann mich maximal 5 Meter vom Arbeitsplatz entfernen, ab dann wird die Verbindung sehr fehlerhaft und bricht letztendlich ab.

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Sounds excellent, but the last model I had of this, my cat kept yanking out the cable. Which is at a 90 degree angle for some inexplicable reason so it broke the external soundcard. But if you get the wireless one, you need a USB hub of no higher than USB2.0 to put some distance between your USB 3.0 ports and the dongle. USB3.0 interferes with the dongle so bad that it's almost not usable.That said, this is the best sounding headset I've ever used (aside from MAYBE the original Pulse 2) and I'm already pretty careful with my things so a little extra care isn't a big deal.

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Ho avuto diverse paio di cuffie negli anni, sicuramente queste sono le migliori. Sono leggere, non da fastidio l'utilizzo nemmeno per sessioni prolungate.Si nota dai materiali, è tutto minimal e principalmente in imbottitura.I padiglioni sono fantastici, io ho orecchini di medie dimensioni su entrambe orecchie sono le uniche cuffie che riesco ad usare senza doverli togliere. L'imbottitura sull'archetto è comoda, ma scivola un po'. Niente di preoccupante, basta non toccarle spesso.Passando all'audio, sono rimasto piacevolmente sorpreso. Il suono non distorce, è bello pieno sui bassi e meno sugli alti, ovviamente sono cuffie da Gaming e ci sta che sia così. Sicuramente non sono da studio di registrazione.Annullano i rumori esterni, ma solo se è il volume è abbastanza alto. Se ad esempio si parla in call è fastidioso il rimbombo della propria voce in cuffia, mentre si gioca invece passa in sordina.Molto comoda la regolazione dell'audio sulla cuffia sinistra.La scheda audio USB da un boost di qualità e di potenza che è impossibile non notare. Per chi come non ha schede audio è perfetta, in più permette la gestione ancora migliore di tutte i possibili valori dall'applicazione della Razer per desktop. La cosa buona è sicuramente che loro montano un attacco Jack, quindi si possono usare anche su cellulare, anche grazie alla possibilità di sganciare il microfono se non si necessita l'utilizzo. Quando si usano al desktop però, consiglio di unirle alla scheda audio USB.Il microfono va bene per il Gaming, mi si sente chiaro e senza intoppi.Unico problema, di cui veramente sono infastidito è il filo. Per quanto sia in tessuto, si intreccia di continuo. Penso che le prossime cuffie saranno wireless, perché non ne posso più. Quello in foto è un intreccio facilmente risolvibile, ma quando il filo non è in tiro fanno molto peggio.Per la fascia di prezzo, non credo si possa avere di meglio. La mia recensione quindi è scritta principalmente per chi cerca qualcosa su questo prezzo.

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Parto con il dire che sono le mie prime cuffie che acquisto per il Gaming , e mi pento di non aver mai avuto delle cuffie con i padiglioni ! Sempre viste come ingombranti , pesante , che fan sudare , insomma non le volevo comprare per nessuna ragione al mondo , fino a quando ho visto questo modello in particolare .Sicuramente le ho acquistate anche per l'edizione speciale , che rappresenta uno dei miei giochi preferiti , ma anche proprio per lo stile della cuffia . Chiaramente mi sono informato scrupolosamente sull'articolo prima di affrontare tale spesa , e sono veramente soddisfatto .All'interno della scatola troverete :Cavo di ricarica per interfaccia Micro-USBCavo da 3,5 mmMicrofono staccabileAdattatore USB DongleManuale dell'auricolareCustodia per l'auricolareRiporto qualche specifica tecnica che potrebbe tornare utile a qualcuno :RISPOSTA IN FREQUENZA -12 Hz – 28 kHzIMPEDENZA - 32 Ω (1 kHz)SENSIBILITÀ - 100 dB (1 kHz)DRIVER SIZE - DIAMETERS (MM) - 50 mmDRIVER TYPE - Razer™ TriForce in titanioPADIGLIONI - Cuscinetti in memory foam traspirantiDIAMETRO AURICOLARE INTERNOLarghezza: 40 mm / 1.57"Lunghezza: 65 mm / 2.55"MATERIALE CUSCINETTIMemory foam FlowKnit ultramorbidaNOISE CANCELLING - Cancellazione passiva del rumore avanzataTIPO DI CONNESSIONE - 2,4 GHz wireless e 3,5 mmLUNGHEZZA CAVO -  1,3 mPESO - 320 gSTILE MICROFONO - Supercardioide Razer™ HyperClearSCHEMA DI RILEVAMENTO - UnidirezionaleMICROPHONE FREQUENCY RESPONSE - 100 Hz – 10 kHzMICROPHONE SENSITIVITY (@1KHZ) -42 ± 3 dBVIRTUAL SURROUND ENCODING - THX Spatial AudioVOLUME CONTROL - Comandi sugli auricolari: Alza / abbassa volumeALTRI CONTROLLI - Comandi sui padiglioni auricolari: Interruttore per attivare e disattivare il microfonoDURATA DELLA BATTERIA - Fino a 24 oreLIGHTING - NessunoCOMPATIBILITA' - PC, Mac, PS4,PS5,XBOX S , XBOX SX, Nintendo SwitchOra vediamo le funzionalità più nello specificoTECNOLOGIA RAZER™ HYPERSPEED WIRELESSCon una trasmissione superveloce e una latenza estremamente bassa, queste cuffie per esport sono dotate di una connessione wireless da 2,4 GHz leader del settore per garantire un audio senza perdite che sarà sempre sincronizzato con il giocoDRIVER RAZER™ TRIFORCE IN TITANIO DA 50MMIl design brevettato consente di personalizzare ciascun driver come se ce ne fossero tre, permettendo di replicare singolarmente le frequenze audio alte, medie e basse e in modo da generare suoni più cristallini, alti più ricchi e bassi più potenti.Le Razer BlackShark V2 Pro includono anche diaframmi rivestiti in titanio per una maggiore nitidezza delle voci che senti, così che tutte le tue comunicazioni siano sempre chiare e cristalline.MICROFONO SUPERCARDIOIDE RAZER™ HYPERCLEARLo schema di rilevamento di questo microfono retrattile da 9,9 mm offre una maggiore esclusione del rumore proveniente dai lati rispetto a un microfono cardioide, e garantisce una riproduzione fedele della tua voce grazie alla sensibilità della risposta in bassa frequenza e a un alloggiamento aperto progettato per minimizzare l’ostruzione. Include supporto Razer Synapse 3 per l’accesso alle impostazioni avanzate del microfono.CANCELLAZIONE PASSIVA DEL RUMORE AVANZATAI robusti padiglioni auricolari di queste cuffie wireless, grazie alla loro imbottitura dalla perfetta aderenza, coprono le orecchie proteggendole dal rumore della folla e dell’ambiente.CUSCINETTI AURICOLARI IN MEMORY FOAM FLOWKNITIl tessuto traspirante riduce al minimo il sudore e il calore generato dal contatto con la pelle, mentre il memory foam ultra morbido dalla densità migliorata alleggerisce la forza di serraggio delle cuffie.THX SPATIAL AUDIOMigliora la tua esperienza immersiva e la tua percezione in gioco con l’audio surround di ultima generazione che offre una precisione posizionale accurata e un’acustica realistica, mentre consolidi il tuo vantaggio grazie alla sua nuovissima funzionalità: THX GAME PROFILES. Applica profili personalizzati che migliorano il design del suono già esistente nei tuoi giochi preferiti. Scegli tra le modalità THX Environmental Mode per un’esperienza immersiva davvero realistica o THX Competitive Mode per una maggiore percezione dello spazio.Per concludere non posso che consigliare queste cuffie , anche dinnanzi a una spesa non da poco , perchè li vale tutti i soldi spesi !Qualità del suono - ECCELLENTENoise  Cancelling - ECCELLENTEDurata batteria  - ECCELLENTESpero che la mia recensione ti sia stata utile per scegliere queste ottime cuffie !

DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 December 2023

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Un casque dans la globalité super bon, un boost des bass qui va rendre les musiques vraiment superbe. Une qualité sonore dans les FPS qui vas vous permettre de déterminer avec précision où est l'ennemis. Franchement un casque superbe. Le THX rend tout vraiment superbe, je n'ai jamais entendu un son aussi puissant et net que celui-ci.Mais il y a un mais. Le casque vous rend tellement immersif dans votre jeu que vous n'allez plus rien entendre autour de vous, genre littéralement plus rien. Quand vous jouerez et que vous aurez de la musique, cela va vraiment perturber le son. Il n'est pas fait pour du multi son, même en vocale sur discord le son sera atténuer c'est dommage.N'étend clairement pas habituer à cela, de mon côté cela m'a donné des vertiges et un mal de crane après 3H de jeux. Après je suis sensible au bruit du coup ça n'aide pas.Mis à part ça je ne peux que recommander ce casque, il vaut son prix!

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: I researched for two days on which headset I would buy. I'd just gotten an ASUS Strix laptop, a headset is essential due to gaming laptop fan volume! What became very quickly apparent was website, after website, after website having this model at #1 in their lists, often above far pricier models.This seemed weird, too good to be true so I started doing more research. I went to rtings website and got a list of every headset on the market, and began comparing the specs and reviews of the Blackshark V2 against top end, highest priced sets, and mid range ones in the same price bracket. I also did this process on other well known tech websites. The results were astonishing! This headset got rated better than models 2-2.5x the price! After probably 10 hours of researching and cross referencing I felt there was no other option and decided on the special edition model.I've tested it out now and I am blown away. The sound quality is astounding, the best I've experienced with a gaming headset - easily. It was rated as having very good neutral sound (true sound, without muddying from effects and enhancements), and it really does. Everything is crystal clear, bass sounds are punchy without distortion, mid range is all there, and treble sings. Also, the noise cancelling is excellent, it keeps the 49db fan noise of my machine completely silenced to my ears. The headset is also incredibly comfortable, and I have very sensitive ears so make of that what you will. I find the build quality fantastic.The sound card and synapse app that allow EQ customisation is a true game changer. Any minor shortcomings the audio range may have can be completely rectified and bring out the full potential of these amazing headphones. To that end I found a brilliant guide from a music producer on reddit and I heartily recommend these settings:In Synapse:Keep volume below 75 (74 is recommended, this is to prevent audio outs which can occur at higher levels). *This doesn't affect the physical volume using the knob on the set*Turn all enhancements off.Set custom EQ with these in the following order: 0, 0, -3, -3, +1, 0, +3, -1, -4, +8THX Spacial is personal preference, I personally use "Dolby Atmos For Headphones" on my laptop as I find it superior, but there are a fair amount of games that specifically use the former, so I'll experiment.Overall this is a truly exceptional headset, especially considering the price. I'm a solid loyal customer from now on, I look forward to a V3 down the line!10/10
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 January 2023

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Juste trop content de mon achat je l'ai eu en promos et j'ai immédiatement adorer. ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Mein Sohn ist begeistert

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Ich habe mir dieses Headset aufgrund des schicken Designs und der USB-Soundkarte zugelegt.---Tragekomfort 5/5---Vorweg habe ich mich natürlich über Tonqualität und Komfort informiert, letzteres war mir als Brillenträger mit empfindlichen Ohren besonders wichtig. Wie viele andere Rezensionen schon bemerkt haben, ist das Headset sehr leicht und weich, sodass man fast das Gefühl hat als würde man es gar nicht tragen, eignet sich also sehr für lange Sessions am PC ohne schmerzende Ohren zu kriegen. Komischerweise fühlt es sich jedoch so an als würde die linke Ohrmuschel langsam runter rutschen. (könnte aber auch meiner Kopfform liegen. Wenn man 'nen dickeren Schädel hat, hat das Headset sicherlich mehr Anpressdruck und rutscht nicht.)---Tonqualität 4,5/5---Der Ton klingt ziemlich ausbalanciert, klar und etwas bassiger (wie von Gaming-Headsets gewohnt). Wenn das einem nicht gefällt hat man jedoch genug Einstellungsmöglichkeiten in der Razer Synapse Software (die bei mir anfangs das Headset nicht erkannt hat, nach einem Update von Synapse ging es dann.) Obwohl ich normalerweise kein Fan von simuliertem Surround-Sound bin, muss ich sagen dass ich vom THX Spatial Audio positiv überrascht bin. Man hört z.b. Schritte/Schüsse von Gegner wirklich merkbar genauer!---Mikrofonqualität 5/5---Über das Mikrofon ist man gut verständlich, ein Pop-Filter ist dabei und in der nicht-X-Variante ist es sogar abnehmbar, heißt wenn man mal ein separates Mikrofon kauft, hat man nicht immer eins nebem dem Gesicht hängen. Das Noise-Cancelling ist bei weitem das beste das ich je getestet hab. Nicht mal wenn man wollte würde es Hintergrundgeräusche von anderen Leuten die reden, PC Geräusche, Tastaturanschläge, Mausclicks oder lautes Atem aufnehmen. Jedoch klingt das Mikrofon, wenn man es über die beiliegende Soundkarte angeschlossen hat komischerweise etwas dumpfer als wenn man es über den herkömmlichen AUX anschließt.Andere coole Features: abnehmbares Mikrofon (nur für die nicht-X-Variante vom Headset, USB-Soundkarte die den Sound am herkömmlichen PC nochmal etwas aufpeppt (ebenfalls nur für die non-X-Variante), Volume Knob an dem man die Lautstärke am Headset selber ändern kann (der sich aus irgendeinem Grund an der linken, anstatt der rechten Seite befindet?) und ein Mute Switch.---Overall 4,5 oder 5/5---Ich habe das Headset für ungefähr 80€ anstatt den normalen 129,99/119,99€ erworben und würde deswegen sagen, das die Endbewertung davon abhängt, für welchen Preis man an das Headset kommt, denn 130€ sind schon etwas dicke.für ~80€ - 5/5für 129,99/119,99€ - 4,5/5

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: PArtiamo dal presupposto che la spedizione di amazon è sempre la migliore, detto questo passiamo al prodotto, un headset molto bello alla vista pulito nel design e quando le indossi non le senti neanche da quanto sono leggere. le caratteristiche principali di queste cuffie sono 2: 1) l'insonorizzazione quasi totale dal mondo esterno è una cosa incredibile senti solo il gioco-film-serie tv 2) l'audio spaziale è assurdo, grazie al razer synapse ti permette di fare qualsiasi modifica e quasiasi settaggio audio per permetterti di avere l'audio migliore in ogni contesto. Io le uso principalmente per il gaming e sento rumori che prima non sentivo con le cuffie precedenti. La  schedina audio compresa nell'attacco permette di avere un audio ancora piu pulito. Prodotto top di gamma per i miei gusti molto soddisfatto ed entusiasta dell'acquisto

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: ignore all the stupid reviews about the bad mic and the connection and whatnot ive had one of these headsets since day one and im still using it now and just orderd the siege version just for a different colour really. so connection issue ive never once had a problem at all. the only bugging thing from time to time is the razer app as we all know can be a bit of an annoyance setting the headset up can be pretty difficult to but once set up right in the app my god does this headset bang. you can hear most fps games 10 fold with footsteps no problem and the bass is beyond ridiculously good same as the sound quality as for the mic everyone says is subpar my friends are streamers and they say the quality is just as good as some of their equipment which is probably 3x the price of what a set of these would've cost brand new at £180 / £200 rrp.  as for the clamp and headset build its one of the best I've ever had the head clamp is still as good the headband hasn't even deformed or gone flat and its 2 years old. really comfy and really light as i wear glasses i struggle to find a good comfy headset that doesn't hurt my ears and this is the only headset that performs on all those fronts as well as being super reliable. just wish razer had put type c or a wireless charge dock variant of this headset out because its really worth it. 10/10 headset had astros a50s and they broke in 3 days crap headband clamps and same with artic pros they're terrible
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 December 2022

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Aún no lo he probado conectado con la clavija; pero con la tarjeta USB no necesita tocar nada para tener un sonido excelente. El micrófono también se oye estupendamente.Es además muy cómodo. La profundidad de 2cm de las orejeras es suficiente para no oirse los latidos. Si se oyen es suficientemente bajo para que desaparezcan mientras se oye algo.No son tan grandes como las imágenes me hacían esperar, con lo que tampoco resultan estéticamente feos.Si tuviera que poner un pero, sería que las orejeras de tela quedan empapadas con el sudor, ya que calientan mucho las orejas. Pero espero que no se pelen como todas las de polipiel.

ProductName: Razer BlackShark V2 Special Edition Wired Gaming Headset with USB Sound Card
Review: Nachdem ich nun einige Headsets ausprobiert habe, bin ich beim Blackshark hängen geblieben und kann gut und gerne sagen, das es zu den besten Headsets gehört die ich bisher getestet habe.Klang ist super, es stört auch bei längerem Tragen nicht und das Kabel ist wirklich lange genug.Sehr schön finde ich auch das abnehmbare Mikrophon, somit kann man es auch als normalen Kopfhörer verwenden oder kann es bei defekt austauschen

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: BT600の5200UCとBT700の5200UC、どこが違うか調べてみました！最大の違いは充電ケースでしょうか。BT600のモデルのケースは隠れるようにドングルを収納していたのですが、BT700は表にドン！とあります。ドングル自体も違っていて、BT600は360度LEDが光る仕様ですがBT700は片面にのみ光る場所があるのでUSBの取り付け方によっては光が見えないかもしれないでしょう。本体はpolyのロゴに変わっている以外は特別変わった点は無いように思えます。過酷な環境では使っていないのでノイキャンとかもしかしたら進化しているかもですが…本体、充電ケース共にMicro USBでの充電という点は同じです。正直言ってここがUSB-Cになっていたら神仕様だったのですがそう美味い話は無いようです。あと写真にもありますがどちらもメキシコ製です。上がBT600の箱で下がBT700の箱になります。とりあえずは以上です。また何か気づいた点があれば都度追記していきます。

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Il Poly Voyager 5200 UC è uno di quegli auricolari che sembrano pensati apposta per la vita di tutti i giorni, soprattutto per chi non si ferma mai. Immagina di dover fare una telefonata mentre il vento si alza o sei in una strada trafficata e i clacson non smettono di suonare: con questo auricolare, la tua voce arriva chiara e limpida dall'altra parte, come se fossi in una stanza silenziosa. È leggero, comodo da indossare anche per ore, e la batteria dura abbastanza da accompagnarti per tutta la giornata. Oltre a questo, la funzione di avviso vocale sulla durata della batteria rimanente è una di quelle piccole chicche che non sai di volere fino a quando non le hai. Se sei sempre in movimento o se il tuo lavoro ti tiene incollato al telefono, il Voyager 5200 UC potrebbe davvero fare la differenza.

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Branchez le dongle USB à un port de votre PC et allumez l’oreillette … ça y est, tout fonctionne ! Immédiatement reconnu sous Windows 10 et 11.Je me déplace régulièrement dans la semaine dans le cadre de mon travail. J’anime et participe à de nombreuses visioconférences et là j’ai enfin trouvé LE casque idéal.Petit et léger, on oublie qu’on le porte ! La qualité du son est très bonne. J’avais peur avec une seule oreillette d’être gêné par le bruit alentour en open space mais pas du tout !Mes collègues m’entendent parfaitement et ceux présents dans la pièce sont ravis car je ne crie plus (et oui, je fais partie de ces personnes qui ont le défaut de parler plus fort avec un casque sur les oreilles 😅).Côté autonomie, je l’utilise une semaine avec une seule charge du boîtier.Je suis ravi et le recommande !!!Un dernier point, car je ne voyais pas l’information dans les descriptifs : l’oreillette peut se porter aussi bien du côté gauche que du côté droit 😉

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Das Headset ist ein professionelles Bluetooth-Headset, das ich seit ein paar Monaten regelmäßig benutze. Ich bin sehr zufrieden mit dem Headset, denn es eignet sich für den Einsatz im Büro, unterwegs und zu Hause. Es verfügt über eine hohe Sprachqualität dank Noise Cancelling, das unerwünschte Hintergrundgeräusche reduziert. Ich kann damit klar und deutlich kommunizieren, auch wenn ich mich in einer lauten Umgebung befinde.Ein weiterer Vorteil ist die Möglichkeit, das Headset mit meinem Smartphone und meinem PC gleichzeitig zu koppeln. So kann ich nahtlos zwischen Anrufen und anderen Audioanwendungen wechseln. Das Headset hat auch eine praktische Sprachsteuerung, die mir erlaubt, Anrufe anzunehmen oder abzulehnen, die Lautstärke zu regeln oder den Akkustand abzufragen, ohne einen Knopf zu drücken.Das Aufladen des Headsets ist sehr einfach, dank der mitgelieferten Ladebox. Die Box hat einen integrierten Akku, der das Headset bis zu zwei Mal aufladen kann. So kann ich das Headset auch unterwegs nutzen, ohne eine Steckdose zu suchen. Die Box ist außerdem kompakt und leicht zu transportieren.Die Gesprächsdauer des Headsets ist beeindruckend. Ich kann bis zu 14 Stunden lang telefonieren, bevor ich das Headset wieder aufladen muss. Das reicht für einen ganzen Arbeitstag oder mehrere Tage bei moderater Nutzung. Das Headset hat auch einen Bewegungssensor, der erkennt, ob ich das Headset trage oder nicht. Wenn ich das Headset abnehme, werden die Anrufe automatisch auf mein Smartphone umgeleitet.Das Headset ist sehr angenehm zu tragen, da es ein geringes Gewicht hat und sich gut an mein Ohr anpasst. Es hat ein schickes Design und eine matte Oberfläche. 3 unterschiedlich große Ohrpolster sind aus Silikon gefertigt und fühlen sich weich an. Dadurch kann ich das Headset problemlos über längere Zeiträume tragen, ohne Beschwerden zu haben.Fazit: Das Poly Voyager 5200 UC - Headset mit Ladebox ist ein hochwertiges Produkt, das mir viele Vorteile bietet. Es hat einen guten Klang und eine gute Rauschunterdrückung, die mir eine klare Kommunikation ermöglichen. Es ist mit meinem Smartphone und meinem PC gleichzeitig koppelbar, was mir Flexibilität gibt. Es ist einfach aufzuladen, auch unterwegs, dank der Ladebox. Es hat eine lange Gesprächsdauer und einen Bewegungssensor, die mir Komfort bieten. Es ist leicht und angenehm zu tragen, mit einem schicken Design.Ich vergebe dem Headset fünf von fünf Sternen, weil es mich überzeugt hat und meinen Erwartungen entspricht. Ich würde es jedem empfehlen, der ein professionelles Bluetooth-Headset sucht und bereit ist, etwas mehr Geld auszugeben.

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,

I can walk around the house and keep conversations going without a break in reception.  Very happy with these even at the price.

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Da ich durch meinen Job sowohl viel im Büro als auch unterwegs bin, war ich auf der Suche nach einem Headset was beides abdecken kann. Mit dem Voyager habe ich das nun gefunden. Es ist ein toller Kompromiss aus Mobilität und UC-Funktionalität bei verhältnismäßig hoher Akkulaufzeit. Ich nutze das Headset ausschließlich zum telefonieren und nicht für Multimedia und da macht es eine super Figur. Im Vergleich zu anderen Headsets dieser Größe werde ich endlich gut verstanden, das haben selbst teilweise deutlich teurere Headsets nicht besser, eher schlechter hinbekommen. Ich denke der lange Mikrofonarm nach vorne tut hier einen guten Dienst. Die Geräuschunterdrückung funktioniert ebenfalls gut und ich werde auch während der Autofahrt (Aussage vom Kollegen, er hört gar nicht, dass ich fahre) als auch in Anspruchsvolleren (=lauteren) Kundenumgebungen gut gehört.Die Basisstation ist super und mein Highlight ist der Dongle, so habe ich das Headset parallel mit dem Notebook (per USB Dongle) und dem iPhone (per Bluetooth) verbunden. Wenn ich dann los muss klappe ich das Notebook einfach zu und kann, ohne irgendetwas einstellen zu müssen, am iPhone weiter telefonieren. Das funktioniert absolut top und erleichtert mir den Arbeitsalltag enorm.Ansonsten empfinde ich das Headset als angenehm zu tragen, ich habe relativ große Ohren und da passt es super dran, auch ist es angenehm leicht, sodass ich es nach ein paar Minuten gar nicht mehr bewusst wahrnehme.Von mir eine absolute Empfehlung für einen tollen Allrounder sowohl im Büro als auch unterwegs.

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Tutto ok, buona qualità, unica cosa - per me volume non abbastanza alto. Persona con chi parlo mi sente benissimo. 6 ore di conversazioni sono realmente 6 ore.

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: The Bluetooth pairing to both computer and phone was fast and straightforward. Just be careful to mute on one  when talking the other. Small box case and charger is handy, keeping all parts and accessories together. Wearing the unit in the ear is like wearing nothing. Very comfortable.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 February 2024

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Been using this headset for the past 15 years.  So I'm on my 3rd one.  I decided last time to go with Jabra, had the Talk 65.  It looks the same as the Poly, on paper it seems slightly better, minus the UC support.  However, it's not even close to the Poly.  The main issue was the volume, just too quiet, and other bugs which drove me mad.  This Poly 5200 UC is worth every penny.  Switches so well between PC and smartphone, its clear, noise cancelling is miles better than the Jabra Talk 65 too.  Would highly recommend, and get it with the charging case, you won't regret it.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 December 2023

Review: I like it.

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Ich durfte das Set im Rahmen eines Produkttestes mal ausprobieren und hier sind meine Gedanken dazu:Grundsätzlich finde ich die gesamte Gestaltung des Headsets sehr elegant. Er sieht in schwarz mit roten Farbakzenten gut aus, wiegt nicht zu viel und fällt in der Tasche inkl. Ladebox nicht sehr ins Gewicht.Gefallen hat mir der relativ große Bewegungsraum der mir das Headset liefert. So muss ich manchmal in Besprechungen die Räume wechseln und bisher hat er mich da noch immer weiter verbunden gelassen. Die Akkulaufzeit reicht bisher locker für einen Vormittag ohne laden. Meistens hänge ich sie in der Mittagspause ans Netz und komme dann gut über den Tag. Hier wird es spannend sein, wie sich die Akkuleistung bei täglicher Nutzung über mehrere Monate verändert. Derzeit da aber kein Tadel. Die vorhandene Rauschunterdrückung finde ich in der Firma gerade mit Hintergrundgeräuschen sehr angenehm. Die Kopfhörer ließen sich auch ohne Probleme mit meiner Garmin Uhr, meinem Samsung Handy (jeweils mit Bluetooth) und dem HP Laptop (über Dongle) verbinden. Inwiefern es Einschränkungen mit Apple gibt, kann ich hier nicht einschätzen.Was mich tatsächlich aber etwas ärgert ist der Klang. Das Mikro, so ist die Rückmeldungen der anderen Besprechungsteilnehmer ist wohl gut verständlich aber für mich im Ohr kommen meine Gegenüber sehr blechern rüber. Ich telefoniere sonst mit den LG Tone und da ist der Sound besser. Hier ist natürlich viel Technik auf wenig Platz verbaut, was natürlich auch irgendwie untergebracht werden muss. Ich finde das einsetzen des Kopfhörer übers Ohr immer etwas aufwendig und ich muss genau kontrollieren ob er nun richtig sitzt. Auch finde ich ein USB-A Ladenschluss nicht mehr zeitgemäß. Das Laden ist vermutlich auch die größte Baustelle des Gerätes. In der beiliegenden Box klappt es ohne Probleme, sollte man jedoch mit der geschlossenen Box von außen laden wollen, muss man genau den Winkel treffen, dass das Gerät auch richtig lädt. Das sollte einfacher sein. Auch sind die kleinen, blauen Signalleuchten beim laden nicht immer wirklich ehrlich. Mal hat er angezeigt, alles voll und dann war's ratzfatz wieder leer. Also da gibt es noch Potential.Mein Resümee: ein ordentliches Headset für Konferenzen, jedoch gibt es bessere beim Klang und in der Handhabung

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review:
I bought the Poly Voyager 5200 UC headset and I recived it six days ago.. But I am totally dissapointed to have my new headset defective. I got embarrassed during the management meetings as they were not able to hear me correctly while I am relying on reputable brand... They kept saying that your vocie is cutting.. First I thought it is an internet issue or laptop issue or .. or....It took me days to identify that the problem is from the headset itself and whenever I raise my arm or hand nearby the headset, my voice starts cutting.. I was not expecting such experience from Poly ( Plantronics ) itself!I opened a ticket with poly technical support, they told if you are wearing an eye glasses it could interfere.. !!  And asked me to do reset to the headset. Steps are as follows:
  








  
  
    . So I repeated the same test call with no eye glasses and same issue is still happening .. So disappointing!In addition to that issue. I returned the defective headset on Aug 10, and till today I havent received the refund !! I have been chasing Amazon throught tickets with no any result.... !!!
