ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Excelente

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: The sound and voice quality is great. However, the piece that goes behind your ear is quite bulky. It pushes the top of your ear out quite a bit.  It was challenging to wear both the earpiece and glasses at the same time…was very uncomfortable. We had to return them as they didn’t work out.

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Over the last 15 years, I've been a loyal Voyager fan (long before Poly and Voyager brands). Every 5 years or so, I would wear it out and buy a new one.Today, I had a totally different experience. The most recent purchase just wouldn't take a charge. Bummer first issue I've every had.So, I submitted a warranty claim. Within minutes it was processed and the tracking number for the replacement was sent along with instructions for returning the original.It was the smoothest, simplest Warranty experience EVER!Now I have a whole new reason to be a loyal customer :).
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 22 January 2024

ProductName: Plantronics Poly Voyager 5200 UC Wireless Headset & Charging Case - Single-Ear Bluetooth Headset w/Noise-Canceling Mic - Connect to Mobile/PC via Bluetooth -Works w/Microsoft Teams, Zoom & More,
Review: Beruflich wie auch privat habe ich nach einem guten und ansprechendem Headset gesucht und bin hier beim Poly Voyager auch fündig geworden.Es ist sehr flexibel, lässt sich wirklich in alle Richtungen einstellen und ans Ohr anpassen.Man kann es natürlich rechts und links tragen und sich entsprechend ausrichten.Ein Ladekabel ist dabei sowie ein schützendes Hardcase, in das man das Headset bei Nichtgebrauch auch wirklich tun sollte. Dazu wie üblich eine Gebrauchsanweisung, die man aber nicht unbedingt braucht.Das Headset macht einen sehr edlen und ansehnlichen Eindruck, jedoch ist es relativ schwer bzw. muss man sich damit am Ohr erstmal gewöhnen. Bedenken habe ich nur, dass es bei schnellerer Bewegung etc. vielleicht auch mal aus dem Ohr fällt. Das dürfte natürlich nicht passieren, das werde ich aber noch testen.Einstellungen muss man nicht groß vornehmen. Das Set ist ziemlich selbsterklärend. Es lässt sich simpel mit Bluetooth über das Handy verbinden. Klang und Audioausgabe sind super, und für das Geld sollte das Poly Voyager schon was bieten. Das tut es auf jeden Fall und ich kann sagen, dass es durchaus ein cooles Teil ist. So ist es auch nicht zu klein, sodass man es nicht ständig verlegt.Alles in allem ein nützliches Gadget gerade auch für unterwegs und mit lauter Geräuschkulisse in der Umgebung.Ich kann es jedem, dem das "Gewicht" nichts ausmacht, auf jeden Fall empfehlen, aber das mit dem Gewicht ist auch emfindungssache.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: I honestly thought the haptics would be a gimmic but they really add a nice dimension. The sound has deep bass without sacrificing treble or being rumble and the sound has an overall warm tone. The mic is also one of the best headset microphones I’ve heard. Amazon asked me to rate the battery but these are wired so draw their power from usb.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Para empezar los audífonos, salieron buenos, ya llevo 2 meses usándolos y son perfectos. Cabe aclarar que el paquete llegó bien, los audífonos son reconocidos por el programa de razer, así que todo está bien.-En cuanto al hypersense, tiene 3 fases y la ultima es bastante fuerte, a mi me da cosquillas en las orejas cuando está al máximo, al principio fue extraño, pero con el tiempo te acostumbras y te da mucha inmersión.-Los audífonos puedo usarlos largos periodos de tiempo y no me pican los oídos.-Debes tener cuidado, por que al tener puestos los audífonos, se bloquea todo el sonido del exterior, he tenido problemas con mis padres ya que tocan el timbre y golpean la puerta y yo no lo he escucho. en verdad bloquean mucho el ruido del exterior.-Tienen RGB y puedes configurar el color y como quieres que aparezca, aparte de que puedes modificar muchas cosas de sonido-El micrófono no están bueno, pero se defiende bastante bien.El único punto en contra es que la diadema no se es de regulamiento fijo y a veces se  baja de más por si sola.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Sonen är väldigt nöjd med sin julklapp, nu kan han försvinna in i spelets värld, utan att bli distraherad av lillebror som spelar och pratar på andra sidan rummet.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Dit is mijn 2e razer kraken, mijn 1e is een kraken TE en doet het nog geweldig.Deze besteld omdat ik toch nieuwsgierig was naar de hypersense, en ben positief verrast.De trillingen zijn leuk en voegen voor mij toch een meerwaarde aan het gamen.Alleen de oorkussens hadden iets groter mogen zijn, zeker omdat ik mijn andere kraken gewend ben die wat iets groter zijn en ook een verkoelend effect hebben.De microfoon kan ik niets over zeggen omdat ik deze niet gebruik, heb een aparte mic.Maar al bij al een goede headset en zeker voor die prijs(+/- 70€)

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: After buying 2 turtle beach headsets that broke in the same place i decided to go for these, looking to avoid headsets with weak stanction supports above the ears these seemed pretty decent and solid, the amplification on these was a great match to turtle beach if not better and hopefully a solid construction aswell but only time will tell but defo worth the price, this was the wired version aswell, looking forward to putting it through the paces, updated review to follow in a few months.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 February 2024

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: llevo ya un mes con ellos y solo tengo buenas palabras.Son super cómodos, el sonido es espectacular y el micro también funciona perfecto. Las apps de Razer para sus productos funcionan muy bien y puedes mejorar el sonido, programarlo, luces...Lo prefiero con cable ya que no quiero estar dependiendo de baterías y que en el peor momento se me pare o lo que sea. es suficientemente largo para que no tengas problemas de tirones.Tiene una rueda de volumen y un mute en su auricular izquierdo y es muy útil10/10

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: rapide d'expédition le est est parfait très bonne qualité je le conseil

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Great for audio, great microphone. LED lights are very pretty and can customise them.Only 2 downsides: occasional static noises that happen very rarely and cause is unknown and because the headset is heavy, after hours of wearing it makes my ears hurt.Recommend if you don’t use a headset for a long period of time.The hypersense feature is too much for me so I prefer not to use it.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 December 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Commentaire en français et englishJ ai branché le casque, le son est bon quand les réglage dans le logiciel ssynapse est bon : les améliorations audio sont automatiquement réglé sur le mode "jeu" et donc en "7.1" ce qui pour certaines applications comme youtube ou autres applications audio/vidéo, cela donne un son pas super. Je conseille de le passer en mode manuel puis régler le type de son par application ( mode jeu, stéréo, film ... )Ensuite j avais remarqué un bruit bizarre redondant toutes les 2-3s dans l'écouteur gauche, cela est du au RGB lorsqu il est réglé de manière à ce que ça change de couleur, il faut soit le passer en statique soit le désactiver. Si ça peut aider des gens qui ont acheté le casque avec les mêmes soucis. Je mets 4 étoiles et non 5 pour ce dernier soucisI plugged in the headphones, the sound is good when the settings in the synapse software are good: the audio enhancements are automatically set to "game" mode and therefore to "7.1" which for certain applications such as youtube or other audio applications / video, it doesn't sound great. I advise to switch it to manual mode then adjust the type of sound by application (game mode, stereo, film ...)Then I noticed a weird redundant noise every 2-3s in the left earphone, this is due to the RGB when it is set so that it changes color, you have to either switch it to static or deactivate it. If it can help people who bought the helmet with the same problem. I put 4 stars and not 5 for this last concern

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: 1 dislike is that the product needs alot of tweaking to have it feel good. Very comfortable ear cups and usability.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 January 2024

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: I’ve always had razer products but the mic on this headset got me flamed over discord. The sound quality is absolutely AMAZING though, just the mic is really disappointing over discord for some reason, but it’s alright on windows and other apps.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 December 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: C'est un très bon casque au prix de 80€ en filaire au moment de l'achat.Je l'ai pris une première fois en version sans fil, je vous le déconseil car malgrès se qui est annoncer, la charge ne tiens pas plus de 3 heures en mode hypersenses.De plus, toujours en version sans fil il y a des bugs de déconnexion (le casque s'éteint tout seul), parfois il n'y a pas de son nécessitant à reconnecté le dongle USB. Et pour finir le THX qui fait des siennes (blue screen, réinstallation car la sortie audio n'est pas sur le casque WTF ? etc...)Je l'ai donc repris en version cablé pour évité se genre de problèmes.Niveau confort rien à redire, il est super agréable à porter, la qualité du son avec le THX est très bonne, toutefois si vous désactivez le THX je vous conseil de bien mettre une EQ afin d'avoir un son potable.Le mode hypersenses ou "vibrations" est un peu gadget car je l'utilise surtout pour flex avec mes potes sur de la musique, en sois je l'utilise pas tant que sa car sur discord ou sur une vidéo/live a moins d'aimer l'ASMR sa n'a pas grand intérêt.Bref, il y a mieux comme casque mais vu qu'il a baissé de prix il est rentable.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: I'm no expert, but these are some of the best headphones I've ever owned!They have flaws and maybe I expected something more, but I don't regret the purchase!

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Toujours déçu par les casques Razer jusqu'alors, j'ai été très intrigué par cette technologie haptique. Et bien on peut dire que je ne suis pas déçu !Déjà, le casque est super confortable, même après plusieurs heures sur les oreilles, on le sent à peine. Le son est quand à lui très bon pour un casque de cette gamme de prix. Les aigus un peu en retrait, mais facilement corrigible avec l'égaliseur sur Synapse.Synapse qui par ailleurs est encore une fois ce qui pêche ici, le logiciel est une petite purge quand il s'y met, mais une fois qu'on a réussi à tout configurer, le casque garde tout en mémoire, plus besoin de s'en inquiéter. La spatialisation marche plutôt bien, ça fait plaisir de voir cette technologie enfin aboutir à des bons résultats.Pour finir, le petit gadget rigolo, l'Hypersense, ou le retour haptique dans les coussinets, avec trois niveaux d'intensité, qui peut être désactivé à la volée avec le bouton de l'écouteur droit, qui rajoute vraiment un peu d'immersion, notamment dans les jeux de tir, les oreilles qui vibre à chaque balle tirée ou qui vous siffle à côté de la tête, c'est très sympa ! On ne révolutionne pas le genre et on aura tendance à le désactiver quand on cherche à être compétitif, mais c'est un petit plus très sympa quand on veut s'immerger dans un jeu, voire même en écoutant de la musique !On est au final sur un casque de très bonne facture avec un rapport qualité prix très satisfaisant !

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Muy buena calidad de materiales, robusto, el sonido es realmente envolvente, muy conseguido, muy bien integrado con Windows gracias a Razer Synapse. Pero tienen un problema, al igual que al parecer otros modelos de Razer, y es que si conectas los cascos en un USB que esté al lado de otro que se esté utilizando, genera una estática en forma de pitido que molesta bastante, se nota sobre todo en los chats de voz de Discord o Teams entre otros.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Die Entscheidung für dieses Headset erfolgte nach kurzer Recherche über Headsets mit haptischem Feedback (Vibration bei tiefen Tönen), wie es das "Puma" von "Klim" meiner Meinung nach sehr gut umgesetzt hat.Das Razer Kraken V3 Hypersense kommt nach Außen hin qualitativ hochwertig verarbeitet daher, mit hohem Tragekomfort. Die Bügel lassen sich je nach Kopfform über kleine Einrastmechanismen stabil und gut verstellen und die Muscheln schließen sehr gut um das Ohr herum ab, womit eine wesentliche akustische Abschirmung gelingt.Nach dem sämtliche Treiber und notwendigen Programme installiert waren, konnte ich leider schnell feststellen, dass etwas am Klang des Headsets nicht stimmt. Mit sämtlichen Einstellungen des Treiberprogrammes ein- oder ausgeschaltet, vom Minimum bis Maximum verändert ließen sich diverse Störgeräusche und Doppelungen nicht verhindern, im besten Fall nur verringern. Als Quelle dienten sowohl Youtube, Twitch-Streams (die einen ganz merkwürdigen Hall erzeugten), Musik-Portale und Audio-Quellen von der Festplatte.Das mit Abstand größte Manko, meiner Meinung nach, war allerdings das sog. "haptische Feedback".Es kommt in 4 Stufen daher (Aus, wenig, medium, stark) und lässt sich sowohl im Treiber, als auch am Headset selbst regeln, bzw. ausschalten.Sobald man diesen Modus aktiviert, überlagert der Ton komplett und wirkt stark verfälscht. Ich hatte fast den Eindruck, als wären in den Muscheln Teile lose und würden schnell hin- und hergeschleudert.Vom verfälschten Ton abgesehen, erinnerte mich die Vibration eher an ein Nintendo64-Rumble-Pack oder einen alten Playstation 4 Controller, welchen man sich an die Schläfe hält.Statt einer angenehmen Vibration, die zum Bass verstärkend wirkt, empfand ich dieses Feedback als plump und unangenehm umgesetzt. Das hatte das "Puma" der Firma "Klim" deutlich angenehmer umgesetzt.Mein Hauptaugenmerk für ein neues Headset lag auf dem haptischen Feedback, das nach meinem Empfinden nach nicht ansprechend umgesetzt wurde.Leider kann ich nicht sagen, ob es sich um einen technischen Mangel meines Produktes handelt oder die Produktlinie im Allgemeinen so funktioniert. Die Überlagerungen und Störgeräusche bei sämtlichen Audioquellen und Einsatzgebieten machen es mir allerdings unmöglich, für knapp 90 Euro ein Auge zu zudrücken.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: I hasitated which one to order out of 15 different kinds of headphones but I couldn't be more satisfied. This is far the best headphones I have ever had. The sound quality is brilliant it's just so load I can't go above 60% but don't even have to (yet haha) the vibrating function gives such an amazing experience in all sort of video games. I definitely recommend it if you looking for a decent headphones for gaming.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 November 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Super klsng, das mikro macht was es soll und durch die Vibration in den Kopfhörern ein echtes Erlebnis beim zocken

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Ich bin mit dem Produkt sehr zufrieden.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Ordered these to replace some many years old hyperx cloud 2's. Was intrigued by hypersense and wanted a headset to match my desk setup.On opening, this headset is beautifully made. They feel high quality, plenty of metal in the frame and plushness to the fabrics. Typical razer packaging, too.I was excited to try them thinking they would be a big improvement over a 7 year old headset and.... no, they aren't. Hypersense is fun in some games but in general web use its annoying as it gives a tinny reverb to the headset.The biggest issue is sound quality. They just aren't up to par with the Kingston made cloud 2's. The bass is muddy, mids and highs are just OK. Not good enough for a headset that cost more than double what I paid for my old battered headset 7 years ago. The soundstage is very poor. In COD, you can hear footsteps but have no idea where they are coming from. Spatial awareness is non-existant.THX spatial is a gimmick that adds nothing, pretty much like all software spatial post-processing. The 7.1 on my cloud 2s is trash and this is no better. Its something I'd never use.Connectivity options are poor, too. I knew this when buying the headset hoping the audio performance would be worth it, but it's simply not.Back for a refund it goes. And back to a kingston made cloud 2 I  go.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 September 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Vom Design her gefallen mir die Kopfhörer, der Sound ist in Ordnung, man hört alles deutlich, aber Mikro macht Probleme, ich habe die Software installiert um alles einzustellen.Man hörtmich als ob ich von der Ferne spreche, keine Einstellung hat so wirklich geholfen.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Update: Es gibt ein Firmwareupdate für die Kopfhörer, dass schon lange draußen ist, ich aber nur durch Zufall gefunden habe. Seitdem finde ich laufen sie deutlich besser und ich würde jeden empfehlen es einzuspielen.Das Wichtigste zuerst, dass Headset ist, meiner Meinung nach zufriedenstellend.Tonqualität, sowie Mikro finde ich gut.Hypersense funktioniert und ist eine ziemlich nette Funktion (auch trotz Brille, entgegen anderer Bewertungen die ich hier gelesen habe).Negativ ist die Software. Irgendwie funktioniert sie nie richtig bei mir, was die THX Spatial Audio Einstellungen angeht.Die Standardeinstellungen waren ebenfalls nichts für mich, aber da habe ich dann im Internet einen guten Guide gefunden, mit dem ich den Equalizer in der Synapse Software auf für mich passende Werte geschraubt habe.Ein paar Bewertungen hier haben von "fiepen" oder Störgeräuschen gesprochen. Ersteres konnte ich nicht wahrnehmen, aber Störgeräusche kommen (sehr selten) tatsächlich vor. Mir persönlich macht das jetzt nicht aus, wenn mal kurz eine Interferenz Auftritt, aber das muss jeder für sich selbst wissen.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: The haptic effects makes the difference, very nice experience on gameplay and for music too, be aware that you have to pay extra £20 for THS Spatial software.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 November 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: After using Logitech for a long time and becoming frustrated with driver issues of the G-Hub software I decided to try Razer who are well advertised and reviewed. This is their latest headset for features and I prefer wired for reliability reasons so picked this up.The sound is okay if a bit bassy, build quality is decent and it's comfortable to wear, mic is neither the best, nor worst I used. Had so many issues with high pitched whistling and popping with the sound, if you watch a video and then close it then it makes a loud whistling sound for 10 seconds followed by a pop and it does this constantly while using them. Also it will randomly disconnect from USB and I need to take it out and plug it back in for my PC to recognise it. It's happened in multiple USB slots and nothing else disconnects like this so it's definitely the headset.This headset has this haptic nonsense that just makes the ear cups vibrate to the sound which is supposed to be more immersive in games but it just irritates me. If you like your ears vibrating constantly then good for you I guess. The Synapse software is no better than G-Hub and causes issues of it's own. Not very easy to use and lacks the options of G-Hub too when it comes to dialing in EQ and mic settings. I might just go back to Logitech.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 July 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Ich Persönlich bekomme vom Hypersense Kopfschmerzen aber wenn ich es aus aber ohne ist es sehr GutSound sehr gutMicro sehr GutSoftware ebenfalls sehr gut

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Ho avuto la possibilità di utilizzare le cuffie Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense per diverse settimane e sono rimasto estremamente soddisfatto del loro utilizzo. Innanzitutto, le cuffie sono realizzate con materiali di alta qualità e offrono un comfort eccezionale durante l'utilizzo prolungato. Ma è la tecnologia HyperSense che veramente rende le Razer Kraken V3 un prodotto di livello superiore.La tecnologia HyperSense fa vibrare i padiglioni in base alla forza dei bassi, creando un'esperienza di gioco estremamente immersiva. Questa funzione è particolarmente utile in giochi di guerra dove ci sono esplosioni, ma anche la musica è molto più coinvolgente con la vibrazione. Non è solo il gaming ad essere esaltato dalla tecnologia HyperSense: anche film e contenuti multimediali in generale sono resi ancora più appaganti.Le Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense sono disponibili in un'unica variante di colore: nero. Inoltre, le cuffie vengono fornite con un microfono rimovibile di alta qualità, il che le rende adatte anche per le chat vocali.In generale, consiglio vivamente le Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense a chiunque stia cercando le cuffie gaming più immersive in circolazione. Si tratta di un prodotto di alta qualità che mi ha soddisfatto pienamente e che mi sento di raccomandare. Lo valuto 5 stelle su 5.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: This is my 3rd headset this year as the others would rip my long hair out whenever I'd remove them. This thing doesn't do that and it's very lightweight! The sound is spot on and the haptic feedback is a complete game changer. For the price this is probably the best headset on the market
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 October 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Great quality! Best headphones i've ever bought. Comfortable though a bit heavy but the sound is just great. Worth every penny!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 November 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: I added a Ferrite Bead to the cable...The static noise is less, it even picked up my phone signal every 5 minutes before...How is this CE certified? I certainly don't know. Measuring USB GND and comparing it to ground, a difference of 2.3mV can be noticed, higher than the 1.6mV my USB ports show on GND before, though I doubt that this plays a role.As for the CE certification, I did not open the headset as this would void warranty and wouldn't allow me to replace it, viewing a teardown though, inside there doesn't appear to be a Ferrite bead either.My tips to making this better would be:- Adding a ferrite bead near the USB plug and another one inside the headset, to ensure signal integrity.- If cable shielding is available, attach it to the ground on BOTH sides, to ensure proper static dischargeIn addition to that, these things - in my mind - should be changed too- If lights are active, there is a whistling arc noise on the left ear- The volume control adjusts too easily, a potentiometer would be better as well, as this adjusts PC volume, which can be annoying if you like to wear a sweater or hoodie or have long hair.I will say, the sound is great, yet it needs adjustment out of the box as bass is too loud and powerful, while higher and especially the mid-range frequencies disappear in bass. After this, these are great (for most sounds, turn of THX Spatial Audio after installing them with synapse!!! many people seem to forget this and complain about a sound that sounds like a empty can of soup, that is virtual spatial audio. That is just what it sounds like.I never found myself using THX. The vibration, haptic feedback is a fun to have, especially if you wanted to listen to your favorite electronic music, as the bass will shake your brain out for sure -w-In addition to all this... USB audio just never really is the best anyways. I will go for the more expensive version of these headphones now, as these have a 3.5mm jack too. The removable microphone is a big plus on this headset, too bad you can't use the microphone's 3.5mm port to attach the headset to a pc and detach the USB cable in this cheaper version...overall, it feels premium, quality seems decent to good, the ear cushions are nice to wear and they fit my head comfortably without high head pressure unlike some other headphones.After all this, these quality deficits however, are causing me to feel annoyed often. I can't listen to music without static noises every 2-10 minutes, especially with multi-layered sound aka when multiple instruments play at once, someone talks to you on discord while you are watching a video etc. this gets irritating. It also changes volume on it's own due to interference occasionally.These major downsides just don't make this a product I want to keep using, though it theoretically isn't 'broken', the interference and general issues with this lower the 'fun-value' of them quite a lot, so much in fact, that I lost interest in this model. I hope the bluetooth version with 3.5mm jack will be better.In addition to this, I hope this was just a manufacturing error and isn't actually the case for all products of this type. I am using Razer products since 8 years now, so far I haven't been disappointed with my old products but even my new keyboard seems to have issues with losing paint on the keycaps now through use over 8 months starting after 4. Sad Razer... Sad... Cheaped out in the wrong places.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Ich bin mit Razer mittlerweile leider gar nicht mehr zufrieden. Die Qualität wirkt zwar erst immer sehr gut, ist aber mehr Schein als Sein.Insgesamt habe ich2019 das Razer Kraken 7.1 V2,2020 die Razer Basilisk MOBA und die Razer Oranata Chroma,2021 die Razer Basilisk X Hyperspeed,2022 das Razer Basilisk V3 und die Razer Kraken V3 Hypersensegekauft.Bis auf die beiden aus 2022 haben mittlerweile alle Probleme oder sind schlicht kaputt. Neben der schlechten Hardwarequalität kommt eine schlecht programmierte und fehlerhafte Software hinzu. Außerdem MUSS man Daten zwecks Kundenkonto preisgeben und die Nutzung überwachen lassen. Ein absoluten NoGo. Leider sitzt man etwas in der Falle, wenn man einmal Razer hat und die Geräte nicht zeitgleich kaputtgehen, immerhin soll ja eigentlich alles gleich aussehen.Das Razer Kraken V3 Hypersense habe ich als letztes Razergerät gekauft und damit hat Razer sich die letzte Chance verspielt. Das Headset ist in Ordnung. Es fühlt sich tragbar an, auch wenn die Ohrmuscheln deutlich besser und angenehmer bezogen sein könnten. Bislang löst es sich immerhin nicht ab. Schauen wir mal, wie es nach 1-2 Jahren aussieht. Die Tasten sind sinnvoll angebracht und das Headset selbst ist gut verarbeitet. Der Surroundsound ist durchschnittlich. Die Vibration ist ein ganz nettes Feature, allerdings gibt es eine gewisse Startschwelle, ab der es erst einsetzt. Das wirkt gekünstelt und nicht feinabgestimmt.Leider ist auch hier die Software wieder dürftig. Wie jeder durchschnittliche PC-Nutzer nutzt man ja nicht nur ausschließlich das Headset sondern auch normale Lautsprecher. Der Wechsel über Windows ist natürlich einfach, die Software reagiert aber nicht immer und das beworbene THX muss oft manuell gestartet werden oder Razersynapse neugestartet werden, damit es überhaupt reagiert. Hier ist auch wieder sehr schlecht gearbeitet worden. Mit der Software ist es ca. 50 € - 60 € wert und, wenn irgendwann einmal die Software korrigiert wird, dann sind wir bei 80 € - 90 €; 120 € ist definitiv zu viel, dafür müsste vernünftiges Kunstleder und eine austauschbare Ohrmuschel mit Sommermuschel mitgeliefert werden.Alles in Allem kann ich von Razer nur abraten. Die Qualität ist dem Preis nicht angemessen und Besserungen bei der Software lassen seit Jahren auf sich warten. Der Support ist nur eine Zusammenfassung der ersten beiden Googleergebnisse. Insofern sollte zur günstigeren Konkurrenz gegriffen werden, auch wenns dann ggf. nicht ganz einheitlich aussieht.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Je déconseille pour les joueurs ps5 ou autres consoles, impossible de regler le volume du son sur le casque lorsque l'on est branché sur consile, un peu décu

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Enfaite quand je suis dans un jeu ou que je regarde une vidéo/live, il y a un court moment ou le son grésille très fortement comme le grésillement d'une radio quand la chaîne bug. Et j'ai essayer de réinstaller les pilotes audio mais cela n'a rien changer... Alors c'est pas si grave que ça étant donnée que à part ce problèmele casque est très bon c'est pour ça que j'ai mis 4 étoiles sur 5 mais c'est assez désagréable quand ce bug arrive. Si vous avez une solution je suis preneur.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Vengo de tener unos Razer Kraken de los primeros, y la mejora de sonido, calidad de materiales es espectacular. Muy buenos cascos.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Ich großen und ganzen hat das Headset einen guten Sound, auch die Räumliche Darstellung ist sehr gut.Allerdings gibt das Headset öfters mal Störgeräusche aus.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: point positif:confortablele retour haptique est sympa mais a petite dose et a petite intensité sinon un bruit de ballon en plastique ce rajoute a chaque secousse haptiquemicro détachablemeilleure qualité de coussinet compare a la version précédentepoint négatifle logiciel qui peu poser beaucoup de problèmes (mauvaise installation du driver thx, grésillement ou crépitement du son du à thxles basses sont bien moins présente que sur la v2pour avoir un son correcte il va falloir bidouiller les paramètres (égalisateur, bass boost normalisation du son ect...)conclusion si vous avez eu le kraken v1 et v2 que vous en étiez satisfait et que vous souhaitez retrouver le même son, un conseil testé le avant en boutique mais je ne le conseillerai pasje conseillerai plutôt des écouteurs black shark lucifer t2 qui ce rapproche bien plus du son du kraken v2 et qui est bien moins cher

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Me han encantado,el micrófono es extraibleSon bastante cómodos y se escucha muy bien

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Wahnsinn, wuchtige Bässe und die Vibrationen, man ist noch viel mehr im Spiel drin. Genial!Zu den negativen Rezensionen wegen der angeblich niedrigen Lautstärke: ich kann nicht über 50% gehen, so laut ist das Ding. Nix mit leise! Entweder haben die ein defektes Produkt erwischt oder falsch eingestellt.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Das Headset ist für den Preis ordentlich. Sound passt und bequem ist es auch. Das Haptische Feedback war bei mir aber leider das Retoure Kriterium. Im prinzip ist die Idee gut und es steigert doch sehr die Immersion, bei den richtigen Spielen und wenn Sie kein Brillenträger sind.Bei World of Tanks z.B., sobald man losfährt, fängt das Headset sehr stark an zu vibrieren, was in den ersten Sek. auch cool wirkt ist spätestens nach dem 4-5 Match nur noch anstrengend. Wohlgemerkt ich hatte es auf Stufe 1 von 3. Gibt man hingegen einen Schuss ab unterstüzt die Vibration schon sehr den Punch der Kanone. Bei dem ein oder anderem FPS Games hat man zu dem das Problem, das die Vibration nicht bei den Schüssen ausgelöst wird. Hier würde ich mir wünschen das man in der Software die Hz abfrage ändern könnte und alles ein bisschen feiner zu justieren. Auch als Brillenträger empfinde ich es nach einiger Zeit als sehr unangenehm weil mit dem Feedback die komplette Brille anfängt mit zu wackeln was doch auf dauer sehr unangenehm wird da vorallem die Pads auf der Nase extrem mitschwingen.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Soy un gran usuario de auriculares. Tanto para escuchar musica, para ver películas o para juegos de ordenador.Razer nunca ha sido mi marca favorita de auriculares. Creo que el precio de sus productos es un poco elevado en comparación a su calidad y diseño.Pero en este modelo, creo que ha cambiado está tendencia.Es el primer auricular decRazer que me ha convencido casi totalmente.Diseño moderno pero sin estridencias, comodidad muy alta, y un sonido soberbio.Se han convertido en mis auriculares favoritos!

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Been waiting for the spare cash to buy these for ages after trying them in store. I LOVED the haptic tech (though not the best I've used) and was really happy at first...then I started getting constant crackling, static bursts and feedback which seems to possibly be picked up from my mobile (it happened every time I got a message). I made sure the software was all up to date and also reinstalled but nothing fixed it. As it's a work phone and I work at the same computer I game at I cant just yeet my phone elsewhere especially as I was also using these for work calls and meetings.... the exact situation I HAVE to have my mobile beside me. The noise cancellation is nowhere near what I have with my old Krakens, I could hear the sound of my basic circular floor fan when I was gaming which is just ridiculous, especially considering I regularly sleep through the noise of that on its mid setting when it stands two feet from my bed. It may be it's a frequency it struggles to block but it means it's just no good for me. Was gutted but made no sense to keep them so they were sent back for a refund.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 October 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Casque de très bonne qualité (il suffit de se fier à la marque).L'option Hypersens est très agréable (ce sont des vibrations qui sont en corrélation avec les mouvements ou tirs du jeu), surtout en jouant sur un FPS !En couplant ce casque avec une veste Woojer, l'immersion est totale !!Je recommande fortement ce produit, même si le prix peut paraitre élevé pour certains qui hésitent

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Angenehmes Tragegefühl und sitzt auch bei längeren Sessions noch bequem auf dem Kopf, das Produkt scheint gut verarbeitet zu sein.Klangqualität - sowohl der Mikrofonaufnahme als auch Wiedergabe - und *empfohlene Software für das Perkfekte Klangergebnis" lassen jedoch in Bedienung und Ergebnis zu wünschen übrig und sind nicht auf dem selben Level wie die Produkte anderer Anbieter in diesem Preissegment.Wenn man unbedingt ein Razor-Kopfhörer haben will, ist dieses Produkt wohl in Ordnung.Möchte man jedoch ein qualitativ hochwertigeres Prudukt haben, empfehle ich mich woanders umzuschauen.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Bought this for my x box but then relised its not compatible but i love it so much i just kept it. The hypersense feture is what made me keep them it gives depth to music that normal headphones don't achieve
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 June 2023

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Super. Bardzo polecam !!!

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Si, tiene muchas cosas pero sorprendentemente no tienen algo que considero básico... y es una simple conexión Jack. Que unos cascos de más de 100 euros no tengan la conexión más apropiada para poder recibir la mejor calidad de sonido... dice mucho. De hecho, ocultan esta información en fotos, videos y descripción. A sí que nada. Ya para la próxima sabré que tengo que prestar atención a cosas que se suponen tan basicas como que tengan una conexión Jack!! Me parece ridículo la verdad.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Ich habe das headset jetzt seit 8 Monaten und habe nur Probleme damit. Einfach alle Funktionen funktionieren auf der PlayStation nicht (4 wie 5). Bei der 4 muss ich das USB-Kabel öfters ein und ausstecken, um die volle Lautstärke zu erhalten. Bei der PlayStation 5 habe ich jede 15-20 min ein lautes Geräusch (ähnelt einem Krächzen bzw. Störgeräusch). Ich verstehe nicht wieso es diese Probleme hat, aber ich würde es nicht für die PlayStation empfehlen.Außerdem, wenn man Einstellungen über den PC auf das headset überträgt und es wieder in die PlayStation einsteckt, dann klappt es gar nicht mehr. Vielleicht hilft die Rezension dem ein oder deinem.

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Einfach nur gut

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: There are mainly 2 problems with this product and I've replaced it once thinking it might have been a faulty headset but still have the same problem with the new one. First problem when plugged in I check my sound settings it comes up with two headphones for the same headset one called razor kraken v3 and THX spacial audio? I don't know which one to pick razor software tells be to make THX default but wen used it sounds like I'm being hacked by aliens or something horrible unable to use it then I use the razor kraken one and atleast I can hear things with this one and that leads me to the 2nd problem I keep getting crackling sounds? it's the reason I asked for a new pair thinking my first one might have been faulty but turns out even the new one has the same problem? Haptic is a really weird feature but one thing I can say if you are partially deaf like me (deaf in one ear) then I can help in a sort of way with the vibrations to the deaf ear not perfect but can help alittle. That being said I will be sending these headphone back aswell and looking for something different.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 March 2022

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Das beste Headset was ich je hatte!Sound und Ortung der Gegner ist on PointIn CS und Warzone sowie R6 kann man Gegner Punkt genau Orten.Der Klang ist auch echt gut.Das Mikrofon ist nur okay, aber da gibt es Möglichkeiten, habe einfach ein vmoda mic reingesteckt anstatt dem Standart mic ... Kostet nur 25 Euro.Gibt da auch noch bessere Varianten von Mod mic .. :)Ist easy einfach nur das normale austecken ist ja abnehmbar und das andere in die Buchse von Kopfhörer.Die RGB Beleuchtung ist auch ein Blickfang und gut synchronisierbar mit anderen Razer chroma GerätenIn meinem Fall das Gehäuse Maus Tastatur usw, funktioniert auch top!Hypersense ist ebenfalls eine tolle Sache aber eher ein Gimmick.Bei csgo etc ist es überflüssig, bei Story basierten spielen wie Far Cry 6 etc ist es aber nice to have und nutze es gerne.Der Preis ist zwar etwas hoch aber für das Gesamtpaket noch verschmerzbar

ProductName: Razer Kraken V3 HyperSense Wired USB Gaming Headset with Haptic Technology
Review: Promotion 112€ au lieu de 160€, je me suis dis autant tenter sa chance... GROSSE ERREUR !! Ce casque ne vaut clairement pas 160€ et ne vaut pas non plus le coup à 112€ ! Grésille de manière aléatoire au bout de + - 10H d'utilisation NON STOP après l'avoir reçu.Micro de piètre qualité ... Impossible à paramétrer correctement sans logiciel tier.Bien loin des anciens razer kraken V2 niveau rapport qualité / prix.Le son est excellent (encore heureux pour du 7.1, anciennement 5.1 sur les Kraken V2), la réduction du bruit est excellente. Le contrôle du volume et les réglage du son entrant est correct.MAIS les grésillements après quelques heures d'utilisation en plus du microphone de mauvaises qualité en font l'un des pires casques pour 160€ ! Et même pour 112€ !

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Very clear, has lasted a long time. Very much enjoying this headset on my xbox.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: This headset is buy far the best cheap headset I bought

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: A decent purchase if you want a gaming headset that is pretty disposable. Good sound for the price.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Very happy with this purchase - comfortable to wear and great sound quality.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: ok headphones for the price, but splitter was missing

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Grabbed these for the kids for Christmas. Microphone rarely ever works. The sound in headphones is seemingly fine after 24 hours. But the microphone works on and off and have wasted more time testing to get it to work then actually using it. Be lucky if there was a 5 minute period where it worked without issue.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: mic was a bit dodgy at first but after learning a simple trick worked perfectly

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Los compré en poco más de 500 pesos, y el sonido me parece que es bastante bueno (aclaro, no soy un audiófilo). Son también bastante cómodos, abarcan toda la oreja y no me han cansado aunque, he de admitir, lo máximo que los he usado son como 3 horas seguidas. Tampoco me han acalorado, por lo que no ha sido necesario hacer alguna pausa para seguir usándolos.El micrófono es un plus, y me gustó que pudiera desprenderse para cuando no es necesario utilizarlo. La calidad del audio del micrófono también se me hace bastante buena.El cable tiene control de volumen y la opción para activar o desactivar el micrófono, lo que también se me hizo un muy buen añadido.El único contra que le encuentro, es que el cable se me hizo muy corto, por lo que tuve que comprarle una extensión de 70 pesos.Lo recomiendo si quieres unos audífonos de buena calidad sin gastar demasiado.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: I'm a HUGE fan of "low-end" turtle beach headsets, and I bought these to replace an aging pair of Ear Force PLa's that had served me faithfully for a long time (and still function very well, albeit thanks to a ton of tape work on damage I caused myself stupidly). Considering I paid only ten dollars more for these, the difference is staggering.As others note, they're not a top end headset, but for $40, do you really expect that? Sound is clear and crisp. Mic is clear and loud, without being overly sensitive (and the windscreen performs very well), and connects/disconnects easily... I'm actually using Dragon to type this with the mic in my laptops mic port! Some complain that the mic is inflexible, but I haven't found a position yet that it won't accept and stay with. I do, however, wish they had used the jacketing from the PLa line (ribbed, semi-metallic covering that allowed for total freedom of position) instead of the semi-hard, plastic-feeling overmold on this one.Leather-feel ear cups are VERY well designed and generously padded, they feel very natural on my head and surround my ear with an almost hermetic seal... pressing on the sides of the cups while wearing them yields a noticeable increase in pressure in my ears (you probably shouldn't do this).Entire system is very light (due in part to plastic construction, which doesn't come off feeling as "cheap" as other plastic headsets).At 4ft, the cord doesn't give a ton of room, but it was designed to be used with a console controller audio jack, so it doesn't need it... but for use with an mp3 player or laptop, it's great for those that don't need the extra length getting in the way.Some cons:In-line volume/mic control is small and hard to grasp (almost too smooth), and in turn, the volume control knob is very narrow and set deeply in the control box. When you do locate the volume blindly, it's somewhat difficult to roll, but I'm going to assume it will loosen in time. I would suggest moving it closer to the wire's splitter to make it easier to locate blindly, but it's a personal preference some may disagree with.The mic only inserts into the headset in one direction, having a cut out on the mic itself that must be aligned with a tab on the mic jack. It's difficult, though not impossible, to insert it while wearing the headset, so I suggest you choose in or out before you begin using them. I see no reason why this design had to be implemented, and hope future models will omit it.The connecting band has very little in the way of padding across the top of your head. It's not only a very small fill, but it's the same low density, very soft foam used in the ear cups, making it almost ineffective. It's not uncomfortable once you get the fit right for your head (though mine is shaved, your mileage may vary), but it still seems no thought at all went into this design point. Increasing the fill or using a higher density foam could fix this in future models.Each ear cup is connected to one half of the wire, which I personally don't enjoy the feel of, though its double connection design does prevent a lot of twisting that could lead to a single wire design pulling out of it's grommet. The wire(s) itself is very soft and flexible, which while offering comfort, I'm afraid would be easily abraded or pinched.All in all, you would be hard pressed to find another headset that offers more or performs better at or near this price point...it may even be an impossibility. Though PLa's are cheaper and more than adequate, for any looking for an entrance point into the headset market, these are without a doubt the only headset I will ever recommend again. If you need higher performance, just move up the price scale in the turtle beach line, each offering will blow you away.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Très honnêtement ce casque m'a fortement étonné, ayant joué pendant 3 ans avec et être passé à un nouveau casque qui est le hyper x cloud 2, franchement je retournerai très probablement sur celui là, le son est excellent, la qualité du micro excellent, vraiment aucun problème avec ce casque étant un joueur competitive. Le casque est un casque ouvert se qui veux dire que vous pouviez joué tout en entendant les bruit à côté de vous si vous aviez des enfants par exemple, c'est important à préciser. En tout cas très très bon casque pour son prix je met 10/10 sans hésiter.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Ottimo e pratico

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: First big thanks to Amazon prime for 1 day delivery 👍Turtle Beach 50p headset is just amazing, I am using it with my PS4 pro and it works great .Good noise cancellation , very clear chat and sound  quality is too good , u can hear enemy steps and make also make out direction of enemies fires by it's sound while playing.In this price range I think you will not get anything better than turtle Beach 50 headset and it's a very good brand product and much better than cheap Chinese headset.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Qualidade excelente.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: I always played video games with my old 5.1 home theater system, never failed me to produce a powerful, theater like experience . But I wanted to try a more "competitive" approach for multiplayer games. Been using them in COD Warzone, and I've noticeably got better. The headset really reduce outside noises, and with the right ingame audio settings, you can really hear enemy footsteps coming your way , doors opening and that's a game changer. I'm really impress with the audio quality, it's crisp and clear. The explosions sounds deep and impactful. The microphone is flexible and people hear me clearly on the other side.You just need to be careful with it. The plastic seems to be strong but could break with a bad fall. Here are my advises:1. Always place the headset on a flat surface/table, that way you won't knock it off and break it2. Disconnect the microphone when not used.3. Connect the microphone in the headset before putting it on your head...( the headset hole is deep inside and in an angle, it's a pain in the butt trying to connect it with the headset on your head, and you could bend the jack connector doing so. Trust me lol )4. Always disconnect the wire by gently pulling the jack plug and not by pulling the wire itself, that's the best way to damage the inner wires.Doing so will prolong the headset lifetime.All in all a really good headset for gamers!

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Wenn man ein gutes und nicht zu teures Headset für den Einstieg in die Gamingszene oder Ähnliches haben möchte ist das echt klasse.Der Sound ist völlig ausreichend und es funktioniert dankt dem AUX-Stecker fast überall, ob für PS5,PS4, Nintendo Switch usw.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Prima goedkope headset om mee te gamen. Verstaanbaarheid door de microfoon is prima. Voor mijn uitzonderlijk grote hoofd wel wat aan de kleine kant.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Comprei pra usa no PS4. Me atendeu perfeitamente, fone bem construído, com bom som, bonito e com bom preço. Me considero um usuário "comum", então recomendo para pessoas que se enquadrem nesse perfil.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: el material está muy bueno; resistente; calidad de el audio es muy bueno; ojo que el micrófono tiene su lado para insertar; tiene una pequeña marca que debe coincidir para poder hacer click; el instructivo viene en un idioma oriental; pero no lo requieres, es muy intuitivo;
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 11 December 2020

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Cuffie economiche fatte in plastica leggera, in linea con la fascia di prezzo, ma non brutte e senza particolari problemi.Anzi! Una volta indossate (comode tra l'altro, almeno per chi come me ha orecchie piccole) sono rimasto quasi stupito dal modo in cui si riesce a localizzare la provenienza dei rumori nel gaming e dalla resa acustica in generale nella musica, con un suono che definirei molto educato. Credo di aver fatto un buon affare.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: These headphones are better than redgear cosmos... Redgear is heavy but turtle beach headphones are really light and confortable... These are really good guys... DONT EXPECT BASS FROM GAMING HEADPHONES... Audio clarity is AMAZING and MIC IS REALLY CLEAR TOO... Im using this on my single jack laptop amd mic works without any problem 😊

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: First pair of gaming headphones I've gotten in a long time. Excellent quality, comfortable around my head and ears. They adjust well and hold. I like that the mic is detachable so I can put it away if im just using them for listening to streams or videos. The mic is sensitive, and these things can PUMP out some sound, when i first loaded up warzone i was almost deafened until I adjust audio!

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Très bon casque gaming pour débuter, il est ergonomique et très agréable à porter. Le son est de qualité. Pour le prix on ne peut pas trouver mieux. Jamais déçu de Turtle Beach.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: von diesem Headset bin ich positiv überrascht.Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist absolut in OrdnungDer Sound ist für den Preis vollkommen OKDas Mikro erfüllt seinen Job mehr als ausreichendDer Tragekomfort ist sehr angenehm, selbst nach einigen Stunden nochFazit: für den Preis kann man definitiv nichts verkehrt machen.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Heavily impessed with the quality even though a best buy rep had told me not to "waste my money" on this item, the cost to quality ratio is superb and the sound quality of video games are out outstandingly clear.Only thing that kind of bothers me (but can be fixed through some games audio options) is that the sound to communication volume is a tad heavy on the sound side rather then the voice side and your allies voice tends to get a tad drowned out.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Après quelques jours de tests du casque.  POINT FORTLe casque reste un bon casque au point de vue qualité prix.Il est très bon au niveau son avec de bonne basse.Le micro est également top avec un anti-pop fournis.Il est aussi confortable et ne fait pas mal aux oreilles après quelques heures d’utilisation.  POINT FAIBLEJ'ai trouvé un seul point faible a ce casque ses qu'il me paraît un peu fragile au niveau du réglage de la tête.  CONCLUSIONCes un bon casque qui est parfait pour les gamers (normal) qui joue en ligne avec un bas prix.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Ho utilizzato queste cuffie dal giorno che le ho comprate (Gennaio 2019) ed ho aspettato finché non ho ritenuto di averle utilizzare a sufficienza (forse anche un po' troppo) per fare questa recensione (come personalmente ritengo debba essere fatto prima di qualsiasi recensione).Venendo al prodotto, le Turtle Beach Recon 50P sono delle ottime cuffie entry level, la plastica dei materiali è di ottima fattura, il rivestimento dei padiglioni è in simil pelle anch'esso di buona fattura (a due anni di distanza sono ancora come uscite dallo scatolo, punto di merito anche il simil pelle che non si è crepato o staccato).Per quanto riguarda l'audio svolgono egregiamente il loro lavoro per il prezzo che costano, fluido, pulito, chiaro, sia in game che ascoltando musica o video la qualità resta la stessa, insonorizzazione quasi completa (se si indossano le cuffie è praticamente impossibile sentire qualsiasi rumore esterno, a meno che non arrivi una cannonata)Anche il microfono è di ottima fattura, l'audio in uscita è chiaro e pulito, non sgrana, e chi riceve non avrà fastidiosi problemi di eco o scricchiolio. Può essere rimosso  e riattaccato all'occorrenza, è regolabile e altra prova della buona qualità dei materiali anche a distanza di 2 anni il ferretto non ha perso elasticità o stabilità.Le uniche note di demerito a mio parere, che sono anche le cose che mi hanno dato più fastidio del prodotto, sono:- la lunghezza del cavo, che dall'attacco sotto i padiglioni fino al jack raggiunge il metro e venti (1.20) il che vuol dire che si ha scarso un metro di cavo, per qualcuno può andar bene, per me è un po' corto;- l'archetto che poggia sulla testa (si sarebbero potuti sforzare di mettere una spugnetta più spessa, essendo molto sottile alla lunga inizia a dar fastidio sulla testa e più volte mi trovo a dover cambiare la posizione delle cuffie perché perdo sensibilità dove poggiano) forse le hanno pensate per i capelloni, chi lo sa.- CONCLUSIONESono delle ottime cuffie per chi non ha troppe pretese ma non vuole rinunciare alla qualità, tra l'altro a questa fascia di prezzo.PRO- MATERIALI IN PLASTICA BUONI E RESISTENTI- AUDIO PULITO E CHIARO- MICROFONO REMOVIBILE CHE RESTITUISCE UN AUDIO PULITOCONTRO- CAVO TROPPO CORTO- ARCHETTO POGGIA TESTA TROPPO SOTTILE E SENZA UN SISTEMA DI COMFORT PER SESSIONI DI UTILIZZO PROLUNGATE

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Excelente producto si estas buscando unos audífonos que te permitan sumergirte en tu videojuego favorito y a la vez interacturar mediante chat de voz con tus amigos o equipoRespecto a la calidad del sonido, sus bajos dejan un poco a desear, pero por lo demás es un sonido agradable y claroSon cómodos para esas largas partidasrecomiendo al vendedor de igual manera, el producto se entrego en la fecha señalada

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Ich muss sagen ich hatte vor diesem Headset eins für ca15€ und meine Team Kollegen hatte schon keine Lust mehr mich in eine Party zu holen da diese sich immer doppelt gehört hatten.Nach dem Tipp von einem Team Kollegen mir doch dieses Headset zu holen da es 1. günstig ist und es auch gemutet werden kann, überzeugte mich schon mal.Also bestellt und was soll ich noch schreiben.Kein Echo Hall mehr bei meinen mates, super Sound.Die Ohrmuscheln legen sich gut ums Ohr an.Der kopfbügel ( versteh nicht die anderen negativen Rezensionen ) liegt gut übern Kopf und hält auch.Es drückt nichts.Für meine spiel Gran Turismo Sport hätte ich mir lediglich ein längeres Kabel gewünscht das zum Controller geht, da ich den Controller neben mein Playseat erhöht liegen habe damit das Kabel nicht auf zu ist.Sonst kann ich es nur jedem empfehlen der eine 1.Klasse Headset haben will für etwas weniger Geld. Kein Rauschen oder sonstige Macken.Das Micro kann man ohne Probleme abstecken, durch den biegsamen schwanenhals kann das Micro vor oder neben den Mund gebogen werden und wieder zurück.Der Stecker vom Mirco hat eine kleine Nase bzw kerbe das man es genau einstecken kann somit ist auch für das Mirco ein guter halt.Also ich würde das Headset definitiv mir nochmal kaufenIch habe mir das Headset in Blau schwarz gekauft.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Perfect Headphones for the price Range. Used it to play PS4 Games such as Metro Exodus and Last of Us 2 and also watch Netflix on the app.The only issue would be a higher variation in the volume is not present which can be excused given the price range.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Ho cercato nello store di Amazon delle cuffie per giocare alla ps4 dotate di microfono e desiderando un prodotto di buona fattura ad un prezzo acessibile ho deciso di comprare le turtle beach visto la fama del marchio. La costruzione interamente di plastica risulta ottima ed i padiglioni sono ben imbottiti e comodi anche dopo una lunga sessione di gioco. La qualità risulta nella media, buoni i bassi un pò meno gli alti ma mi aspettavo di più visto il prezzo e il brand. Il microfono funziona molto bene almeno a discapito delle persone che mi sentono in party ed ottimo il controller posto a metà filo per disattivare/attivare il microfono e regolare il volume. Da far notare che appena prese in gioco ogni tanto davano un disturbo che però dopo qualche giorno si è risolto da solo.Consiglio queste cuffie a chi non vuole rinunciare al marchio ma penso che a questo prezzo si possa fare qualcosa di più.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 9 December 2021

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Verarbeitung: Die Verarbeitung finde ich sehr hochwertig und schön (wie von Turtle Beach gewohnt). Etwas dickere Polsterung im Kopfbereich hätte nicht geschadet, aber insgesamt finde ich das Design gut, funktionell und auch relativ bequem. Mir gefällt vor allem, dass das Headset sehr leicht ist und nicht auf den Ohren drückt. Einzig allein das Rausziehbare Mikro hätte man vllt. etwas anders verbauen können.Klang: Gekauft habe ich das Headset hauptsächlich um Nachts Dead by Daylight zu spielen, um dabei sowohl räumlich hören zu können, als auch mein Umfeld nicht beim schlafen zu stören.Der Klang ist relativ sauber, man hört aus welcher Richtung Geräusche kommen und insgesamt ist die Lautstärke gut ausbalanciert, ABER insgesamt für meinen Geschmack ein wenig zu leise, was jedoch meiner Meinung nach bei Overear Headsets in dieser Preisklasse nur schwer zu vermeiden ist.Ich kann meine Teammates über die Playstation Party gut verstehen und mir wurde gesagt, dass das Mikro auf der anderen Seite der Leitung einen sehr klaren Klang liefert.Neben der relativ leisen Lautstärke lässt noch der Bass zu wünschen übrig, aber insgesamt ist der Sound für mich ok.Alles in Einem kann ich dieses Headset jedem empfehlen, der nicht permanent damit zockt, sondern nur hin und wieder/bei bestimmten Spielen. Das Preis/Leistungs-Verhältnis ist okay, wem das Design gefällt kann ohne schlechtes gewissen zuschlagen.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Good choice , works well , good quality.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Antes de escribir mi reseña he vuelto a leer toda la descripcion y preguntas realizadas y en ningun apartado encuentro que hace falta un split para conectar auricular y micro a tu ordenador para poder tener a la vez sonido y micro. La verdad que los cascos son ligeros y comodos, con una estetica bastante bonita. ¿El problema? Que o los conecto a la salida de auriculares o a la salida de microfono, por lo que no puedo tener ambas opciones conectadas a la vez. Tienes que leerte el manual que trae incluido para darte cuenta que hace falta si o si este adaptador. Te remiten a la pagina del fabricante para comprarlos y cuando accedes ves que cuestan 10 EUROS. ¿Como me van a vender un adaptador de jack por 10 euros si los cascos enteros cuestan 20? No tiene ningun sentido. Es un abuso. Estoy buscando online a ver si en algun sitio se vende alguno generico que pueda usar por 2 o 3 euros, pero tiene que tener la entrada hembra y las 2 salidas machos y todos los que veo son al contrario.Resumen, buenos cascos en relacion calidad precio pero ojo, si buscais que nada mas os llegue tengais micro y audio en vuestro pc, estos cascos no son para vosotros. Por 30 euros habra cascos mejores que lo traigan ya todo preparado.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black

Review: Pas encore testé, mais le rapport qualité/prix est excellent

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Dopo 7 anni di XO One era giunto il momento di sostituirle, anche se non potevo fare a meno di notare che la TB nel frattempo aveva notevolmente abbassato la qualità dei suoi prodotti di fascia economica. Prima di approdare a queste 50P ho provato diversi modelli della serie 70 e TUTTI mi hanno dato dolori a orecchie e testa dopo nemmeno 40 minuti di utilizzo. A parità di prezzo, queste sono di un altro pianeta, letteralmente: un po' di fastidio lo si comincia ad accusare dopo un paio d'ore ma non è niente che una buona pausa non possa risolvere. In più, il fatto di poter rimuovere il microfono (e non semplicemente spostarlo all'insù come nelle 70) rappresenta un plus che ormai è sempre più raro in questa fascia di cuffie. Il suono, come sempre, è ottimo e ben bilanciato, quindi 5 stelle sono d'obbligo.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Best headset under 2000.Pros:Sound is good enough, and the microphone is great for a budget headset. The ear cushion are comfortable enough.Cons:The cushion on the band for you head is super thin, its pretty much there for show so wearing it for long periods does hurt your head. Infact wearing it for even 10 mins makes your head hurt.I have to constantly adjust it as it hurts the top part of my head.Wish the headset extension was a bit longer as I have to wear it at its fullest extent. Its built more for children or someone with a tiny head.If you are on a budget and are looking for a branded and renowned gaming headset manufacturer,then buy it. You can always get a better one but this is fine if it's your first haedset.I like the headset a lot but I only wish it had more padding on top. This should be a thing to consider which I unfortunately did not.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: First of all Products packaging was good. Came in a rather large box, but contents were protected.It also came  with the basic manual etc. Gave this a 3 star review as this headset was recommended by a gamer friend who had purchased one of the later models and had suggested it as a good option for a remote job.Sound QualityThe first five months of using the product went fairly well. Audio can be turned up very loudly, but if there is background noise the person on the other end will hear it. There is a manual mute botton and volume enhancer botton, but the persons on the other end will hear the odd silence when you press it.FitThe fit was pretty good, fits the ears really well. The ear muffs are very big, comfy and round. (As mentioned, before, noise still gets through).  Disadvantage, after about 6 months the mock leather on the ear muffs will begin to strip a bit. The headset  overall has a pretty big fit, so if you have a small-medium head you may have to readjust a few times. If you have a big head head (tee-hee!), you'll like it. Plus it has a rigid lengthening options on both ears. The muffs themselves have a bit of pivot in them, but the headband (that rests on top of the head) is made of hard plastic and can break if not treated with care.Issues I had:1. The cord or the point that connects into the computer (3.5 mm jack), under six months started to lose static, then over time it stopped working. (Have lighted the part in  on the headset that gives trouble overtime). You can hear videos if you turn it the right way, but others won't hear you clearly, until one day you completely lose the static. Overall was disappointed in the headset as I expected more from a $25 headset.2. We tried to get another jack but those efforts failed, hence the end is cut off in the photos.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: The Mic sound is pretty good for a cheap headset like this one. The sound is ok but you'll be able to hear footsteps, etc in games. I wouldn't buy this because within a week of using the headset I tried using my mic and it picked up no voice. I unmuted my mic and still no voice. I went on my laptop and went to an online voice recorder and it worked but not on my ps4 which was weird. I realized that the online voice recorder would still capture my voice even though I switched my mic to mute so I am guessing right now that the flip switch is hard stuck on mute for some reason and that's the reason it would pick up my voice. Anyways instead of these, I would rather go with the Turtle Beach Recon 70s.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 50 Playstation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: La cancelación de ruido es perfecta y el sonido para el precio que tiene no está nada mal

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: These are the best earpiece I’ve come across.  The noise cancelling is excellent, people have often expressed surprise that I’m in the car doing 100km/hr and not sitting at my office desk. Battery lasts for a full day of phone calls and it’s very comfortable to use.  I’ve abandoned my useless in-car Bluetooth and just rely on the 5200.  I’ve paired my laptop with it as well and do all the Zoom and Teams meetings with superb voice clarity.  Highly recommended for the phone user on the go!!

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: I use this Bluetooth device everywhere- at home, while shopping, for work, in the car. I sound better to people while talking on the phone & I can hear them better. I always have a spare one, in case I lose one- can’t imagine life without it.The delivery was super fast.

Reviewer: Volume on earpiece is softer than my old ones, hard to hear with background noise
Review: I've used this over-ear headpiece since June 2022 and it has been so useful. The sound quality is excellent, it's comfortable to wear  and I usually forget I have it on. If I needed to buy another in the future I wouldn't hesitate to buy this one again.

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: My previous Plantronics earpiece had no over-ear attachment (it just pushed into/held in your ear on its own), so was easy to pick up, remove it from it's little charger coffin, and put in your ear and the battery charge lasted for ages (so did the device, but all things die in the end). This thing has me pissing around every time to try and fit it to take/make a call, constant bluetooth connection drop-outs, and crap battery. to add insult to injury, the third party charging case for it died in just a couple of months.

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: Still the best earpiece for daily use, earbuds can't replace the utility.Pros- hands free answering and/or rejecting a call- light on the ear, sits on the surface so ambient sounds are natural- loud and clear when outdoors or in a crowd- Multipoint- press the button with not on a call and it'll tell you how much talk-time is left and which devices its currently connected withcons- boom is a bit long- still uses micro-usb- doesn't have NFC (i'm fine with that)

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: This is my 2nd bluetooth Plantronics. Bought the same one again. Excellent product,  great sound quality , good battery , easy to use, voice enabled,  sturdy and doesn't cause headache or ear blockage unlike buds. Only crux is availability and no improvement in its features.  I am unable to connect to my laptop without an interface .

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: I have used so many TWS, including the ones from Apple and Google. Although they are great at sound and music, use them to make a call from an Indian Road, and be ready to irritate everyone else.This is a one stop solution for professional calls. It is almost magical in its ability to wind down environment noises.Not perfect. Switching between laptop and phone can be improved. I had the bt700 dongle for laptop from the focus 2. It really makes connection to laptop perfect.They don't have the option to buy the charger stand and dongle. It makes sense to have them. Charging port looks flimsy. Certainly don't use the provided cable as it is very poor quality and will end up harming the ear piece.Also the earbuds could be better.But what it offers in terms of ENC, this product has NO competitor. No one comes close.

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
