ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: 同機を5年愛用し、だいぶくたびれてきたので追加購入です。野外での騒音や風音を消して、クリアな声を相手に伝えることのできるノイズキャンセル機能は、どのヘッドセットよりも優れていると思います。声音もこもることなく、とてもクリアに聞こえていると、通信相手からも好評です。

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: It, would be helpful if at least given basic charge accessories, least availability of chargers is pathetic.

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: 毎日２～３時間ほど使用しておりましたが、丁度AMAZON返品期間が過ぎたころに、ある日突然サイドの電源スイッチをきっても電源が切れなくなり、充電切れで電源が落ちたタイミングで再度充電を試みるものの充電すらできなくなりました。1/3程の値段の安価な中華製品でも今時こんな事にはなりませんので、最悪な商品を購入してしまいました。あと他のレビューにもありますがイヤーカップのつけごごちは最悪です。

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: Gifted this product to my friend, and he went ballistic from no BT to whole day wearing and showing around the house / street / car / friends - he was so excited like someone found a biscuit of gold or something.......

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: 1～2年ごとに買い替えながら計5～6台Voyager Legendを使い続けていた。Legendは着信音は耳から聞こえるのに通話ボタンを押すと声が聞こえず、通話はスマホ本体の方に切り替わっているという誤作動が時々あった。使ってきた全ての個体で発生していたので、個体差ではない。装着センサーの誤作動か？5200の方は今のところその症状はない。ただし音楽やラジコを聴こうとすると、ほぼ毎回スマホ本体から音が出始めてビックリする。5200の電源を入れ直したり通話ボタンを押してもダメ。スマホのBluetoothをOff/Onしてもダメ。色々試したが、ペアリングをしなおすとつながる事が分かった。ラジコを聴くたびにこんな事をしなくちゃいけない。性能や通話音質は文句ないので、もう機能を増やしたりしなくていい。動作の安定・信頼性の向上に努めてほしい。

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: This is the best bluetooth for the phone if you can afford it

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: 前のは6年使用　使い過ぎて耳に掛ける所が裂けてきてお疲れさまでしたにしました。今回のは少し進化してるのかな？充電器ケースはそのまま使えます。一日使っても耳は疲れません。大事な話してる時でもはっきり聞き取れます。相手も今家の中かって聞かれます。実際はトラックに乗って窓開けて話してるんですけど！最高な商品です。金額的に6年使えば元は完全に取れます。お勧めです。

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: Product is good but battery backup is poor ( less than earlier model) . Micro USB charging connector is also bad.

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: Gud

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: Had bought the same product in 2017 (battery life ran out after extensive usage in 2022 - 5 years is fair) for around ₹ 22k when it was still Plantronics that had not yet taken over Poly.com (Polycomm) & found it to be beyond words in terms of quality & features. Got the same product now in 2023 obviously expecting the same quality but this time it was called Poly (Plantronics had taken over Poly & now Poly merged with HP) but found it lacking in various aspectsCons - tech:(1) The battery is supposed to be 7 hours but doesn't go beyond 5 hours of charging.(1.1) Battery actually doesn't even last the 5 hours, every time you shut it off and switch it on even when on standby it generally eats away one hour.(2) It will disconnect between calls and reconnect at will.(3) The voice announcements are not just different from what it was but that's negligible but it doesn't always announce names that it used to earlier while my address book remains the same.(3.1) Earlier it used to announce aka read out numbers of callers that aren't in address book but now that feature is absent keeping you guessing or take a look at the phone.Cons - Company / Organisation1. While the build quality seems better than the earlier one which is a pro; HP subjects the customer to their elaborate processes such as1.1. Clicking pics of product and sending them1.2. You have to print the original invoice to send it back with the courier for pick up.1.3. You have to write on the box the serial number and all identification data on the box.1.4. Person talking to you on mail is from HP while the one on phone is generally Poly (cause the transition is still ongoing in the merger).1.5. The logistics department is blissfully unaware and cut off from the communication and they wind up calling you not knowing head from tail.2. They did send a replacement of the original PLT one (inspite of me asking them if the battery will hold good since PLT series was renamed Poly in 2018 and it's battery only lasts 5 years) when I logged a complaint  but again what I anticipated came to pass as the battery was drained in the replacement earpiece no matter how much you charge the standby time was only 5 minutes.3. Customer is subject to the lengthy organisational documentation processes laid down by HP that is cumbersome.3.1. This wouldn't happen even after Plantronics took over Poly where I remember the earbud that is a separate movable part had broken up and I tried reaching Plantronics / Poly, India who didn't respond to several calls and mails; I randomly wrote a stinker to their UK office and next thing is I received 2 sets of earbuds.PROS - Tech1. Sound quality is excellent2. Noise cancellation is awesome as ever3. Siri works fine as does AlexaPROS - Company / Organisation1. The CSE are exceptionally prompt.2. They do their best within scope of their knowledge & laid down processes.3. They keep following up religiously till the case is closed (in my case I gave up and requested them to shut the case as I didn't have time to keep going in circles, wait for their tech R&D etc)On the whole the product is still good BUT difference in the ₹ 22k and ₹ 8k product can be felt by those that have used it earlier.

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: 3回目の購入です。他社の製品も使用しましたが、結局はこの製品が使いやすいので、リピート購入しています。以下、参考まで。★良いところ•マイクが高性能のようで、通話相手からの評判が良い•一度ペアリンクをしておけば、イヤホンをONにした際に、ほぼ確実に自動接続してくれる•音量調整、通話受け、曲飛ばしをイヤホン側で操作できる•寝る時以外は装着しているが、全く違和感なく装着できる★残念なところ•電池持ちは、YYK-525の方がよい•音質に関しては、ELECOMのHSC20のほうが良い•頻繁に使用していると1年ほどでガタが来る

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: Polyになってからホント良く壊れる様になりました。これで8台目でしょうか、、、。今回は半年で相手から良く聞こえないと言われる様になり大体この症状がでるとアウトです。使い始めは通話品質やノイキャンなどとても良いので耐久性がしっかりしていたら最高だと思います。あと防水ではないので、汗や雨などの少量でも故障し始めますのでご注意ください。

ProductName: Plantronics - Voyager 5200 (Poly) - Bluetooth Over-The-Ear (Monaural) Headset - Compatible to Connect to Cell Phones - Noise Canceling, (Charger not Included) Standard
Review: ものは良いです。マイク品質は群を抜いてます。しかし壊れます。私は丁度1年で壊れ保証範囲外でした。レビューを見ても、◯個目 という評価も多くありますので、製品寿命は短いものと覚悟した方が良いと思います。

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: (quick update: it’s been about a year and i still give it 5 stars no issues with me) so the comfort is that it feels okay. it’s quite a heavy feeling (a bit tight even after adjusting but it’s not bothersome). definitely value for money it works perfectly no issues, all the light pieces work, mic light works and mic itself is good (based on my own questioning to others hearing me.) A little white rubbery cap to cover the usb is cute addition. i don’t have windows only mac so i don’t know about the colour changing sorry but the basic white is pretty enough for me lol.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: LITERALLY SO MUCH CHEAPER THAN THE REAL ONES!! i saved sm money and they’re so hot. they work on my ps5 and i love love love. only sad thing is, is that i have to go to the volume on my ps5 to put it lower, the headset volume button didn’t work?? however i still love it so much. i have never had such good microphone quality ever.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Originally i was going to buy them on the official razer site but since amazon takes returns, i gave the $129 vs $250 price a chance! I'm so glad i didn't spend the $250 because they're amazing and brand new from the box! really cute and i definitely recommend tysm amazon <3

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: I love this so much, super comfortable and amazing sound quality!! I use this with my PS4 and while you can’t use the buttons on the headset with PS4, it’s still very good and I highly recommend.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: My only issue is the mic - sometimes my friends say it sounds weird like I'm actively blowing air into the mic and sometimes it's too loud or too quiet.  Anyways, I've been trying to move configuration and so, it's been better I guess but not completely sure. Besides that, everything else is cool

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: It has nice sound and my friends said the mic sounds crisp my only complaint is that it gets a little warm after wearing too long. But other than that its great.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    
Okay here's the quick review. Sounds great. Is comfy (used to stream for over 12 hour sessions). Would recommend alone for quality. But Twitch Integration simply doesn't work.Now for the depth of it. I'm using OBS and StreamElements on Windows 10. I've linked Razer Synapse and Companion App and all that jazz to Twitch. Test Alerts work fine. In actual practice, nothing. I am not switching to OBS Streamlabs to use the headset either - and especially not now after everything has come to light, which frankly, doesn't surprise me. I digress.The sound is great, I was previously using a Razer Man O'War Edition, and the sound is better (but could easily be due to degradation over time).The comfort is a 10 for me, the ear cups don't squish my earlobes whilst wearing them - many headsets have in the past so this is a real plus.The RGB is bright and vibrant but depends on your lighting setup, obviously. I just use Razer Synapse Chroma Visualizer for some effect rather than static. But half the reason I bought this headset was to use with Twitch.My only concern with the Krakens is the cable being exposed above the earcups and between the top headrest is showing.**I have contacted Razer on Twitter and they just responded with a help bot/somebody who had no idea what I was talking about with Twitch Integration. So customer support gets a 4/10 for atleast acknowleding my existence and trying to help - even if linking to the same webpages I used to set up the device.**My only hope is that this whole Streamlabs OBS thing maybe kicks Razer to update the Companion App, unlikely. I just don't understand why Twitch Alerts work in Preview and not while Live - could just be a StreamElements issue which I haven't contacted them about yet.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: the audio and mic quality are nice, but the cord is frail. my cord died within 12 months and razer sent me a replacement product, however the second pairs cord died within 6 months so i gave up and just bought a different set. if you want the aesthetic go for it, but just be careful of the cord and try not to get it twisted

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: The sound quality is honestly pretty amazing, and the comfort is great for maybe 1-1.5 hours but then my ears got really hot.The pricing is pretty good but I would suggest getting the regular kraken if your not looking for the aesthetic cause I mainly got it cause it looked cute.Overall, good sound quality, good comfort for shorter periods, and very aesthetic! Would recommend if your into the aesthetic but the regular kraken will be just as good!

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: The design of this headset is quite cute and I love it, sound quality wise is good too. There's a button behind the headset close to where the volume scroller is, which I assume is the 3D sound function. If you leave that on, the sound is bound to disconnect after. On top of that, this is the second month I'm using this headset, not even two months in and there are some connectivity issues, where the sound and the mic cuts off. At the start, I had some issues with it too and had to restart my PC for it to work. For the price I paid, I was expecting something that's of a higer quality. I have read some bad reviews about this on Amazon but there were a lot of good ones too. I decided to give it a go and I'm kind of disappointed in the quality of this headset. I had a Logitech G432 headset before this, I was using it for more than two and a half years, I also acciddentally dropped it before and it still works perfectly fine despite the design looking flimsy. I never had any issues with that headset either. This one? The build makes it look like the quality is good, but in reality is way worse than the Logitech headset I had, I had to deal with more issues and way more expensive too.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: I bought this headset to replace an my old pair of headphones, and am very happy with the headphone functionality. However, the RGB functions did take some setting up to get working properly, and do not work as seamlessly as other RGB devices I have used. Additionally, while programming RGB, I noticed that Soft color tones can be hard to see, and I had to make them brighter so I could actually see them. Other than that, they're pink cat-girl headphones, what more do you want?

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Really great sound, especially when you go into the Razer Synapse software and pick the right settings. The mic is not that great but doesn't pick up background noise which is good.Now the reason I'm returning it - I have a small head and I've been using an older Razer Kraken Pro V2 which has thicker ear cushions, which cup around the sides of my head and kind of hold the headset up and distribute the weight of it evenly. The Razer Kraken Kitty for me, basically just sat at the top of my head. The sides were way too loose and didn't really cup around my ears, so I would just get headaches on the top of my head after 5 minutes of wear, which sucked. If you've got a small head like me, I don't recommend this headset!! You'll get headaches :(

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: I got this for my birthday, which is also my own fault because I didn’t really read reviews, but I’d have high hopes because it was so darn expensive?! I took care of the headset really well in comparison to my older ones. But they both seemed to have fully cut out within 6 months? Really weird, sucks considering I paid $250, the quality of the sound and the comfort is still pretty good though.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Died after three months

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: My headphones jus stopped completely working I cant hear anything out of them, the cord gets extremely tangled very easily and they just break there's a hole in the cord that came out of nowhere

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: I rarely used these headphones however just after 6 months of having these they have completely stopped working. They were always in a safe spot and don’t understand how they are broken.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: straight out of the box the sound quality was awful with a crackling noise every couple of seconds, I do not recommend buying these at all!!

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Sound and noise cancelling is great. There's a lot of options for manging the ear colours. Hubby is annoyed I spent so much but 100% no regrets.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: I've been using it for a couple weeks now, and I love them so much!! Synapse was a bit of struggle but other than that, they're really great.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Great sound quality and super cute

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1

It it so laughably bad that I almost want to throw them away. But I paid $180 for them, so I won't. What a reason.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Ordered this headset in black, came in pink, i was very mad at first but then i became one with the pink headset. Would recommend

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: love it

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1

Das Design ist super süß und die farbliche Einstellung ist einfach. Es gibt verschiedene Modi und die Farbe ist frei wählbar.Der Klang ist echt super gut. Es gibt viele Möglichkeiten zur Einstellung. ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Increíbles!

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: software(razer synapse) makkelijk installeren en je kun je geluid aanpassen naar wens.minpunt als je instellingen gaat in de windows geluidinstelling ruist de koptelefoon pieptoon.(dit is alleen met microfoon instellingen aan)  microfoon heeft nog extra insellingenWat ik graag wou zien was een losse kabel aansluiting en aanpassingen kleur van microfoon is best vervelend.voor de rest top , zijn leuk , en goede koptelefoon die luid kan zonder dat geluid raar klinktartikel was ook snel geleverd volgende dag in huisFijne dag nog toegewenst aan allen :)

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: I got these as an early Christmas present from my partner and I love them a lot!These are definitely well made for gaming; I can hear footsteps and shots so well in these, and it increases game immersion.The sound quality is surreal, and you can adjust the mode from Stereo to Surround Sound for specific apps and games in Synapse. You also can control the volume from the little wheel on the back, and the volume range is super powerful while maintaining the sound quality. Another pro is that they're noise cancelling. I would even wear these on the street while connected to my phone with a USB to Type C adapter; they don't feel too heavy on the head and you can maintain the light mode with cosplay mode. Also, they don't squish your head with prolonged use, and, because I wear glasses, this is definitely a major pro.Upon testing it on Speech Jammer, the microphone is the clearest I've ever used. You can definitely use it even for live streaming and YouTube voice-overs. It also features a mute button right at the tip, and lights red when active.I love using the Chroma Studio to customise the lights on the ears and sides, so it elongates the experience in a way.And, if it wasn't obvious already, they are absolutely adorable and taking selfies with these, as shallow as that sounds, is a joy!

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: The headset sound quality and the mic sound are superb and build is sleek and cute at the same time. The retractable mic is a plus, it doesn’t get in the way when not in use. It is also comfortable to use compared to a lower end headset I bought 2 months ago. I am happy with my black Razer Kraken Kitty despite of being on the pricier side. I hope it last a long time.I’d love to give this a 5 star review but I had an issue connecting it. The device worked perfectly with a new RSH 7 Port USB 3 hub with AC Adapter I bought on the first night. However, the next day it keeps getting disconnected and reconnected in Razer Synapse 3. I tried some TS steps online and it seems like it happened to other users too. I made sure all apps/software were updated and restarted several times to no avail. Now, just to use it I connect it directly to may laptop even though I prefer it attached to the hub with other accessories. I will try it again some other time and hopefully it works again on the hub.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 23 October 2020

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Das Head ist sehr gut verarbeitet, der Klang ist sehr gut und das handling ist auch perfekt.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Given to my 16 year old granddaughter for a Christmas gift. Very pleased with the quality of the headphones and all its features!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 January 2021

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Cet article est l'un des objets que j'attendais le plus.Le son est parfait !Les coussinets s'adaptent parfaitement bien à mes oreilles et vu que je porte des lunettes, le casque ne pose aucun problème car il n'y a pas de gêne.Le RGB est très sympa. On peut le modifier en passant par un tableau de bord qui s'installe automatiquement.Je suis complètement fan de mon achat.Je le recommande aussi bien pour l'esthétisme et la pratique.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Finally I can be the cat-gamer girl I always wanted to be! 😂I love these! They sit very comfortably on my head, have great noise cancellation, and the way that you can play with the lighting in the headphones is so much fun. I love everything about the product and can’t recommend it enough. My friends are all jealous.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 1 January 2024

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Le son est très bien (jeu fps), j’ai pris ce casque pour les lives le côté oreille de chats le rends très mignon.Rien à dire parfait pour moi.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Actualmente tengo varios headset, unos sennheiser HD 598 Cs,  un razer tournament manowar, hyperx cloud alpha y el headset de dva (incluso tuve unos beats solo 2).  De todos estos la comodidad se los han llevado los Kitty. Uso lentes de armazón delgado y tengo perforadas mis orejas así que desde el inicio se siente la diferencia (pondría mis sennheiser en empate y los cloud alpha en segundo lugar).En cuanto a sonido la verdad me parecieron muy buenos,no me desagradan los bajos potenciados (los disfruté en mis beats solo2) pero este headset no exagera en ellos, siento que tienen muy buen balance. Los probé en overwatch y el positional audio está muy bien, recordando que para juegos no es necesario tener el surround.En cuanto al micrófono la cancelación activa me pareció buena (aún sin moverle a los settings) , ya he comparado los otros en overwatch y estos sí tienen un pequeño plus.  Probé hablando con otra persona y la otra persona sí se oía con un volumen más bajo que mis demás headset con mic.En cuanto a calidad de construcción se sienten súper bien, no tengo miedo de que se rompan como mis manowar TE. Y al parecer estas almohadillas van a durar más que las de los manowar.La verdad es que el RGB y las orejas no eran tan necesarias para mí, pero no quería algo tan parecido a lo que ya tengo y no era tanta la diferencia en precio comparado con los razer kraken ultimate (que técnicamente son lo mismo). Aún así me está gustando mucho el detallito de las luces con mi música.Espero poder hacer update positivo de este headset después de usarlos por un rato :)  pero de entrada me encantaron muchísimo.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 19 July 2021

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Depois de 1 ano de uso, venho aqui deixar minhas observações. O fone é lindo e o software da raze sempre atualiza. Depois de um curto tempo de uso, comecei a perceber que o microfone não tem qualidade, minha voz sai bem rouca e “suja”, todos sempre comentam, para o valor, esperava mais da qualidade do microfone. Já o áudio é perfeito, e tem diversas opções no software para alterar. Com o tempo o cabo começou a enrolar e meio que partiu bem na altura do pescoço e fica me dando choque. Se você está procurando por um headset gamer com qualidade de matéria e microfone não recomendo a compra desse. Mas se for para apenas áudio ele é sensacional!

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Veio tudo certo. Mas sinceramente? Pelo preço a razer poderia atualizar algumas coisas. É basicamente pagar pela estética, porque no quesito qualidade msm tem uns mais baratos bem melhores

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Le casque de géniale, il es super jolie. Bonne qualité de son ! Il es pas lourd, foncé

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Ya llevo unas semanas utilizandolas y no me han decepcionado, yo los utilizo en especial para jugar pero para ver series no estan mal aunque si te recomendaria otra opcion si solo los quieres para algo mas casual

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Der Kauf des Razer Kraken Kitty Gaming Headsets für meine Freundin war ein Volltreffer! Sie ist absolut begeistert von dem verspielten Design und der beeindruckenden Soundqualität. Ein Gaming-Headset, das nicht nur stilvoll, sondern auch leistungsstark ist. Sehr zufrieden mit dieser Wahl!

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: - super good audio quality- able to edit the RGB and the bass in the installationi am SO happy with it. a bit pricey but that's expected when it comes to razer haha. i think its totally worth it if you love pink and RGBs as much as me !!

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: super comfy headset with great lighting that you can customise yourself! mic quality seems good too, obviously the quality won't be as great as an actual mic, but for comms in a video game its perfect! the sound sometimes cuts out for me but i think that may be a problem with my pc, so if you have usb problems with your pc, you might wanna consider something else as this headset only has a usb cable.

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Destiné pour un cadeau pour une ado, aucunes déceptions.(Qualité et description conforme au signalement de l'offre).Casque de très bonne facture fabriqué avec un choix de matériaux de qualité.Plastique haute densité et armature en Aluminium. (TOP !!!)(D’où un poids un peu lourd... mais c'est le prix de la qualité qui ne gêne aucunement sa bonne tenue et son confort d'utilisation).Très bonne finitions(Coutures, rembourrage des écouteurs, câble tressé, alliance harmonieuse entre métal et plastique, bonne luminosité des LED).Bref, une réelle impression de qualité, tant dans la conception que dans le choix des matériaux.(C'est du RAZZER, la robustesse se voit et le soin de sa conception justifie amplement son prix).Installation facile et reconnaissance instantané du casque par l'OS (Windows10 ).Néanmoins, pour le rendre réellement polyvalent, un adaptateur USB <=> Prise jack aurait été apprécié.(Quitte à payer quelques € de plus).Acheté 116€ lors du promo, à ce prix, c'est un article que je recommande donc vivement.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 2 July 2021

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Qualidade e Luxo !
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 July 2023

ProductName: Razer AU Kraken Kitty Chroma USB Gaming Headset, Quartz, RZ04-02980200-R3M1
Review: Muy bonitos y cómodos. Valen la pena 100%

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: The Pulse 3D Headset for PlayStation 5 is a great product for gamers who are looking for a high-quality, immersive gaming experience. The headset is designed specifically for use with the PlayStation 5 and provides a number of features that enhance the gaming experience.One of the things I liked most about this headset is its comfortable design. The ear cups and headband are made with soft, breathable materials that make it easy to wear for extended gaming sessions. The headset is also very lightweight and you can wear it for hours and not feel any discomfort.The sound quality of the headset is also great, the 3D audio feature provides a more immersive gaming experience, and you can hear every sound in the game with great clarity, it provides an immersive experience that is hard to get with other headsets.Another thing I liked is that it has a built-in microphone which is very clear and easy to use, making it perfect for online gaming and communication with friends.The only downside I found is that the headset is a bit pricey, but it is definitely worth the money for the high-quality, immersive gaming experience it provides.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: I’ve had this for a dozen days and the 3D audio and the mic is flawless. It’s very comfortable and and I love how how it’s just plug and play then you just turn it on boom it’s comes fully charged and it lasts for 9 hours which is enough for my play session. I think it makes my whole online interaction

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Frustrating that I can’t just use my AirPod Max with the PS5 just like I do with every other gaming device, so I had to get these. Going from a decent set of headphones to these is noticeable, the fit isn’t adjustable so it can feel like the headphones are floating on your head, they are not fully closed, so you can easily head surrounding noise, the 3D sound is pretty good though. It really feels like the headphones were such an afterthought for Sony when they made the PS5.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Love this product. Fits well, the sound quality is great.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: I really like wearing these headphones, the sound is great and they’re very comfortable even after a few hours. The battery life is good as well.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Exactly as advertised, delivered on time and in good order.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: been using them for a couple months there great

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: The quick service. Delivered on time and a good price. Exactly what my son wanted. He is rapped

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: I liked this headset a lot. Sounds nice and feels good on the head but disappointing that the Bluetooth cannot be used on phone and is very finicky when using it on computer

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: limited use, it should work on its own.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Sound quality is very good, but they are very tight and uncomfortable to wear for an extended period. They are my backup pair when I need to charge my Steel Series, so I can live with them, but I would not recommend if you are looking for comfort first.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: The seamless integration with the PS5 console is a big selling point. Built and sound quality are also above average. The only issue I have is the tension of the headband. It clenched my jaw and made usage uncomfortable after more than half an hour. I ended up removing the rubber headband and attach a household sponge to keep the headphone on top of my head. Much more comfortable this way, but looks rather ugly.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: I'd been using an Arctis 7 for both my PC and PS5 and it was a pain swapping the bluetooth dongle between the two so bought the Pulse headset to be my committed PS5 headset. The first time I jumped into a voice chat with some friends, unprompted and with no knowledge that I'd replaced my headset, my buddy Steve says "Eurgh, why do you sound so bad? What did you change?". A day later I have an almost identical discussion with my friend Dave, who asks what happened to my headset and why I sound so much worse. Hardly a ringing endorsement, and made me feel like I should have spent a little bit more money for something better.The controls on the headset are pretty good, I appreciate being able to easily hear the side-tone (hear my own voice back through the headset) and easily adjust the game/chat balance. I think generally the game audio I'm hearing is solid, and the headset is light and comfortable. I have quite a big head and large ears (my head has the same proportions as a lightbulb lol), but the cups cover them and the headset is fine to wear for extended periods of time without feeling like my head is being squished. Just be aware that the mic isn't the best, and if you're swapping from a Steelseries or Razer headset then this is probably going to be quite a big step down. Also worth noting that the battery life seems to match the PS5 controllers (it's bad) and I've had to recharge the headset multiple times even though I've only had it for a week.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: This headset is easy to connect and setup. Can be used on multiple devices not just the ps5.The audio quality is excellent and i cant find a fault.Battery life is also rather good. Lasts easily 5 hours without a charge.My only grievance would be the ear cups are slightly uncomfortable. The leather feel may make you sweat in warmer locations. They are soft and fit a large ear easily.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: My son loves these things.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Likes, sound quality is the same as my Astro A50’s but noise canceling is better than my A50’s though they only have the std ear pads. I do like the sliding adjustable head strap that’s a cool innovation, the usability on other devices is a bonus plug and listen though a Bluetooth option would of been a nice touch also great design.Dislikes, somewhat tight fitting people with a bigger than std head ears get little uncomfortable after hours of gaming but not to the point where I need to remove the headset, guess more usage will help stretch the main frame , to scared to try and  do it by hand in case I snap them hahaha.All in all I still recommend them to anyone wanting very affordable headset equal to myA50’s for a fraction of the price, sorry Astro I still use my Astro A50’s also

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Fast postage item as described highly recommend thanks 👍🏼

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: GREAT HEADSET - FAST DELIVERY

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: I use these with a PS5 and they are fantatsic. Also very good when using with desktop computer. Love the fact they utilise wifi instead of bluetooth. For the price you cannot go wrong.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Seem like ok quality, however fit and feel are pretty average. Don't know why these get rave reviews. Maybe I am just spoilt with more high end cans.... Only got these so I did not have to set up my DAC/AMP and Sennheiser's all the time. No where near is comfy though...

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Great Product quick delivery!

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: These headphones are great for my PS5. The sound is vibrant and clear, and sync'd with the images on the TV. I find them really comfortable too.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: My kid just ends up using his controller which has a microphone and speaker on the PS5.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: I love these headphones. They have such an amazing sound. Very highend

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Very limited stock floating around meant I felt pretty lucky to be able to get the headset when it became available, and haven't been disappointed with it since. It looks great alongside the PS5 and the other accessories (controller, charger, remote) and the quality of the sound is high. The noise cancelling really elevates above previous headsets I've used.Only downside is that the design does feel very flimsy and fragile and it remains to be seen how durable they will be with the heavy use I intend for them!Great price and delivered very quickly. Several days earlier than originally estimated by Amazon at checkout.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Definitely worth the price, very good sound and super comfortable

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: aside of its fast shipment, i can use this not just for ps5 but also to my work laptop. easy to use and charging is fast. only thing is that i cannot adjust it. i have a small head and it just looks loose on my head. but overall it does the work.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: These are good for play when you don’t want to disrupt others - such as middle of night game play when family is asleep or middle of the day when you’re meant to be working. They aren’t fantastic as far as comfort goes but they are fine for a few hours of play. The sound is also fine, but not incredible. I’m happy I got them, pairing was simple.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Sound was great, connectivity and ease use was great. Used for PS5.Mic quality was horrible, especially for party chat, there was no fix for adjusting Mic QUALITY. Very disappointing, returned.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Not my favourite headphones ever but it does work well with a PS5

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Great sound. Wireless audio works great. Plus it’s great for late night gaming. You get big sound and not disturb anyone in the house.The only negative is that it can get a little uncomfortable. The ear cups  are a little harder than I’d like.Ive got a pair of Sennheiser Momentum over ear wireless headphones. Which are great btw. The ear cups on them are nice and soft and feel super premium compared to the PS5 headphones.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Purchased these to keep things down after the kids go to bed. They work perfectly. Battery lasts about as long as the remote too. Happy customer.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Over all pretty happy with these. Sound quality is fantastic, usability is easy and reliable. I've got big ears so would rather a larger cup but its still pretty comfy. Over all I'd definitely recommend, especially at this affordable price.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: They are great

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Great functions and sound quality but for small ears/children. I'm an adult with multiple ear piercings including small tunnels, and have to remove the jewellery to wear this comfortably

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Good

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Sleek design. Little bit flimsy with the buttons but sounds good! I thought it was noise cancelling but it’s noise cancelling microphone. Oh well.Love the integration. Instant connection, no bs. Once it’s switched off, it changes audio output to your tv speaker.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Plenty of bass without blare and clears highs without sibilance. Using with PS4, hassle free connection and can use with phone via USBc OTG cable. Comfortable enough though gets a bit much after an hour or so. Better than Bluetooth by a country mile!

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Sounds fantastic and good value, I think for the price.  Mind you, it seems that buying it from Australian Amazon is cheaper than Amazon UK. I am using it on my PS4 Pro because like the rest of us I still can’t get a PS5. On my PS4 Pro, they are glitchy when playing with some games.I will compare this review later when I get my hands on a PS5.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5

Review: No complaints with delivery or packaging. The headset itself is of excellent build quality, but to be honest, the sound quality is not quite as good as I was expecting. Considering these are designed to show off the Ps5's new 3d audio tech, I'm a little underwhelmed.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Completely non adjustable so you need to get used to how they sit, the on/off button is hard to use but sound quality is decent for the price. Not bad overall but could be better.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
