ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Good quality. Syncs in no problemo with the ps5. Used by my son daily for 6 months so far and had zero issues.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: This headset is great quality for its price. It cancels out noise and I love the fact that I don't have to worry about cords getting in the way. Not only that but it was $10 cheaper than anywhere else with free delivery, arriving the very next day

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Bought these as a gift and they’re apparently the best gaming headphones ever.

ProductName: Pulse 3D Wireless Headset - PlayStation 5
Review: Pretty disappointed with these. They feel like cheap flimsy headphones that cost a third of the price. There are two many controls on the one ear cup and they all feel to similar to use them by touch alone.Sound is not great at all, they sound like they feel, flimsy.The headphones also don’t isolate very well, if you are playing in a room with other people it’s like you’re not wearing headphones at all.Their only redeeming quality is that they work.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: first and foremost, these headphones are excellent! they do look awesome and feel very comfortable when in place on your noggin! however, they are not cheap and sadly that is where they don't quite make it into the high-end quality headphones that they pretend to be! they feel cheap! the sound is great but not as good as i was hoping for...particularly for listening to music and watching movies...gaming is where they excel...because they are so light and open cups you can play for hours and not feel like your brain is being squashed by a pair of vice grips (my GSP601 tends to do that after an hour or two)...don't get me wrong...they are very nice...just don't over think them...if you can buy them on special...go for it!

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Overall happy with this item sound is okay could do with some better noise cancelling but they would there gonna be more expensive. I was in that everything works doesn’t need to do so I have enough

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: The  soundstage is nice you will really know where the enemy is coming and you will not have a boiling ears after a long gaming seasions.Volume is enough for me but it is best paired with epos soundcard for the best results.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: This headset is objectively amazing. The comfort, built quality and style are fantastic and feel premium. Yes, it’s a wired headset and can only be connected via 3.5mm jack but the sound is incredible (punchy and rumbling yet also detailed bass and clear highs). The mic sounds fantastic too (I sound rich and natural) and it is both flip to mute and detachable. There aren’t any controls on this headset other than the volume wheel, but what it lacks in features, it makes up for with comfort and sound quality. Highly recommend
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 January 2024

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Olha, sou viciado em fones de ouvido. Adoro jogar e ouvir música, e sou muito exigente. Esses fones foram o SEGUNDO fone que conseguiu me deixar sem palavras. Simplesmente perfeitos. Muito confortáveis, bonitos, leves, e o som... Maravilhoso!!!! Se eu pudesse citar algum detalhe, diria que eles precisam de uma certa potência para brilhar, o que quer dizer que talvez ache eles baixos se ligar diretamente no celular, sem um bom DAC. Mas isso não é problema, é qualidade. Valeram cada centavo pago!!!

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: J'avais auparavant des HyperX Cloud, mais je suis plus que satisfait d'avoir enfin changé !Pour moi le gros point fort de ce casque est le contrôle du volume latéral.Honnêtement je pensais que ce n'était qu'un gadget, mais à l'utilisation cela rend vraiment l'utilisation du casque très confortable.J'ai tendance à regarder beaucoup de vidéos en étant "allongé" sur mon siège de bureau, et pouvoir régler le volume sans avoir à se relever est vraiment un gros plus !La qualité du microphone doit être moyenne, sans plus, étant donné que je n'ai reçu aucun commentaire positifs à son encontre lors de mes sessions en vocal sur Discord.Le casque est sinon très esthétique et semble de bonne facture.Le fait de pouvoir activer et désactiver le microphone en le faisant descendre est également très pratique.Finalement ce casque regorge de bonnes idées et est donc incroyablement confortable à l'utilisation.Je n'ai, pour le moment, aucun point négatifs a signaler.Cela dit, si cela venait à changer je modifierai mon commentaire en fonction.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Throughout my time I’ve purchased MANY headphones, I am very very picky with how they perform and feel and the quality of the headphones itself.. now the reason I’ve gotten this was cause my last pair were decent but the wire gave out sadly… i did the switch to the epos based on what I’ve heard about them and my oh my where have I been. These headphones not only feel nice and look good but they also sound spectacular and have some very nice features. For one the open back models have absurd surround sound which trumped a lot of headphones with surround sound I had before, the audio clarity is great and the headset feels very comfortable for long durations of gaming or music or whatever you do. One fantastic feature i love is the option to take off the mic if you have one too, and the slick little disk that covers it is another part of that which I love.Overall, quality and performance for audio on these headphones are very good and the materials make me think this will last a long time. I’ll update my post if they don’t last. (Ps: feels great if you also wear glasses)

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Ich habe noch nie ein so hochwertiges Headset besessen, dem zu Folge kann ich es nicht mit anderen vergleichen. Meine Erwartungen hat es jedoch voll erfüllt.Beim Auspacken viel mir gleich auf, wie gut die Kabel sind, die dem Headset beiliegen. Besserer und vor allem weniger anfälliger Schutzmantel, sauberer Anschluss an den Stecker - die Kabel gehen mir jedenfalls nicht so schnell wieder kaputt. Und das beste - sie sind abnehmbar und damit einzeln ersetzbar.Das Headset ist aus Kunststoff, wirkt aber stabil und ist überraschend schwer. Der Bügel endet bei mir relativ weit Vorne auf dem Kopf. Ich empfinde das als sehr angenehm, weil er dann nicht über der empfindlichen Mitte des Kopfes liegt. Der Bügel wird sowieso wenig belastet. Der Andruck der Hörmuscheln auf den Kopf ist angenehm. Ich hatte in verschiedenen Rezensionen gelesen, er sei sehr fest. Nun, mein Bezugspunkt ist da wohl ein anderer (Schutzkopfhörer für die Arbeit), den für mich ist er passeend, obwohl ich gerade hinter dem Ohr recht empfindlich auf Druck reagiere. Das Polster der Hörer ist sehr weich.Klangqualität und Mikrofon erscheinen mir deutlich besser, als was ich es bisher kenne. Auch Musik lässt sich damit gut hören. Meiner Meinung nach macht es dabei sowohl die Höhen als auch die Tiefen super mit.Das Mikrofon ist abnehmbar und durch eine kleine Scheibe ersetzbar. Davon liegen gleich zwei dabei. Abschalten lässt sich das Mikro, indem man es einfach hoch klappt. Gut brauchbar, wenn man während eines Gespräches gestört wird. Beide Funktionen sind praktisch, aber wegen des dünnen Mikroarms sollte man aufpassen, das Mikro möglichst dicht am Bügel anzufassen, damit es nicht irgendwann vielleicht doch bricht. Nicht das es so wirkt als bräche es schnell, aber Vorsicht ist besser als nochmal kaufen. Lautstärken lässt an der rechten Hörmuschel regulieren. Für manche Fälle leichter als auf die Lautstärkeregler am Gerät zurückzugreifen.Ich habe es im Angebot gekauft und bin mit Preis/Leistung sehr zufrieden.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: I have had this headset for over a year and I am quite happy with it. It's not perfect but luckily I found ways to fix the only major issues I have had with it.PRO TIPS! To get the most out of this headset I have some recommendations:I found that the headset on PC was too quiet and didn't get loud enough. To fix this I found out that you can download steelseries GG software and make adjustments in sonar, even though this headset is a completely different brand. In the game tab, scroll down past the EQ and there is an option to enable "volume boost." I turned this all the way up to +12 and the headset is SIGNIFICANTLY louder. Also you can fine tune EQ and save presets with sonar to dial in the sound profile. You're welcome!The other issue I had was that the ear pads were stiff enough that they really irritated my head after a while, especially wearing glasses. Luckily this was also a relatively easy fix. I found a youtube video recommending replacement pads from Dekoni Audio. I purchased the Jerzee mesh pads and they are much softer and more comfortable than the original, which completely solved that problem. The headset does still create a bit of a pressure point at the top of my head because of the uniform shape of the headband cushion, so I wish it had a gap at the top like other headsets but it's not that bad.https://www.amazon.com/Replacement-Sennheiser-Headphones-Headphone-Cushions/dp/B08DSL5KH8?ref_=ast_sto_dp&th=1The headset overall is great. I love that it is open back, has a nice wide soundstage and the sound just feels big and rich with detail. Sound is a bit bass heavy and sometimes can sound muddy but you can change EQ in sonar to help with that some. I find that open back creates less listening fatigue over time and I can still hear my own voice without sidetone and I can hear whats going on around me.Build quality is outstanding and comfort is really good (with the new pads at least). The design works very well to create a good fit around the head. Love the big deep ear cups and drivers.I bought this headset used from amazon for I think $70, and there were no issues. At that price this headset is an incredible deal and I recommend 100%. Retail price is definitely steep, but you wont be disappointed with build quality. I'd say $60-$120 is an ideal price and feels like excellent value.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 8 December 2023

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Terminacion muy premium y el sonido sorprende por calidad y fidelidad.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Après avoir eu un Corsair Void Pro pendant presque 5 ans il était temps de changer de casque.Je m'étais tout d'abord tourné vers le Corsair HS80 RGB Wireless mais pas convaincu de la qualité sonore et de la durée de la batterie j'ai essayé le Arctis Nova 7+ qui à une meilleur qualité de son mais qui à une qualité de micro vraiment pas folle et une qualité de construction qui fait vraiment cheap comparé au Corsair HS80.J'ai commencé avec le Epos h6 pro fermé qui est vraiment super confortable avec une très bonne restitution sonore et une isolation au poil voir un peu trop à mon gout, en effet je n'arrivais même plus à m'entendre parler tellement qu'il isolait ce qui est terriblement troublant. J'ai donc décidé de prendre son frère qui est ouvert et qui est globalement le même que celui fermé mais en isolant pas, seul bémol à la version ouverte c'est les coussinet que je trouve moins confortable surtout avec des lunettes et qui appuie plus sur le crane car étant légèrement plus épais.Par ailleurs je vous conseille d'acheter un autre câble compatible en caoutchouc car les câbles tressé ont tendance à s'entendre à l'oreille lorsque qu'il y a du frottement.En conclusion si vous souhaitez un bon casque pour jouer, écouter de la musique et regarder des films l'Epos h6 est vraiment superbe, il ne vous restera plus qu'à choisir entre la version ouvert ou fermé selon si vous préférez une bonne isolation ou non.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Great sound, Great mic and extremely comfortable. Only bought it so can't comment on longevity but build is fantastic so can't imagine I'll have an issue.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 February 2024

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: I really tried to love this headset. The build quality is really good and you can feel it right after you open the box. Yet I have to point that the sound quality is not as good as it seems. If you are a competitive gamer on a budget, get yourself a shp9500 or 9600. If you want a on par build quality, get the Beyer dt770/990 pro. If you want a superior sound with a mic, grab the drop pc38x.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 5 January 2023

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Não tem Bluetooth os fios só tem p2, pra quem quer para Playstation nem adinta compra, mas o heatseat é muito confortável e tem bom áudio.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Muy comodos, bonitos y suenan super bien para gaming y escuchas musica, justo lo que buscaba

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Cuffia pensata per l'utenza gaming di una ex branca, ora indipendente, di Sennheiser. Si propone come modello aperto con microfono integrato e regolatore di volume. La qualità dei materiali usati è sufficientemente superiore (archetto parzialmente in metallo con tanto di numeri per la regolazione, padiglioni ricoperti in microfibra sempre freschi) a quanto usato da altri concorrenti come Razer e TB, più simile Hyperx. Rispetto a quest'ultima chiede un prezzo quasi doppio non offrendo nulla di eclatante dal punto di vista sonoro. Tarata verso bassi consistenti e dei buoni alti perde in spazialità del suono, risulta tutto molto vicino all utente tanto da non sembrare una cuffia aperta, e da notare che viene proposta in entrambe le versioni. Non c'è senso di distanza delle sorgenti e gli oggetti sonori affrontano uno "spigolo" quando passano dal fronte al retro che può disorientare.Anche l'ascolto musicale ne soffre, il palcoscenico è decisamente ristretto per poter essere coinvolgente ma rimane abbastanza divertente, di certo non vi donerà una dimensione più ampia delle vostre tracce preferite.Le funzionalità dedicate al gaming sono oggettivamente un punto a favore: la possibilità di regolare il volume dal padiglione destro va bene (livello minimo 5% si narra sia dovuto allo smarrimento di alcuni utenti che dimenticandoselo allo 0, ritenevano che la cuffia avesse smesso di funzionare, così si decise per il minimo 5%) e il microfono è preciso, pulito e molto comodo potendolo spegnere spostando il meccanismo verso l'alto e risulta rimovibile grazie all'aggancio magnetico. Viene fornito anche un dischetto per coprire la zona rimasta scoperta insomma uno dei migliori integrati in cuffie. Ma comunque non mi ha convinto appieno. Ci sono cuffie che costano se non la metà, addirittura la metà della metà che risultano molto più soddisfacenti sia nell'ascolto musicale che per chi dovesse giocare. Nel secondo caso risulta spesso fondamentale la presenza di un microfono. Con lo stesso budget dell'Epos H6pro (180 al momento della recensione) potete prendere cuffie migliori, microfono a condensatore con tanto di braccio e avanzare qualche decina di euro. Nessuno chiede per questa cifra le stesse performance di un Hd800, ma una Cloud Alpha, una hd 599 o una umilissima Superlux hd681 si giocano meglio le proprie carte. Mi sa tanto di occasione sprecata anche perché dal punto di vista estetico e tattile sono veramente piacevoli, la colorazione verde scuro è una chicca e la scelta di abbinare inserti dorati ne accentua il carattere. Fossero state con un soundstage più aperto e puntuale e una riproduzione anche solo leggermente più verso il neutro (di poco, si può mantenere comunque una sonorità divertente) sarebbe stata una recensione molto differente.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Amazing mic quality, and sound quality. I use them mostly for gaming, and am able to pinpoint sounds so easily. Especially in games like Hunt: Showdown which have great sound design. Would not recommend if you game in a loud area as they do let some sound in being open back.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Nachdem mein Sennheiser PC 350 SE mit seinen 12 Jahren langsam aber sicher auseinanderbröselt, wollte ich mir endlich ein neues Headset zulegen.Ich habe auf das immer so oft erwähnte Beyerdynamics MMX 300 geschielt, weil man relativ oft davon im Bereich PC-Gaming gelesen hat/liest.Nach einigem einlesen in die Materie bin ich aber schnell davon abgekommen, weil es einfach ein Beyerdynamics 770 mit Micro sein soll und somit maßlos überteuert war.Ich besorgte mir nun aufgrund mehrerer gelesener Wertungsseiten folgende Headsets:Beyerdynamics 770 Pro 250 OhmBeyerdynamics 990 Pro 250 OhmHyper Cloud X AlphaEpos H6 ProBetrieben wurden alle vier Kopfhörer/Headsets an einem Creativ SB X G6 in diversen Modi, aber überwiegend im Direct Mode.Ein verstellen des Equalizers kam für mich nicht in Frage. Wenn ich ~150 Euro für einen Kopfhörer ausgebe, dann muss das in den Standarteinstellungen passen und nicht erst durch herumdoktorn gelöst werden müssen.Gespielt wurden: Warhammer 40K Darktide, Warhammer 40K Deamongate, War Thunder und ein paar andere Titel. Des weiteren wurden Metal, Klassik und Synthietitel angehört um einen etwaigen Vergleich zu erlangen.Test: Beyerdynamics:Vorweg, die Beyerdynamics hatten den saubersten und ausgewogensten Klang für meine Ohren. Ich hab lange nicht verstanden wovon in den Foren immer geredet wird, wenn von einem hochauflösenden, klaren, granularen, gleichmäßig auf Höhen/Tiefen/Mitten verteilten Klang geredet wurde.Als ich die beiden BD auf hatte, wusste ich was gemeint war. Es war schlichtweg ein Genuss damit in die Games reinzuhöhren.Behalten hätte ich dann tatsächlich das 990 Pro, weil mir das offene System einfach besser gefallen hat, weiter/räumlicher wirkte und man trotzdem noch ein wenig was von der "Außenwelt" mitbekommt.Gescheitert ist es dann letztendlich aber an dem sogenannten Beyerpeak. Die Höhen waren so klar definiert und hatten für meine Ohren wirklich grantige Spitzen, dass ich nach spätestens einer Std durch. war und die Höhrer abnehmen musste. Sehr schade muss ich sagen. Mich hats wirklich sehr gereut die beiden Modelle wieder zurücksenden zu müssen, aber so konnte ich nicht zocken. Im Scout-Mode schon gleich fünfmal nicht. Da meinte ich, mir piekst jemand ins Ohr.Dann das HyperX:Wie bitte in allen Herr Gotts Namen kann dieses Teil so gut bewertet werden!? Ich hatte es lediglich in Darktide auf und war der Meinung in einer Blechröhre zu sitzen. Grottenschlecht. Dumpfer Sound, Hall ohne Ende und keine Räumlichkeit. Sofort wieder ab in die Verpackung. Aber gut, ist auch eine andere Preisklasse. Weg damit.Das EPOS H6Pro (offen) in Racing Green:Das Teil ist super verpackt und macht optisch einen sehr tollen Eindruck. Für Gamer. Musikliebhabern wird das erstmal wurscht sein nehme ich an.Klar, viel Plastik, aber alles ist sauber und schlüssig verarbeitet. Der Volumeregler hat den optimalen Widerstand und lässt sich reibungslos drehen. Die Arretierung für das abnehmbare Mikro ist robust und ohne Schnickschnack gebaut und verspricht so Langlebigkeit.Nun aber zum wichtigsten, dem Klang. Basslastiger als die BDs. Die Höhen und Tiefen kommen gut rüber, die Mitten rutschen etwas in den Hintergrund, aber nicht zu Lasten der Räumlichkeit. Ortung funktioniert mit diesem Headset genausogut wie mit den BDs.Nach langem Hin- und Herprobieren hab ich mich dann für das EPOS H6 Pro entschieden.Zum einen brauch ich kein Extra Mikro, zum anderen hatte ich da kein Problem mit den ebenso klaren Höhen, die jedoch nicht diese unangenehmen Spitzen wie die BDs hatten. Die leicht in den Hintergrund gerückten Mitten sind verkraftbar. Der Bass ist gut und definitiv nicht schwammig, sondern schon eher knackig und verleiht Explosionen oder einem MG das nötige Volumen.Ich persönlich bin sehr froh mit dem Epos und habe mein nächstes Headset gefunden und genieße es so oft ich kann. Guter Klang ist einfach unerläßlich für eine ordentliche Immersion in Games.Zu den Passformen möchte ich nicht viel sagen, denn jeder Kopf ist anders. Allerdings, sehr bequem waren die Polster der BDs, von der Form und Größe her, sowie vom Anliegen an den Kopf kam mir das Epos besser vor.Ich hoffe einigen mit meiner Rezension geholfen zu haben. Die Suche im Headsetdschungel hätte mich fast wahnsinnig gemacht, weshalb es mir die Mühe wert erschien, eine ausführliche Rezi zu schreiben.Game on!

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Me deje llevar por la marca que es y porque se supone que son de lo mejor que hay para gaming, pero me han decepcionado bastante.Yo los uso para Series X y PS5 y no cumplen, el sonido NO se escucha nitido, parece como "¿hueco? ¿en una cueva?".Actualmente tengo unos HyperX Earbuds 2, que son unos auriculares gaming de 40€ y se escuchan mejor que estos en juegos de PS5 y Series X , con eso lo digo todo. Y para musica mis Sony wh-1000xm3 le dan mil vueltas en todo y encima son inalambricos con cancelacion de ruido.Con el amplificador que vende la marca seguro qeu mejora, pero este amplificador no se puede poner en consolas creo, asi que no valdria para mi.Resumen: Si lo que quieres es jugar en ps5 o series x, olvidate de estos auriculares, el sonido es bastante malo.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Regularly used for 2 years so far. I originally got these for 3 reasons: open-back, looks, and good sound quality.Open-back was important to me so I could hear my dog, my surroundings, and my own voice better. Hearing my own voice helped me lower my own speaking volume a bit.Sound quality is good. Do keep in mind they're open-back, so the bass is never going to be impactful - with that expectation in mind, everything sounds pretty good and it's relatively easy listening (not exhausting like some more punchy headphones)Also very comfortable for long periods. My last two sets of headphones were uncomfortable after longer sessions (Bose QC35, Sony WH-1000XM4). These ones don't leave a dent in my head, don't clamp too hard on my very sensitive temple area, and don't heat up my head/ears. I sometimes forget I'm wearing them!I usually use it without the microphone. The microphone itself is "fine". The connection for the microphone is not - I usually have to push the attach point hard a couple times, because the contact pins don't seem to make proper contact and no sound goes through until I do. Likely just a problem with my unit, but notable.My skin oils are very hard on ears cups and such. These ones are definitely degrading and starting to show signs of wear, but they're probably good for a while yet.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Voulant changer de casque afin de verifier les commentaires plutot elogieux de ce casque j ai franchi le pas.Tout d abord : livraison avec prime le lendemain de la commande, donc +1 pour le service.Au niveau du casque : bon casque avec des basses marques, le micro est de bonne facture, la couleur verte on aime ou pasPlug and play sur xbox serie xLe moins : je le trouve plutot inconfortable au niveau du poids de ce dernier, j ai mal au cou au bout de 30 minutes de jeu, est ce du a mes cervicales ou le casque est il vraiment lourd ? Il faut dire que je viens d un Sennheiser 560 S qui est un poids plume à côtéJe pense le retourner et revenir vers mon sennheiser pour des raisons de conforts, au niveau du son il est meme plus précis..Pour ce qui ne connaissent pas les casques gamer, pour le prix ca vaut le coup mais niveau confort ca va dependre de vous et de l age de vos os...

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Son muy buenos al ser unos audífonos abiertos solo a considerar que se filtra el audio exterior pero eso si tiene un soundstage muy amplio

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Ich habe mir das Headset geholt, weil die Ohrpolster auseinander gehen von meinem alten Headset. Und da es vier Jahre alt ist...warum nicht. Ich dachte die Tonqualität, wäre jetzt praktisch ein "wow" Faktor, bei diesem Preis. Muss aber feststellen, das es für mich enttäuschend war.Bei meinem alten Headset (Roccat Khan) sind die Schritte in Shooter Games viel deutlicher zu hören und klarer. Bei diesem Headset war es oke, aber nicht befriedigend, auch klang für mich alles so stumpf, als wäre ich in einem Flugzeug oder so. Vielleicht auch einfach gewöhnungsbedürftig, aber einfach nicht mein Fall.Zum Miko: Niemand beklagte sich über meine Stimme, außer das es sehr leise war, was dann schnell gefixt wurde. Sonst konnte man sich nicht beklagen. Sollte für den Preis allerdings auch selbstverständlich sein.Komfort: Ich hab es mehrere Stunden getragen und muss sagen, das es sehr angenehm war auf den Ohren und Kopf. Nach ca. 4 Stunden hab ich oben am Kopf langsam Kopfweh bekommen, hab das Headset mit den Bügeln einfach ein wenig weiter gestellt und dann ging es wieder. Man muss einfach seine Einstellung dann für sich finden und dann passt es.Ich habe Irrtürmlicher weise gedacht das es über USB-Stecker an den Pc gesteckt wird. Nicht drauf geachtet. Somit musste ich hinten am Pc meine Boxen rausmachen und hätte für diese rosa-gelben Stecker extra etwas kaufen müssen, damit meine Boxen wieder rein dürfen.Ich denke für Gaming ist es sehr gut, aber bei Shooter Games würde ich hier etwas anderes suchen, da es nicht so meins war.Alles in einem...es geht zurück und ich benutze mein altes Headset wieder, da nur die Ohrpolster auseinander fielen und ich jetzt neue Ersatzteile bestellt habe und die passen. Headset fast wie neu und ich hab kein ärger mehr, welches teure Headsets in Frage kommen.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: First of all this is not a audiophile gaming headset, they're a gaming headset with audiophile features so if you're looking for audiophile open backs then just buy actual open back headphones.H6pro open vs PC38xSound quality goes to PC38xBuild quality goes to H6pro by alot (just wow)Comfort goes to H6proIf youre looking for that pure neutral sound for gaming and listening to music then the PC38x are amazing and pretty comfortable but theyre very light plastic so for the money youre getting amazing sound and what feels like cheap plastic.If youre looking for amazing sounding super comfortable gaming headphones that you can EQ the neutral tuned sound to whatever you like for gaming and music with the open back design that eliminates ear fatigue almost completely then the H6Pro open backs are for you.The PC38x sound like 10% better but are built way cheaper and are less comfortable and theyre both the same price, your ears float inside the H6pros which makes the soundstage sound amazing for gaming. Everything about the H6pro says quality and comfort and you also get similar sound quality to the PC38x but the highs are a bit loud so you can hear footsteps really easily but gunfire can be uncomfortable which is why a DAC is amazing so you can turn down the slightly over tuned treble in the H6pro open backs.Bottom line theyre amazing sounding, super comfortable, and youre getting quality worth the price tag. The PC37x are like half the price of the PC38x and sound almost as good so if youre not looking for the ultimate build quality and comfort with amazing sound of the H6PROs then the PC37x are in the proper price bracket for what youre getting.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 13 March 2023

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Bought these to replace my DT990s that had their right ear pack in. Had some trouble at first which ended up being a problem unrelated on my end, that resulted in an experience with their customer support who was about as useful as a paper bag in the rain.Had a GSX1000 arrive after these headphones arrived which I couldn't possibly not recommend if you're in it for the audio quality.The detachable mic was a splended addition, ideal for me since I have a standalone mic.The headphones are very comfortable once properly adjusted, however not as comfortable if you have glasses.Amazon asked me about Noise cancellation which these headphones don't do, as for as i know. and being the open varient would be pointless.I saw another reviewer having trouble with the sound quality, which I must assume was a bad defect or connection issue on their end since mine arrived just fine. I will note, that the 3.5mm jack these supply are 4 pole, and may have issues connecting to a 3 pole connector.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 June 2022

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Es cómodo y muy bonito esta version verde pero el software deja mucho que desearLo compré junto con un DAC EPOS Audio GSX 300 que literalmente instale 5 veces el Suite de Epos y no agarraba, termine descargando una versión vieja para que reconociera el DAC y con esa funciono , la aplicación no funcionan los tests para probar los presets de ecualización , el volumen era bajo , el "7.1" es espantosoEs resumen, es un buen producto, pero lo opaca su mala calidad en software , no vale la pena por el costo tomando en cuenta las demás alternativas del mercado  , esperaría un producto más pulcro y desarrollado por el costo del mismo.No recomiendo su compra, ya que el software vuelve el producto horribleUna vez arreglado los defectos del software podria considerar recomendar su compra pero de momento se queda en un 2/5

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Schon sehr lange war ich auf der Suche nach einem guten, offenen (!) Headset. Ich möchte meine Umgebung noch wahrnehmen können, daher konnte ich mich mit keinem der geschlossenen Modelle anfreunden.Bei dem Epos passt alles: es sitzt gut, aber nicht zu fest. Es drückt nicht auf die Ohren! Und es hat einen hervorragenden, vollvolumigen und leicht basslastigen Klang, der sich auch für Musik gut eignet. Und dennoch kann ich in der Umgebung hören, was vor sich geht.Drei kleine Mankos könnte man anbringen: es ist ein recht schweres Headset (aber es ist qualitativ auch hervorragend, irgendwo muss das herkommen). Das schwenkbare Mikrofon löst sich schnell mal aus der Magnethalterung (aber so kann man es auch schnell mal beiseite legen). Und es gibt keinen Lautstärkeregler (das ist in der Tat schade, aber kein Weltuntergang).Alles in Allem für mich trotzdem 5 Sterne!

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: So to preface this review, I've had a lot of headphones both for music and gaming. I'm not an audiophile, but I am quite particular when it comes to sound. I've had HyperX Cloud2, SteelSeries, V-Moda, Sony XM3.These headphones (open) are now my favourite for both music and gaming.Comfort:  these do not clamp against your head like some have reviewed on the closed back. There's enough adjustability in the headband to get the sizing just right and stays in place nicely.  I don't suffer from hot ears or sweaty head after hours of gaming, and I really don't feel like I've got anything on. You will not fatigue with these one bit.  I found my HyperX to be very comfortable, but when trying these and going back to the HyperX, you can tell they're in different leagues (price wise you certainly are)Sound quality:  this area is highly subjective like anything audio related it comes down to personal preference.  I saw a lot of reviews saying the profile was relatively flat and lacked low end when compare to the closed.  I can't comment on the closed, but I was pleasantly surprised how much low end it had when expecting such a flat profile.  Both gaming and music, these things just sing.  Playing FPS games I could hear footsteps and direction of enemy much clearer than HyperX.  Explosions and bullets sounded amazing!Sound leakage:  these are my first open back headphones.  But the wife didn't complain hearing my gaming/music when played at same volume as HyperX. Not to say its not there, because it certainly is. But in a typical sized front living room, with my wife sat on the other sofa, she had to concentrate to hear anything. Happy wife, happy gamer!Music:  I compared these to my Sony wh1000 XM3, which I love.  I wasn't expecting much at first as the two couldn't be more different with Sony having ANC and closed back vs non-ANC and open back.  But I was taken aback by how good music sounded on these. Obviously these are basically Sennheiser headphones, and so should sound very good!  But it wasn't something I thought I'd appreciate quite as much as I did. The clarity, clear crisp highs and rumbling lows were welcomed, I cranked the volume up and no distortion. You could happily listen to Rap/R&B, hip hop, dance, pop, rock... they are truly versatile.Microphone:  I like how you can magnetically remove the mic if you wanted.  It rotates up to mute the mic automatically.  From what others have fed back, my voice is clear and not too loud, with no background noise either. Though can't comment too much as not heard the results myself only feedback of others I've played withI highly recommend these headphones for either gaming or music.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 October 2022

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Je me suis pris ce casque car ayant eu une bonne expérience avec un Sennheiser pc 363d que j'avais changé avec regret pour un Beyerdynamic MMX qui m'a lâché au bout de 3 ans... Du coup mon dernier casque de comparaison est un Hyperx cloud II qui est très en dessous niveau son et micro par rapport à cet Epos h6pro ouvert. J'ai écouté de la musique en qualité cd ou hi-res et bien il est au niveau d'un casque hi-fi comme le Philips Fidelio HR avec des basses plus présente mais c'est normal vu son orientation gaming. Le micro est très bon bien meilleur que sur le hyperx cloud et bien plus pratique avec la perche à relever pour mute rapidement. Sinon niveau confort après 3h de jeu aucune douleur et pourtant j'ai d'assez grande oreille qui rentre tout juste dans le coussinet mais aucune gêne pour ça. Le casque est branché sur une carte son créative sound blaster z donc je pense que cela doit en tirer la quintessence en tout cas je suis vraiment content de cet achat car c'est un très beau casque bien finit et super rapport qualité prix avec promo !

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Compré estos auriculares, porque vine de unos Corsair HS80 que los tuve que devolver porque están hechos para personas con la cabeza pequeña. Si eres una persona grande, los Corsair HS80 no son para ti y estos tampoco.Compré los Epos después de hincharme a ver videos, buscar en foros, buscar en tiendas, y supuestamente estos auriculares con forme los pintaban en las reviews eran una maravilla, era auténtica calidad de audio. Para mí sorpresa cuando me llegaron me dejaron bastante de desear ya que los auriculares pesan bastante poco y da la impresión de poca calidad, los acabados están bien pero son muy plásticos.La ergonomía de los auriculares por imágenes se veían los drivers de las orejas grandes, cuando los recibes ves que no es así. La verdad que los Compré también porque sus almohadillas no son de piel y así no hervirte en verano, son de tela. Pero no son nada cómodos de verdad, cuando llevo 1 hora o 2 puestos me dan dolores de oido.Los auriculares sinceramente no están hechos para gaming ni para escuchar música, son plug and play y tienen software configurable pero no los puedes configurar si no te compras una tarjeta de audio externa de la marca Epos o un Dac.Me compré el modelo abierto ya que según reviews de canales americanos, los cerrados te aislaban demasiado y no podías escuchar si estas gritando y el sistema de audio que tienen para shooters estilo fortnite, csgo, no interpretaban nada bien el juego. Y estos la verdad que tampoco sirven, son abiertos pero no escuchas tu voz, no interpreta bien el posicionamiento en los juegos. Para escuchar música no sirven ya que cuando subes el volumen de los auriculares medio-alto, tus amigos de discord escuchan el sonido de tus auriculares. Se cuela el sonido, y en el exterior también se cuela, es decir NEFASTO.Lo único bueno que tienen es el microfono que capta muy buena calidad de voz y ya.Sinceramente, no los compréis porque para jugar no sirven y para escuchar música tampoco, son incómodos y en general todo bastante mal excepto el micrófono. No hagáis caso a las opiniones de los foros y de los canales de YouTube como yo hice, porque iréis mal.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: My ears get hot in other headphones... these sound great (not sure how great on the other end) and I can wear them for a long time
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 15 July 2023

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: J'ai eu ce casque depuis maintenant plus d'un an, et je suis finalement plutôt déçu de mon achat :Avantages : - Bon son, - Super confort, notamment en été ou je souffrais beaucoup de la chaleur avec mon Hyper X Cloud II, - Joli design, - Micro détachable / attachable facilement grâce à des aimants (sur le papier), - Position ouverte et fermée du micro : quand on le lève et qu'on entend un "clic", plus aucun son n'est détecté.Désavantages : - Le micro peut être levé pour qu'il ne détecte plus de son, et il est détachable / attachable facilement, mais après un an d'utilisation il me faut environ 10 manipulations (changement de position + détachement / réattachement) pour espérer qu'il soit détecté par mes ordis.... Le casque en devient insupportable et je vais finir par en changer pour cette raison, - C'était un choix volontaire pour lutter contre la chaleur et pour rester dispo pour mes proches, mais le fait que ce soit un casque ouvert et que j'ai un gros PC rend les jeux compétitifs compliqués, on entend vraiment tout ce qui se passe hors du casque... notamment son propre PC :D Je ne reproche rien au casque, mais je n'avais pas réalisé à quel point un casque "ouvert" ne bloquerait aucun son extérieur.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: En ese rango de precio hay auriculares inalámbricos con mejor rango dinámico.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Packet erhalten, ausgepackt, Headset angeklemmt, geprüft, abgeklemmt und wieder für den Rückversand vorbereitet :DAktuell lebe ich noch mit meinem mittlerweile Ü 10 Jahren alten Sennheiser PC 360, welches leider einen kleinen Wackelkontakt auf einer Seite über die Jahre bekommen hat. Daher sollte was neues her.Die Marke EPOS ist aus Sennheiser hervorgegangen und da ich wirklich mehr als zufrieden mit meinem aktuellen Sennheiser Produkt bin, fiel mal Wahl auf EPOS.+Offene Akustik - mag ich. Man bekommt noch was vom Umfeld mit. Kann sich beim Daddeln mit der Außenwelt unterhalten und bekommt auch mit wenn die Tür klingelt oder der Backofen-timer abläuft. Auch beim EPOS H6Pro open passt das alle. Die Kopfhörer sind angenehm ohrumschließend, es drückt an dieser Ecke schon mal nix unangenehm (zumindest nicht direkt am Ohr). Mit offener Akustik geht auch ein angenehmeres Ohr-Klima einher.-Ton-Qualität - hier liegt meine Hauptkritik - da hätte ich deutlich mehr erwartet. Ich empfand den Ton als sehr unangenehm... es scheppert, klingt dünn bis blechern. Ich bin wahrlich kein Sound-Experte, daher will ich hier auch gar nicht zu sehr versuchen es genauer zu beschreiben. Ich habe den direkten Vergleich mit dem PC360 gemacht und das H6Pro lag hier ziemlich weit hinter. Verschlechtern möchte man sich ja auch nicht...-Anpressdruck - tja... das Ding sitzt zu Beginn zieeemlich fest aufm Kopp. Nach den ersten 10min wurde es schon beinahe unangenehm und man neigt dazu beim längeren Tragen die Ohrmuscheln kurz vom Kopf abzuhebeln um den Blutfluss in der Region zu gewährleisten. Möglich, dass sich dies mit der Zeit etwas gibt - ich wollte es nicht darauf ankommen lassen.Mich hat dieses Produkt mit der Preisklasse leider nicht überzeugen können.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: It's not a bad Headset but for the price tag there are far better options. The audio quality is incredibly quiet compared to some headsets you can get for as low as $100, Very disappointed with this purchase.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: I bought the open back and closed back version and the open back sound is amazing. I suffer from noise cancelling headphones building pressure in my ears and these fix that issues.  Also, it is nice to hear your own voice so you don’t get that feeling as though you are underwater.  I also use these for listening to music and they have a lovely balanced sound.  Although they are open back, the ‘sound leakage’ I.e. what people can hear around you is actually quite minimal.  I would be happy using these in a cafe or on a train at a moderate level.The mic is also one of the best I have used. Everyone comments on how clear your voice is either when gaming or making phone calls.Bang for buck, there is nothing like these headphone and it has convinced me to used wired headsets as opposed to Bluetooth which, was always my go to.Get them. You won’t be disappointed.  Oh and comfort is absolutely superb.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 June 2023

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: These are open back which I prefer for gaming. Wider sound stage and sense of scale over closed back. They aren’t as punchy as closed back, but still very good. Replaced my Astro A40 and Mixamp with just these. Very comfortable and well built. Love the magnetic quick removing mic. Can’t go wrong with these.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 18 August 2022

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: tres bonne qualité de son , je dirais meme plutot bluffant ( le fait qu'il soit filaire y est pour quelque chose ) , il est confortable et se porte bien avec mes lunettes .pour qui en a ras le bol des casques sans fil qu'il faut tout le temps recharger c'est un tres bon casque.pour la tenue dans le temps je ne saurais dire car je l'ai depuis trop peu pour en juger , j'ai usé beaucoup de casques , meme haut de gamme , on verra bien pour celui ci , neanmoins les articulations de cup en plastique m'inspirent peu confiance , je vais essayer de pas le brutaliser

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: No entiendo exactamente que pasa con este tipo de productos. No tiene sentido que los cascos funcionen tan mal, cuando tienen buenas críticas online.No sé si puede ser porque no esté acostumbrado a los cascos abiertos, pero el sonido es horriblemente vacío. No sé si esa es la idea de este tipo de cascos, pero me parece un sinsentido que se escuche todo como... ¿con eco? y al escuchar música algunos sonidos se distorsionan.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Bought these to replace my aging Sennheisers, but the sound quality is worse, the mic is worse and they are less comfortable. Ive had 3 of the Sennheiser g4me ones and they all develop the same issue with the boom mic mute failing. At least they sound decent and work well for a couple years. These EPOS headsets must be using much lower quality components. If you are looking for a good open back headset look elsewhere.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 23 May 2023

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Where to start here. I used three differents type of microphones/headsets during a live stream and asked to my followers which one was the best and which one was the worst. This one was. It was either too strong for them or too quiet. Nothing in the middle so you really really need a foam, but it won't make things better. The microphone on console is just awful.Now the sound. Muffled and not just a little, but very very muffled. It was ok if you play a FPS game, but any other games the ost or voice acting will be very very bad. I tried the headset with a sound blaster card after this and well, that wasn't better.Was it better than the JBL Quantum one (which is a bad joke). No. It's in this category. I had a Razer Nari that provides better sound than this piece garbage.Didn't try on PC. Probably sounds better with some mods, but on console, STAY AWAY.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: I recently purchased the EPOS H6PRO Open headphones and have been using them extensively, particularly for gaming. The sound quality is truly impressive, especially considering that they are open-back headphones. The audio is crisp, clear, and immersive, providing an excellent gaming experience. The open-back design allows for a wide soundstage, which is a significant advantage in FPS games.However, I did find some issues with comfort. After prolonged use, I noticed discomfort under my ears. It seems that the design of the ear pads might not be the best fit for me. This is something potential buyers might want to consider, especially if they plan on using the headphones for extended periods.Adding to this, if you can find the EPOS H6PRO Open Green headphones on sale for 100 euros or less, they are an absolute steal. The sound quality and gaming experience they provide at this price point is truly exceptional. Despite the comfort issue I experienced, the overall value they offer at this discounted price is outstanding.Overall, the EPOS H6PRO Open headphones deliver excellent sound quality, particularly for gaming. However, the comfort level might not meet everyone’s expectations. Despite this, I believe they offer good value for their price point, given the superior audio experience they provide. Happy gaming!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 January 2024

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Der Sound ist Sennheiser typisch 1A aber der Kopfhörer wird mir schnell unbequem.Er drückt besonders auf dem Kopf und der Anpressdruck an den Ohren ist mir auch etwas zu stark.Für 2-3 Stunden ist es ok aber nach drei Stunden fängt es an mir weh zu tun.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Agréable et performant

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Ich habe das HS gekauft, da es einen guten Rabatt hatte und die Bewertungen mich neugierig gemacht haben, ob es was für mich wäre.Der erste Eindruck war gut, sieht leicht aus, fühlt sich auch angenehm auf dem Kopf und den Ohren an.Jedoch kam dann der Schreck. Es ist nur auf der rechten Seite Sound und das auch teilweise sehr klirrend und unverständlich.Ich habe daraufhin alles versucht was so möglich war. Sei es Treiber deinstalliert, neu installiert oder sogar das Hauseigene Programm von EPOS heruntergeladen, aber selbst das erkennt das HS nicht als HS an, sondern mehr als Lautsprecher. An meinem PC kann es eigentlich nicht liegen, weil mein altes HS was ich ersetzen wollte auch mit Klinkenstecker funktioniert und da gibt es keine Probleme.Habe es auch an meinem Laptop probiert gehabt, jedoch selbes Ergebnis und wird als Lautsprecher und nicht als HS erkannt.Zum Mikrofon kann ich nicht sagen, da es wie geschrieben nicht als solches erkannt wird.Schade eigentlich, da es sehr hochwertig wirkt und bequem ist.Fazit: Ich würde es empfehlen, jedoch nicht wundern wenn es vielleicht auch so eine technische Macke hat, wie das was ich getestet habe.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: I really like the openness of them, really nice crisp audio with more bass than i was expecting. If youre into gaming, the footsteps seem to be pretty distinct compared to other headsets and the feeling of directional/distance awareness is perfect.The one and only thing I am hating and genuinely mad about is how uncomfy the earpads are. The headphones are light on the head but it feels like they got the WORST stiff foam to press hard against your skull. Idk if theres a way to break in earpads immediately but youre better off buying 3rd party earpads, or buying headphones that are $30 more expensive cause you'll end up wanting to buy earpads.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 21 July 2022

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: I am actually astounded at how many people sing the praises of this headset when it is quite easily the worst headset I've ever used in my life, let alone for the ridiculous price range these apparently belong in.- The sound quality was awful, the overall volume had to be so low in order to preserve any kind of clarity which you could barely hear because it had to be so low. When raising the volume, the bass would distort so loudly the mids and trebles would get drowned out.- The build quality felt good in the hands and to look at, but immediately felt uncomfortable when wearing them. The earpads were a good shape for the ears but the material was like having 4 bricks cemented around the driver.- Despite what many sources have said, this DOES NOT work with Epos software and DOES NOT HAVE SIDETONE. Also the microphone which I had, did not sound anything like some of the microphones on reviews of this product, which did vary quite drastically video to video. (Post editing most likely)- The connections on this headset are AWFUL quality, I had to unplug and replug the wire upwards of 5 times and spin it in the fixture until finally both earcups engaged and was not missing any frequency.I honestly expected so much better for a headset in this price range from, supposedly, the gaming division of Sennheiser. I have never refunded anything in my life so fast and I really tried to like it to save the hassle of a return, but I simply feel like I have been SCAMMED.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 May 2022

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: No funciona correctamente en mando de xbox ni con dolby atmos

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: Audio quality isn't bad and having a volume slider is nice for when things are too loud but the quality is not there when it comes to reliability. Detachable microphone stopped working after just 6 months of use. Would not recommend purchasing unless you plan on getting a new headset every 6 months.

ProductName: EPOS H6PRO Open Acoustic Professional Gaming Headset; Detachable Lift-to-Mute Mic; Lightweight, Comfortable, Durable; PC, Xbox, Playstation, Switch Compatible; Wired Headset (Racing Green)
Review: I wanted open back headphones, more comfy, and you can still hear doorbells, the phone ringing etc. These seemed overpriced but you can't go wrong with Sennheiser or so I thought.Basically for gaming these are adequate. But if you do anything else like listen to music, watch youtube or whatever, these are surprisingly poor. Play Michael Jackson's 'Man In The Mirror' through them and they just can't cope. The driver in these is located up and away from your ear and it makes everything sound distant. The higher the frequency, the more distant and tinny it sounds. The bass is pretty good, no complaints there but for this price you'd expect more. These don't even do 7.1 surround. (They will if you pay an extra £70 for a sound card). HyperX are offering wireless headphones with 7.1 for half this price, it's a bit bizarre.The microphone does the job but nothing amazing, and as with a lot of headphones these days they do put too much pressure on your head.I returned these and got Sennheiser's Gaming One headset instead, they're far superior.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 July 2022

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: A very good headset. It has surprisingly good sound quality for its price. In my opinion, it’s far better than it’s it’s more expensive sibling (Recon 50) which I’ve also used. The synthetic leather earcups are also a great feature, as they feel very comfortable, lower the cost, and are cruelty free. A great headset for people on a budget, but who want a high quality brand.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Needed them for PS4 - microphone better and more solid with single action on/off. Seems a better build, comfier fit with the half flex earpiece design and sound quality is very high for price point :)

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Good headphones for gaming and affordable

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: they are really good headphones work with everydevice known to man. super comfortable great mic deffinately worth more than 50

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Product as expected. Works well for PS4

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: A qualidade, durabilidade e conforto desta marca é sem dúvidas a melhor na minha opinião. Um amigo tem outro modelo dessa marca e faz mais de 5 anos que usa e está perfeito.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: I bought this for my PlayStation 4, it works great especially for the price. The audio is good, it has a mute option and volume control.  It’s quite sturdy, just be aware of the headphone jack so you don’t accidentally bend it like I did hahaha.This also works on multiple devices, I even started using it to listen to music on my iPad. (If you plan to do this, make sure your iPad has a headphone jack, or whatever it’s called)I bought a kraken headset after this one for nearly double the price and it was ridiculous in comparison, audio was worse, no, mic or volume control. I now have a new found appreciation for Turtle Beach. <3

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: The Turtle Beach Recon 70 Gaming Headset is a must-have accessory for gaming enthusiasts. Compatible with various gaming platforms such as PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PC, and mobile devices, it offers versatility and convenience. The headset delivers high-quality audio and clear communication, enhancing the gaming experience. With its comfortable design and lightweight construction, it allows for long gaming sessions without discomfort. The headset features powerful 40mm speakers that deliver immersive sound, making games come to life with rich and detailed audio. The flip-up microphone ensures clear communication with teammates and can be easily muted when not in use. The headset's sleek and durable design ensures it can withstand the rigors of intense gaming sessions. With the Turtle Beach Recon 70 Gaming Headset, gamers can enjoy crystal-clear sound and reliable performance, taking their gaming adventures to the next level.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Priced reasonably, this headset feels like it's noise cancelling (although it's not). It fits the head well and the sound quality is brilliant in terms of gaming. The mic is easy to turn on and off.Although it's majorly plastic this product definitely does not feel cheap or badly designed/finished.Super simple to use. Would recommend buying.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 January 2024

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Parfait pas trop lourd niveau de la tête niveau son parfait et même la réduction du bruit

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: 孫のゲーム用に購入したのでよくわかりませんが気に入っているようです。

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: If you are on a budget and looking for something that will get the job done, this is enough. You get what you pay for. Just do note that the black coat on the padding peels off easily and it's not that comfortable. If you play for 2 hours or more, it heats up your ears. I also tried using it for work calls and the mic sounds good, no issues.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Die Kopfhörer haben mich vom Tragekomfort und vom Klang her doch sehr überrascht, dass hatte ich für den günstigen Preis nicht erwartet. Auch nach einem längeren Tragen fühlen sich die Ohrmuscheln immer noch bequem an. Der Klang und der Bass ist sehr gut und hört sich wertig und voll an. Das Spielen macht damit deutlich mehr Spass. Die Gegner sind gut zu orten und es kommt ein gutes, allgemeines Raumgefühl rüber. Die Verarbeitungsqualität ist ebenso gut, nichts klappert und die Länge lässt sich einstellen. Der Kopfbügel ist auch nach längerem Tragen noch bequem und drückt bei mir nicht.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: perfect price performance

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Very comfortable. Good sound quality and cheap.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Me agradaron mucho estos audífonos, tienen un buen sonido, llevo usando los por 7 días y no me han fallado de nada, si completamente te elimina los ruidos exteriores, al momento de hablar con una persona ya sea por teléfono o en alguna consola si se escucha bien y por parte de la otra persona igual te escuchan bien, no produce eco, logras escuchar y percibir todos los sonidos en los videojuegos, si se las recomiendo mucho, estoy muy satisfecho y feliz con el producto y el vendedor, muchas gracias.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: The beat headset for the price. The ear cups are made of pleather which are comfortable and it fits any ear size. I does not have booming bass but it's audio is clear.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: I am actually very pleased with this headset. I wear it for a good part of my day and it is actually pretty comfortable. I can wear it for a couple hours before I even notice it's there. It is way lighter than my old Razer headset. And it actually fits my small head. Since I am using it on PC, I had to buy an adapter for it, but I knew this going in and was totally fine with that. For the price, this headset sounds great. I mean, it does sound really, really good. Although when my Razer headset was working properly, it was slightly better in the sound quality department, but more than double the price, even if you include the price of the adapter. And comfort is more important to me anyway. The sound is more than good enough. I can hear what direction bullets are coming in, that's all that really matters to me.The only complaint I have is I wish the cord was another foot or so longer. Not much more than that because then it would hang down. But even though my tower is only a few feet from me, the cord is still not very loose. It would be slightly better I guess if my tower was on the left side, but still. The cord is obviously short because it is made for plugging into a controller.  Just keep that in mind if it's a deal breaker. It isn't for me thankfully, just an annoyance.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Après avoir lu tous les commentaires négatifs je pensais avoir fait une erreur en achetant ce casque mais une fois livrée je n'ai pas été déçu le casque fait très bien son travail et je trouve qu'il y a beaucoup de commentaires injustifié

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Material plástico resistente, confortável, possui botão de ajuste do volume no lado esquerdo, opção de mutar microfone bastando levantar o microfone. Atende minhas necessidades para jogar Cody.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Love the colour combination, and the coloured wire gives good visibility (no risk of tripping on it). Very good comfort and sound quality, and nice to have a mic built in that can also fold away if you don’t want to use it. They’re very good, and great value, highly recommend.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 PlayStation Gaming Headset for PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Removable Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
