ProductName: Poly - Voyager 4320 UC Wireless Headset + Charge Stand (Plantronics) - Headphones with Boom Mic - Connect to PC/Mac via USB-C Bluetooth Adapter, Cell Phone via Bluetooth - Works with Teams, Zoom &More
Review: I ordered this headset on Dec. 30, 2021, sold by BTE Computer Inc through Amazon.ca.  No Provincial sales tax was charged on the purchased (only GST), requiring my business to self-assess the RST sales tax and forward to Manitoba Finance when I next filed my next RST return.  The headset was delivered punctually and well packaged on January 12, 2022.I ordered the USB-C version of this product.  It comes with a 5.2 Bluetooth Adapter that plugs into the USB-C slot of my Windows 10 computer to pair the headset. When plugged in, the Poly software displays that the adapter is plugged in, and the Voyager 4320 Headphone plays a message that the computer is connected, however the Poly software shows the headset itself as being disconnected even though the power is on and the connected message was heard from the headphones.  In this disconnected state, the headphones do not show up on the computer’s Sound Playback output device selection menu on my taskbar, nor do the Poly drivers show up in the BT700 module in the Device Manager.  A reboot is required to make this happen.  Similarly, if the adapter is unplugged briefly, perhaps to use the computer USB-C input port to plug in the headphone charging station, once you plug the adapter in again, a reboot is once again required to register the device in order to use it on the computer.  Device and software updates have not corrected this problem.  I have not tried using the headphones on a different computer to determine if this problem is device specific.  (see attached photos).This headset comes in both USB-A and USB-C options.  When I ordered this product, I couldn’t find clear documentation to indicate which USB standard the USB-A headphone option used (ie:  USB 2.1, USB 3.0, USB 3.1, etc).  Wanting a newer technology, I opted for the USB-C headset not fully understanding that my computer required two unique USB-C ports, not just one.  The USB-C Bluetooth Adapter requires one port, and the Plantronics Charge Stand requires a 2nd USB-C ports.  Sadly, my work computer only has ONE USB-C port, so I am limited to using either the adapter or the charger but not both.  I wish the documentation was clearer on that point as clearly I missed reading it before ordering this product and would have chosen the USB-A option had I known about this in advance.  Since a reboot is required each time the USB-C Bluetooth adapter is plugged in, swapping out the Bluetooth adapter daily to plug in the charge cradle is simply not an option I can contend with.  As a result, I have been forced to use a USB-C cellphone charger to charge my headphones while the charge stand remains unused, acting as a dust collector stored behind my monitor.  It would have been nice if Poly provided a USB-C to USB-A adapter for the charging unit for situations like mine so that the product can be used out of the box vs having to now research and order this type of adapter in order to use the product (I still haven’t ordered one).I have used these headphones with both my cellphone and computer.  Sound quality is good, and they are relatively comfortable to wear for several hours at a time if you can tolerate light pressure on your ears.  They do have a tendency to fall off your head if you bend forward, so care is required during these movements.  The mic sound is clear, although I was told that the reception was clearer when talking through the VOIP on my computer vs using the VOIP on my cellphone.  When the mic boom is in the up position, the surrounding sounds are muffled but still heard by the recipient.  The mute button on the mic boom works very well and is in a good location.  The headset, by default, is on the right side of your head matching the Right headset (labeled R).  The boom can be swung around to use on the left side of your head. In this case, the headset will be worn rotated 180 degrees with the Right label ear on the Left side of your head and vice-versa.  Sound quality for music is reasonable for a headset designed for a call centre.When connected to the USB-C port at the back of my desktop computer located under my metal office desk, the Bluetooth range is only a mere 24 feet before the signal starts breaking up (the joys of having a metal desk, LOL).  When paired to my cellphone, the range is excellent, allowing me to walk through almost my entire home (upstairs and downstairs) while my cellphone was left on my office desk.  I’ve notice interference when within 3 feet of my kitchen microwave oven when it is powered on; the software has no options to change frequencies to prevent this.Overall, it is a decent entry level office headphone.  I would give it a 5 rating if I didn’t have to reboot the computer every time the USB-C Bluetooth adapter was pulled out and re-inserted, and if it came with an optional USB-C to USB-A adapter for those of us who only have one USB-C port on their computers.

ProductName: Poly - Voyager 4320 UC Wireless Headset + Charge Stand (Plantronics) - Headphones with Boom Mic - Connect to PC/Mac via USB-C Bluetooth Adapter, Cell Phone via Bluetooth - Works with Teams, Zoom &More
Review: Es ist schon zum Verzweifeln. Nach langem Ausprobieren verschiedener Headsets war ich mir sicher, dass das 4320 die Nachteile des Poly Voyager Focus 2 (wenig sinnvolles ANC auf den offenen Kopfhörern, starrer Mikrofonarm und unbequemes Kopfband) mit seinen Vorteilen (für Bluetooth sehr hohe Reichweite, guter Klang, praktische Ladestation) verbinden würde.Und ja, das tut es auch. Es ist in vielen Belangen eine gute, teils sogar schlauere und deutlich günstigere Alternative zum Topmodell. Es lässt sich sehr bequem und sicher auf dem Kopf tragen (verglichen mit etwa dem Jabra Evolve2 65, das mir bei der leichtesten Kopfneigung schon runter rutscht), klingt für Musik ausreichend bis gut und bietet eine wirklich gute Mikrofon-ANC, die Alltagsgeräusche wie Kaffee kochen oder Schreibtisch umräumen gut herausfiltert.Wegen des schlechten Feedbacks meiner Gesprächspartner geht es trotzdem leider wieder zurück. Mir wurde trotz des einstellbaren Mikrofonarms, mit dem ich das Mikro bis auf 2 cm an meinen Mundwinkel bringen kann, durch die Bank eine leise, wenn auch gute Sprachwiedergabe bescheinigt. Das größte Problem ist aber, dass das Mikrofon sehr windempfindlich ist und kein Schaumstoff-Windschutz vorhanden ist. Ein Schritt ans offene Fenster oder gar vor die Tür ist sofort hörbar, und das Ärgerlichste: Ich muss gezielt am Mikro vorbei atmen, um nicht ständig hörbare Atemgeräusche zu produzieren.Warum das nicht viel öfter kritisiert wird? Ich vermute, dass die meisten Anwender das Gerät unter einem Betriebssystem oder mit einer Kommunikationsplattform verwenden, die dynamisch einen Mikrofonverstärker zuschalten. In der bei mir üblichen Kombi Linux+BigBlueButton ist das leider nicht möglich.

Review: I purchased these to replace an old Jabra headset that broke. I received my headset yesterday so today (Monday) was my first time using them for work.Issues:The Bluetooth adapter works for some but for me it caused problems.  When I plugged it into my laptop I noticed that my headset did in fact connect but each time I tried to join a MS Teams meeting I either couldn't hear or my team couldn't hear me.  This was resolved simply by pairing my headset with my laptop without the adapter. Once I joined my meetings everyone said I sounded very clear.Music:I tried listening to music and found the sound was better than I expected. I could surprisingly could hear the bass in my music.Cellphone Use:I tried my headset on both my cell phones (an iPhone and a S21).  Both sounded fine.  Everyone said they could hear my loud and clear.Overall I am satisfied with my purchase. Rhese headphones were comfortable and i had no issues wearing them for hours at a time.  If my experience changes I will post an update.

Review: Can not turn up volume
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 25 August 2022

ProductName: Poly - Voyager 4320 UC Wireless Headset + Charge Stand (Plantronics) - Headphones with Boom Mic - Connect to PC/Mac via USB-C Bluetooth Adapter, Cell Phone via Bluetooth - Works with Teams, Zoom &More
Review: These Poly - Voyager 4320 UC Wireless Headset + Charge Stand (Plantronics) headphones were a much needed upgrade from my old Plantronics headset that my company gave for work. They are super comfortable to wear and are really padded in the ear area. Though I will say that the padding took some getting used to since my old plantronics had basically no padding at all. But now that I have gotten used to the padding I wouldn’t go back!Both outgoing and receiving sound quality is great! I have had absolutely no issues with the sound quality at all. I have asked several co-workers and have even had not one, but two of them ask me what I was using because I sounded so good! The receiving sound is just as nice and it is easy to hear and crystal clear.I will say I don’t get anywhere near the stated wireless area. I go from one level to another in my home which is maybe 15-20 feet and sometimes it will start cutting out. I see some suggestions on here to help with this so hopefully I can get that worked out. But overall I’m pretty happy with these! Sound quality is great. The fit is super comfortable, and the quality is what you would expect from the brand which is well made with good materials. There made to be used daily and should last a long time even with constant use!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 21 December 2021

ProductName: Poly - Voyager 4320 UC Wireless Headset + Charge Stand (Plantronics) - Headphones with Boom Mic - Connect to PC/Mac via USB-C Bluetooth Adapter, Cell Phone via Bluetooth - Works with Teams, Zoom &More
Review: I recently got this headset for occasional meetings that may last all day long. First of all, I am very impressed with the battery life. I always keep it charging whenever I finish my calls, and the headset always worked just fine. The earpad is very comfy, so I don't feel any pain from wearing this headset. The sound quality is good, and the speaker works just fine. The only concern that I may mention is the range - it works okay if I work on the same floor. Whenever I have to go up to the second floor, the signal becomes weak, and I have to promptly come down.Overall, I am satisfied with this headset and definitely recommend it. I just hope that the range could be improved.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 6 December 2021

ProductName: Poly - Voyager 4320 UC Wireless Headset + Charge Stand (Plantronics) - Headphones with Boom Mic - Connect to PC/Mac via USB-C Bluetooth Adapter, Cell Phone via Bluetooth - Works with Teams, Zoom &More
Review: This headset is very comfortable, especially when I need to wear it for hours. The sound quality is decent - not exceptional, but good. Battery life is good as well, I haven't had any issues and it charges well overnight. Overall, I'm very glad to have found this headset asy head and ears needed a change and this has been ideal.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 8 February 2022

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: If like me you have 6 existing headsets and wanted to add another 2, please be aware you will need to do a firmware update through Hollylands website before your system will allow a total of 8 headsets paired.Every single one of your 6 existing headsets will need to be updated. Search for Hollyland V1.0.4.3 to find the patch.Once you do get these paired, you are laughing - terrific quality, great for live event comms.

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: I've been using this comms system for over 2 months now and I've been extremely impressed. Compared to other much more expensive solutions, I expected the quality to be signifcantly worse but the Hollyland set has been the same if not better than systems I've used previously that were double the price. It's been super refreshing to just be able to slide a battery in and flick the power switch and have a 6 person comms system going in less than 2 minutes. The sound quality is exception and I've been able to get the 300m range as advertised. My only complaint is once you get over about 350m the signal does drop out and needs you to walk back into range about 280m before the connection resumes. However I can't really fault the product as it already performs beyond as advertised and you can clearly hear the single slowly failing and you know the limit. The battery system is great and the charging dock is super helpful for recharging an entire set + spares at the same time. Battery life is amazing compared to my previous system and I regularly get 6-7 hours runtime on a single battery and it comes with 12 for a 6pc set. Overall, a great investment that I have and will continue to use on every single shoot or professional production. 11/10 you won't be disappointed with this kit.

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: Easy to use and works well. I purchased this during the Black Friday sale so it was a great price. Battery life seems better than advertised which is rare. With the extra set of batteries there is no downtime. The sound is very clear and you don't need to shout to be heard. The new model has noise cancelling as well so it would be even better but it does cost more. Overall I am very happy with this set.

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: Video production

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: Le Hollyland Solidcom C1 est un véritable jeu changer en matière de communication d'équipe. En tant que passionné de production et de travail d'équipe, ce système de casque de communication sans fil a révolutionné la façon dont je collabore avec mon équipe.La portée impressionnante de 350 mètres garantit une communication transparente même dans les environnements les plus vastes. Que ce soit sur un plateau de tournage, un événement en direct ou un lieu de tournage en extérieur, ce système de communication est une solution fiable et robuste.Le concept de communication duplex intégral, qui permet à quatre utilisateurs de communiquer en temps réel, est tout simplement incroyable. Grâce à un maître et trois casques esclave, nous pouvons rester connectés et coordonnés à tout moment. Cela améliore considérablement notre efficacité et notre collaboration.Le design ergonomique des casques à oreille unique assure un confort optimal, même pendant de longues heures de travail. La qualité audio est cristalline, sans aucun retard, ce qui rend la communication fluide et naturelle.L'installation et la configuration sont simples et rapides, ce qui permet de gagner du temps précieux lors de la mise en place. De plus, le système est portable et léger, ce qui facilite son transport et son utilisation sur différents lieux de travail.En résumé, le Hollyland Solidcom C1 est un outil essentiel pour toute équipe qui nécessite une communication fiable et en temps réel. Que ce soit dans le domaine de la production, de l'événementiel ou d'autres industries, ce système de casque de communication sans fil améliore considérablement la coordination et la collaboration. Si vous recherchez un moyen efficace de rester connecté avec votre équipe, je recommande vivement le Hollyland Solidcom C1.

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: O produto é muito bom , já o fornecedor não tem a qualidade do produto.

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: The sound quality and battery life is excellent. I've ordered 2 more.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 3 October 2023

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: ドローン防除に使用するのに購入しましたがお互いのやりとりも鮮明に出来トラブルも全くありません。またバッテリーも長持ちして重宝してます。

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: ITALe abbiamo testate su un set impegnativo. A differenza di altri brand risultano estremamente leggere e comode. Potendo inoltre scegliere la tipologia di padiglioni in condizioni di temperature elevate risultavano comunque confortevoli con il padiglione di spugna sostituito a quello chiuso in eco pelle. Gran parte del set prevedeva riprese su motoscafi in movimento e il segnale è rimasto ottimo nonostante le distanze di utilizzo. Inoltre la qualità del suono ci ha permesso di comunicare senza sforzo nonostante il vento e i forti rumori di sottofondo. Altro aspetto che abbiamo apprezzato è l'assoluta semplicità di utilizzo, fanno letteralmente tutto in automatico. La tecnologia DECT 6.0 oltre a criptare il segnale garantisce una stabilità del segnale impeccabile.La durata delle batterie è ottima, avendo a disposizione due batterie per ogni cuffia non è mai stato necessario utilizzare la dock di ricarica durante le lunghe giornate di riprese. Hanno un costo considerevole ma è assolutamente giustificato dalla qualità e sopratutto dall'affidabilità.Assolutamente consigliate!ENGWe tested them on a challenging set. Unlike other brands they turn out to be extremely light and comfortable. Also, being able to choose the type of on-ear cushions in hot conditions they were still comfortable with the foam substituted for the leather ones. Most of our set involved filming on moving boats, and the signal remained excellent despite the distances of use. In addition, the sound quality allowed us to communicate effortlessly despite the wind and loud background noise. Another aspect we appreciated is the absolute ease of use, they literally do everything automatically. DECT 6.0 technology not only encrypts the signal but also ensures impeccable signal stability.Battery life is excellent, with two batteries available for each headset, it was never necessary to use the charging dock during long days of filming. They have a considerable cost, but it is absolutely justified by the quality and, most importantly, the reliability.Absolutely recommended!

No se si estoy contento o descontento con este producto.Me dedico al Sector Audiovisual y su función de comunicar a varias personas entre si con reducción de ruido y mute la cumple perfectamente, pero es cierto que la diadema es como muy grande en su forma más pequeña y notas que si vas a estar moviéndote da sensación de que no aprieta bien y se te va a caer.Es cierto que esta muy bien para conectar varias personas a la vez sin problemas, pero por ejemplo si solo quieres usarlo para dos personas, hay productos muchísimo más baratos y que funcionan perfectamente. ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range
Review: We are going to use this as we stream HS Football & basketball games live. We use an Atem Mini Extreme for our video mixer. The problem was how to get the audio into the atem, which has 2 mike inputs. Work around, you get a xlr cable that plugs into a sm58 shure mike and then plug into 3.5mm split cable that plugs into the Atem. Then you put the mike next to one of the headsets and now you got 5 wireless headsets to use for the announcers and the field announcer and the 2 camera operators. Hollyland needs to make a breakout box for audio to plug direct into the Atem. It completely eliminates need for sound board, wireless mikes and wireless headsets. All with one headset.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 12 July 2022

ProductName: Hollyland Solidcom C1 4S Full Duplex Wireless Intercom System 4-Person Communication Single Ear Headset with 1 Master & 3 Remote Headphone Microphone 1100ft Los Range

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Overall, I like the product.  Just one star off because it was a bit tight when used.  Could possibly be due to the design. My other one, Lenovo,  was a lot more comfortable and enjoyable to use, the downside was the absence of nice bass.  Arctis 1 is quite good for communication and some music listening. Not outstanding at the musical side, I would say above average and pretty much acceptable for me. It has enough bass and punch to make the music alive.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: good

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Le uso per lavoro e sono molto soddisfatto perchè sono molto comode da portare, inoltre la riproduzione dei suoni è pulita ed efficace.Ottimo prodotto per me

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: This was my first time getting stereo headphones for gaming. I preferred mono chat with my surround system.After going through 4 Xbox headsets in a year I wanted a better investment.I was skeptical that headphones could compare to my high end home audio system.My thoughts:I was pleasantly surprised on how much more I can hear footsteps playing first person shooters without the neighborhood hearing me playing War lolI chose these BC of the comfort and they had a mid range sound stage, not overly bass heavy.I find a bit of distortion if I have them loud and there is a ton of guns and explosions simultaneously.It's rare and I haven't been bothered by it yet.Bass is more than ample, I don't need bass driven directly into my ears.I found the highs weren't decent, wasn't tinny or too high, in fact I wanted a tiny bit more treble.When listening to music I was really surprised on how well they sounded, I tried a variety such as rap, metal, EDM and live accoustic. The accoustic guitar was really picked up well and the way tones  sounded really good.I will definitely be listening to music with these as well.The microphone is loud and clear, good background noise cancelling.**One note is check your headset volume on your Xbox settings BC it's default to 1/2 volume. I thought something was wrong at first, adjusted that and amazing!👍**

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: I have a serious problem with wired headphones. For some reason, even wired headphones that I take very good care of end up with the wires getting pulled in just a way where one ear will stop working, or they only work when you twist them into a specific angle when plugged into your phone, etc... but these headphones are different. I wear my headphones almost 24/7 because I have autism and it helps soothe me, and I listen to loud music all the time as well as using them for gaming and using them for voice chats. These headphones can do it all. They are lightweight, affordable, AND I can wear them in bed while laying on my side for ages without feeling like my ear is going to fall off or explode. The removable microphone is very nice too as long as you don't lose it. I use these headphones every day and have been using them for over 3 years, only having to buy a single replacement pair whereas most headphones only last me like 4-5 months if I'm lucky, even ones at twice the price. The adjustable dial on the headphones themselves is perfect for quick adjustments, and the sound quality is very nice. I haven't noticed much sound leakage (sound escaping the headphones when turned up loud so other people can hear your stuff) compared to other headphones at the same price.If you're like me and you take even bare minimum care of your headphones, this pair will last you forever. I plan on just buying this set of headphones on repeat forever whenever I need a new pair- at least until they stop selling them, because I have NEVER found a pair that's as nice as these, especially on a budget. I would rate these headphones 100 stars If I could.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 3 January 2024

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Los auriculares SteelSeries Arctis 1 para Xbox son unos auriculares gaming que ofrecen una gran calidad de sonido y comodidad¹. Según la marca, los Arctis 1 tienen exactamente los mismos controladores de audio que los Arctis 7, por lo que su sonido debería ser excelente para este rango de precios². Además, su micrófono ClearCast desmontable es muy útil y ofrece una buena calidad de voz¹.En cuanto a la comodidad, estos auriculares son muy ligeros y cómodos de llevar durante largas sesiones de juego³. La banda supraural única y fina y los drivers compactos hacen que estos auriculares sean muy cómodos y no pesen demasiado³.En general, los SteelSeries Arctis 1 para Xbox son una buena opción si buscas unos auriculares gaming con una buena calidad de sonido y comodidad⁴.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Primeiro Headset que adquiro da Steelseries e realmente posso dizer que é um produto Premium em todos os aspectos.

Review: Ich habe mehrere Produkte probiert und das war das einzige "budget" Headset, welches mich überzeugt hat. Zum hören konnte man die alle benutzen aber das Mikro punktet bei der SteelSeries auch!

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Pros:One of the best headset for gamingAwesome audio qualityComfortable to wear for atleast 6 hrsAdjustable almost all directionsSolid buildCons:The connecting wire can be bit longer

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Había comprado primero los JBL Quantum 100, excelentes pero las almohadillas de las orejas son sintéticas y sudaba mucho. Después unos HyperX, me apretaban la cabezota pero excelente sonido y micrófono, luego unos Corsair, pésimo micrófono pero cómodos y buen sonido, probé unos AstroGaming muy ligeros excelente sonido y micrófono pero las orejeras están muy reducidas. Al final después de ver algunos vídeos en internet compré los steel series. Excelentes por dónde lo vean, son los más caros de todos los que comenté pero valen cada centavo. Micrófono nítido, audio excelente, orejeras cómodas y no sudas. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: nunca habia probado unos cascos como estos, son los mejores cascos que e probado en toda mi vida, por que le doy 4 estrellas? el motivo es por el cable, el cable es demasiado fragil, se me arrugo apenas un poquito, pero dejando a lado eso, ES EXCELENTE, os lo recomiendo muchisismo

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: I record Youtube videos, and I've had headphones in the past where they bleed just enough audio that the microphone picks up some of the sound leaking out of the headphones (which is an editing nightmare).These ones don't bleed audio.Their sound quality is excellent, and it's easy to tell where enemies are coming from in Halo Infinite with their directional sound.  But most importantly, they are super comfortable. The fabric ear pads keep you from getting clammy or sweaty during long periods of wearing them.I also love the built in mute and volume control on the headset that don't require software integration, but is an actual hardware feature (nothing worse than a USB headphone that you "asked" to mute, but it never actually did it, so now your buddies get to hear you burp real loud in their ears).I will say that I don't love the microphone quality though. It's sufficient, but I have headsets with much better mics, so I almost always use this WITHOUT the microphone and instead use an external mic.So if you are buying this for the mic, I'd say it's only a 3 star review. If you are buying it for the headphones, then it's a solid 5!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 1 September 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Upgraded from my Turtle Beach Stealth 700 to the Arctis 9x and was not impressed at all. Constant crackling sound despite various troubleshooting techniques I was looking up. I decided to give up on them and return them, which of course Amazon is amazing and their customer service was great! I ended up getting the Arctis 1 headset and so far I'm very happy. Sound quality is great, though I did have to use an older adapter I have to improve the volume, but all in all, these ones are absolutely phenomenal.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Purchased this mainly for gaming on my PS5 and Xbox. Great audio sound for the price, and easy plug and play for both systems ( although for the Xbox there were a few sec delay before it actually switched to the headset). Love the ear cuffs as they are soft and very comfortable and covers the entirety of my ears. The band is also comfortable and doesn't squeeze your head/face but it does tend to be a little warm on the top of the head so I ended up having to wipe off sweat a few times. This was for longer sessions, like over an hour of use but if you don't have a/c or it's a warm day it may cause discomfort.Now for why it's not a 5 star - mic is horrible. It either doesn't work or when it does it is faint and tinny. I've even tried it out on my pc with all my audio software to see if I could find the issue, but nope the mic is just either bad or defective. I would return it but got a good deal on Warehouse and bought it mostly for the audio but keep that in mind. I've seen others report the same issues so it isn't uncommon.All in all, after a few months of use it's going strong and love the headset.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: I purchased these headphones in April 2022 and the mic on it stopped working suddenly in December 2022 and I literally searched all over the internet to get a replacement mic from anyone who deals for steelseries in india, found a company named techxhub, tried contacting them but no response, contacted steelseries support on steelseries official website and they told me that they do not ship to india otherwise they would have sent me a replacement mic for my headphones, hard luck i guess but then i contacted amazon and hats off to Amazon service they really care about their customers and they took the headphones back from me and told me that I'll get the full refund. But if I talk about the overall performance of these headphones I am pretty satisfied by the sound quality, the comfort and the overall experience was quite good actually but unfortunately steelseries not being prominent in india is a bummer.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: The sound quality is decent for the price and it's definitely comfortable to wear, but the microphone is just cheap. Taking into account other reviews, it seems that the microphone essentially comes down to luck. Sometimes it works perfectly, sometimes its just broken. Unfortunately it was the latter for me. If you need a decent mic, don't get this one, otherwise go crazy.

DateOfReview: Reviewed in the Netherlands on 10 February 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Wie im Titel benannt, geht es hier um die Kabelvariante des SteelSeries Arctis 1:Ich habe dieses Headset auf Grund der guten Bewertungen mit BlackFriday Rabatt für 30€ (statt 59,99€) gekauft. Leider haben sich diese Bewertungen als typische Augenwischerei herausgestellt, weshalb ich nur davon abraten kann.Auf den beigefügten Bildern seht ihr ein abgenutztes Schrott-Headset von Tecknet aus dem Jahr 2017 für das ich damals 9,99€ bezahlt habe. (bekommt man bei Aliexpress inzwischen für 5€) und auf dem anderen Bild ist das neue Steelseries Arctis 1.Optik: ist Geschmackssache von daher keine BewertungTragekomfort: ist das Einzige wo das Arctis 1 im direkten Vergleich punkten kann. Ohrmuscheln lassen sich drehen und sind mit Synthetik-Stoff bezogen, welcher recht angenehm auf den Ohren sitzt; das obere Polster ist mit Kunstleder bezogen. Regelelemente (Lautstärke, Stumm) befinden sich direkt an der Ohrmuschel.Kabel: Das Tecknet hat ein solides, Nylon ummanteltes Kabel mit 2,2 Meter Länge und USB Anschluss - reicht also um auf der Couch oder am PC zu sitzen ohne das man eine Verlängerung braucht. Dazu kommt ein kleines Bedienfeld mit Lautstärkeregler, Beleuchtungsregler und Stummschalter.Das Arctis 1 hingegen hat ein dünnes Kabel mit Gummimantel , welches so dermaßen kurz ist, dass es ohne Verlängerung nicht mal dann reicht, wenn der PC genau neben dir steht. (1,2 Meter).Noch schlimmer ist aber, dass es im Artikel heißt:" "Kompatibel mit allen Plattformen" was ein Witz ist, weil kein Signalsplitter für den 3,5mm Klinkenanschluss dabei ist. Den musst du extra kaufen damit du Mikro+Ton Anschluss am PC nutzen kannst. Heißt im Klartext also auf den Preis kommen nochmal 15€ für Verlängerung und Splitter drauf.Tonqualität: Hier habe ich absolut kein Verständnis für das Preis/Leistungsverhältnis und kann beim besten Willen die positiven Bewertungen nicht nachvollziehen. Fakt ist, dass das Headset regulär 59,99€ kostet. Beide Headsets haben exakt identische Spezifikationen und hören sich auch identisch (damit meine ich gleich schlecht) an. Ich erwarte ja keine Sennheiser oder Beyerdynamic MMX300 Studio Qualität, aber zumindest hätte ich vom Arctis mehr erwartet.Wer hier mehr als 3 Sterne vergeben hat ist offenbar stark schwerhörig und nicht in der Lage einen Unterschied zwischen Presslufthammer auf der Baustelle und einem Streichorchester zu finden.Mikrofon: Ich habe zu beiden Headsets mehrere Leute seperat befragt und 7 von 10 Leuten bewerten die Sprachqualität als identisch. 2 finden das Arctis besser, 1 Person das Tecknet.Fazit: Der fast 6 Jahre alte und stark abgenutzte Billigschrott von Tecknet für 9,99€ schlägt das 59,99€ teure Arctis 1 im Gesamtergebnis durch Preis und Ausstattung. Einfach nur erbärmlich.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: This is a great headset for the price, it is very cheap for the quality of the headset. My first impression when i put it on was. Wow these are comfortable! normally you cant wear anything while playing with a headset but with these i could sit there with a hat on and forgot i was wearing a hat. All around great product for gaming amazing sound too for music i would recommend.

DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 25 February 2024

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: There's nothing very fancy about it, but you can tell the build quality when you pick it up. It doesn't feel plasticky of flimsy. It's solid and durable and that's the #1 feature I needed in a headset besides good audio/mic. In every other brand, I've had something either quit working or part of it break. I've had a couple of these for about a year and a half now and they're the only thing that's made it this long with 0 issues.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 5 December 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: This is a good headset - but good is where it ends. It is comfortable and pretty lightweight but that’s about it for the pros.The downsides I found after 3 months of use, there is not enough clamping force - I know this is difficult to get get right as too much clamping force can make the headset uncomfortable to wear but in this case there is not enough, this means that you can’t really hear the bass or your surroundings as good as other headsets. But it’s brilliant if you squeeze the ear-cups to your head so they really let this one down with this simple mistake.The second is, you can’t really hear anything at all unless you’re using some sort of amplifier. I have been using this headset in conjunction with the turtle beach audio attachment as just plugging the headset directly into the controller means you really can’t hear anything. Maybe that’s bias as I’ve used the Audio controller for around the last 6 years but I struggle to not use it with this steel series Arctis 1.Lastly, after 3 months I’ve noticed a static sound coming through the headset as it appears the 3.5mm jack has some sort of wiring fault or loose connection which almost makes games unplayable due to the stats if sounds coming through the speakers. It has inky just started with this fault.Also I find the mic is just not as flexible as I have been used to and really struggle to set it out if my peripheral vision when gaming or streaming a movie. It’s really short and stiff. Just not a good design.In conclusion just buy a turtle beach, I’ve never had any issues with them in the past, I opted to try a different brand after being with turtle beach for the past 10+ years and I’ve made a mistake. It’s hard to beat the best in the business.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 February 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: I bought this and It worked like a charm I loves it so much it's a perfect size and one wired but 2 things 1 that it's not noice cancelling at all and I can hear almost everything that's going on and the second Is that the audio is just a teeny bit muffled other than that it's nice

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: *This review is for the WIRED version of the headset. I almost didn't purchase these based off of negative reviews saying how the connectivity had issues, but then I realized these reviews seem to be both for the wired and wireless versions.______________________________________Summary:  This is a very comfortable, high quality headset with hit all of the bases with someone not looking to spend $100+ on a headset that may or may not feel like a bang for your buck.--------------------------------------Alright so for starters I was looking for some headphones that were an upgrade from my previous Turtle Beach Recon 50P (a great budget headset for anyone in a pinch), and I use my headphones for light gaming, music, and watching movies on my laptop when I go out and about.  I've had these for only a handful of days, but will provide an more updated, long-term review down the road when I think of it.I can't stress how dang comfortable the padding is...it's a cushion that easily fits over your whole ear and does not make you sweat like headsets with the leather-like material that many have.  The sound is not distorted and hits the bass very well, and they fit very, very well.Behind the left ear there's a little knob that lets you adjust the sound easily, and there's also a convenient switch for the microphone in the same area. I can't speak for the microphone quality yet, but I can tell you that It is detachable and I will update my review when I do end up using it.On the box it literally has a statement saying something on the lines of, "This feels way more expensive then what it is!", I'm inclined to full-heartedly agree with that.  Hope this review helps anyone that's on the fence!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 4 August 2021

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: Estos audifonos son lo mejor, tenia uno de baja gama y pasarme a Steel Series y su Arctic 1 fue la mejor decisición, un sonido de alta fidelidad con una experiencia inmersiva en los juegos, que te dejara con la boca abierta y a un presio adsequible.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: The SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired Gaming Headset offers a reliable sound experience for gaming enthusiasts. While it may not boast outstanding sound quality compared to higher-end models, it delivers consistent audio performance. The headset provides clear and immersive sound, allowing for an enjoyable gaming experience without distractions. With its comfortable design and decent audio output, it serves as a dependable choice for gamers seeking a budget-friendly option.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 23 May 2023

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: I wear a turban so I wanted a large headset to go over it.I've been using an MPOW H17 for a few years, and am sensitive to headset weight.This part had way too much clamping force while also feeling heavy, and providing a bad seal.At the same time, it is only $25 CAD + tax for a warehouse model.I will try the Arctis 3 in the future as that has the ski goggle headband which provides a superior fit despite the fragility.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: So in order to make this microphone work on PC(more likely a laptop with TRRS like in my case), you need to go to your Realtek audio panel under Device Advanced settings switch the Connector Retasking ANALOG to Headset...Sounds good mic works fine, cable should be about 3 feet longer imo or at the very least make the part that connects interchangable(modular)

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: You need to purchase an usb port seperately. Not sure why it’s not supported regardless of which console it’s for or PC, but all 3 have usb ports so why would the headphones not include the port option that works with each device? This isn’t the sellers fault at all it’s more so the manufacturers fault for lack of detail. Regardless, I would order again because of the price to quality that you’re getting (they sound great) but I’d purchase a usb adapter right away or spend a little more and get a headset with an included usb plug in.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: The headphones are really good,(I'm taking about the wired version). The price is reasonable, and the sound quality is really good, y like the design.

ProductName: SteelSeries Arctis 1 Wired 3.5mm AUX Gaming Headset - Designed for Xbox, PC, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Android & iOS
Review: So, after a few weeks with this. The worst part about this is the cord length. If I ever lose access to my front IO then this headset might as well go straight to the trash. ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 Gaming Headset for Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Flip-up-Mute Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Brought around March 2021, first year everything was pretty decent, just as good as expensive Razor headset's with the mic and audio quility being good. Started to notice the mic and audio quility started getting worse after a years use and now friends can barely hear me and audio is starting to get worse over time. If you're looking for a pair of budget headset's to last you till you can get a better one and need good quility in both mic and audio then this will do you perfectly fine, but be warned, the headset is definitely not a long lasting pair. Most headsets I've got in the £50-150 price range normally last me around 3-5 years, these only lasted about a year, but for the price, it's a grab if you're low on money but are desperate to get a quility headset in the meantime. And as prices are still going up on everything, then get these while you still can as even technology and equipment for gaming is starting to go up in the last year (not just living, bills etc). So grab a pair while you can or if you can wait then I recommend getting some Astros or Razor headsets. Probably contradict myself here, but the durability is excellent, just the actual audio and mic quility over a short period goes down extremely fast once you start to notice it. Anyway, overall, decent pair of budget headset's here.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 February 2023

Review: 日本のレビューは全く無かったのですが海外からのレビューを見ると非常に好評だったので購入。マイクの音質はまあ聞けるレベルで音質も同価格帯のステレオヘッドセットと比べても良い方だと思います。本体重量に関しては225gとかなりの軽量。側圧もきつくはないので長時間の使用に向いているかと思います。ただ付属のUSBDACや分極ケーブルの類はないのでPCでマイクを使いたいという人には最初の一台にはおすすめしません。

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 Gaming Headset for Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Flip-up-Mute Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: Pur non essendo una marca famosa si è fatta valere per la qualità dei suoi prodottiOrmai sono un videogiocatore da parecchi anni, e per questo ho potuto testare molti tipi di periferiche e con queste, vari tipi di cuffie, e devo dire che con queste mi sono trovato particolarmente bene.Ma partiamo dall'arrivo:Le cuffie mi sono arrivate con un anticipo di 1 o 2 giorni non ricordo, erano imballate e protette perfettamente da eventuali urti o graffi. La confezione e semplice e non ha particolari pezzi dispersi nella scatola.La cuffia è composta da: un mixer del volume dietro il padiglione sinistro, il microfono che può essere utilizzato in 3 modi:1) Aperto, quindi parlando2) A metà, quando ci si vuole mutare3) E infine spostato indietro, che consiglio quando non si usa proprio parlare magari nei giochi offlineDa gamer, ho acquistato davvero parecchie paia di cuffie, che siano per ascoltare la musica, lavorare o giocare. Ho trovato di meglio con Razer, ma spendendo molto di più, infatti un vantaggio enorme di queste cuffie è il rapporto qualità prezzo. Mi sono trovato davvero benissimo e le sto utilizzando tutt'ora da 2 anni che le ho comprate, difficilmente si trova di meglio a questo prezzo.La qualità del suono è davvero pazzesco e il microfono si sente benissimo estraniando le voci o i rumori nei dintorni. Per non parlare della perfezione e della comodità del padiglione, pur facendo lunghe sessioni di gioco non ho mai avuto dolori alle orecchie, cosa che invece capitava con altre paia di cuffie.Sono delle cuffie surround quindi in giochi in cui è necessario sentire l'ambiente esterno come magariTom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege sono perfette. Infatti grazie a queste sono riuscito ad avere una migliore performance in giochi come questi.L'unico difetto che mi sento di dare è che dopo un po di tempo il microfono quando viene spostato fa parecchi rumori come se fosse un cigolio della porta, e non è una cosa da poco anche perché mi ritrovo molto spesso a spostare il microfono per mutarmi e sento questo fastidioso rumore.Mentre invece premio molto la resistenza del cavo che a distanza di più di 2 anni mi tiene ancora compagnia come quando è arrivato e il jack non si è rovinato di una virgola.Potete vedere le condizioni della cuffie nelle immagini che ho messo, ovviamente dovete contare che sono state acquistate 2 anni fa e nonostante ciò sono ancora in perfette condizioni.Concludo dicendo che mi sono trovato molto bene e le consiglio soprattutto alle persone che fanno lunghe sessioni di gioco perché in testa non si sentono proprio e per ora rimangono le mie cuffie preferite rapporto qualità\prezzo.

ProductName: Turtle Beach Recon 70 Gaming Headset for Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, PS5, PS4, PlayStation, Mobile, & PC with 3.5mm - Flip-up-Mute Mic, 40mm Speakers - Black
Review: I ordered this product already being familiar with the brand of TurtleBeach. I've been a customer for close to 6 years and have gone through 3 Recons over that time period that have all served me greatly in sound, durability and mic quality. So my expectations were high when i saw a new model. However while the product meets my expectations in terms of sounds and durability (so far), the mic quality is reportedly worse than its predecessor. The wide census from friends and strangers was "are you using earphones or something your mic is ****". This has quite obviously irritated me and has left me disappointed hence the 3 star review. In summary don't let the "unique features" off a flippable mic sway you into purchasing this headset. I'd recommend sticking to the older models manufactured by turtle beach or other competitors.

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Essential Leather Sneaker
Review: Die Sneaker sind zweifellos eine Investition in Qualität und Stil. Ich habe diese Sneaker nun seit einigen Monaten und sie haben sich als eine meiner besten Kaufentscheidungen erwiesen.Erstens möchte ich die Qualität des Leders hervorheben. Das Leder, aus dem diese Sneaker gefertigt sind, ist von ausgezeichneter Qualität und fühlt sich langlebig an. Es ist nicht nur strapazierfähig, sondern verleiht den Sneakern auch einen Hauch von Eleganz, der sie von anderen abhebt.Der Tragekomfort ist ein weiteres bemerkenswertes Merkmal dieser Sneaker. Die Sohle ist gut gepolstert und bietet den ganzen Tag über hervorragende Unterstützung für meine Füße. Egal, ob ich einen langen Spaziergang mache oder den ganzen Tag auf den Beinen bin, diese Sneaker bieten den nötigen Komfort.Der minimalistische Stil dieser Sneaker ist ein weiterer Pluspunkt. Sie sind vielseitig genug, um zu verschiedenen Outfits zu passen, sei es Jeans und ein T-Shirt oder Chinos und ein Hemd. Das ikonische Tommy Hilfiger-Logo an der Seite verleiht ihnen eine subtile, aber erkennbare Markenpräsenz.Die Passform war für mich perfekt, und ich schätze die hochwertigen Schnürsenkel, die fest sitzen und nicht ständig nachgezogen werden müssen.Obwohl diese Sneaker etwas teurer sind, sind sie meiner Meinung nach jeden Cent wert. Sie vereinen Qualität, Stil und Komfort in einem, und ich erwarte, dass sie mich noch lange begleiten werden. Wenn Sie auf der Suche nach hochwertigen Sneakern mit zeitlosem Design sind, kann ich die Sneaker wärmstens empfehlen.

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Essential Leather Sneaker
Review: Très belle et bonne qualité du cuir

After wearing these Guess shoes, I feel compelled to share my experience with other potential buyers. The first thing that strikes you is the quality of craftsmanship: the premium leather blends beautifully with a small patent detail on the back, creating a texture play that catches the eye. The gold Guess lettering on the side adds a touch of class without being overbearing, well balanced in the overall design of the shoe.But the real surprise is in the details: the last lace hole features a refined golden circle, set with subtly sparkling little diamonds. This detail elevates the shoes, making them suitable not only for everyday wear but also for those events where a touch of elegance is a plus.In terms of comfort, these shoes are a dream come true. The sense of comfort is immediate as soon as you slip them on: the support is optimal, the fit perfect, as if they were tailor-made for my foot. It's rare to find shoes that so effectively combine aesthetics with comfort, but Guess has hit the mark.In summary, these Guess shoes are a true gem in the wardrobe. Suitable for everyday use, but with that extra touch that makes them special. Whether it's a day at the office, a drink with friends, or a stroll around the city, these shoes never disappoint. They are proof that you can be comfortable without sacrificing elegance.

ProductName: GUESS
Review: I recently added the GUESS Women's Loven Sneaker to my collection, and I am beyond thrilled with my choice. These sneakers are the epitome of style, comfort, and quality craftsmanship.First and foremost, the design of the Loven Sneaker is simply stunning. The attention to detail, from the iconic GUESS logo to the sleek silhouette, exudes sophistication. The choice of materials is top-notch, ensuring both durability and a luxurious feel. These sneakers are not just a pair of shoes; they are a fashion statement.Comfort is key when it comes to sneakers, and the Loven Sneaker does not disappoint. The interior is cushioned and supportive, making every step a breeze. Whether I'm running errands or spending a day exploring the city, my feet remain comfortable and fatigue-free. The sneakers provide a perfect fit, hugging my feet without feeling too tight, and the laces allow for easy adjustments according to my preference.I also appreciate the versatility of these sneakers. They effortlessly complement a wide range of outfits, from casual jeans and a tee to a trendy dress or skirt. The neutral color options make them easy to pair with different styles, adding a touch of chic to any ensemble.Durability is another standout feature. Despite regular use, these sneakers have shown minimal signs of wear and tear. The quality of construction is evident, promising long-lasting performance and value for the investment.In addition to their style and comfort, the GUESS Women's Loven Sneaker offers a confidence boost. Every time I wear them, I receive compliments on their fashionable appearance. They have become my go-to choice for both fashion-forward outings and days when I simply want to elevate my casual look.

Ho recentemente acquistato le scarpe da ginnastica GUESS GWLOVEN per mia moglie, che calza il numero 38, e la mia scelta si è rivelata assolutamente azzeccata per due ragioni fondamentali. In primo luogo, mia moglie è da sempre una fan del marchio Guess, considerato una garanzia di qualità per noi. In secondo luogo, il prezzo estremamente interessante ha reso l'acquisto ancora più allettante.Dalle foto online, le scarpe sembravano già molto belle, ma devo dire che dal vivo sono ancora più sorprendenti. La consegna è stata impeccabile, con le scarpe presentate in una scatola bianca elegante dai bordi dorati, richiamando il tono dorato delle stesse scarpe.La calzata è perfetta e la scarpa è incredibilmente comoda grazie alla sua morbidezza. Le cuciture presenti conferiscono un effetto elegante che aggiunge prestigio al design complessivo. Alcuni dettagli che particolarmente abbiamo apprezzato includono due parafori con piccoli diamanti all'estremità delle scarpe, un tocco chic ed elegante. Le strisce dorate sul tacco sono imponenti e aggiungono un tocco di colore accattivante alle scarpe bianche. Infine, il marchio Guess è non solo stampato, ma addirittura in rilievo dorato, un dettaglio di classe.Queste scarpe GWLOVEN sono un mix perfetto tra eleganza e sportività. Sebbene siano concepite come scarpe da ginnastica, il loro design raffinato le rende adatte anche a occasioni più formali. La cura dei dettagli, la qualità costruttiva e il comfort che offrono le rendono un acquisto eccezionale. In conclusione, sono estremamente soddisfatto di questo acquisto e consiglio vivamente le GUESS GWLOVEN a chi cerca un paio di scarpe che uniscano stile, eleganza e comfort in un unico prodotto.

ProductName: Crocs Unisex Adults On The Clock Clog
Review: I do a lot of remodeling and construction on my house inside and out and have to be on my feet for 8 or 10 hours at a time. I have been having more problems with that lately apparently due to insufficient width on shoes. I haven't been able to find a good shoe for this until I got a bit desperate and decided to try these "on the clock" crocs. I have two pairs of the regular ones I used for lounging at home and at my office when it's snowy and I don't want to track in. So I understood that they are comfortable, but didn't think of them as great for climbing ladders and working on scaffolding. In fact, I tried on those and it was scary. This shoe is very different. Stays on your foot securely but still very comfortable. I worked about six hours today for the first test and had no foot fatigue at all. Size 11 is my sneaker size and that fit great. I was concerned it would slip too much on my heal but no problem. Felt safe on ladders and even went to Menards wearing them. And they aren't as dorky looking as one might think -- though they do remind me of my dad's old galoshes. Others have commented on the hot and sweaty factor. In the 50s today and 65 indoors. Didn't notice this as an issue but as summer comes I may rethink that. Not quite sure why they aren't better vented. I will say one thing about using them in construction...no steel toe! So if you are working heavy machines or at risk of a smash, this is not a great idea. Otherwise, I think they may solve my problems.

ProductName: Crocs Unisex Adults On The Clock Clog
Review: these are amazing i love them. i got them in a size 6 and im between a 5/6. i have abit of space in them, so i wear thick socks and there so comfy. i dont slip at all and habe really good grip, and so so easy to clean. theres an insole in them so you can just take that out and then you can wash/ spray the shoe so their clean. my favourite work shoes by far and i'll definitely be repurchasing

Review: I have worn these shoes to do my gardening every day for the past week.  They are so comfortable.  I go sockless and so far they don't smell.  They have great traction.  When the grass was wet or the garden was muddy, I didn't slip at all. They keep the water and mud out even when I've sprayed them with the hose.  I can wear them for hours and my feet still don't hurt.  I wear a size 8 1/2.  I bought size 9.  They fit perfectly. The icing on the cake is just how fun and cheerful they are to look at.  They are adorable!  How did I garden all these years without them?!?!

ProductName: Sloggers Women's Splash Waterproof Rain and Garden Shoes, Bee Blue, 09 US Size
Review: I ordered these with, I must admit, low expectations. After all, they were inexpensive and waterproof and I just wanted them for the garden.  When they arrived I was so pleasantly surprised and pleased by the quality of these shoes, and how easy they are to use. I can easily slip them on and off to hop on out to the garden and back yard when ever I want - and they look amazing. They are so comfortable I can wear them all day long, with a nice sole, there is plenty of bounce under the step. They run true to size, so don't order 'up a size' like you might be tempted to do for a shoe like this, you won't have to. I'd wear these anywhere.

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: È la mia prima scarpa da trail running. Le impressioni dopo il primo utilizzo sono ottime. Le prime cose che mi vengono in mente sono impermeabilità e trazione. Ottime su terreno morbido, fangoso e sterrato in generale. La roccia liscia bagnata non è il suo terreno, bisogna fare attenzione.

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Je suis fidèle à ce modèle depuis des années, j'en suis donc très content

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Bueno, diré la verdad (la mía claro). Pués tuve bastantes problemas con el tallaje, habiendo leído muchas reseñas compré un par de números más de mi talla normal y . . . . . . no fue suficiente. Tuve que cambiarlas por otras dos números más grandes! Aquí es cuando Amazon me dejó no sorprendido,lo siguiente. Las recibí un miércoles por la mañana,las llevé de vuelta por la tarde en un punto de recogida cercano a mi casa y. . . . el jueves por la mañana ya tenía las nuevas. En este caso un 10 por Amazon.Bueno, referente a las zapatillas poco que comentar. Excelente superior. Se adaptan al pié de manera sorprendente, con un ajuste,en mi caso casi perfecto. Es una sensación de tener tacos en el pié directamente. No hubiera imaginado que pudiera haber un calzado así. Y sí,lo hay. Por lo que a mí respecta,ha sido una gran adquisición. Espero disfrutarlas mucho tiempo! Corrigiendo el tallaje no dudo en recomendarlas.

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Me encanta la calidad y el confort de estos tenis. Los he usado por mucho tiempo casi diario y no se despegan las suelas y esto. Excelente la forma lo más parecida al pie

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: A little snug when I first tried them on, but after walking around a while I realize they fit just fine. I have used these for just golf, best golf shoes I have ever had. I was concerned about scuffing the greens with the aggressive tread on the bottom but this has not been an issue. I walk 18 holes (pushing a cart) 3 or 4 days a week and after 6 rounds there is no evidence of wear on the bottom. I do try to keep off the cart path and walk on grass as much as I can. Comfortable, durable, good looking, and the easy pull up "laces" all equal a great product. These are waterproof and I just bought a second pair (of the non-waterproof version) for summertime use.

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Wer mit dem Hund, der gerne an der Leine zieht, auf nassen, matschigen Wald- und Feldwegen unterwegs ist, bergauf und schlimmer bergab, der hat hier den richtigen Schuh. Ich laufe nicht mehr wie auf Eis, sondern sicher wie auf einem erstklassigen Parkweg. Kein Wegrutschen, die Knie bleiben heil, der Hintern macht keine Bekanntschaft mehr mit dem Matschboden. So entspannend. Auch auf dem asphaltiertem Straßenstück bis zum Wald laufe ich sicher. Eine nasse abschüssige Wiese überqueren - kein Thema mehr.Und der Schuh ist leicht. Kein Vergleich mit meinen schweren Wanderschuhen.Ich habe die Schuhe jetzt gut einen Monat im Einsatz. Über die Haltbarkeit kann ich noch nichts sagen.

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: I’ve used the trail running shoe on three occasions since I purchased them just over a week ago. The footpaths that I have run are fairly level (in terms of ascent and descent) but are normally wet, slippery and rutted at this time of year. First impressions are that these trail shoes provide a sturdy and surefooted feel. The trainer soles dig into the surface and provide a strong degree of certainty. Having used road shoes in the past, it takes a couple of miles to appreciate the confidence they provide.The shoes are lightweight, comfortable and easy to put on / take off.I normally take an 11 in shoe. I ordered an 11.5 in the trail shoe which is just about right.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 31 March 2023

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: 雪道結構歩けますね　アイスバーン気味の道はちょっと怖いけど　冬のデイリーシューズとしてかなりいい気がします

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Amazing grip on soft ground, fit like a glove, beautiful shoes

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: So I wanted to see what all the fuss was about......and I wasn't disappointed! These are absolutely perfect and worth every penny!

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: I've had my pair of Salomon Speed Cross 5 GTX since Apr. 2023 and they still surprise me each time I slip them on. If my feet could talk they would probably describe these shoes as comfy house slippers with cleats. I appreciate the next level of engineering that went into these shoes. From the stealthy gortex shell to the quick-release wire lases. Water and debris won't get in and so easy to put on for a quick step outside without tying any lases. BRAVO. I have very high arches making it so so difficult to find shoes that don't hurt my feet. My feet require a wide toe box and extra cushion under the ball of the foot. To make these shoes perfect for me, I paired them with the AIRR Softsole Perform inserts.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 December 2023

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Son de buena calidad y confortables

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Le scarpe Salomon Speedcross 5 Gore-Tex sono il sogno di ogni trail runner che vuole affrontare le avventure outdoor in qualsiasi condizione meteorologica. Queste scarpe non sono solo impermeabili ma offrono anche protezione, trazione e comfort straordinari.Immagina di indossare queste scarpe e di sentire subito la sensazione di stabilità e supporto. La membrana Gore-Tex garantisce che i tuoi piedi rimangano asciutti anche nelle condizioni più umide, mantenendo il comfort e la protezione durante la tua corsa.Le Salomon Speedcross 5 sono progettate specificamente per il trail running. La loro suola con grip offre una trazione eccezionale su terreni accidentati, bagnati, fangosi o rocciosi. La loro costruzione robusta è pronta a superare qualsiasi ostacolo che il trail possa presentare.Queste scarpe sono ideali per le avventure in montagna, i percorsi nel bosco o qualsiasi attività all'aperto che richieda prestazioni di alto livello. Grazie alla loro impermeabilità, puoi attraversare ruscelli, fango e terreni umidi senza preoccuparti dei piedi bagnati.Scegliendo le Salomon Speedcross 5 Gore-Tex, stai investendo in protezione, trazione e comfort. Sono la scelta ideale per i trail runner e gli amanti dell'outdoor che vogliono esplorare la natura in ogni condizione. Indossa queste scarpe e preparati a sfidare qualsiasi terreno con il massimo supporto e sicurezza.

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Las bambas son muy cómodas y se ven muy chulas y de buena calidad.

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Mes pieds sont comme dans un moule, super chaussures de randonnée

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Salomon Ultra passen mir besser. Diese sind um einiges enger aber super schuh

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Ich laufe Schuhe verschiedener Marken, primär Hoka, Salomon und Brooks. Bisher war Hoka für mich die Nummer 1, super verarbeitet, hoher Tragekomfort, relativ lange Haltbarkeit (hängt natürlich davon ab, wie viele Kilometer man die Woche damit abreißt). Diese Laufschuhe setzen noch einen drauf, super Grip im Gelände, gerade auf weichem Untergrund (Sand, Matsch, Schnee), hoher Tragekomfort, und zum Schnellschnürsystem (Quicklace System) von Salomon muss ich nichts sagen, das fetzt einfach. Von außen kann in den Schuh auch nichts reinkommen, was beim Laufen stört (kleine Steinchen), und Regen sollte den Schuhen auch nichts anhaben. Wasserdicht sind sie sicher nicht, aber bis die innen naß sind, muss es schon ordentlich schütten. Alles in allem ein super durchdachter Laufschuh für's Gelände, echt Mega!

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Der Schuh ist mega bequem und sehr robust.Jedoch dürfte es keine Standardgröße sein.Normal hab ich Gr.44 bzw Gr.44 2/3Bei diesem Schuh hab ich jetzt Gr.45.Deshalb nur 4 Sterne.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 23 February 2024

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: 軽くて使いやすいGORE-TEX採用のトレッキングにも使用できるシューズを探していて、ちょうどセールになっていたこともあり、Try before you buyを利用してフィッティングをした後購入しました。まずは以下フィッティングをした感想です。※普段のスニーカーは26.5cm～27.0cmで足は細身。NIKE FITでもAF1やDUNKで27.0cmがベストサイズの案内。27.0cm→薄手の靴下を履いた状態で問題なく履ける。まさにピッタリという感じで、足先などが不自然に当たったり詰まる感じも無し。但し、冬場に厚手の靴下を履くとややタイトになりすぎるかと感じた。27.5cm→薄手の靴下を履いた状態だと余裕を持って履け、ストラップで締めればきっちりと足にフィットさせる事ができる。厚手の靴下を履いた状態でピッタリといった感じ。28.0cm→薄手の靴下だとかなり余裕ができる。ストラップで締めれば問題なくフィットさせられるが、逆にここまで余裕をもたせる必要はな無いかと感じた。厚手の靴下を履いても余裕を持って履ける感じ。いずれも夜の、やや足が浮腫んだ時間帯にフィッティングをしたので、朝とかであれば上記より更に余裕が出ると感じました。ただ、自分の場合は足が細身であるので普段の靴と同サイズでも問題なく履けるという感想になったものの、日本人に多い幅広の足の方で、普段3E～4Eを履かれる方なら通常のスニーカー+1cmでも問題ないと思います。私の場合は以上の感想から冬場のことも考慮し27.5cmを選択。本格的に山で履く前に、足に馴染ませるため街中で1日履いた感想としては、舗装路でも十分にクッションが効き、またアッパー全体で足をホールドできるようになっている為ブレも少なく疲れが少ないと感じました。当然のことながらGORE-TEX採用でラグも深いので多少の雨やぬかるみなども問題なし。SALOMONのシューズ全般がそうですが、軽いのも大きなアドバンテージになっていると思います。最新の現行モデルとしてはSPEED CROSS 6が出ていますが、よほど本気のトレイルランをしない限りはこちらのSPEED CROSS 5でも十分な性能ですので、買って損は無い1足。

ProductName: Salomon Men's Speedcross 5 GTX Trail Running Shoe
Review: Firstly, these come up small so you'll need to size up by 0.5-1 size.They look great and have been comfortable to wear so far.However, they're not very practical for anywhere other than trails. There is almost no grip on flat smooth surfaces. I find myself sliding all over the place on walks around the village. Pavements, bricks, tiles, paving, manhole covers all become an unexpected challenge to remain upright on.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Der Croc möchte ein normaler Schuh sein. Vom Design auf das Foto hat es mir gefallen, allerdings in der Realität passt es nicht. Der Schuh sitzt nicht, ein Stück Gummi mit etwas Stoff. Kein halt an den Seiten. Dann doch lieber Rieker. Ansonsten normale Crocs sind Super, mein Sohn schört drauf.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Es un zapato cómodo de  buena calidad , un terminado excelente , lo único que la talla es muy pequeña comprar una talla más grande . Hice el pedido talla 40 es como que fuese la 39 . Les recomiendo comprar  porque su calidad  precio  no se puede pedir más

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: 旅行の履き替え用に買いました軽くて履きやすいものでした荷物としても持ち運びは軽く買って良かったです

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Preso misura 39-41 , mi sono trovato bene e ho il 40... fare attenzione ala taglia.  Le ho usate un week-end in barca a vela,  ottima aderenza, grande comodità, poi c'è  soletta interna in  gomma removibile e lavabile. Promosse in barca, e anche fuori!

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Very comfortable

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Der Schuh ist optisch super. Er lässt sich auch hervorragend tragen. Nur 48/49 ist ein Größe, die mir absolut passen müsste, jedoch drücken meine Zehen den Oberstoff nach Außen, was bedeutet, dass dies nie uns nimmer 48/49 sein kann, allein aus diesem Grunde vergebe ich nur 2 Sterne. Es sollten die Größen wirklich genormt werden, damit das Einkaufen auch nachhaltig zur Freude wird.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Very poor quality!!! Didn’t expect this from crocs!!!!wrinkles all over..

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Scarpette da passeggio veramente comode, eleganti. Si possono calzare per ore senza il benché minimo problema. Forse avrei dovuto acquistare un numero in meno, sono leggermente larghe, ma ad ogni buon conto le indosso comunque apprezzandone il confort. Davvero soddisfatto, anche per l'eccellente rapporto qualità / prezzo praticato da Amazon. Consegna puntualissima.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: The product foot feel is good and relaxing.The only challenge what i observed is that it doesn't have arch support so people who want to use of for full day or while long walks might have difficulty in using them but for short stints be it driving, short walks etc they are good.Also as all crocs footwear are this too is washable and stylish.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Terrible for summers. The material is not conducive to be worn in summers. Sweat a lot.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: 幅広甲高の自分の足には抜群のフィット感です。

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Great shoe. Comfortable and good to wear in the summer. Drys fast when wet. This is my second pair. I still wear my first pair, I’ve had them for at least 5 years and they still look good.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Has a handy tab on back for going on easy.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: I second all the complaints about the wrong size for these shoes.I supposedly ordered size 13, but they were more like size 11.They must be American sizes, not UK's.On the same day I ordered some "Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers" also size 13, and these arrived on time and fitted perfectly.So there is a screw up somewhere in Amazon.And the fit was only "Medium", Not wide.Come on AMAZON. WHEN WILL YOU DISPLAY WIDTHS FOR SHOES??? PLEASE!!!Also, these came from America to the UK and took absolutely ages (4 weeks) to get here.They look nice and comfortable, so i will return for larger pair, if I can get them.(The Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers are super comfortable!!)
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 May 2014

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: 個体差でしょうが、かかとのブルタブの辺りが縫製が荒く、縫い縁が当たり痛いです。我慢して自分で加工さいます。

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Mocassino molto leggero.Estetica piu' tedesca che italiana, ma comunque gradevole.Scarpa molto leggera.Io ho ordinato una taglia 48/49 (in realta' ho un 46,5 / 47) e mi sta' piccolo.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Well I bought 4 pairs as they are so well made and comfy.I tend to have poor ankle's that can give a bit of pain now and again due to having sprained both over the years, I also have a funny big toe that can play up, a bit like a bunion. So I have had no problems with either swelling due I think to the insert, also the air holes stop your feet getting hot.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 September 2015

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: Product feels like low end canvass and is overall uncomfortable. Unhappy with the workmanship.

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: If these shoes were alive I'd marry them!  Wait...I'm married...nevermind.  I really, really like these shoes and I'm on my third pair.  I wear them until the soles wear too thin for traction a then they are trashed.  The arch support is fantastic and by the way, when you wear this shoe out, save the insoles!  Put them in shoes that need it!  I have seen these on sale (used) on EBay) and should you be tempted, buy the shoe for the insoles and throw the shoe away.  They don't wear out and they don't flatten.  If you have bad knees, back or hip joints and the like, then these are for you guys and girls, too!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 11 December 2023

ProductName: Crocs Mens Santa Cruz Loafers
Review: I am a big foot and my size is US 13 D and very rarely I get shoes like this at this price. Else, I have to spend a huge amount of money to get these kind of shoes or whenever I travel abroad I my shopping is only for shoes. This shoe satisfied the comfortability need and easy to wear! But I suggest don't use this shoes in summer and climates of Chennai is not suitable for this shoe. I can feel the sweat inside the shoe and the heat is not being absorbed by the upper material.. Rest all is good

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Elles sont magnifiques. Je chausse généralement du 38, parfois du 39 en fonction du modèle. Je les ai prises en 38 et elles vont parfaitement. Je vais peut être même pouvoir y mettre mes semelles orthopédiques. Le cuir est "doux" , mais le noir n'est pas complètement mat.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Coole Dr. Martens Schuhe. Müssen wie fast alle docs erst eingelaufen werden, aber danach sind sie mega bequem. Habe viele Doc Martens und auch diese passen wie erwartet. Preisleistung Top (95€ von Verkäufer Amazon)

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Dieser Schuh hatte ein sehr hartes Oberleder. Er war gut verarbeitet.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Ich habe den Schuh vor ein paar Wochen gekauft und bin bisher sehr zufrieden. Eine schmerzhafte Zeit des Einlaufens habe ich nicht erlebt. Ich habe den Schuh angezogen und er hat gepasst. Er ist jetzt zu meinem Lieblingsschuh geworden. Meiner ist aus Thailand und ich habe weder beim verwendeten Material, noch bei der Verarbeitung Defizite oder Mängel erkannt. Lasst Euch von den negativen Beurteilungen nicht abschrecken. Klare Kaufempfehlung!Nachtrag 02.04.14: inzwischen habe ich dasselbe Modell, allerdings in England produziert, gekauft. Ich habe es kürzlich auf einer anderen Plattform für 180 Euro + ca. 10 Euro für den Versand aus England erstanden. Die Unterschiede die ich festgestellt habe sind durchaus erkennbar. 1. der Schuh aus Thailand ist bei gleicher Schuhgröße wesentlich weiter, er wirkt auch optisch breiter. 2. beim made in England Modell sind die Nähte gleichmässiger (jeder Stich gleich lang), 3. und für mich am Wichtigsten: die Qualität des Leders vom Schuh aus England ist besser. Es ist robuster und Schuhcreme zieht wesentlich schneller ein. Dennoch nehme ich meine Kaufempfehlung für dieses Angebot nicht zurück. Wenn man beachtet, dass je nach Angebot zwischen 100 und 120 Euro Differenz zwischen den Paaren liegen, relativieren sich diese Unterschiede ein Stück weit. Wer hier kauft macht nichts falsch, auch wenn ich das englische Paar ein klein wenig mehr mag.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: まさかほんとに正規の物だと思わなかったらしいですが主人は安く手に入って喜んでいました。海外の物?と日本の物?があるらしいのですが海外での正規品だったらしいです。素人の私は良く分かりませんが。。
