Review: Llegaron antes de lo indicado. Me quedan perfectas pero dudo si sean originales. Llegaron en una caja que no es y sin el par de agujetas extras habitual.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Sometimes available for less than $100; the shoes are well worth it at that price.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Son increíblemente bonitos. Estéticamente super versátiles y aportan un plus de modernidad a cualquier estilismo. Sin embargo, son realmente incómodos. Llevo poniéndonmelos día sí, día no, durante más de tres semanas y aún molestan un poco al final del día. Cuidado con la talla, yo, siguiendo las recomendaciones de otros compradores, me pedí una talla menos de la mía y los encuentro algo justos, sobre todo porque para domarlos sin que te hagan ampollas hay que usar doble calcetín o calcetín de lana gordo...

Review: As you expect, well made, bomb proof...very satisfied..come up a little big in size.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Prodotto originale, scatola, lacci due colori. Molto meno costoso di quanto lo puoi trovare nei negozi!! Molto comode, se non ci cammini per ora. Sono fighe e stanno bene su tutto. Sappiate però che i primi giorni (a me 2 settimane) soffrirete le pene dell'inferno in quanto la scarpa deve prendere la forma del vostro piede..ho perso del sangue dietro. Vi consiglio di tenerle in casa, ovviamente nuove per non sporcare :P, così si abitua più in fretta

Review: El primer día hacen unas rozaduras muy grandes. No fabrican medias tallas y eso puede ser un problema porque siempre te van a quedar un poco grandes o un poco pequeñas. Con una plantilla se puede solucionar.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Shoes are very comfortable .Beautiful and built well.This is the first time I buy this shoes and I love them.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Ce modèle 1961 me convient, chausse un poil grand mais une fine semelle fait l'affaire.C'est ma première paire de Doc, je ne regrette pas mon achat, à voir dans le temps si la qualité est là ?Voila un an que je les porte presque tout les jours, un peu raide les quinze premier jours, mais depuis se sont de vrais merveille, après un an elles n'ont pas bougées, et je ne les ménage pas ...ce modèle est quasi indestructible.Je viens de commander une paire de 1960, en espérant qu'elles seront aussi à la hauteur de mes espérances.Je recommande vivement ces 1461

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: この値段で購入出来て良かったです。最初は硬いので履いて慣れていきます

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Great shoes!!!

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Really nice fit. Long lasting.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 October 2023

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: What a great pair of shoes. I love 'em! Firstly, I read all the reviews and knew that these were not made in the UK, nor have they been since 2003, and can say that they are well made in Thailand...very well made actually. They are a quite substantial pair of shoes that are going to take a bit of time to break in as the leather is quite thick and stiff. With the proper care, these babies should last a long time. There was a hiccup with the delivery on my end, a local courier which was not amazon's fault, that delayed delivery. These shoes fit well, sizing is accurate, are comfortable and will get more so with wear and absolutely look the part. Secondly, I liked them so much, a week later I got a pair of DMC 8053 gaucho crazy horse. "Buy a pair, you can't go wrong".
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 May 2012

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Bought for my daughter as school shoes, following the demise of her no-longer-red-but-dead shoes. I think these are possibly a slight degree above the expected size, but that is perfect for her feet.The shoes arrived next day with Prime and are the genuine article, which means the usual Dr Marten quality. Not only that, but they were as much as thirty quid cheaper than other places I looked online, never mind the high street shoe shops, who were even dearer still!Eleanor has worn them for a week now and she says they are the epitome of comfort, and the envy of many of her friends. You just know that they will last, too, because of the legendary durability of Docs. Let's hope her feet don't grow anymore for a while!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 April 2016

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Die Rezension gilt dem Modell 1461Z schwarz, mit gelber Naht, Herstellung in Vietnam.Auf der Suche nach neuem Schuhwerk stieß ich auf diesen Kultschuh meiner Jugend...Zuerst hatte ich Zweifel ein altbewährtes Produkt zu bestellen, bei welchem der Hersteller seine Produktion nach Asien verlegt hat. Arge Skepsis hatte ich hinsichtlich der verwendeten Materialien, da ich auf Weichmacher stark reagiere.Doch: der Schuh ist gut verarbeitet, dass heisst die Nähte sind sauber und gleichmässig. Der Tragekomfort ist spitze. Zwei Tage ein wenig 'Docs AuaAua' die harten Lederränder betreffend aber längst nicht so, wie ich es von früher in Erinnerung habe! Und wer will kann dem ja mit altbekannten Tricks entgegenwirken.Das Obermaterial besteht aus Leder und der Innenschuh aus Leder und Textil. Dementsprechend passt sich der Schuh sehr schnell dem Fuss an und nach drei Tagen saß er bei mir wie angegossen. Super gemütlich! Die Größe entspricht meiner reellen Schuhgröße 42 (UK 8). Ein Top Produkt zu einem Top Preis!Die Lieferung war schnell und die Verpackung dem Produkt angepasst, also nicht mehr Karton als sein muss.Ob das Produkt unter fairen Bedingungen hergestellt wurde kann ich leider nicht beurteilen.Ansonsten ganz klare Kaufempfehlung für 5 Sterne! Ergänzung 2023...sie begleiten mich immer noch.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: I waited a long time to buy these shoes due to price but finally have them now and they are worth every penny. Extremely comfortable and durable, and look so good!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 May 2022

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: I had a pair of Docs in South Africa over 30 years ago.These brought back so many fond memories, of long-lasting, comfort and styleBTW, excellent buying experience at a very reasonable price
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 February 2013

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Maravillosos zapatos. Al principio son muy rigidos pero una vez domados se adaptan perfectamente.Original Dr Martens

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Primo paio di Dr Martens per me. Il primo impatto è stato fondamentale: bella ed elegante la confezione, così come le scarpe al suo interno (che emanano il buon odore della pelle). Al tatto risultano molto rigide e "grandi" e ho temuto per aver sbagliato numero, cosa di cui ero dubbioso fin dall'inizio. Inaspettatamente le scarpe hanno calzato subito bene. Solitamente porto un numero 44 di Vans (che sono le sole che utilizzo) e di queste ho ordinato un 43. La parte centrale calza precisamente e lascia un pò di spazio in prossimità della punta, piuttosto spessa. Ora sono in fase di "collaudo": le sto portando poche ore al giorno da qualche giorno, per abituare il piede e adattare la forma. E' vero che risultano molto rigide i primi tempi, ma già col poco utilizzo vedo cambiamenti. Infine, fatto non meno importante della comodità, sembrano molto "abbinabili", perché danno una bella forma a jeans un pò più larghi (slim, ad esempio) e stanno molto bene anche con gli skinny. Metto cinque stelle piene, che tengono conto sia della velocità e la precisione di Amazon che stupisce sempre di più (selezionata la consegna in 2-3 giorni, mi è arrivato l'oggetto il giorno dopo l'acquisto); sia per il fattore prezzo (viste in negozio a non meno di 130€, pagate meno di 90€).

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Ich trage diese Schuhe jahrelang und habe dieses Modell auch schon. Ich musste es mir beim Schuster bearbeiten lassen damit das Leder hinten keine Blasen beim Gehen macht. Das hatte bei den alten Schuhen gut geklappt. Bei den neuen war der Schuster leider zu faul und das Leder ist leider immer noch zu hart. Man muss es entweder weichlaufen oder weichklopfen.... Und dieses Angebot war mit ca. 100€ verhältnismässig günstig.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Scarpe perfette, ho preso il 37 perché sapevo che il 36 mi sarebbe stato stretto in lunghezza. Un po' rigide ma perché sono nuove. Consegnate anche prima del previsto

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Very nice shoe, comfy too! The only thing I would suggest is getting a half size down if possible. ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: Compré estos zapatos con la firme creencia que mejorarían mi día a día y no me equivocaba. La gente me respeta más ahora que los llevo, no sé si se atienen a un criterio estético o es porque les cortocircuita que afloje 100 rupias por unos zapatos, pero ¡Ay mi madre el bicho! Si duran 10 años bien amortizados estarán. Cómodos desde el instante uno, algo grandes todo hay que decirlo, calzo un 41 y me compré un 41 y voy algo holgado pero, ¿qué más da? Además me confieren un +1 a altura y solo por eso ya soy más alto que Messi. ¿Se puede pedir más? Pues no acaba aquí, hice la furla de probármelos en tienda física y comprarlos en Amazon, no es que sea cuestión de hundir al negocio local pero 50 maravedíes de diferencia me parece un margen fuera de mercado, me sale más barato construirme una Carabela e ir a buscarlos yo al Reino Unido, o a Taiwan o a donde sea que los produzcan. El color es ligeramente mate, y repelen el agua que da gusto. No los recomendaría para bañarse en la piscina pero no porque no sean impermeables sino porque tu hundirías hasta el fondo de lo que pesan. En verano y con temperaturas más altas dan una calor que te vuela la peluca, incluso después de llevarlos un rato puedes meter una pizza y la tienes hecha en un par de minutos. ¡Son una gozada!

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: soddisfatto della spedizione, rapida e puntuale. le scarpe sono bellissime, purtroppo fidandomi dei consigli di amazon ho preso un 41 e mal me n'è incolto. nonostante infatti io porti di solito un 40/41 le scarpe sono risultate strettissime e pur provandole con cerotti e calze spesse mi hanno scavato i talloni. ho effettuato il reso e prenderò una taglia 42 quando mi arriverà il rimborso.

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review:
So I just took delivery of my new Dr Martens 1461z's. These are the ones with the yellow trademark stitching around the sole. Rather than tell you how good they are, I'll tell you how good the pair that I'm replacing have been. I'm hard on shoes. A decent pair from a normal shoe shop will be lucky to last me four months before they either crack across the sole or the leather splits, or becomes so marked that even a polish won't hide how badly I've treated them. My current pair of DM's has lasted me 3 years of wearing to work, 5 days a week in all weathers, rain, hail, blistering sunshine and deep snow. I've never once troubled myself about slipping over, soaking my socks, or finishing the day with stinky feet. They just take the abuse and keep going. Somewhere in the middle of all that, I had a job interview, so they got a DM polish and buff up and looked like new. (ps, I got the job). If you want a decent pair of shoes that will last you, look good and serve your feet well, these are the beauties to have. Sure, they're not the cheapest but false economy of cheap shoes just doesn't work for me, and probably not you either. They get two thumbs up from me every time.
  
Dr. Martens Mens 1461
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 July 2012

ProductName: Dr. Martens Unisex 1461 3-Eye Lace-Up Smooth Leather Oxford Shoe, Black
Review: After reading a few reviews I was a bit apprehensive knowing that they are now made abroad, but decided to purchase them anyway.Ok they are'nt as well made as before and probably won't last years like the original Dr Martins, but too be honest they are still comfortable, although probably a bit stiff at first and needed a few days wearing in.I would advise that the sizes are large and I should of ordered the size down and this was pointed out in other reviews.On the whole still a great shoe and I would buy another pair, and for £30 at the amazon market place itsa bargain

ProductName: Skechers Men's Cessnock Food Service Shoe
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 November 2023

ProductName: Skechers Men's Cessnock Food Service Shoe
Review: I purchased this shoe as well as a pair of the Skecher Afterburn M tennis shoes.  I wanted a dedicated work shoe, because I was going though my shoes pretty quickly from wearing the same pair all the time.  So, being that I had already had two previous pairs of the “Afterburn” shoe, and burned through each of them in just over a year respectively, I decided to get another pair of them and also get a pair of the Cessnock Food Service Shoe strictly for work.  Both pairs of shoes arrived yesterday, and today I wore the Food Service shoe (FSS) to work for the first time.I slipped them on and found them to be a perfect fit.  They are very light weight and comfortable.  Usually, I find new shoes need a few days of wear to break-in until they really conform to the shape of your foot and then begin to fit well, but that wasn’t the case with these FSS shoes; they fit perfectly the moment I put them on.I wore them all day at work and discovered something that really surprised me.  We had a snowstorm today and got about 2” by the time I got to work, and had a good 7” by the end of my shift.  I park outside so of course I have to brush the snow off the car.  After doing so I knocked the snow off my shoes before getting into the car.  I was surprised to see that the snow didn’t stick to the material on top of the shoes, it was as if there was a water repellant in/on the material.  I was sort of wondering why my feet weren’t getting cold while I was cleaning off my car and I guess that explains it.  Another surprise was the fact that these shoes make no sound when walking on a tile floor while having wet soles.  The “Afterburn” tennis shoes squeak like a rusty hinge when the bottom of the shoe is wet and you walk across tile or other such surfaces, but the FSS’s, are quiet as a mouse, not a sound comes from them, you could almost call them Ninja shoes.As for the style, well that’s a personal preference and these shoes suit me just fine.  I think they look sharp, and nobody even noticed I had a new pair of shoes on today.Durability is the unanswered question and being that I’ve only worn them one day, that question will remain unanswered for a while.  If I can get a solid two years out of them, just wearing them to work, I will definitely buy them again and certainly would recommend them to a friend.I hope this review helps with your decision.  Peace.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 19 January 2024

ProductName: Skechers Men's Cessnock Food Service Shoe
Review: Bought a pair that was similar but a different style a year ago and had to replace them as I literally walked holes through the rubber soles.  They were the best shoes I've ever had.  Bought these put of necessity and while the shoes hurt to wear the first couple pf days, these took far less time than the last pair I owned and are even better.I have extremely wide feet at the toes due to growing up "toe-walking" with a very narrow heel, so on the rare occasion I can find shoes that fit my width even a little, my heel comes put when I walk.  My feet would also rip them apart within months.  The slightly  stretchy material of these shoes accommodate my wide toes but keep my heels in place.  My last pair didn't suffer any damage due to my feet and only due to normal wear and tear.I even bought a size 11 (no wide) and it fits my weird feet fantastically.  If you have a similar issue with your feet, give them a try!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 29 November 2023

ProductName: Skechers Men's Cessnock Food Service Shoe
Review: These arch fit shoes are very comfortable for long hours of standing on concrete as a mechanic. They are extremely breathable so my feet don’t sweat in summer heat. The soles are extremely non-slip on wet surfaces. This is my first pair of shoes with the stretch on laces, but definitely won’t be my last! The only downsides are the breathable fabric exterior attracts dirt like a magnet and they always look dirty when wearing in mechanics shop. The other issue is the soles tend to pickup tiny dirt & stones that end up falling out in the front office. But, I would still highly recommend & the two issues would not likely be a problem in most jobs.

ProductName: Skechers Men's Cessnock Food Service Shoe
Review: EDIT: After daily wearing them even just as normal running shoes and not just for work for the past 14 months (1 Year 2 Month) I purchased these on may 13th of 2021, it’s currently July 15th 2022! they are still holding up fantastically!!  They have been comfortable and perfect every single day! I’ve tried other shoes and just can’t get comfortable the way I do with these! I’ve come to this page again today to finally purchase more and not because they are totally gone but only because the glue on one the left shoe is starting to come off from the sole! But even with that happening I could still get atleast 5 more months out of these bad boys but I want to grab new ones out of personal preference!! To anyone looking for a fantastic non slip shoes these sketchers are definitely a great buy! I’ve attached photos of the shoes and how they look after 14 months of heavy wear!EDIT: After daily wearing them for the past 4 months they have held up great! The cusion in the sole is wearing down but all in all they are holding up well! I’ve put them thru hell and back and still love them! 10 / 10 will buy another pair when these goSuper comfy! Way better than my Walmart bought non-slips, with my old shoes my feet would be so sore afterwork I would have to sit in my car for 10-15 minutes after putting my runners on and before driving 30 min home, these are great! Could use more cushion in the soles but nothing Dr. Sholl’s can’t fix, can’t speak for longevity as have only had them 1 day, will update review if I find and faults and will update biased on longevity

ProductName: Skechers Men's Cessnock Food Service Shoe
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    
I have larger feet, 12, wide.. so the clog type/rubber ones that are easy to spray and wipe clean are pretty tight on my feet, so I tried these.I just soaked and cleaned these ones before the photos, , they still look like new, they come scotchgarded (sp?) so nothing has stained them yet. They do get the odd crumb or speck of food in the knit fabric, but nothing has gotten stuck or embedded, or needed to really be scrubbed out. That is key, because I don’t wanna fray or cut or ruin the weave. I just use an old soft bristle toothbrush to flick anything out that fells into the in it weave.So I’m gonna get some more spray scotchgard from the store and continue cleaning them every 3-4 months or so, and see how long they last.But they look great, and are comfy for sure. I swap the insoles every few months also; it keeps my feet and knees from getting too sore.I enjoy these a lot. They also pass as normal shoes or sneakers.. so if you’re out in public you don’t have to feel too weird because most kitchen shoes look odd or bizzare lol.

ProductName: Skechers Men's Cessnock Food Service Shoe
Review: I bartend at the theme parks in Orlando and average 10 miles plus a day, 6 days a week. I have burned through three different pairs of shoes in the past three months, until I found these! The conditions I am in are high volume wet conditions, and my feet stay perfectly dry in these shoes. The soles have the perfect height to keep the shoe dry, without being bulky preventing one from tripping over their own feet.I have a wide flat foot, and these shoes have PLENTY of room in them. I wear a 12W and order the same in these. When I first put them on, they feel really loose which caused concern, but after wearing them a few days, I actually like the feel of the “looseness” as there are ZERO pressure points on my feet with these shoes, and they are snug enough that blisters do not form. The toe box feels longer than a 12, but like I just stated, my feet do not slide in the shoes and no blisters form. I AM IN LOVE WITH THESE WORK SHOESThe shoes actually look great as well. I find myself throwing them on when heading out for casual fun too. I NEVER leave reviews, but decided to in hopes others may see this and helps them buy these shoes for the same relief. Stay comfortable my friends
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 7 April 2023

ProductName: Skechers Men's Cessnock Food Service Shoe
Review: I work in food service and stand all day and run around like a maniac and these shoes are going straight into the dumpster out back. totally flat inside. no arch support, no bounce, no soft cushioned heel. Memory foam is maybe 1/8th of an inch thick so by the time you step on it its completely compressed with no benefit whatsoever, it'd be better without. I'm a size 8 and I ordered an 8, but it fits like an 8.5 so too loose. waste of my money.

Review: I’ve always bought my Skechers shoes from in-store and found size 7 (Australian and US) the perfect fit. First time attempt to order this item online has proved disappointing. While length of size 7 is adequate, the width is too narrow that only a third of my foot is able to get through inside the shoes. To avoid return fuss, we’re gifting the shoes to a sister whose feet are much slimmer and smaller.  The whole experience has unfortunately increased my personal aversion against online purchase specific to shoes.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: They are super for the gym, especially squats and deadlifts.I also wear them around the house for that barefoot feel.I'm not sure they will last long but time will tell.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: I use these for wading Saltwater flat fishing. Great traction, durable. Recommend.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Nice comfortable shoe. Good grip. However I have worn these out in 3 months. I have separate work shoes  so I would not say this worn down from excessive use. First time trying merrel barefoot, big fan of the hiking boots, but will not be trying the merrel barefoot shoes again. other barefoot brands have lasted a year plus in my experience.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Awesome barefoot shoe. I started wearing it a few weeks ago, and now I can't wear anything else. My foot loves these shoes. My foot gets to stretch and feel the ground. The sole is thin but very good quality, and with a nice grip. The upper is very good quality, and very breathable. I wear them outside and to the gym too. The fit is good. I'm a 45 in these and a 45 in Nikes too. In other shoes I'm usually a 44. I tried the 44 in these and it was too small. My feet are around 28.5cm long.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Son mis primeras zapatillas barefood y la verdad que estoy muy contento con ellas, son cómodas, se ajustan súper bien al pie y es como si fuera en calcetines. Las utilizo para diario y para entrenar en el gimnasio. Por ahora no se han roto y son transpirables así que el pie no suda. Las recomiendo para los iniciados al barefood.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: I went through about 10 pairs of Vapor glove 4’s. These are my second pair of Vapor glove 6’s.I have had many brands of barefoot style shoes over the years, including vivobarefoot, freet, xero, sole runner, vibrams etc and Vapor gloves have been my favourite. The downside is the durability, I was burning through the Vapor 4’s in under three months. The 6’s are no more durable than the 4’s and that is an issue considering the price but I have found durability with other brands to be even worse. The most recent purchases a made were xero prio’s, freet flex and vibe. I couldn’t possibly recommend the prio’s, I can’t understand why they are so highly regarded, the sole is extremely stiff in comparison to the Vapor’s, there may be room for the toes to wiggle but the sole doesn’t move along with them so the sole can effectively slap of the ground and the toes/feet follow, they don’t work in unison, they feel very clunky and the sole started to split from the upper after minimal use.The Vapor’s wrap around my feet and feel snug but don’t restrict the movement of my foot, more of a sock like fit so my feet don’t bounce around inside them causing friction and lack of direct feel of the ground like it get with other ‘barefoot’ shoes.Of course everyone is different, but for me these are the best.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 October 2023

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Hubby wanted a pair of minimalist shoes for his birthday so I went hunting. I came across these and we're pleasantly surprised by the cost and high ratings I ordered them for him and when he tried them on he was in love. He did a jog around our house a couple of times and was smiling from ear to ear. They have become his new work shoes, for an RMT they work great to work in without any blistering right away.  They help with foot distribution and back .He has purchased another pair since I ordered these.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Elles accrochent bien et sont très confortables.Pour le prix, j'ai eu une bonne offre. Dès lors, c'était ok.J'attends de voir la durabilité sur le long terme. Mais rien à redire à ce stade.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: I have and use/love Trail Glove 5's, and 7's, and Xero Mesa Trail, and now also these.  These are by far the thinnest sole and are so comfy.  I run on Rocky trails alot and these will get used for that about 1/3 the time because little bruises.  It's worth it, but I like to switch between all those options I mentioned as they're all amazing.  These are the cheapest available thing when they're $99CAD, so I can't recommend them enough.All that said, I've run in them on plenty rough terrain a few times and they seem fine durability wise, but can't yet speak to the longevity.  $99 gives the a little wiggle room there, not a ton though because they don't have $99 worth of material in them, not even close.Fit exactly like Trail Glove 7, exactly like Trail Glove 5.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: tengo varios pares de Zapatillas barefoot de varias marcas. Estas son seguramente las más cómodas. La relación calidad precio es insuperable. Comparadas con el model vapor glove 3 lether, el model 6 se las nota más cómodas y mejor acabadas, sobretodo en la zona que roza con el talón.La suela Vibram te permite sentir la sensación como si fueras descalzo. Ten en cuenta que en general las Merrell tallan pequeño con lo que debes pedir como mínimo un número más del habitual. Usa las tablas recomendadas por el fabricante midiendo tu pie.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Impossibile usarle in città,le minime asperità della strada sono avvertite dal piede.....fatto il reso.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Light. Soft. Follows the foots movements. True to size. Buy your normal size. I have normal foot, not wide, but I like the slightly wider toebox in a barefoottype shoe. Cool looks.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Très souples, qualitatives, confortables.Taillent bien, prendre un peu plus grand pour optimiser l'expérience du barefoot.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Comode ma estremamente economiche per il prezzo, meglio le Saguaro a questo punto

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: All the family use barefoot/vapor shoes by Merrell and always try to buy them when we can

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Die Schuhe sitzen perfekt (habe weder kleiner noch größer bestellt) und sie sind so leicht, dass man sie kaum merkt. Das Klima innerhalb der Schuhe ist auch angenehm, denn man schwitzt kaum. Die Sohlen sind sehr biegsam und rutschfest mit vergleichsweise tiefem Profil. Trotz der Leichtigkeit und Luftigkeit wirkt das Material relativ stabil und lässt sich leicht reinigen.Einzig die Schnürsenkel gehen immer mal wieder gerne auf. Diese sollte man gegebenenfalls durch elastischen Senkeln auswechseln, die man nicht binden muss.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Tread is separating at inner side of right shoe near big toe.  I've worn them indoors only for about 8 hours all together. The fact no exchange option is available and buyer has to pay return shipping means they already new.... ?Reviews show this has happened to others.I'm returning them.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Si estás pensando en pasarte al calzado minimalista, este sería el ideal para hacer deporte, es bastante cómodo y se ajusta muy bien a tu pie

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Zapatillas minimalistas muy parecidas a las versión anterior. De todas las zapatillas minimalistas que tengo , la mayoría son Merrel Vapor Glove (o Luna), ya que relación calidad-precio son las mejores para mi.Como digo, son semejantes a la versión anterior. Parecen tener la misma horma y la misma forma de suela. Sin embargo, la trama de la suela sí que cambia y creo que va a ser un acierto. Lo digo porque la versión anterior tenía una especie de "taquitos" que se gastaban. Las últimas veces que ha tenido que cambiar las Vapor ha sido por el desgaste de la suela, que acababa haciendo un agujero. Lejos quedan los problemas de rasgado de la tela en la parte del "upper" de las primeras versiones, que obligaban al cambio de zapatillas en pocos meses e incluso semanas.Volviendo a la suela, la de esta versión tiene una trama más homogénea que probablemente retrasará el desgaste.Otra cosa a tener en cuenta es que al ser un calzado muy bajo es fácil que entre agua al pasar por suelos encharcados. Versiones anteriores intentaban mejorar este aspecto añadiendo una suerte de "parches" plásticos en los laterales. Sin embargo, estéticamente no los encontraba muy acertados. En esta versión, aunque la solución es la misma, han mejorado mucho y quedan más equilibrados con el diseño de la zapatilla.La "tela" de la zapatilla sí que ha cambiado mucho y, aunque es más bonita, no parece que vaya a ser tan resistente como la de las versiones anteriores. Parece que esta tela vaya a rasgarse con facilidad si se engancha con algo, cosa que no pasaba con las Glove 4, que tenían una "tela" realmente fuerte.Yo he comprado estas zapatillas en color negro y lo cierto es que me gustan mucho. Quizá sea por el color, o por el cambio de "tela", pero me dan la sensación de ser más agresivas y deportivas que las Glove 4 (más parecidas a las Saguaro). Otro cambio es que está versión tiene el cordón redondo en lugar de plano. Me gusta más este cordón y espero que la forma redonda no provoque que se desaten. Lo único que no me ha gustado, y es precisamente de los cordones, es que son demasiado largos y, siendo más gruesos que los anteriores, se ven demasiado incluso atados.En general, estoy muy satisfecho con la compra. Las zapatillas son tan o más cómodas que las anteriores y se adaptan muy bien al pie. El número és el que uso habitualmente en las Merrel (44'5), aunque me quedan un poquito más grandes que la versión anterior.Para mi, que siempre uso zapatillas minimalistas, y a la espera de la resistencia de la tela, es una compra muy recomendable.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Wirkt gut verarbeitet, die Schuhsohle ist biegsam und"klebrig" so dass man guten Halt auf hallenboden/fitnessstudio etc hat.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: These are my first barefoot style shoe and I'm in love! They are very comfortable.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Got these for my 14 year old runner. He loves them. They have enough structure and support but are good barefoot shoes. His feet are a little wider than typical and he says they are very comfortable. They feel like a glove. They would probably be too narrow for my other child who has wider feet.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 18 December 2023

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: You really do feel more muscles engaging when you walk, love em.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Vom Prinzip her ein guter Schuh, sehr leicht und bequem, ausreichend Platz im Zehenbereich und gutes Feedback des Untergrundes  aufgrund der dünnen Sohle...Aber...die Haltbarkeit der Sohle ist ein Witz. Die Sohle an einem Schuh ist nach zwei Monaten normalem Gebrauch durchgelaufen, die Sohle des anderen Schuh ist kurz davor. Somit sind die Schuhe nach nur zwei Monaten nicht mehr zu gebrauchen, was für einen knapp 100 Euro teuren Schuh inakzeptabel ist.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Las utilizo para el gimnasio y estoy encantado con ellas, nunca había utilizado de este estilo y son muy cómodas

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Had multiple pairs of zero bottom shoes but on these ones the rubber was so thin it was nearly impossible to run on any rocks at all.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Me gustan

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Las uso para el gimnasio y me encantan. Ono se sienten y su comodidad. Repetiré cuando se me rompan estas.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Ta llevé las vapor glove 4. He de decir que mi pié mide 27.5. Siguiendo la guía de tallas, la correspondiente era la 43.5, pero me venían un poco grande para mi gusto, así que esta vez compré la 43 y creo que he acertado.Las utilizo sobre todo para realizar entrenamiento funcional o calistenia. El contacto con el piso es total y la libertad de movimientos muy grande.Alguna vez me las he puesto para salir por la montaña, pero en rutas cortas o llanas, sin demasiadas piedras.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Son unas zapatillas muy buenas. Hice un rodaje de unos 15 km a ritmo medio y hoy unas series de velocidad sostenida. Encantado con ellas. La pagué 67 euro. Me parece un precio ridículo considerando su calidad, con suela Vibram. Tengo unas Saugaro, también con ellas estoy contento, aunque creo que estas son algo mejores. Tengo unas Groundies Active de 120 euro (costan como la Merrel y la Saugaro juntas) y no valen en calidad, servicio al cliente de la marca, y comodidad, ni la mitad.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Después de andar 4-5 meses en sandalias per una lesión, se me hizo imposible encontrar unas zapatillas que me fueran hasta que encontré estas.Muy satisfecho con el producto

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Se adaptan muy bién a tu pié.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: A quien le guste el calzado minimalista le encantarán. Ya tenía otras de la marca con drop cero aunque con algo de amortiguación. Estas no tienen nada. Es como ir descalzo. Solo hay que tener cuidado con caminos de piedad porque se clavan en las plantas de los pies.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Estaba buscando unas zapatillas barefoot que no tuviesen q ser five fingers y estas son ideales.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: The vapor golves 6 are a solid barefoot choice, but a bit on the expensive side for what they are. The QA does not seem to be very good. In my case, the front sole of the left show was a bit deformed, and after a few days it does not look like it will revert back to the 'regular' shape.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Estoy encantado con ellas. Muy resistentes y flexibles

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Ajuste perfecto para mi pie, que es bastante normal, no demasiado ancho.Utilizo estas zapatillas tanto por asfalto, como por caminos de tierra e incluso por montaña. Estoy acostumbrado desde hace tiempo a correr con zapatillas minimalistas.Es una zapatilla muy flexible y ligera, sin acolchamiento. A mí me encanta para distancias hasta 10 km; una gozada.En terrenos de montaña técnicos tengo que ir despacio, con cuidado, porque el zapato ofrece poca protección, pero me gustan las sensaciones y corro sin prisas. Se agarra muy bien en terrenos secos. En mojado no lo sé porque no ha llovido en mi zona.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Tengo las Glove I desde hace aprox. 10 años y aunque estan destrozadas todavia siguen manteniendo intacto el empeine. Con estas me da la sensacion que la tela se acabara rompiendo. Son muy comodas, como un guante y ligerisimas...vamos, como no llevar nada. Buena sensacion de suelo y contacto total. La puntera algo mas estrecha que las antiguas Glove y eso se nota si estas acostumbrado a calzado minimalista.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Até agora 5 estrelas. Só espero que a durabilidade seja melhor do que aquela tenho visto aqui em algumas fotos.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Comodísimas y muy transpirables

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Ugly, but cool ugly imo. Comfy and light. Good without socks.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 4 January 2024

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Son muy cómodas, si hay que los materiales provocan mal olor si las usas de forma continuada

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Ich war schon immer ein Freund von Schuhen ohne Absätzen und dünne Sohlen. Also war es mal an der Zeit das Phänomen Barfussschuh auszuprobieren.Ich habe die Schuhe Mitte Juni bestellt. Promt geliefert bekommen. Ausgepackt! Vom ersten Augenblick war ich begeistertbegeistert. Auch wenn man sich an die veränderte Belastung  erst mal gewöhnen muss, haben Sie hervoragend gepasst, waren bequem und boten ein tolles Laufgefühl.Aber nach knapp 2,5 Monaten hatte ich das erste Loch in der Sohle. Das ist mir für das Geld zu wenig, und setzt mit Augenmerk auf Nachhaltigkeit auch kein gutes Zeichen.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Son muy cómodas , se siente la libertad del pie. El único problema es q lleva cordones. Por preferencia personal me fusta más las gomas con su tensor

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: Update: bereits nach 2 Monaten moderater Nutzung ist das Profil praktisch komplett abgelaufen an einer Stelle. Dass es sich schneller abläuft als bei normalen Schuhen ist klar, aber der Gummi taugt garnichts. Nichts mit "Vibram ist ja so toll"Meine Wander Stiefel haben auch Vibram und die werden wesentlich mehr und öfter beansprucht und sehen nach 4 Jahren immer noch aus wie neu. Für das Geld finde ich das etwas unverschämt.Auch die älteren Modelle von Merell sind WESENTLICH Verschleiß-resistenter.Die Schuhe hatten direkt ab Auslieferung einen Herstellungsfehler. Einer der Gummis in der Fußkante, der zum Schutz vor Abnutzung dienen soll, ist nicht richtig verklebt.Die Schuhe fallen etwas kleiner aus. Ich habe normal zwischen 42.5 und 43 und die Größe 43 war mir zu klein, da bin ich immer mit dem Fußzeh vorn angestoßen. 43.5 passt ganz passabel.Mit dem Gummi hat man unfassbar guten Grip, allerdings sorgt die Musterung dafür, dass man sämtlichen Dreck vom Waldboden etc förmlich aufsaugt und sich alles richtig schön rein hängt und nur mit ordentlich Stampfen wieder ab geht..Die Zehenbox ist für meinen Geschmack etwas zu eng für Barfuß Schuhe. Ich habe keine sonderlich unnormalen Füße, aber mein kleiner Zeh wird minimal eingedrückt. Das war bei den Vapor Glove 3 nicht der Fall.Alles in Allem ist der Schuh aber bequem und das, was ich erhofft / erwartet hatte. Ob der bei dem dünnen Gummi länger als ein Jahr hält, ist fraglich, wir werden sehen.Auf Grund der schlechten Verarbeitung und des meiner Meinung nach viel zu überteuerten Preises ziehe ich aber zwei Sterne ab. Gibt leider kaum Alternativen auf den Markt. Und die, die es gibt, sind meistens auch nicht gerade günstiger.

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: I've been trying to find a cheaper option compared to Vivobarefoot and Wildlings shoes that also last a little bit longer and I think these are it. So far they have been great and have amazing traction. I put a small insert so my foot would fit a little bit better as it was a little too big. These are lighter than Wilding shoes which to me is impressive and I am very happy with.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 15 October 2023

ProductName: MERRELL
Review: I was looking for a barefoot feel and have been wearing Merrells for many years.  I'd never tried the Vapor Gloves but they was exactly what I was expecting.  I wanted some lightweight and felt like I wasn't wearing a shoe; this delivered.It felt like a sock with extra sole protection and that's what I wanted.

ProductName: adidas Performance Runfalcon
Review: Las zapatillas adidas Runfalcon 3.0 son decentes en general. Tienen un diseño clásico y una combinación de colores básica que podría funcionar bien con diferentes conjuntos. La calidad de construcción parece estar bien, y la marca adidas suele garantizar un cierto nivel de durabilidad.Sin embargo, en términos de comodidad y rendimiento, no son nada excepcionales. La amortiguación y el soporte son promedio, lo que podría no ser suficiente para actividades intensas como correr largas distancias o entrenamientos intensos en el gimnasio. Además, algunas personas podrían encontrar que la talla es un poco ajustada o ancha dependiendo de la forma de su pie.En resumen, si estás buscando unas zapatillas básicas para un uso casual o ligero, las adidas Runfalcon 3.0 podrían servirte. Pero si buscas un rendimiento óptimo o comodidad durante todo el día, es posible que quieras considerar otras opciones dentro del rango de precios similar

Review: I ordered my usual size - an 8, and these are literally SO TIGHT across the toes. I'm probably going to return or resell these, there's just no point in trying to break them in.The seam on the far left and far right rub across my poor pinky toes. The toe area seems shorter than usual as well, no wiggle room at all.The soles don't flex well like they used to, and the tongues are SUPER OVERSTUFFED.I've worn DC shoes for literally a decade and I can't begin to express how disappointed I am by the brand in general. Did my sizing research and got the correct size. I always have DCs. I use them for work and every day. They are the most comfortable shoes I've ever had. FINALLY pink ones. I'd say the width is a tad smaller and isnt as chunky but super happy with the purchase.

ProductName: DC
Review: I love this shoe! I want to address some things I have read in previous reviews. The shoe is a little more narrow towards the toes than what I myself was use to (Compared to older DC's I own). The lip on this particular shoe is fatter/thicker than older styles. The fit is true to size for me. I ordered an 8.5 and it fits perfect minus it being a little narrow. I read that these were not real DC's or they were knock offs. Prior to ordering this pair from amazon I ordered directly from DC a different pair. These are REAL DC's! The pair that came from DC directly is also made in Vietnam, have the same logos/markings inside and out. I am not sure where people are getting that they are not real. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase! If you have any other questions regarding this shoe, send me a request for review!

ProductName: PUMA Men's Tazon 6 Cross-Training Shoe
Review: The PUMA Men's Tazon 6 FM Sneaker is a top-notch athletic shoe that combines style, comfort, and performance. Crafted with 100% synthetic leather, this sneaker boasts a contemporary design with a seasonal fracture graphic that adds a modern touch to your workout attire.These sneakers have reliable padding. Whether running or training, the stable cushioning provides exceptional comfort and support, and you can push yourself to the limit without worrying about discomfort or foot fatigue.The sleek and streamlined silhouette of the Tazon 6 FM Sneaker is visually appealing and ensures a snug fit. The synthetic leather upper and midfoot saddle provide maximum comfort and support, allowing you to move freely and confidently during workouts.Furthermore, this sneaker excels in shock absorption. The EVA in the heel effectively absorbs impact, reducing the strain on your feet and joints. This feature is particularly beneficial for those who engage in high-impact activities like running or jumping.In terms of quality and durability, PUMA has once again delivered a top-notch product. The synthetic leather material is not only stylish but also built to last. The rubber sole provides excellent traction, ensuring stability and preventing slips and falls.The PUMA Men's Tazon 6 FM Sneaker is a must-have for any fitness enthusiast. Its contemporary design, reliable padding, sleek silhouette, and shock absorption capabilities make it a standout choice. Whether you're hitting the gym or going for a run, these sneakers will keep you comfortable and supported throughout your workout. Invest in the PUMA Tazon 6 FM Sneaker and experience the perfect blend of style and performance.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 18 July 2017

ProductName: PUMA Men's Tazon 6 Cross-Training Shoe
Review: These are my second pair.I was gutted when I found most suppliers were now not stocking these particular trainers any more, so was really fortunate to find these available in my size.I personally think these are more a casual/fashion trainer rather than for running, based on the construction and weight of the material used in the soles.The white, black, and silver colour scheme looks great in my opinion and because of this they are a bit different to the usual stuff on sale.Very comfortable bit a bit heavy feel if you want them for active sports use. Size wise I take a 10.5 in most brands and these were bang on, and on a par with most Adidas and Nike shoes I usually wear.My first pair have lasted a year and with careful use and regular cleaning they still look pretty good with little wear or signs of rips, tears etc, but I liked them so much I started the hunt for a new identical pair.If you like them good luck in finding any in popular sizes, many sellers were out of stock in December when I was looking.Overall-  Good fit, size as expected, comfortable fashion trainer. May even grab a third pair while I can still get them.....

ProductName: etnies Men's Jameson 2 ECO Skate Shoe, Dark Blue, 11 Medium US
Review: I recently purchased the Etnies Men's Jameson 2 Eco sneakers and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. These sneakers are not only stylish and versatile, but they are also eco-friendly, which is a big plus.The sneakers are made from recycled materials, including recycled rubber outsoles and recycled plastic in the laces and eyelets. This is a great step towards sustainability and it's wonderful to see a brand like Etnies making a conscious effort to reduce their environmental impact.In terms of comfort and performance, these sneakers are top-notch. The foam insole provides excellent cushioning and support, while the padded tongue and collar add an extra layer of comfort. The grippy rubber outsole also provides good traction and stability, making these sneakers a great choice for a range of activities.What I appreciate most about these sneakers is the sleek and simple design. The black and gum colourway is timeless and can be paired with a variety of outfits. The embroidered Etnies logo on the side adds a subtle touch of branding without being too flashy.Overall, I would highly recommend the Etnies Men's Jameson 2 Eco sneakers to anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable option for everyday wear. They are eco-friendly, durable, and provide excellent comfort and support.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 March 2023

ProductName: Heelys
Review: Huch, was ereilt mich denn da eine Woche früher als angekündigt? Meine Heelys sind ja schon da! Und ich freue mich RIESIG!Ich hatte als Teen welche und bin damit echt viel geskated. Ich habe diese Schuhe so geliebt und war unglaublich traurig festzustellen, dass nach dem Umzug lediglich Rollen und Werkzeug noch vorhanden waren. Nach etwas Bedenkzeit habe ich mich endschieden die schicken Dinger hier nochmal zu kaufen und ich bereue NICHTS.Ich hab normalerweise Schuhgröße 40-41, die 42 passt allerdings perfekt, da sie bisschen kleiner ausfallen. Ein Stern Abzug gibts für 1 Schnürsenkelpaar wo 1 Nadel fehlte, was das durchziehen etwas schwierig gestaltete. Da ich ihnen aber eh grüne Schnürsenkel verleihen möchte, geht das mal ohne weitere Beanstandung durch ;)Hoffentlich gibts die Tage nicht noch paar mehr Überraschungen, aber auf den ersten Blick scheinen sie stabil verarbeitet zu sein. Ich freue mich wieder ein bisschen Nostalgie zurückbekommen zu haben :)

ProductName: Heelys
Review: My boy has a blast with theses shoes!

Review: Exelente material, calidad, diseño, tal como se describe. Llego antes de tiempo

Review: Love the shoes but my teenage son feet change quickly have to return 😞

ProductName: Heelys
Review: Die Schuhe kamen pünktlich an und funktionieren soweit auch gut. Allerdings war die Sohle sehr sehr schlecht verarbeitet und teilweise gar nicht richtig befestigt. Die schwarzen Stellen an der Sohle waren kaum festgelegt und hingen lose am Schuh. Ich habe die Schuhe dann selber nochmal kleben und fertig. Machen müssen, alles andere hätte mir zu lange gedauert, der Versand hat schon lange genug gebraucht. Also sowas habe ich noch nie gesehen.. 2* aber dafür dass der Schuh ansonsten gut funktioniert und spass macht.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: These shoes are probably the most comfortable dress shoe I’ve ever worn. I work 9-10 hour shifts on my feet in a grocery store and have been looking for comfortable shoes for years. Unfortunately these are not designated as slip resistant, but I’ve found that even when wet on slick floors they don’t slip. The leather is soft which prevents the crinkled look where the foot bends and also keeps the top of the shoe from hitting and rubbing the toes when bending. They seem to be extremely high quality and I can imagine I will get my moneys worth out of them.

Review: クッションの衝撃吸収力が高く、体重があるので、膝や腰にも負担が少ないように思います。

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: These are great shoes and well worth the money!  They feel good, look great, and are extremely well made.  Several other reviews mention size, and they do indeed run large.  I am a solid 12, so I ordered the 12-12.5.  They were way too big so I exchanged for the 11-11.5 and the fit was perfect. I plan to buy another pair in a different color,  and  I highly recommend these shoes. Your feet will thank you!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 22 January 2020

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: They fit ok one the foot but toe area is long with empty space..the heel is super stiff and has been bothering the heck out of my Achilles. It rubs and rubs I thought it would go away with breaking them in but no, this is the only thing that kills me but they are comfortable, squishy footbed..I can not return after wearing them so I am disappointed spending so much.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Amazing shoe for long days at work, very comfortable.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: I spend most of my life in comfortable shoes (trainers or approach/walking shoes) and generally hate having to wear uncomfortable 'dress shoes' on those odd occasions when I have to wear a suit. These hybrid ECCOs have, however, changed this, as they are are smart enough to be worn at any formal occasion, whilst also offering up the comfort and support generally associated with sneakers/trainers/walking shoes.Also very impressed that they are Gortex lined and therefore sufficiently waterproof for the wet London streets.Happy to recommend!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 January 2024

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Los zapatos son de calidad premium. Pero posiblemente por no ser de México los 25.5 cm que dice que es son un poco más grande,mi número porque no da la opción de 25,las opciones son: 24 a 24.5 y 25 a 25.5 . Todo lo demás 10Gracias

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Great shoe. Love it!
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 July 2023

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: My second pair from this series. Super comfy and looks great.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Fit’s like a glowFast shipping 😊

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Schon die zweite paar bestellt, sehr zufrieden.Qualität könnte noch besser sein bzw. länger dauern, aber für die preis ist top!

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: They are comfortable, but the toe box is too long. You need to be more careful when you are walking with them, the LONG toe box makes it easier to trip.Overall they are a good comfortable pair of shoes.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 25 November 2023

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Chaussures qui s'est abîmées au bout de trois semaines, laisse une coloration bleue sous les pieds, confortable au bout de 2 semaines , n'est pas extraordinaire non plus. Chaussures qui ne respire pas je déconseille

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Dessa skor har en ny typ av sula som är mjukare och har mindre stabilitet. Det gör att höft och leder får arbeta på annat sätt. Som följd fick jag obehag och smärta efter gått i skorna i ungefär en vecka. Jag kan inte använda skorna. Köp inte dessa skor om du är över 40 år och väger mer än 100 kg.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: These shoes look classy and have a very sturdy sole, and they fit me perfectly.  I don't know how long they will last, since I just got them.  But for looks, style and fit, five stars.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 3 January 2024

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Exactly as expected. Wonderfully comfortable shoes.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: I selected Ecco as required the ultimate quality and comfort. Comfort didn’t disappoint but a day after wearing the sole has failed…..really really disappointed

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Really light and comfortable . Used them for city break right out of the box and they were instantly comfortable.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 May 2023

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: very comfortable and supportive shoe with the ecco premium insole

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Immediately on removing the shipping wrap, it was clear there was a problem. The box was was torn and the product label scraped off. Examining the shoe, it was clear by the wear on the outsole and dirt on the base, these shoes had been worn. The uppers had a couple of scuffs. They are going back.I've owned multiple pairs of Ecco shoes and continue to go back to this brand. The issue here is not the shoe per se. It's the inconvenience and disappointment of dealing with a product that should not have been shipped as new.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Sehr schöne Schuhe , leider für mich zu eng !Danke.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: I bought these in August last year and after a month or so of normal wear, the soles started separating from both shoes all around. This is now letting water in. Not what I expected from a pair of Ecco shoes.WARNING!!! Since the shoes are NOT covered by ECCO Manufacturer's Warranty you cannot claim against any defect outside the 30-day window. In other words, DO NOT BUY ECCO SHOES from Amazon.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 February 2023

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: quality style beautiful run large for me normal 10.5 , 44 size bought 10-10.5 too big , returned reordered 9-9.5 . double size fit scale is confusing , I might be in between update to follow . ( the reordered size was 80$ cheaper :).)

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: The most comfortable shoes that I have. I purchased Brown and immediately followed up with Black. I am a school administrator which means I walk all day. I have narrow feet. That being said a friend brought the same shoes and he said he struggles because he has wider feet.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 10 January 2024

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: There was a bit of trepidation since it was an international order but I commend the delivery experience of Amazon and the quality of the product that was delivered. I was fortunate to get it at lower than its usual price on Amazon which was almost 40% lower than what I would have paid at home for the same pair.Coming to the shoe, I am a UK10 and this pair fit me comfortably. I have worn them for some time now and found them to be comfortable without requiring time to break them in. Happy with the purchase.

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: I read the reviews and they suggested ordering one size down. I did that and the shoes were too small. The bad part is that I had to settle for a return vs. an excchange and now the shoes will cost me more, $80 more, before tax. I dont find it fair that an exchange was not possible.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 2 February 2024

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Really comfortable, great for walking good stability. Probably i would probably dispute the trainer description, but the photos are there to be seen.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 June 2021

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: I'm a fan of ECCO shoes. They are well constructed and made with premium materials. This particular pair, though, ran slightly large and were quite heavy in weight. I also had a hard time with their overall price. I own two other pair of ECCOs and they have never worn out. Hard to beat this brand of shoe.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 2 January 2024

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Excellent service
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 28 January 2024

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: I tried these shoes on in a Dept store and they were very comfortable.  I purchased on Amazon and my first wear was torture. I’m hoping they just need to be broken in because if not, it was a major waste of $175 on shoes.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 28 November 2023

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: I ordered this shoe in my size and it’s a bit bigger than what I need and it is very stiff to break in since I wore them I could not return them. I may try a size down, but this is an expensive proposition as I was hoping for more comfort for my feet.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 23 December 2023

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Very nice and comfortable
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 13 December 2023

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Everything is fine. But I know the main secret of ECCO shoes. They are not stored for long. They have a guarantee of up to 10 years. And then you have to wait until the sole begins to deteriorate. It probably took you less time from production to consumer? We have ECCO stores, but there were a lot of negative cases; they probably sat in the warehouse for a long time.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 7 October 2023

ProductName: ECCO Men's ST1 Hybrid Plain Toe
Review: Both look good and are quite comfortable. Appropriate sizing. Very nice shoes.
DateOfReview: Reviewed in the United States on 5 December 2023
